111.title: Louis

choices: When he first meet Tiana and Naveen.
When they arrives in New Orlence on the flood boat.
1112.content: More specific, when in the movie?
1112.title: During the movie

11122.content:
Our heroes were on their way to Mama Odie. Tiana and Naveen had heard from the fat, trumpet playing alligator named Louis that she was the one that could help them become humans again. He was also the only one who knew where she lived. At first he didn't want to help them get there because it was scary, but after Naveen said too him that if he got transformed into a human as well he decided to lead them to her.

Louis felt a bit stupid not figuring out this himself. He loved playing jazz and wanted to be able to play it for the humans. They had always been scared for him (being that he was an alligator.), and never really letting him show them what he could do. He knew that if he only was human they would love him. He also knew that Mama Odie had all kind of magical abilities. So he couldn't get why he hadn't visited her himself before? 'Anyway' he thought, 'Now it's my time. I'm going to become a human and fulfil my dream.'

When they reached Mama Odie's home (that was the wreck of a boat in a tree.) Mama Odie told Tiana and Naveen how they must 'dig a little deeper' and look for 'what they need instead of what they want.' She also sang it in a big song number with gospel singing birds. After that it was Louis turn to talk to Mama and tell her what he needed help with. He told her he to needed to be human so he could 'play with the big boys'. But all Mama Odie said was that he to needed to 'dig a little deeper' and he would find everything he needs. He wanted to ask her some more but he saw that she had sat down in her chair and fallen asleep.

Louis didn't really get what she had said to him, and thought about something different. During the time he had spent here at Mama Odie's home he had seen that she has a big stick that worked like a magic wand. In the musical number he saw her use it to turn her pet snake Juju into a dog, pig, cow and goat. He had also seen that she had a bathtub that was filled with gumbo. He had seen that it to had magical powers.

'Are you coming with us Louis?' Tiana and Naveen asked Louis. 'We need to get back to New Orleans before midnight if we are going to break the curse.' 'Yes I'm coming soon.' Louis replayed. 'I just need to do a quick thing. You can go first. I reach up with you quickly.' 'Okay.' The frogs said and they leaved the house.

'At least one of those things should be nice shortcut for me to reach my goal of becoming a human.' Louis though for himself. 'All I need to do is to be quick and stealthy while she's asleep.' Louis thought looking at Mama Odie sleeping in her chair. 'But what magical item should I choose?
11122.title: When they visit Mama Odie

111221.content:
Seeing what magical powers the stick had Louis decided that it would do. "I just hope Mama Odie doesn't get mad on me for this." Louis thought to himself. "I mean I'm not going to steal it, just barrow it for a short time. But if I want to take it without Mama Odie noticing it I have to be quick and stealthy'. But being an almost obese alligator made it pretty hard for Louis to be stealthy. For every step he took the floor would made cracking sounds, and he could also feel the whole boat house tilting a little because of his movements. But still he could see how Mama Odie just sat there snoring. 'Must be a really hard sleeper.' Louis thought.

After many careful but noisy steps Louis was finally in reach for the stick. He saw how Mama Odie was holding it in a tight grip while sleeping. He leaned forward trying to reach it. But just as he was close enough to grab it, Mama Odie pulled it away from his paws.

Louis looked up to her face and saw'
111221.title: Bad robbery

1112211.content:
Even though she was blind and had glasses on, Louis knew that she was now awake and staring at him.

Louis, (who had thought this was such a good idea before) now felt like he had made the biggest mistake of his life. How could he have thought this was a smart idea from the start? Try to steal something from someone that he had clearly seen had the ability to control magic didn't sound like such a great plan anymore.

He was sweating and shivering by fear of what was going to happen to him now. Louis didn't do anything else but breathing heavily, Hoping that by standing still Mama Odie wouldn't be able to see where he was standing. But his hope was quickly crushed.

'So you tried to steal from me?' Mama Odie said. 'And now you think that by just standing still I wouldn't know you where still standing there. I can clearly hear that you're still here.' Louis made a nervous gulp in respond.

'I can hear you're a big fellow too,' Mama Odie continued. 'By how big sounds you're breathing makes, and by how your fat belly touches the ground every time you breathe out.' Louis stop breathing and looked down too see how close to the floor his stomach really was. He took and pulled it in a bit just too try to prove her wrong. (Even thought Mama Odie wouldn't be able to see any difference.)

'It's too late to be silent now Mr. gator, I know where you stand and I will teach you lesson too make sure that you and you're fat greedy fingers never even thinks about stealing again!' Mama Odie yelled and throw a magical spell right against Louis.

All he could now was to hope that for a miracle.

The spell hits him and a big smoke cloud surrounds him.

When the smoke disappears Louis is'
1112211.title: A not so nice wakeup.

choices: Louis tries getting himself up again to look for food.
Tiana and Naveen finds and discovers Louis' new appearance.
11122111.content:
After the smoke had disappeared, Louis looked down at himself and had been shock of his new appearance. His stomach had became twice it's size, his arms were packed with more fat and had been heavy to pick up, and as for his legs...he couldn't see them.

He could hear Mama Odie laughing, knowing what had happen to him. "Don't be stealing any of my things you hear! Now scram! Or else I'll make you bigger!"

Fearing what else could happen to him, Louis, who struggled to get on his feet, hurried out of Mama Odie's home. As a result, he broke through her open door and fell down to the water below, creating a big splash.

Louis quickly swam to nearby land and once he set foot out of the water, he collapsed on his back, breathing heavily, due to the result of his larger appearance.

Looking at his new round belly, Louis said, "Oh! Why did this had to happen?" He tried getting himself up, but failed to.

"Now I can't get up! What else can happen?" Suddenly, his belly rumble of hunger.
11122111.title: A blob form of himself.

111221112.content:
Meanwhile, the two frogs and firefly were making their way back to New Orleans. At one point, Tiana realizes Louis hasn't still returned from Mama Odie's home. She mentions this to Naveen and Ray, and asks to head back to check if he is fine.

The three friends backtracks to Mama Odie's home. Upon arriving the blind old women's home, they notice the front entrance seemed...broken, as something big broken in or out of the home. The three were worried and hoped both Louis and Mama Odie are OK.

The three rushes toward Mama Odie's home, until Ray spots something off from the water. He flies closer, and is shocked from what he sees. Flying back to the two frogs, he informs them of what he saw, in which he drags them to. The two frogs also sees something on the offshore of the water. It seemed to be an animal. Its two legs were under something...round? But it didn't took long to realize who it was.

The three hurries and when they got closer to the animal, their first guess was correct: it was Louis.

Tiana questions of what happened and Louis responds, "Mama Odie. She did this to me!" The three, especially Ray, couldn't believe in what Louis had just said.

"Are you sure?" Naveen asks.

The overweight alligator nodded his head. He explains of what happened back at Mama Odie's home and how he got his new size appearance. Even after telling the truth, the three still couldn't believe in Louis' story. Mama Odie did this? they though. It couldn't be.

Tiana asked if they can return back and see if Mama Odie can turn Louis back to his original size, which the overweight alligator disagreed. He didn't want to go back and he worried Mama Odie would not transform him back to his original size.

With this decision in hand, they decided to...
111221112.title: Tiana and Naveen finds and discovers Louis'...

choices: Suck up all the water he touches."
Gain a pound each five minutes."
11122112.content:
When the smoke disappears around Louis he couldn't believe what he saw. He had still the same body. He didn't know if something went wrong with Mama Odie spell, or what it was. He just stood still and silent and looked at Mama Odie. She was acting a bit confused.

'What happened? Did I hit you?' Mama Odie asked out to the silence. Louis thought of this as his way to escape from her, and started to act like if he had been hit.

'Oh, ooooooooh, ooooooooooooooooh!' Louis cried out in pain and rolled on the ground, holding his stomach like if he had been shot there.

If Mama Odie could have seen now she would have died of laugh of Louise's bad overacting. He made so much effort in looking like he was hurt (forgetting that the woman he was doing it for was blind) that his screaming didn't sound so serious all the times.

As he was faking his injuries Louis started to back toward the exit of the boat. Finally he reached to a part of the boat where the hull was missing. 'The swamp is just down there.' Louis thought. 'All I need to do now is to make a nice final, and then I can escape her.'

Louis made sure to really act like this was the end for him, and finished by falling of the boat with a scream of death.

With a big splash everything went silent afterwards. Underwater Louis decided that the best thing to do now was swim back to the frog, and act like nothing happened when he was left with Mama Odie. He also decided to stay underwater while swimming for as long as he could hold his breath, just to stay hidden while near the boathouse. 'Even though she can't see I don't want to take any more risks with her.' Louis thought and started swimming away.

From her chair that she had been sitting the whole time Mama Odie could hear the big alligator swim away. When she couldn't hear him anymore, she let out a big laughter for herself. 'Ha, ha, ha. Oh my. I haven't heard such bad acting in all my life! He really thought that with over 100 years of magic casting that I would miss such a big target. What he don't know is that the spell I cast on him doesn't work right away. But soon he will'
11122112.title: Just like he was before.

"He would gain a pound each five minutes" mama oldie says then she laughs "that will teach him to try to steal from me" before going back to sleep

Four minutes later Louis was still swimming in the water he is still scared that the spell that she put on him will work "oh man I hope that spell doesn't work" then he thinks "hey, the spell has not work why should I be worried" after he saids that it feels like he is getting heavier then he goes toward the surface of the water he says "wow! Is it me or did I put on a pound. He looks at his belly "must be my imagination" then he chooses to take a nap and by the time he woke up he will feel a lot heavier and one more thing the spell has the ability to make the person sleep for a really long time.

How long do you want him to nap
111221122.title: Gain a pound each five minutes."

He was transformed into another animal.
1112212.content:
Louis expected Mama Odie to be glaring angrily at him. Much to his surprise, however, she was still sound asleep, and had simply rolled over a bit.

"Wow, she sleeps like a rock," Louis said aloud. He quickly clamped his paws over his muzzle, hoping and praying that she wouldn't wake up after hearing that. Thankfully for him, she didn't. He sighed a breath of relief. "Jeez, she wouldn't wake up if you screamed in her ear. Now then, time to borrow her stick. I'll give it back when I'm done."

He gently slipped the stick out of her hand. "Yes!" he quietly cheered. He then waved it around a bit, crossing his fingers in the hope that this would work. Then he tapped himself with it.

*POOF!*

When the dust cleared, Louis found that...
1112212.title: Heavy sleeper indeed

11122122.content:
Louis coughed loudly. He then roared with confusion. Wait...roared? He looked down at himself and realized he was covered in thick, messy, brown, fur. He felt his face. Instead of a thick, scaley, snout. He had a wet, fat, nose. He felt the top of his head. Ears. EARS. EARS!!! Plush, furry, rounded, ears stuck up on the top of his head. He wiggled his tail. Instead of a long tail that dragged on the ground behind him. Louis had a short, stubby, tail.
Louis's nose twitched.
His tail shook.
His newly found longer fangs were bared.
Speaking of "bared", HE WAS A BEAR!!! Louis roared in shock and stumbled backwards into the bathtub loaded with gumbo. The overweight bear tried to shake it off of him and stand up, but when he stood he slid right back into the bathtub. He knew that the magical stick would help him transform back into his fat, gatory, self. He just needed a way to get out of this magical bathtub...
11122122.title: He was transformed into another animal.

111221221.content:
Louis knew that there was only one way to get out. Eat. He had done a lot of eating before, as you can plainly see, but this would have to take all of his eating strength to get out of the gumbo-tub.
"Alrighty" Louis said. "If I wanna be me again, I'm gonna have to risk my weight." He crawled onto all fours and started to slurp the soup. He felt the cold liquid splashing on his face as if saying "Bad Louis!".
After a while, Louis realized something he realized that-
111221221.title: Eat his way out

choices: the gumbo starts to do things on it's own!
the magic in it would force him to gain weight after ten minutes of drinking it
111222.content:
Louis eyed the gumbo. It looked the most promising since Mama Odie was asleep and clutching the wand tightly. He could get away with taking a sip of gumbo without waking her up.

The overweight alligator tiptoed towards the massive pot of gumbo, but each dainty step still warranted a loud creak from the flooring because of the huge, scaley mass on top of it.

Once he reached the pot, he dipped a finger in an brought it to his mouth to taste it. His eyes lit up. This was good stuff! Whether it was magic or not, he wanted more!

So he haphazardly buried his alligator muzzle into the pot, drinking straight from the wondrous liquid. He drank and drank and...
111222.title: The Gumbo.

choices: Let him get filled until she felt he was all done.
Let him have ALL the magic that is stored inside of it.
1112221.content:
As he was taking big gulps of the gumbo in the tub Louis suddenly felt how the thick sticky stuff that was the dish was getting a lot more "alive" in some strange way. Wanting to pull out Louis tried lifting his head out of it, only to find that he couldn't!

Trying to fight his way out Louis could feel how the gumbo was not only holding his face in a tight grip, but also forcing itself into him. He only wanted to have a few sips of it to try and get some of it's magic, and now he was getting the whole huge tub forced down into him. He could feel how it was starting to feel up his stomach, and how even it's huge size was feeling to small for this. He could quickly feel it getting filled to it's limbs, and it started to get a little painful.

"What's going on here?!" He heard a familiar voice say. Looking up with his eyes Louis could see that all the noise of him trying to break free from the cursed thing had woken Mama Odie up from her sleep. "Help!Iamstuckinthisthing!" Louis tried to shout with his mouth being stuffed and force-feed by the gooey gumbo. "I can hear that you couldn't let my gumbo be alone, you just had to take a small sip didn't you?" She asked, sounding like she was expecting this exact thing to happen. Even thought Louis knew that she was blind he still gave a very limited nod in response. "You are probably wondering what will happen to you now my fat friend?" She asked, poking his gumbo filled belly, making him moan in pain a little.

"There is one of two scenarios going on here." She said, with Louis listening carefully. "Either I broke you free from this curse now and leave you with all this extra weight that you got, or I will let you eat it all and let you consume the magic that it contains and make you it's new host."

What would Mama Odie let happen to Louis?
1112221.title: the gumbo starts to do things on it's own!

11122212.content:
"Since you wanted to use magic to change yourself, I will let you have ALL of the magic in the gumbo for your use." Mama Odie said, and left Louis for his destiny.

Feeling like he was at a big family reunion where everybody had made something they wanted him to eat Louis could feel that his body might not be able to fit all of this food. He could see that the gumbo as disappearing at a quick pace, but he could also feel just how much quicker his body was expanding to take it all in.

When his stomach felt like it wasn't able to expand anymore he could feel how his chest, arms, legs, head, butt, and even tail was getting filled up by the magic liquid. Pressing down at one of his arms with his thick claw hand Louis could feel how his whole body now felt more like a water balloon in context. With every movement he made he could both see and feel how his whole body was shaking up like a big piece of jelly.

But he wasn't done yet. After he managed to consume all of the gumbo Louis could feel something strange happening in his stomach. He could see that something was starting to glow inside of it, and it was starting to shake on it's own without him moving at all. "Uhm, what's going on now Mama Odie?" Louis asked nervously as the shaking started to spread to the rest of his body. "After the gumbo has found it's host it will start making it's keeper a true user of it's magic." She said. "And what does that mean?" Louis asked as even the strange glow was starting to spread all over him. "That it right now goes down into you and sees after what kind of magic fits someone like you. Basically it means if you are a good or a bad person, or in your case gator." She said.

But something that Mama Odie hadn't thought about was if Louis really was a good guy deep down inside. Once the magic was settled Louis could feel that his body was now starting to get filled with...
11122212.title: Let him have ALL the magic that is stored insid...

choices: Since he'd been gluttonous with the gumbo, it thinks his goal is to be fatter
111222121.content:
Once all the gumbo was inside Louis, he staggered backwards, and stood up straight. His belly stuck out far in front of him, bulging a good 7 feet in front of him. He would've explored the rest of his bigger body, but he had other things to worry about.

His colossal gut was still quaking roughly. It didn't hurt, but it was odd feeling all that gumbo inside of him shaking so harshly. "But...I'm a good gator right!?" Louis asked worriedly.

"We're going to find out in a moment or two" Mama Odie said, curious herself to see what the result would be.

Abruptly, his body stopped shaking. Then, it glowed a bright white before turning back into the dull, greenish light it had been before. "I see," Mama Odie said. "It seems you are a good gator, but there is still magic inside of you! That magic will make you reach your goal. But you can't choose the goal. The magic will guess what it thinks you need and then it'll force you to achieve it."

"But Mama Odie, why can't I just make it change me into a human?" Louis asked, not really listening to what she'd just said.

Just then, he felt another low rumble throughout his entire body. It shook his gut, arms, legs, thighs, butt, and even his face wiggled! But it was short lasted. "I believe it just decided what it wants to do to you." Mama Odie said.

"What is it?" Louis asked scared, but was soon answered by his body.
111222121.title: White Magic.

choices: Every ten minutes! And they'll get worse every time
Every time you eat or drink something! And it'll change with how much you ate
1112221211.content:
The bright light shown again, and disappeared just the same. Louis then felt himself...getting even bigger!?!?

But this time, he wasn't getting full, it seemed he was getting to be more fat instead of filled with gumbo.

"Mama Odie, what's happening to me!?" Louis asked, freaking out.

"It choose your goal. Since you were gluttonous and decided to drink the gumbo, it thinks your goal is to gain weight. So now, all that gumbo is turning into fat. But don't worry, the magic will be inside you all your life! The magic won't get converted into fat."

But all that did was make Louis more worried. This stuff was going to try and make him fatter for the rest of his life! Granted, he'd always been a "girthy gator", but his weight was all in his stomach before. Even though must of his fat still took shelter in the blob of a belly, the fat was spreading elsewhere.

He wasn't used to having such a big pair of hips! They jutted far out to the sides, further accentuating his pear shape. He watched with his own eyes (although his vision was a bit hindered by his huge, chubby cheeks) how his chest ballooned out into two round man boobs, each one as big as his head. His tail was a useless, fat triangle, sitting heavily on top of his monstrous rear end. His short, thick legs weren't long enough to lift his rotund, rounded rump, which in turn, dragged on the floor. His legs were spread far open to accommodate for the huge wrecking ball that was his belly, the thighs underneath, although unseen, were plump and blubbery. He couldn't take one step without having his thighs and belly rub together intimately.

It was slow and steady, but his temporary weight gain had ceased...for now.

"I'd say your body fits that greedy mentality now," Mama Odie commented on his new sheer size, "It looks like you'll gain weight in small segments like that. It seems you'll get one of those...
1112221211.title: Since he'd been gluttonous with the gumbo, ...

Lets him continue to grow for a while.
11122212111.content:
"About every ten minutes." Mama Odie said, sounding like it wasn't important to be specific about it.

"Every ten minutes?!" Louis said shocked, and started to panic a little.

He already felt like he was at the limit of what his body could cary, and if he got another gain burst he would definite end up to fat to even move.

He immediately started to try and walk over to Mama Odie to try and make her help him, but found just how heavy and fat his body really now was. He was used to having his big belly and big tights making it hard for him to walk on his hind legs, but it was nowhere as challenging as it was now.

He couldn't see his legs and feet at all with his gigantic gator gut blocking all kinds of view that wasn't straight forward to him, and it also was hanging down so much that he couldn't move his legs forward more then a few inches at a time.

His legs themselves where also much more harder to work with then before. It felt like he was trying to walk through a swamp of thick, sticky tar, and it had a strong grip on his legs with every step.

He also felt unusually sweaty and out of breath from walking the short distance of "around the bathtub", had the gumbo really made him this out of shape?

As he's almost there he can feel a now familiar shaking going on in his body. "Oh no! Has it already been ten minutes?" He thought as he tried his quickest to get to Mama Odie. Right as he's just about reaching out distance Louis could feel his legs giving up on him, and sending him falling straight on his big belly.

"Please Mama Odie, help me! I will soon not be able to even move my ridiculously huge body!" He said pleading for his life, as he felt his body starting to grow again.

Mama Odie takes a moment to think about it and...
11122212111.title: Gain every ten minutes!

choices: She makes him lose just enough weight to be able to walk again.
She makes him grow bigger at a faster pace.
111222121111.content:
With a snap of her fingers Mama Odie made the shaking and the growing of Louis's body stop.

Looking up at the elderly blind woman Louis looked more confused then ever and asked. "How did you manage to take away the gumbo magic? I thought that it was above even your skills."

"Well, it wasn't that hard to do it. Since there never existed anything as stupid as Gumbo magic. It was all a part of my own magic this whole time." Mama Odie said, barley able to keep a straight face as she was so proud over how she had managed to trick the now very overweight gator.

If Louis's extra chins wasn't blocking him, he would have had his jaw dropped to the floor. "Y-You mean that this whole time, the gumbo coming alive, the glow to determined if I was good or bad, and all this extra weight was something that you made on purpose?!" Louis asked, and Mama Odie simply replied "Yes." "But why?" Louis asked. "To teach you a lesson. You tried to steal from me, even after I told you that no magic has the key for you to find what you desire." She says, sounding very upset and disappointed in both his actions and that he still doesn't seem to get it.

"So...What will you do now?" Louis asked, feeling a bit nervous over what the answer will be. "It all depends..." Mama Odie said, putting in a small pause in her sentence. "D-Depends on what?" Louis ask, feeling really scared now. "On what I think you deserve for your recent actions." Mama Odie said before doing some waving with her walking stick that also serves as her magic wand.

Louis could feel that her magic was having some form of effect on him, but what kind?
111222121111.title: Disables the magic that is inside Louis.

As she was casting the spell, Mama Odie tripped on the aligator's expanding underbelly. She gasped. Instead of Louis himself, her spell had hit is enormous butt. Louis cringed. He felt the stinging spell hit his two bathtub-sized buttcheeks.
First, silence. Then, the Louis-quake returned. Then, his butt started to grow bigger than his gut which compared to his buttocks was growing like a snail.
Without any hesitation, his ass skyrocketed into the ceiling. The two montserous cheeks tried to break it. They were pushing, and shoving, and becoming thicker every second. His obese blob of a tail was growing as well. Bigger, and bigger, fatter, and fatter, faster, and faster.

CRAAAAAASSSHHHHHHH!

Louis knew this was just the beginning. He felt himself stretch and grow-out. Until-
111222121111221.title: Butt

choices: By consuming more food and get fatter.
111222122.content:
At first there was a white aura glowing from Louis's big belly, shining brighter and brighter. But then something happen.

All of the sudden the white light was replaced with a sudden darkness, and even thought Mama Odie couldn't see she could still feel how the warm summer evening that it was now instead was replaced with a uncomfortable coldness. Louis could see the how his otherwise green skin was now starting to take a much more black skin-colour. He could also see that on some parts of his body he was starting to get green neon glowing signs all over it. (I say some parts because he couldn't see some places because of his limited vision.) It was things like bones on his legs, elbows arms legs on his arms, ribs on his chest, and a bunch of little symbols making up a circle on his belly with a big skull in the middle. Even his face had it's own skull-like "tattoo" covering Louis's face. (A bit like Dr Facilier at the end of his song "Friend On the Other Side") It was pretty hard to recognise after that transformation.

"What have I done?" Mama Odie asks scared.

It had all just been suppose to be a big joke towards the huge alligator. To have him get the magic gumbo into him, and having him get all it's magic was just going to be a way to later take back the magic and hopefully have teach him a lesson on that he only needs to be himself. But this had just taken the worst possible outcome that she could have ever imagine. Louis had not only manage to take complete control over the magic, but he had also turned it into pure black magic. He was evil, and with complete control!

"Soo," A very demoic and dark voice that kinda sounded like Louis's said. "Looks like the gumbo knew I was really evil inside, and wanted to help me get it outside as well." He said grinning evilly towards the frighten old blind woman and her pet snake Juju. "I can feel it inside. All the power!" He shouted and charged a huge magic blast from his fist, making a big hole in the roof of the boathouse.

Mama Odie and Juju tried to discreetly walk away through the main entrance behind Louis, but just as they where about to leave Louis turned around and said "You aren't going anywhere." With some powerful steps Mama Odie could ensure that the evil voodoo magic had also helped Louis get some extra strength in his legs, since he sounded much more balanced when he walked, despite him still being very overweight. "I have secretly craved for this power a long time, and now when I finally got I want you to give me more!" "B-But how will I be able to help you?" Mama Odie asked, scared for her life.

Louis thought for a second on her question. He got this power by eating of the magic gumbo. It was the combination of it being very fattening and magical that unlocked his powers, but he only wanted to increase it the most logical step should be...
111222122.title: Black Magic.

choices: Go to the second big magic source, Dr. Facilier.
To find his little frog friends, and eat of their magic curse.
1112221222.content:
By consuming other people's magic Louis would be able to increase his strength to whole new levels.

Looking back at Mama Odie he licked his lips and said "I hunger for your magic."

Mama Odie knew she had to do something. Trying to flee was pointless as the big gator was blocking the main exit out, so all she could do was to try and fight back. She could feel that the fat reptile had much more powerful aura surrounding him (Proving he was much stronger then her already.), but she had to at least try and give him a fight.

Louis started walking towards her (His steps making the whole houseboat shake.), and Mama Odie tossed a few light flares towards him. Louis simply waved one of his fat arm flabs, and sent the flares in other directions away from him.

"Oh No." Mama Odie said as she tried backing away, but found herself walking into a corner. (Her fears had made her completely lost how even her own home looks like.) This was it now, and she knew it.

"Time for my meal." Louis said, and started his eating. The weird thing was that instead of simply eating her like he would have done when he had been himself, Louis instead uses his dark voodoo magic to make Mama Odie's own magic leave her body in a bright yellow glow. (Almost like he was eating her soul.) The magic then instead of going into his mouth, circled around the gator a few times before going straight into his belly, making it grow a few more inches as is took the magic for storing.)

Looking down he saw how Mama Odie was laying on the floor very weak. (Having all of her magic drained made her really feel all of her 197 years come to her.)

Louis could finish her since she was so weak, but he thought that she wont be any treat for him in her state. Instead the gator focused on what his next goal would be. He wanted more magic so he could grow more, and get even more powerful.

After some thinking he decided that his next magic eating should be...

1212.content:
Baloo loved India's moist and warm weather: the perfect excuse for bathing in rivers and mud ponds! But, eventually, play time comes to an end....

That year, when winter came, the weather got REALLY cold, much colder than usually!

Baloo felt the primordial instinct to go in hibernation, like all the bears of the world, but it was his first time. He didn't know how to do!

So, he asked to Hathi how a bear can go in hibernation.

"Well, I remember a story of an Elephant who worked in a human circus long time ago..." Hathi started. "Please, make it brief..." Baloo thought: he knew when Hathi began speaking it was almost impossible stop him. "He had as partner a bear who spend many winters in nature. When he asked him how bears could survive in winter, the bear told him: 'Simply eating a lot, then sleeping for three months!' That's all, Baloo! Devour all the edible stuff you can find and put on yourself as much weight as possible!"

"Oh my goodness....This is a dream coming true!!!" Baloo shouted happily, then, he ran in the jungle to begin his food research.

"How can I start ? So many good things to eat, so few time...." Baloo thought about it for some minutes, then he decided to....

choices: He get's captured by monkies, who thinks he would look funny with a big belly.
He needs to become fat to be able to defeat a bigger foe.
1223.title: Or...

12232.content:
As Bagheera was walking around patroling the jungles he found someone that looked familiar, and yet not. What he saw was something that was both bigger and wider then anything he had ever seen before. It stood with it's behind against him, giving him a look at just how much of the things body was fat.

It had two very enourmus buttcheeks that both gave away a very big shake with every step the creature took. It's legs where also covered mostly in fat, being so wide that just one of them would be wider then Bagheera's waist. It was almost funny seing how small the creatures feet was compared to the rest of it, "I guess they don't grow with the rest of the body." Bagheera thought. Something else that hadn't grown so much with the rest of it's body was it's tail. It looked thicker then a normal tail should look, but it wasn't so much different in size compaird to the rest of it's body. Taking a very wide step with one of its legs Bagheera caught a glimse of the big sagging belly that the creature spotted. It was so big and round that Bagheera almost got mesmerized by staring at it. But got out of the trance when he saw the creature was about to walk into the sunlight.

They were both hiding in the shadows, but it seemed like obese creature hadn't noticed Bagheera spying on it. Getting itself out of the bushes and into the clearing Bagheera was about to see what it was, and much to his surprise it was...
12232.title: The thin underdog.

122321.content:
"Shere Khan." Getting so taken away by the surprise of seeing the long lost bad guy of the jungle return and being in this condition, made Bagheera whisper the words to himself loud enough for Shere Khan to hear. Turning his fat body around Bagheera could see that even his face had been fatted up. It was much more round and thick, and his neck was so fat that it made his head look like it was sinking into the rest of his body.

Spying with his eyes around Shere Khan started to search the area for any intruders. Bagheera was hiding in a small bush that he couldn't escape from without Shere Khan seeing him. He could only hope the trembling terror wouldn't find him.
122321.title: The terror returns fat.

1223212.content:
As Shere Khan was looking around his surroundings, Bagheera sat dead silent as he kept himself hiding in the bush. Even thought he was still a bit older since seeing Shere Khan last time, Bagheera would still be considered fit and in good kondition despice his age. Still he decided to keep himself hidden from Shere Khan instead of running away from him, and that's because he knew Shere Khan. He was the most feared and deadliest predator of the jungle for a reason. And even though he looked like he wouldn't be able to take 20 steps before gasping for air, Bagheera knew that you should never, ever underestimate Shere Khan.

Seeing though his hideout he could see Shere Khan while still searching after the mystical sound he heard, started to move away in the direction opposite the one where Bagheera was. Seeing Shere Khan walk was just like the walk of a rhino, only with Tiger fur instead. Even though Shere Khan dissapeared from his sight, Bagheera decited to keep himself hidden some more just to be safe.

After hiding for around an hour Bagheera finally took courage and dashed out of his bush, and in opposite direction of where Shere Khan had gone. As he was running through the jungle Bagheera thought about what to do now. Shere Khan was back and needed to be stopped. The question was who was going to be able to stand up against such a colossus?
1223212.title: Safe, for now.

choices: He finds something magical near the watering hole.
Something delicious catches his eye right off the plains.
12232121.content:
Bagheera knew there was no time to lose - if he didn't work to stop Shere Khan now, there would be no guarantee that anyone else would be willing to do it. Plus, in the wasted time it would take for him to rally the troops, the titanic tiger would have a chance to do... well, do whatever he did to get to this point again.

The panther knew it was his time to shine, but he was reluctant as well. How far would this go? And how would he even get that big?

"Well, there's no time to waste," he thought to himself, and set out dashing to Shere Khan's old haunts around the jungle to find out how the tiger managed to become so large. After some searching...
12232121.title: Himself. (Fat Bagheera)

choices: Climb up into one of the trees.
Takes a deep breath and hide underwater.
122321211.content:
Gathering enough courage Bagheera turned around and dashed of in the same direction as Shere Khan had done earlier. If he was going to be able to defate him he needed to figure out just how Shere Khan had manage to become so big. "He can't just have gained everything naturally, there has to be another reason to it." Bagheera thought.

Getting back to the same place where he had spotted Shere Khan in the first place Bagheera started to regret not following him immediately. All he had to go on now was one direction that just lead into more jungle. "Sigh" "If my own cowardliness is going to be the reason to why Shere Khan wasn't stopped, I'm never goign to forgive myself." Bagheera thought as he started running deeper into the jungle.

This whole area of the jungle was well known to be Shere Khan's personal place. Everything was much more darker and tightly grown together, making it the perfect place for a tiger to jump out and take it's prey. The whole place made Bagheera feel so weak and vulnearble. Even thought he know that Shere Khan now looked like he wouldn't even be able to hide behind an elephant herd without getting spotted, Bagheera still felt that the tiger could still suddenly apperar and attack him if he wasn't careful.

As he reached an open area Bagheera saw something that looked interesting. Hidding in a small valley surrounded by big thick trees laid a small water pond. As he walked closer to it Bagheera could feel that it had some kind of a magical sphere about it. Looking down into the water he didn't see anything strange about it, except that it looked to be really deep because he couldn't see all the way to the bottom of it.

Still getting this weird attraction to it Bagheera was almost on his way of tasting the water, when his ears picked up the sound of someone approaching. It could only be one other living thing that knew about this place, and that was Shere Khan.

Quickly trying to find a way to hide Bagheera takes and..
122321211.title: Searching for the fat source.

choices: The tree branch he's on snaps.
Something big slams into the tree he's on.
1223212111.content:
Quickly Bagheera took and started to climb up one of the trees next to the pond. Just as the creature almost had arrived to the place Bagheera took and laid still on one of the tree branches.

Just like he thought it was Shere Khan, waddling towards the pond. He could hear him starting to rattle off what sounded like a made up language, and the water suddenly started to glow strongly. It was so bright that it almost made Bagheera blind.

Concentrating on looking at Shere Khan, Bagheera saw how he started to drink of the water, and what effects it had on his body. Bagheera looked in awe at how the water was making Shere Khan grow, not only in fat but also in lenght. That was something Bagheera hadn't notice before but when he first saw Shere Khan earlier he had been taller then him. The fat had been hiding it some what but now he saw it clearly. The pounds started to pile on as Shere Khan's chins became thicker, his belly more hanging, and his butt wider. His legs started also become taller, and so did his waist. When he was done he looked like he had added another 100 pounds on his frame. His added muscles in legs and back helped him making moving the body so much more easier.

As the walked of Bagheera waited until he was absolutely sure he could get down wihtout being notice. That's when something horrible happen.
1223212111.title: The fountain of fat.

choices: Shere Khan, staring him in the eyes.
Nothing, but he heard Shere Khan was on his way back.
12232121111.content:
Just as Bagheera was on his way to get down from the tree and take a closer look at the water while it was still glowing, he suddenly heard a cracking sound. Realizing to late what it was, the branch holding Bagheera snapped and the black panther found himself falling down towards the glowing water pond. "I wanted to take a closer look, but not like this!!!" Bagheera thought as he made impact on the water.

When in the water Bagheera found out two things about the water and the pond. It was much more deeper then it looked like, since he had sank down at least two meters and still hadn't hit the bottom, and the second, much more important thing, was that you didn't need to drink the water for it to have effect. You only needed to be in contact with it, and that was something Bagheera was now experiencing first hand.

As he was floating around he could feel his whole body starting to change. How his limbs was getting thicker and shorter, and his belly getting bigger and rounder. He could also feel how his adding weight was starting to pull him down, away from the surface.

Getting really panicing now Bagheera started to try and swim with his overweight body to prevent him drowning. His movements were really jerky and the constant gaining he was getting only made things worse, but to a sheer miracle he managed to get his front paws above the water, take a grip on the ground, and drag his super fat body up on dry land.

Rolling over on his back the black panther huffed and puffed as his big, wet, sweaty body was resting after his near death experience. He understood now why Shere Khan had only been taking these weight gains in small parts before. It was to help his body adapt to it better.

Looking around trying to see if this whole incident had created any attention, Bagheera saw...
12232121111.title: Surviving the fatness.

choices: Uses his weight to bully Bagheera around
Uses his weight to knock Bagheera into the pond
122321211111.content: Shere Khan, the massive tiger, was within ten feet of Bagheera, eyeing the panther disdainfully. "I see you've found my secret pond," the tiger hissed. Looking Bagheera up and down, the bigger cat's eyes suddenly flashed, like he had come up with an idea. He then began to charge toward Bagheera, slow but steady, and gaining speed quickly, and before the panther had a chance to move out of the way Shere Khan...
122321211111.title: Shere Khan, staring him in the eyes.

choices: Bagheera is forced to drink some of the water
Bagheera is bullied again and then is thrown into the lake
1223212111111.content:
Shere Knan impacted his gigantic girth on the reletavly smaller belly mass of Bagheera. Shere Khan then lowered his head to eye contact with Bagheera to talk to the large panther "well,well,well what do we have here? If its not our old bud Bagheera" Shere Khan then gave a small unsetaling smile to which Bagheera could only "gulp" in response.
" And look our panther gained a BIT of weight" Shere Khan only exclaims as he pokes the large girth of the panther. Bagheera only whaches on as he is to terrified to even move an inch, complete contrast to the massive tiger who walks around impesionatly and wobbles his mass for added girth. "Oh I have plans instore for you Bagheera" as he turns to the panther grinning.
1223212111111.title: Bullying the panther

choices: Shere Khan loses his balance and falls in as well
Someone comes by and distracts Shere Khan
1223212111112.content:
...body-slammed the panther as hard as he could. Considering his weight, the tiger was able to get to a decent speed before knocking Bagheera straight into the pond.

"So you thought you could use my pond against me, eh? Well, enjoy it all you want, then!"

Bagheera was knocked clear underwater, and it took him a few seconds to gather his bearings. Beginning to gain weight again, the panther quickly tried to swim to the opposite side of the pond, only to find the fat tiger standing in his way when he reached the edge. Panicking, Bagheera started gasping and flailing. This did nothing but speed his gaining as he started taking on mouthfuls of the water when he did so. He could feel his body expanding further and further, though luckily it no longer seemed to be dragging him downward. Still, though, the panther's movements were slowly starting to limit themselves, so he knew he had already gained at least a few hundred pounds.

Bagheera swelled continuously for the next few seconds, looking for an escape route, when...
1223212111112.title: Uses his weight to knock Bagheera into the pond

12232121111122.content:
Suddenly Shere Khan got bombarded with small rocks and fruits!

Looking up in the trees the two felines saw a bunch of monkey's sitting there laughing and mocking them both, or to be more correct the Tiger.

"Get away you worthless little bugs! Can't you see I'm in the middle of drowning my enemy in his own fat..." Shere Khan growled just when one of the monkey's threw a slightly bigger and heavier rock right into his face, knocking off a fang.

Looking at the lost fang on the ground (and feeling a taste of his own blood in his mouth) made Shere Khan really loose it, and he charged towards the tree the monkey's where in with all his powers.

The monkey's quickly saw the danger approaching, and jumped of to other trees next to the one the Tiger was on attacking.

ROAR!!!!!!

Shere Khan was beyond furious as he looked up trying to see where the monkey's had taken off.

"Try to catch even one of us if you can, fatty." The one of the monkey's said and then they all spilt off into several different directions.

Only having revenge on his mind Shere Khan left the pond area in order to try catching any of those annoying monkey's.

As soon as the Tiger terror had left Bagheera could finally get up from the pond, but not without some troubles.

As he had been stopped from getting up by Shere Khan for such a long time the Black Panther had now gained probably about 250 extra pounds on his frame.

He now both looked and felt like how he thought Shere Khan must feel like. (Even thought the Tiger still was slightly bigger then him.) He didn't like the way he looked now, but he didn't have time to think about it. he had been given a short time to escape now from the monkey's, and he was pretty sure that they had not just come to annoy Shere Khan for fun. He was pretty sure that the had been sent there as a distraction. The only question was "How had sent them?"

The answer for that was soon to be revealed to him, for as soon as he lefts the well hidden Pond area he was faced by...
12232121111122.title: Someone comes by and distracts Shere Khan

122321211112.content:
Looking around he didn't see anything, but he knew that all the noises he had made would probably make Shere Khan coe back, and he couldn't even think about facing him before he had have time to get use to his new body.

But getting away wasn't going to be as easy as it sounded. The whole place was surrounded by steep walls and thick trees, and the only entrance in and out was leading to a very open area that would make him very easy for him to be spotted by the tiger.

Looking around he saw that the lowest tree branches was very, very thick. They looked strong enough to be able to hold his weight. "I guess not only animals gets bigger by this water." Bagheera thought as tried to get himself up, which prooved to be much harder then he thought concidering his new weight. After putting all four legs in place Bagheera counted to three and managed to lift himself up. He now stood 2 feet higher and was taller then before, but he also had around 400 pounds of extra weight on him.

Not wanting to waste anymore time Bagheera took and waddled up towards one of the trees. Looking up he saw that there was a pretty thick branch that was stretching itself all the way to the edge of the steep walls. "It's worth a try." Bagheera thought as he gathered strenght and jumped up to the closest branch. The branch was about as thick as his own legs, and surpristingly it held his weight. Not wasting any time Bagheera took and climbed branch after branch, until he reached the one that was going to be his ticket out.

As he made himself ready to carefully walk out on it he heard the sound of Shere Khan almost being there, so not having much time to think Bagheera took of and tried to run across the branch. Hearing the sound of this branch starting to snap as well lead to Bagheera to take a big chance and try to jump to the edge. Just as he jumped the branch gave away by his weight and feel to the ground. In midair Bagheera tired to make himself as long as possible to be able to reach for the edge, and luckily for him he did it. He only got half his body on it, but thanks to his belly holding so much weight it helped to keep him on the ground while dragging the rest of his body up.

After getting up he turned around and saw Shere Khan entering the place once again, this time looking more furoius and terrifying by the fact that someone might have found his secret place and use it on themselfs. Not wanting Shere Khan to find him Bagheera took of and started running back to his familiar area in the jungle.

Getting completely breathless after running only a couple of feet and then walked the rest of the way, Bagheera thought he needed to find somebody to help him train his body to be able to get in fighting shape against Shere Khan, and just as he thought about it he happen to run into a friendly face.

Who does he run into?
122321211112.title: Escape the place.

choices: Have Baloo train him how to move his fat body.
Have Bagheera lead him to the fat fountain.
1223212111122.content:
Not seeing where he was going Bagheera felt his face getting pressed into something soft and warm. Taking a few steps away he could see he had walked into a very familiar gut. "Hey Baggy!" He heard the voice of his bear friends say. His voice sounded normal but when Bagheera took and looked at his face he saw that the bear was as shocked of Bagheera's new shape as he had expected.

"What has happen to you?" Baloo asked after a long moment of silence. "To make a long story short I wanted to find out what the source for Shere Khan's sudden weight gain was, and I literally got deep into it." After taking in the answer Baloo said, "I think I would like to hear the long version." "Fine." Bagheera sighted after a moment, (He really didn't want to go into the details of how he had very clumsy ended up in the pool when the water was still giving effect.) and as he got to the part when the branch he had been on snapped Baloo couldn't help but laugh. "Ha, ha, hah! So you just feel down into the stuff that could make you gain a hundred pounds in a second? I'm surprised you can still walk."

"And that's the reason I tried to find you." Bagheera said, "If I want to stop Shere Khan in my state I need to learn how to move with all this extra flab, and that's when I though..." Bagheera stopped before finishing his sentence seeing the how the otherwise joyful bear was starting to get upset. "Thought what?" He asked with his arms crossed over his chest. "Well...You seemed to very experienced with moving around with a well packed body." Bagheera said carefully not wanting to cross any lines.

Baloo kept his serious face for a while before getting back to his always happy mode again. "In that case let's start making up a plan then." He said walking over to Bagheera. Once near he started to feel on the panther's flab (Making Bagheera blush a little) and asked, "Is this fountain you speak about still active?" "Yes, I think so. Why?" Bagheera asked. "Well, I got two idea's here. Either I train you on how to use your extra weight to your advantage in combat, or you can take me to the fountain to let me take a swim and then help you in the fight." Baloo explained.

"What do you choose?" He asked, and the answer was...
1223212111122.title: Baloo.

choices: 4 hours. (Baloo gains 8000 pounds and is stuck)
7 hours (Baloo gains 14,000 pounds, butt and belly are the only things visible)
12232121111222.content:
"Well, where'd you see this, uh, fountain?" Baloo questioned intently, "In the plains on the brink of the forest," Bahgeera worriedly replied, "Just head North, we don't want Shere Kahn to become any bigger!" The slightly pudgy Bahgeera ran off into the North forest, while Baloo trotted along behind him. Bahgeera found it harder to jump or even to run at all, he knew he was fat, but he knew he wasn't out of shape. Sometimes Bahgeera would get stuck in a log he thought he could fit into, so Baloo would have to break the log in half to let him free, this happened TWICE. Stones and tall plants were harder to doge as well for the panther, his now tubby paws would narrowly miss landing on the plant or rock, and would often end in a face plant or stubbed toe.
After thirty minutes of trecking.

THUD, THUD, THUD. ROAR!

The chubby duo heard this as clear as day, so they knew they were close.
"Oh my, he sounds b-b-bigger!" Bahgeera stammered, "You don't think he gained weight do you?"
"He sounds about 2000 pounds overweight to me." Baloo replied, trying to be serious yet funny.
The thought made Bahgeera cringe, "This isn't a time for jokes! He could become larger than the jungle, plains, AND desert for all we know!" He took a second to calm himself down, "You stay here, unless he finds you of course, but till then, DO NOT MOVE."
Then the panther, forgetting about his extra weight, tried to climb a tree next to the pair, making the tree snap in two and fall over, creating a loud BOOM, that Shere Kahn was destined to hear.
Bahgeera eyed the tree with disgust, "Oh come on Baloo, it WAS a small tree..." Then,

THUD, THUD, THUD, THUD-

Baloo looked at Bahgeera with worry in his eyes, then grabbed the big kitty with all his might and started to run. Bahgeera struggled and fought, but Baloo was surprisingly strong. Then after a while of tumbling through the forest-

THUD, THUD, THUD, "I SEE YOU BALOO!" A voice boomed from all the way across the forest, Baloo froze, he looked around and saw no orange, black, or white.
"He must of gained more!" Bahgeera exhaled, "Yeah, about 500 extra!" Baloo shouted, then he took foot again, running faster with the large panther in his arms. "I can run you know!" Bahgeera scolded, "Just because I'm fat, doesn't mean I'm immobile!" Baloo let Bahgeera down. "Yeah, and it doesn't mean Kahn is either!"
The two dashed far until they didn't hear any roars or 'thuds'. The two were hot, sweaty, and exhausted. They walked for at least another half mile until-
"Baggy, do you see what I see?!" Baloo exclaimed excitedly.
"What Baloo?! I'm not interested in another fern just so you know." Bahgeera cranking replied.
"It's none of that, it's WATER!" Baloo shouted as he cannonballed into the small pool.
Bahgeera was splashed by the playful bear.
"Wow, it's surprisingly deep in here, but it's very narrow. It could fit like, two animals at the maximum!" Baloo took a big gulp of the water, and another, and another. "Water has never tasted so good!" The bear rejoiced.
"Yes Baloo, it's water, now the more important thing we have to look out for his food! While you're lazing away, I'll be looking for some fresh fruit or meat or SOMETHING!" Bahgeera, was not very happy at all with the bear's sudden laziness, he began to walk away in the other direction. He looked behind him to see the sloth-like bear. "Is it just me, or has Baloo gained 50 pounds himself?!" Bahgeera mumbled to no one in particular, "Oh well, that's nothing some nice fruit can fix. But will he get captured by Kahn?! Maybe Kahn will eat him! After all, he is very tubby bear...No, he'll be fine, I worry to much, after all, I'll only be gone for-
12232121111222.title: Have Bagheera lead him to the fat fountain.

choices: Get help - Baloo will know what to do
Get bigger - with a few more swims, he could take on Khan
1223212112.content:
Not wanting to be caught by the tiger who was easily three times his size, Bagheera surveyed his surroundings, only to find there were no hiding spaces close enough for him to reasonably get to before the large THUDS he kept hearing - though they weren't getting louder, but simply staying the same volume. His only chance to get away would be to dive into the water, swim across the bottom of the pond, and hide behind some trees on the far side of the lake.

Not wanting to waste any more time, the black panther quickly held his breath and dove into the lake, which was just as deep as he had expected. However, as he took his first major stroke through the dark water, he felt a sudden shimmering sensation take hold of his entire body. Not understanding what was going on, the panther quickened his pace, swimming across the pool, dashing out the other side and ducking behind his targeted trees all in about 15 seconds.

Taking a breather as he dripped dry, Bagheera ducked out from behind his hiding spot, expecting to see the tremendous tiger he was afraid of. Either the tiger saw him and ran away or had only come close - he couldn't hear any footsteps, so the panther assumed he was safe for now, and laid down to take a breather.

Until he realized that he had hit the ground much earlier than he had expected.

Bagheera had always prided himself on his lithe figure, perfect for stealthily protecting his domain without being seen nor heard. However, when he looked down, the panther saw his skinny frame had become noticeably less so. Where there were relatively straight lines on his haunches, some folds had developed - they weren't quite twice as thick, but they were noticeably fatter. The same went for his belly, as his small waist had expanded outward an easy six inches. Walking back to the pond, the big cat noticed just how big he had become - it was noticeable from the small of his back to his very cheeks. Bagheera was nowhere near the size of Shere Khan - the tiger naturally had a hundred pounds on him, and even with his new gain making up that ground, Bagheera still paled in comparison. Although he was now bigger, meaning he could stand up for himself if necessary, the tubby black cat still needed to figure out what to do next.
1223212112.title: Takes a deep breath and hide underwater.

choices: He tastes the water to see its exact effects

He wasn't worried about himself as much as he was the others... well, not that much - he was a bit concerned about how much magic was in the water itself, and how big he would end up, but for now it was time to take action.

Seconds later, that same sensation the big cat had initially felt quickly returned, though now that he knew what was happening, the cat didn't panic. Ten seconds passed, then fifteen, and the pond continued to work its magic. As Bagheeera treaded water underground, he could feel his body, his arms, legs, back and stomach, slowly swelling with the magic fat, enveloping his natural form. He could feel himself quickly swelling as the weight added itself rapidly. He swam underwater for a second and then tried to use the momentum from going up to get him on land, only for that to fail when his paws slipped. Finally, the panther managed to grapple his way out of the water...

122321221.content:
As Bahgeera thought, he heard a familiar, friendly, voice. "Hey Baggy!" Said Baloo.
Startled, Bahgeera jumped into the air and landed in a tree. "Ugh...*facepalm* *mumbles* Hello, Baloo..."
Baloo let out a quick laugh, and shook the tree so hard the Bahgeera fell back onto the hard ground with a small 'thud'. "So uh, Baggy," started the already tubby bear, "Why 'ya out here in the middle of nowhere?!"
"We live in the middle of nowhere, Baloo..." Bahgeera said with little patience and personality.
"Ha, oh yeah. Say, have you heard the Sheer Khan is back?! He has returned for YOU Bahgeera, he wants revenge on you for bringing in Mowglii! He also said he wants to fight!"
Baloo said matter of factly.
"Baloo, I just saw him! And he was- different- to say the least. But- that's why you're going to help me. Hey, where did you hear all that info from anyways?"
Bahgeera replied.
"Kaa of course- oh..." Baloo stated realizing he was hypnotized.
"Do you want to help me or not?!" Bahgeera snapped, getting impatient.
"No, not really." Baloo sheepishly responded to an angry Bahgeera.
"After we win, we will have a victory feast all for you! It will be a great day! Ok big guy?" Bahgeera said, kind of breaking it down to the large bear.
"In that case...sure!" Baloo returned, shaking Bahgeera's paw violently. Bahgeera smiled. He knew this would be a great day indeed.
122321221.title: Baloo.

1223212212.content:
On their way back to...nowhere in particular. Bahgeera, (every chance he could get) tried to show Baloo how great it was to eat before a fight. Baloo ate the few whole fruits Bahgeera sometimes handed to him. But they where going to get nowhere if they kept going like this...
Seven failed attempts later, Bahgeera and Baloo had found a nice wide area with trees surrounding it. This would be perfect.
Bahgeera told Baloo to sit down. Baloo questioned why they were taking ANOTHER food-break. Baloo hadn't seen Bahgeera eat anything yet, maybe he was a private eater.
"Hold on Baloo, I will return shortly. Try and snack on anything and everything you can. I will be back---momentarily." Bahgeera said lying to Baloo a bit.
Baloo shrugged and sat on a wide stump. It wasn't the most comfortable thing in the world, but it would do.
7 hours later, Bahgeera had finally returned with a large pile of various fruits. Baloo had fallen asleep by that point.
"Wake up, wake up." Bahgeera nudged Baloo repeatedly and he was whispering fairly-loudly.
"Huh, what, where am I?" A groggy Baloo muttered, he sat up slowly and turned to Bahgeera,
"Oh, hi Baggy, glad you came back!" "Glad you're still here..." Bahgeera replied coldly.
As Baloo opened his mouth to say something else, Bahgeera forcefully stuffed a dragonfruit into Baloo's gaping maw.
"MMMPH!" Baloo grunted loudly. Bahgeera shushed him. And Baloo was chewing on the most delicious fruit he had EVER had. He had to have more. Just then, Bahgeera had stuffed a bunch of bananas into the bear's mouth. Bahgeera want interested in talk right now. He needed to forge an instant win.
Baloo licked his lips, and spit out five banana peels onto Bahgeera's face.
"Nice..." Bahgeera said with a permanent scowl on his face.
Baloo smiled, and gobbled another three whole pineapples in one bite.
After 700 more fruits, Baloo had grown a bit. Not a lot but a bit. He was starting to grow another chin, and his cheeks where plumper, his belly had expanded into a literal body-pillow. His butt was starting to fill with flab, but Baloo didn't see yet. He had no idea how monstrous he was going to become.
1223212212.title: Bahgeera feeds Baloo anything he can find

1223221.content:
Daylight showed a smooth, gray skin, belonging to an animal with a large, meaty and wide muzzle. It yawned, showing two pairs of very long canines (two upper ones and two lower ones).

Bagheera knew which animal was: a hippo! He's already seen some hippos in the jungle (and some of them were friends with Baloo), but not so big and obese like the lardy titan he was watching!

Since there weren't signs showing that hippo was a dangerous guy, Bagheera came out his shadowy hideout to greet him. "Good morning and welcome in our jungle, errr....Mister ?" The hippo turned towards him and answered. "Marlon, Marlon the Meat Mountain!" "Meat Mountain ?! He'd call himself Lard Mountain!" Bagheera thought, astonished by his massive size and fattyness; then, retaking control, said: "I'm Bagheera! Nice to meet you, Marlon!" "Thanks, now outta my way, Buggy!" Marlon badly said.

Bagheera couldn't believe it: how rude that hippo was! "Hey! What's wrong with you ?! Could you be more polite, please ?" "Hehehe! And why ? I don't need good manners when I've THIS!!!"

Then, Marlon lifted his massive butt and began coming it down on Bagheera.

Bagheera could only stare that monstrous back coming...but he had to do something!
1223221.title: A hostile newcomer

choices: It's Balloo! (Balloo saved him before Marlon did something horrible to him)
It's Marlon! (Marlon took him to his secret hideout)
12232211.content:
Bahgeera, not usually bring the hostile type at all, out of pure instinct, but the hippo's massive rear. Marlon squealed like a stuck pig, sitting on Bahgeera trying to get him off, Bahgeera endured the 1 ton hit to his whole body, and continued hanging on. Soon, his claws gripped onto the flank making Marlon screech louder.
Still not letting go, Bahgeera felt almost every bone in his body crack as the blubber ball of a hippo sat on his whole body.
"YOU WILL NOT DEFEAT ME, JELLY-LEGS!!!" Marlon screamed triumphantly, he soon kicked up his hind legs and sent Bahgeera flying into a tree, knocking him out instantly. It was dark and blurry as Bahgeera fell asleep, but the last thing he saw was Marlon coming towards him with a sinister grin.
A while later, Bahgeera heard a voice, it was so distant he couldn't hear it, but he knew something was in front of him, and something big.
12232211.title: Biting the ass

choices: "Tell the person who's coming the truth!"
12232212.content:
Bahgeera was many things, such as: A worry wart, a bit overprotective, and could be a bit rude at times: but a bully wasn't one of his many flaws.
Bahgeera rolled away from the gigantic mound of blubber coming down on him, missing it so narrowly, that the panther could hear one of the hairs on the tip of his tail snap off. Bahgeera felt a new surge of pride and tranquillity enter his body as he moved from possibly his certain doom.
Marlon bellowed with laughter, "You-you-you, skinny bones! I can't BELIEVE you escaped my main weapon, you've got somethin' I can tell you that, but Goll-y!, I'm loosin my touch!" The massive hippo laughed so hard at his own failure he couldn't even breathe.
Poor Bahgeera was very confused. "B-b-but-" he stammered, but he was cut off by the oversized pig. "B-b-b-but, BUT," Marlon mocked, "But we'll see what you got in round TWO!" Before Bahgeera knew it, Marlon was bounding straight for him! Bahgeera walked out of the way, he walked because Marlon was slower than a slug stuck in molasses. Bahgeera wasn't threatened by him at all.
Four hours later, Marlon was beat from using his charge attack three times. But his overly confident attitude had in no way made thin even THINK about giving up.
"I'll. *pant* Get. *pant* You. *wheeze, COUGH COUGH COUGH* Skinny-Bones..." The massive beast was collapsed on the floor, trying to move an arm to grab Bahgeera with, Bahgeera stood just out of reach of the overweight adversary.
"Um, Sir? Are you okay?" Bahgeera questioned, secretly hoping he wouldn't get an answer.
Then, with one awful wheeze, the hippo completely fainted.
Bahgeera, being a little bit too motherly and caring, started to panic, he couldn't let anyone know that he was near this whale, maybe someone would think he killed him!
But time was ticking, because Bahgeera heard a slight crunch in the bushes behind him.
"Oh my, what am I to do?!" The Panther thought, then it hit him, "I know I'll-"

I'm sorry this happened, hopefully we won't have any hard feelings?"

The orangutan kept eating and the only time he spoke was when he wanted more bananas. The worse thing that frighten the monkeys were the amount of pounds the obese orangutan was gaining. Louie didn't cared about, though. He notice his change of appearance, but does not care and continues eating.

King Louie...
1231.title: He's depressed because he lost the mancub a...

choices: To get revenge on that man cub.
12312.content:
King Louie reached out to take another banana only to have his hand catch air. Looking to his left side he saw not a trace of any bananas left. Looking to his right he saw a huge pile of banana peels from what was once whole bananas. And finally he looked straight down to confirm his guesses. He had been eating them all, and they where all in his belly.

He had been known for being a very well rounded orangutan before, but it was nothing compared to the belly he was sporting now. All of that eating and not moving had been a very good way for him to pack the pounds. Looking at it he could see that it looked to be at least three times the size it was before, and even when sitting down he could see it hanging down half a foot from his waist. To further confirm that it was his eyes playing him a trick he took and felt it with his one of his hands. Touching it felt soft and jiggly meaning that it wasn't even digested food anymore, but a part of him.

He didn't move or say anything, he just sat there and marveled over the fact that it was his body. He hadn't even been thinking for how long he had been just sitting and eating, but it must a been a very long time considering he had never once before stopped and thought about it. Looking up he saw his loyal servants staring at him. He wondered what they thought of him right now. Did they still see him as their great leader, or was he now just a big slob taking up their space? Maybe he should just walk away from them, find a nice place to be lonely, and start consuming other fruits?

"NO!" he thought. He had been doing this for too long already, and just moving to another place wasn't going to help it. And what about his servants? Would he just abandon them after all this time they had been loyal for him? He had learned to become great friends with almost all of them, and from what he saw from looking up earlier proved that they too where still his friends. They could have just leaved long ago and let him sit on his busted throne eating bananas, but from what he saw they where all still there. They where still there because they cared, and he was lucky to have such great and supporting friends. He had been depressed a long time now, but not any more.

The servants where wondering if something had hit the king inside since he was now just sitting there looking down, when all of a sudden he started to move again. Everyone became silent and watched as their king took and raised his head again. Looking out on his smaller army the king was silent at first, before first giving a smile, and then laughing. At first the monkeys thought that something was wrong with their king, but then they remembered that it was the same laugher that their king would give when he wanted to have fun. He was back.

The king looked at his servants and then at his belly, and then started to play with for them. He was jiggling it with his hands, used it as a big drum to play on, and even got of his throne to do a little belly dance with it, and the servants loved it. This was the Louie they had been missing for a long time. The one that would solve all his problems by making jokes and throw parties. He was still very much fatter then his usual self, but they didn't care, they had missed him.

It didn't take long for the monkeys to get into the old groove that they used to have, with King Louie being the center of it. They played music, ate fruit, and was overall having a great time. But for the King things wasn't over that easy. He had been in his sad state for a reason, and for him there was only one way for him to get it all behind him and move on.

And that thing was...

131121.title: The wildebeest stampede.

choices: Timon and Pumbaa find him stuffing himself one day
Timon and Pumbaa, unaware, challenge Simba to an eating contest
131122.content:
After Simba joined Timon and Pumbaa in their life of no worries in the jungle, he tried his hardest to forget the events of the stampede. No matter how much fun he had with his adopted uncles roaming the jungle, swimming, playing and relaxing, he sometimes found he couldn't shake the images of his father's death, which continued to haunt him at times.

However, the lion found that as he got older and began to grow into his adult self, there was one constant that helped him feel better. Whenever he dug into a big pile of bugs, he was able to focus on the tastes, textures and aromas of his meals, temporarily delving into a period of buggy bliss.

Over time, when Timon and Pumbaa were occupied with something else, the lion found himself sneaking off for an extra meal. Though the bugs were plentiful, it was slowly becoming evident that he had been enjoying them too much. It's too much to say Simba had become fat yet, but the initial evidence implied he was on track to get there eventually. Just in a general sense around his body, the lion's fur was puffier, and his legs were thicker than usual. Even his face had grown a bit wider.
131122.title: In the jungle with Timon and Pumbaa.

choices: They don't notice Simba's eating and tell him about another bug buffet nearby
1311221.content:
One day, confident that Timon and Pumbaa had left his area of the jungle for the day, Simba set out looking for a particularly big meal - he was feeling down, and the main way he coped was to eat his feelings. The lion trudged through the trees and vines, overturning logs until he found a smorgasbord inside a hollowed-out tree. There must have been a small pool of bugs of every flavor and color in that tree trunk, and Simba was ready to make sure he dried it out, and started happily digging in.

Twenty minutes later, Simba could tell he was painfully full. His slightly fluffier stomach was clearly giving him signs of distress, and it looked a bit thicker than he was used to. But the lion kept going, taking bite after bite even though he knew it was a bad idea. Groaning, and with nearly a fifth of the bugs still left, he kept chomping away, slowing his pace steadily but still trucking on.

Which is when Timon and Pumbaa wandered over, having found his tracks from the earlier search...
1311221.title: Timon and Pumbaa find him stuffing himself one day

13112212.content:
Timon and Pumbaa were hugging and puffing as they approached Simba, nursing swollen stomachs as well. Near-delirious from their own food comas, they told Simba that they had found huge collections of bugs down by the swamp, and they had forged themselves silly. They were heading to go take a nap, but said Sinba would have a delicious meal if he went down.

The lion waited for his friends to leave and then forced himself to finish the logs around him, eating every last bug. His stomach was painfully distended at this point, but the lion decided he wasn't quite done. He marched down to the swamp as best he could to see what Timon and Pumbaa were talking about, and they weren't kidding. There were dozens of trees all around, each one positively packed full of bugs. It was enough to feed a family of 50.

Simba decided that he would eat...
13112212.title: They don't notice Simba's eating and te...

choices: Simba quickly learns to love gluttony
1311222.content:
Perhaps assuming the lion was just recovering from being lost in the desert - he was near dead when they found him, after all - Timon and Pumbaa didn't notice that Simba was packing on a few extra pounds here and there. In fact, they thought it was great. The lip loved to chow down like them, and more importantly, a more sated lion was a less dangerous lion. While Pumbaa was sure Simba would be their friend for life, Timon was still just the slightest bit paranoid. He wasn't exactly going to act on it, just keep an extra eye on the lion here and there.

Waking up from a nap one day, Simba opened his eyes to find Timon and Pumbaa standing in front of him with giant grins on their faces.

"Hey guys... what's up?", the lion asked.

"Oh, nothing, Simba... we just found a mother lode of bugs!", Pumbaa proudly exclaimed. "Ya hungry?"

"I could eat," Simba said sheepishly, not wanting to admit he was sleeping off a mid-day snack beforehand. As he got up, the lion followed the meerkat and the warthog, who had already eagerly started wandering away.

It took just a few minutes before Simba saw what they were talking about, and they weren't kidding. In front of them were three massive grubs, easily two feet long and just as wide. "Can you believe these were just lying here?!", Pumbaa said. "Let's dig in!"

"Wait," Timon replied. "Let's make this more interesting! There are three grubs. If any of us can finish the whole thing before the others, they get an entire day of meals brought to them by the others!" Pumbaa and Simba both felt that was fair, and the added challenge would make things more fun.

Each walked to their respective grub. "Three, two, one, go!" Timon yelled, and it was off to the races for the three, each tearing into their massive meals. Though they each had plenty of experience gorging themselves on grubs, these were a little different, very thick and fatty. Every bite was full of flavor, but took up plenty of room once swallowed.

It only took a few minutes for Timon to tap out, the tiny meerkat hesitant to keep eating once he'd gotten about a third of the way through his grub. Meanwhile, Simba and Pumbaa were still going and going fierce. The warthog had the size, but Simba had the speed. His recent extra meals had taught him how to gulp a meal down fast, and even as he started feeling full past the halfway point, he knew he could keep eating until it was gone.

As Pumbaa, slightly bloated and uncomfortable, started to say something to Simba as he neared the end of the grub, he was surprised to hear the lion say "done!" Looking over, he had indeed finished the whole massive grub. His stomach was noticeably bloated, jutting out under him, and the young cat looked more than uncomfortable, but he managed to gloat just for a few minutes before the food coma set in. "I'll take those meals tomorrow," he said, before he laid down with an oof. Full to bursting but with a satisfied smile on his face, he managed to add, "I'll take a few of those for breakfast."
1311222.title: Timon and Pumbaa, unaware, challenge Simba to a...
