Simba had never felt so good as he did slowly wandering back to his sleeping corner in the jungle. His belly, distended inches off his chest, sloshed back and forth uncomfortably, yet felt just as blissful as it did strained. He had unleashed a new hobby, one of eating as much as he could and seeing how much he could eat at one time. After sleeping off the eating contest, Simba lazed around the entire next day, asking his friends for grub buffets almost hourly. Frequently napping to stave off the food comas, the lion resolved to have a king's appetite.

Every day from then on, his meals were endurance contests. Whenever he sat down for a meal, he ate fast and long, often doubling or tripling his old portions and dwarfing his friends' diets. This continued for a while.

Food gluttonous lionesses wanting to be fed faster...
132.content:
After Mufasa's death and Simba's supposed death, Sarafina, Nala's mother, had taken her away with her to escape the
tyranny of Scar's reign. But before the two lionesses completely left the Pridelands, they stopped by the baobab
tree to see the shawman Rafiki. He gave them each a gourd to drink, like much of his potions, he said it would help
them on their journey.
As soon as they finished drinking the liquid, Sarafina and Nala thanked the baboon and left to continue on their
way. Rafiki had told them to head west and south to seek help in that direction but the help they find might not be
what they would expect. Mother and cub lionesses continued on their way for what seemed like three days,
eating things here and there when they could find food, and they didn't notice right away until the third day that
they're bodies were putting on weight despite the traveling they were doing. And they seemed to gain more
than they ate. But they weren't shocked or afraid but rather found enjoyment and pleasure in the weight they
had gained. Sarafina was now as big as a water buffalo but not yet as big as a hippo while Nala now was
as big as a baby hippo. They thought it was perhaps the potions that Rafiki had given them was the cause of
their surprising weight gain of body fat. And it wasn't just centered in one area of their body but all over their
lioness and lioness cub bodies, even their heads, faces, backs, legs, paws, necks, rumps, tails, torsos and
bellies. All over them was jiggly fat rolls and wobbly thick bulges of flab. And it seemed that they didn't have
no health related problems and didn't effect their walking mobility just yet. Likely not until their bellies did
firmly press against the ground.

At the end of the third day, they found a small settlement with two man-made buildings. One looked like a
human dwelling and the other was likely for storing something. It was a surprise when a young human male
child came up to them and motioned the two lionesses to follow. They hesitated at first then decided to follow
the human child. He led them to the front of the storage building which was closed for now. Since it was
in the summer with both hot and rainy days, they were now at least under cover of human made shelter.
There Sarafina and Nala spent the night.

Then the next day, the human male child came out with his young adult father. And they didn't have dark
brown skin color like the African tribes but a creamy tanned white color. The father unlocked the storage
building and allowed both lioness and lioness cub inside. Once inside, both father and son began feeding
the two fat lionesses slabs of herbivore prey meat and most of it was thick but the lionesses were hungry
again and ate the slabs of meat anyway. The young adult human male introduced his name as Lionel then
introduced his son's name as Leo. Feeding the two hungry lionesses lasted all day, with their bellies bloated
and filled with the slabs of meat. But Lionel and Leo stayed out there with Sarafina and young Nala in the
food storage building to keep them company. Strangely enough, it was Leo that seemed to hear and
understand animal language and would hear what Sarafina and Nala said. So Lionel slept with Sarafina
and Leo slept with young Nala while the lionesses bloated stomachs digested the food they had eaten. All
four of them hoped that this would last forever. There's no way of knowing what kind of result this feeding
will have on both of Sarafina and Nala's fat bodies.
132.title: Feeding Fat Lionesses

choices: The feeding continues for a month.
Feeding for a full year nonstop.
Sarafina and Nala each have dreams of feeding with their human friends.
1322.content:
The night passed with the loud echoing noises of both Sarafina and Nala's stomachs digesting their load of
food all through the night while they slept with their new human friends and feeders.

By the time morning came, Sarafina and Nala were fattened to the flabby immobile size of seven ton
elephants each, their bodies layered, covered and packed with easily jiggled and malleable fat. Their
fat paws had been pushed up by the mounds of their bellies by more than several feet while pooling
and oozing outwards in lardy rolls like liquid lava, their legs so packed with rolls that the rolls of their
fat legs are piling around each leg and their fat bloated and immobile paws almost about to be engulfed
and sunk deeply into their jiggly rolls of their leg fat.

Both Nala and Sarafina's backs had fattened as well, domed up by thick bulgy rolls above the level of
heads by several feet, maybe even as big as their bellies if they had been laying on their backs. The
lionesses rumps also bulged and looked like mounds of piled sacks of doughy flab that wobbled and
jiggled at the slighest touch. The tails of both lionesses had thickened even past the point of being
able to move, thick with rolls and stuck out of their bloated rumps and as thick as hippos. Their rumps
so fat anyway that the rumps firmly lay on the ground and pooled out some feet. Nala and Sarafina's
fat bodies were like giant blobs of pudding and just as wobbly as jello gelitan. The necks of both
lionesses had formed into ringing cascading rolls of flab that encircled around their heads and almost
about to engulf their heads that are starting to sink back into the masses of their neck rolls.

The lionesses' heads, fat and bloated so much their heads also have rolls and bulges. Their face cheeks
had bloated out round to the same round size as their fat heads are. Even their ears are fat. From their
chin pour down dozens of many flabby chin rolls that cascade down from their heads, down the middle
of their lower neck rolls, down their fat bloated front chests and spilling out onto the ground and pooling
outwards widely like flowing liquid lava.

Once again, like yesterday, the two humans Lionel and Leo feed the lionesses the thick fatty hippo
meat slabs, stuffing them and letting the lionesses feast on the hippo meat slabs more and more and
if one was to watch, they would visibly see Sarafina and Nala's bellies bulging out and up as they
were being fed with more fatty hippo meat. Lionel and Leo soon got tired at midday and Lionel introduced
two conveyor belts, one for either lioness. All Lionel and Leo had to do was to keep the slabs of fatty
hippo meat loaded on them and the conveyor belts would deliver the each meat to both Nala and
Sarafina's awaiting fat flabby maws. To the two humans surprise, Sarafina and Nala took each slab of
hippo meat in and swallowed them down whole. This was faster, so by the end of the day both Sarafina
and Nala were both each the bloated size of the round parts of a fully inflated hot air balloons.

And this went on for weeks, each time the lionesses got bigger and fatter, Lionel had to adjust the height
of the conveyor belts to each lioness. The lionesses simply continued to eat and eat, feeding and
getting fatter and fatter.
1322.title: Fatter, hungry and wanting more food to be fatter

1323.content: Do you want to continue with this story or do else?
1323.title: Other

choices: When King he eats as much of the kingdoms food supplies as possible.
He's discovered planning to kill Mufasa and is punished through force fedding.
133.content:
What gets Scar fat?

http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/Scar_(The_Lion_King)
133.title: Scar

choices: The food supply runs out and scar demands to eat the members of the pride
Scar wakes up the next morning having digested the food
1331.content:
Some weeks passed after Scar's successful coup, and he wanted to test the extent of his powers as king. He contacted Shenzi, Bazai, and Ed, and told them to order the lionesses to hunt as many animals as they could. under the command of the hyenas and scar, the lionesses begrudginly listened and went out into the savanna.

The next day the pride returned with their bounty. the carcasses gazelle, zebra, wildebeest, and had been brought back to pride rock. Scars mouth began to water/ he could not believe the lionesses had hunted such great numbers.

"bring me a wildebeest," Scar said.

The hyenas instantly did so and brought him the fattest one they could find. They tore it apart and fed it to him, piece by piece. He did not notice as his belly began to slowly pooch out over his legs. He finished the first wildebeest, looking noticeably fatter, and let out a loud belch.

"well what are you waiting for? Bring me another." he commanded

The hyenas once again obeyed instantly, bringing him another plump carcass, this time a zebra. They fed it to him quickly, and this time they didnt need to be asked to retrieve another.

This process went on for some time, and the lionesses looked on in horror as scar fattened up on their food supply. His legs splayed outwards as his ballooning belly quickly rendered him immobile. The hyenas eventually needed to climb onto scar to reach his mouth.

The sun was going down by the time scar decided to stop.

Scar let out a mighty burp "OOOUUURRRRP"

He quickly passed out, tired from the day of feasting.
1331.title: Scar uses his new powers as king for a feast

13312.content:
Scar opened his eyes. He saw the sun rising ahead of him, but he also saw to blobs of fur in his peripherals. He would have jumped, but he was stuck to the ground.

Scars head was sunken into his many necks and signified by his two bloated cheeks. His two buttcheeks were packed with lard and sticking out from the rest of his massive body. He was being held up by his body fat, which spread out around him like liquid. His arms and legs arms had sunken into rolls of fat, only recognizable by the fat paws sticking out of his mass. He tried to move, only succeeding in jiggling his wave-like fat.

Had he really gotten this fat after one meal? His perfect physique was ruined!

He sat there, not knowing what to do, until he heard laughing.

"Hey there Fatty," Shenzi said.

"Get up here and talk to my face!" Scar yelled through his cheeks.

He felt tickling as Shenzi and the other hyenas began to climb.

They reached the top of the mountain of lard.

"Hey king," Shenzi said stifling a laugh

"What did you do to me!' scar was about to exclaim, until the group heard a stomach grumble.

The hyenas laughed "is somebody hungry!"
13312.title: Scar wakes up the next morning having digested ...

choices: Scar's already fat and continues to gain more weight.
Scar believes that if he becomes bigger, he would be a better king than Mufasa.
1333.content: How about some more choices for Scar?
1333.title: Other reasons.

choices: Scar becomes angry think about some plans.
Scar takes his anger out on eating.
13331.content:
In the Pridelands, there was always peace. Except when Scar took over and cause problems. But this will be a bit of a different story. Let's start out from the beginning before Simba was born. Sarabi was pregnent with Simba and Mufasa has happy about it. It ment that he would have someone to be the future king when he was gone. Scar, was not too happy about. He felt that he didn't get anything that he wanted and his brother got had everything. This left Scar to eating his pain away.

When he he would go out hunting, he hunted for more they just one thing. He would ofter hunt for three things and eat them BY HIMSELF. Antelope, zebra, even a hippo once. All those animals evenually gone to his hips and his belly. Basically, Scar was now just a big bloated lion with a belly touching the ground.

Here's a reference on what he looks like. http://www.furaffinity.net/view/10843702...

One day, Mufasa and Scar decided to walk and talk a bit. Mufasa happened to notice how big he was getting.

"My brother. Look like you gained quite a few pounds." Mufasa said patting his stomach.
"Maybe a little." Scar replied.
"Ha. Look a you. You're close to a hippo." Mufasa said.
"Watch it, brother." Scar said. "So what did you wanted to talk about.
"As you know, Sarabi is close to giving birth to my cub." Mufasa said.
"When he grow up, I want him to be the future king."

Hearing that made Scar's ears drop.

"Future......king?"
"Well yeah. But only when he's older and my time is passed. I was hoping you would help with making him a good king as well."

Scar was still in deep thought. In reality, HE wanted to be the next king to take over.

"Aren't you a bit ahead of yourself? I mean, the cub isn't even born yet."
"Still, I want him be one the greatest kings of this land. Great like father."
"Father........"

Scar decided to walk out now.

"Scar.....where are you going?"
"I.....just need to get some "me time" for a while."

Scar felt down about not being sad and angry at the same time.
13331.title: The fat lion, Scar.

choices: Go to Scar, wanting to get his anger out.
Skip to years later, Simba's a young cub and Scar is larger than before.
133312.content:
About a couple of weeks laters, Sarabi gave birth to the young cub, Simba. The young prince and future king. All the animals praised the new prince. All except for Scar. Scar was not there. He was filled will mostly anger because he knew he still will not be king. During the time, he began to overeat again. Scar belly would continue to spread wider and bigger. It was actually getting a bit harder for him to walk now. Most of the time, all he would do is eat. One day, Mufasa went over to Scar to talk to him.

"Ummm, brother?" Mufasa asked.
"Yes? What is it?" Scar said lying on his back.
"You.....having been gaining a lot of weight lately."
"Maybe a bit."
"A bit? Your belly looks like it could fit a hippo." Mufasa protested.

Scar had some problems getting off his back. But he got up. Then he took a long look at himself. He had notice that his belly was defiently rounder touching the ground and spreading his legs a bit.

"So I'm a little bigger, what's it matter?" Scar said.
"You missed my son's big day?" Mufasa said.
"It's no big deal. He's not king yet."
"True, but the least you can do is be there for him. He is your nephew."

Scar was still not happy. He still felt that HE should be king. Instead, he will just be the uncle to the king.

"Tell Simba, I'm sorry." Scar said holding his tougue.
"Why don't you tell him yourself?"
"Something has just came up."

Scar said that and left. Leaving Mufasa with a look of concern.

"What's with my brother lately?" Mufasa said to himself. But he try not to worry about it and headed to see his son.
133312.title: Scar takes his anger out on eating.

1333122.content:
"Dad, dad, dad," Simba pounced on his father trying to wake him up.
"Yes I'm up, I'm up son..." Mufasa yawned and laughed at his playful son.
"Dad, is anything special going on today?" Simba asked his morningly question to his father, hopefully.
"Hmmm...lets see..." Mufasa thought. "Oh yes, today is the fifth annual elephant-hippo eating war."
"What's that dad?" Simba cocked his head awaiting a response.
"Oh, it's where the elephants and hippos eat very much food to become fatter to keep the other species away from their territory in the watering-hole." Simba blinked. "You'll understand when you're older."
"Anything else?" The young lion said excitedly
"Well, it's your Uncle Scar's birthday...but we don't celebrate it here. I don't even think he does anymore." The older lion mumbled
"No birthday?" Simba seemed sorry for Scar. "Poor Uncle Scar, I'm gonna go say happy birthday!" From sorrowful to excited the young cub took off, but was stopped by his father.
"No, you must NEVER visit Scar, especially on his birthday. He would get really mad at you Simba, and I don't think we would like that." Mufasa nobly trotted past his son to Zazu who was patiently waiting for him during half of the conversation.
"What about Scar, Sire?" Zazu yelped
"Now what's the morning report for today, Zazu?" Mufasa ignored.
"Well there has been a flatulence contest between the elephants and hippos, eventually it even scared some warthogs away, the cheetahs are in a spot, of course the meerkats are below it all, the termites keep biting back at the rhinos, but the rhinos have a point, oh long story short, THERE'S BEEN A HYENA SIGHTING! Near the hippo-elephant gaining grounds, Sire!" The small bird sat on Mufasa's head.
"Sorry Simba, we'll talk later. Until then, your mother will watch you." Mufasa then charged off with Zazu.
Simba frowned. "But I wanna-"
"Simba Honey," Sarabi's voice was heard in the main den of Pride rock near Simba.
With no hesitation, Simba began to head North, in the direction of Scar's kingdom. Or at least his dad had once explained to him in fables.

After an hour of traveling, Simba stood in awe as he saw a giant shadowy den before him, it must of been bigger than ten elephants stacked on top of one another.
Simba stepped inside "H-hello?" He whispered
Just then three eyes cornered Simba, "WeMre gonna be eating tonight!" a female voice laughed as it eyed the young lion.
"You look like your a little bit...lost..." A male voice chuckled.
"Yeah, yeah, HAHAHA!" Another male voice hysterically cackled. Then hundreds more laughs were heard, then thousands, then millions. The eyes surrounded Simba, glowing in absolute hunger. One nipped at his ear, the little lion clawed back but to no avail of finding the biter.
Something knocked the wind out of him, pinning him to the floor, it's eyes glimmered in the dark of the cave. And Simba was face-to-face with a hideous, slobbering, disgusting hyena.
"Yeah, get him Tofauti!" A voice snarled in glee. The female hyena who was pinning Simba down was a young one, about his age, she had golden eyes and a blacker pelt than the rest of the beasts she was surrounded with, and did Simba see a hint of-beauty in her face? No. Couldn't be. All hyenas were monstrous.
Just then-
"QUIIIIIEET!" Shouted a voice. All hyenas stood clear. Tofauti turned to look at the sound which gave Simba an open window to escape, but he didn't.
"NO ONE SHALL TOUCH THE PRIDE-WALKER. HE IS MINE!" It yelled again.
"Aww, nice try Tofauti, better luck next time, you'll kill one someday." The same hyena who had introduced her, chimed. Tofauti stepped off Simba and started to walk away with her seemingly older sibling, she looked back and smiled at him. Or maybe it was a snarl. Either way Simba felt a bit charmed. All other hyenas fled to their 'positions'. Some lit flint to create fire, others picked up fanning leaves, some just went home. But no one prepared him for who they were working for, as soon as all the torches went up, he saw something that resembled an orange-black seven story blob.
The young lion was greeted with an orange ball of fur that seemed to be a HUMONGOUS swollen stomach. It was bigger than five elephants. It scraped stone the walls and all, Simba must of only been 1/87 of the belly itself. Simba poked it, it didn't ripple like his own belly did when he poked it, it seemed, stuck.
The small lion tried to see what was past the round ball of fur that was the huge stomach, but all he saw was another two bubbles sticking up out of the back of the monstrous gut. It was too far to see what they were, but from what Simba saw, they're was a tiny line sticking out of both of them. It was a tail. It was so small, Simba had to squint to even guess it was one anyways. There were two tree trunks on either side of the blob, something was underneath them but Simba didn't know what, then the blob roared loudly (or burped he didn't know) at least fifty hyenas lifted (with a bunch of struggle) the orange tree trunk. Underneath was the tiniest paw Simba has ever seen. Simba gasped.
"What are you?!" The lion yelled so the blob could hear him. "Are you an elephant?!"
"NO!" The blob's voice bellowed. "I WISH I WAS, IF I WAS AN ELEPHANT I MIGHT HAVE A CHANCE AT BECOMING THE WORLD'S BIGGEST KING, I WOULD BE BIGGER THAN PRIDE ROCK, AND EVERYONE KNOWS THAT THE LARGEST THING IS A PLACE OF ROYALTY AND POWER! AND TODAY IS THE ELEPHANT-HIPPO GAINING WAR! I COULD BECOME HUGEEEEE!" The blob shook.
"But, what are you?!" Simba asked again.
"I, AM A LION! JUST LIKE YOU SIMBA!"
Simba gasped, he tried to speak but-
"I KNOW YOUR FATHER, THAT'S HOW I KNOW YOU! WHY ARE YOU HERE?!"
"Um, I wanted to tell my Uncle Scar-"
"I AM YOUR UNCLE SCAR! WHAT DO YOU WISH TO ASK ME?!"
"HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!" Simba joyfully yelled to his much bigger uncle.
Scar stood still for a moment then-
"NOW SIMBA," he slowly spoke again. "IF YOU WANT ME TO REALLY HAVE A HAPPY BIRTHDAY, PLEASE, I WOULD LOVE MY NEPHEW HERE TO CELEBRATE WITH, BUT TO COME TO THE PARTY, YOU NEED AN INVATATION BUT I DONT SEE ONE ON YOU!"
"WAIT!" Simba screeched. "Uncle Scar, I can take you to the hippo-elephant gaining war! Just follow me!" Simba spun around to look at the WAY PAST immobile ocean of fat his uncle had transformed into.
"Hmm, I have an idea..." Simba said thoughtfully.
After hours of building a rock to budge Scar out of his place, it finally worked, and the lion-whale started to roll down a slope, Simba moved out of the way just in time, and Scar began to roll.
While his blimp-sized relative was tumbling down slopes the hyenas built, he saw better views of him. Like Simba saw those two massive bubbles he saw earlier were his buttcheeks, each one jiggled every time it moved. He also saw his uncle's sunken in head once or twice, though it took a keen eye to even see the small indent on his body that indicated he even had a head. Scar's eyes were closed due to the amount of fat that flowed in through his face and the rest of his body, two gargantuan cheeks blocked Scar from seeing ever again, they sloshed as he tumbled, making Simba see glimpses of the face Scar apparently had.
A greasy black mane dripped down from Scar's small head to his buttcheeks and tiny worm-sized tail that followed the elephant of his rear. The black fur around his head looked like it hadn't been groomed in years, it surrounded the tan-lion's face in a massive cluster, bursting out in the biggest hair ball the Simba had ever seen. It created a thick line leading into the lion's gluttony-caused buttocks. Simba hadn't noticed, but most of Scar's mane had grown out of control and was swallowing the fattest lion's body, all except for his bursting belly which was 80% of him, the other 20% was his fur-covered butt.


As the duo approached the hundreds of morbidly obese hippos and elephants ahead, Scar began to panic.
"SIMBA, IF ONE OF THOSE CREATURES SEES ME, I'LL BE BANISHED TO THE JUNGLE FOR LIFE, YOU MUST MAKE ME LOOK LIKE AN ELEPHANT, SINCE MY GIRTH IS CLOSER TO MATCHING ONE OF THOSE PLANETARY PACHYDERMS!" Thankfully Scar hit a rock and stopped, butt in the air, and balancing on his circular yet blobby gut.
"I MUST LOOK LIKE ONE OF THEM!"
Nearby Simba saw a patch of gray-muddied water, and a few white plants he could carve into tusks, large flower petals were nearby as well.
Simba knew he was gonna use those, Simba realized Scar was too round for an elephant. Simba gathered the petals and white tusk-plants, but he was concerned about his uncle's shape.
"Uncle Scar, you hafta get blobbier, they won't suspect you as much if your blobby! They're all stuck on their backs, hopefully we can still roll you after this..."
"BUT SIMBA, THEY WILL SUSPECT YOU AS WELL, WE MUST GROW, TOGETHER!"
Reluctantly Simba accepted, it was for his beloved uncle after all.
Then, Scar's gut sounded louder.
"Uncle Scar are you hungry?!" Simba questioned as he jumped on many rocks above him to jump on the blob's large rump which was much closer than his stomach.
"OH SIMBA, IM ALWAYS HUNGRY, BUT THIS IS HOW I CALL MY FATTEST HYENAS!" The large stomach growl carried throughout the land.
After a while Simba peered over the hill to see many obese hyenas slowly trotting down to greet their big master.
"Master, what may we do for you?!" The largest hyena spoke.
"FETA, FEED ME TILL I BECOME A BLOB TO JOIN THE ELEPHANT-HIPPOS OVER THERE, PAINT ME LIKE ONE AS WELL, AND MAKE MY NEPHEW HERE LIKE A HIPPO, BY LOOKS AND BY FAT!"
Scar demanded.
"Yes sir." Feta replied and then some hyenas began to enter Scar's open mouth, they squeezed through just barely. Scar let out many gluttonous noises as they entered his maw. Scar creaked forward as he was slowly becoming more blobby.
Simba on the other hand was force-fed dead zebras, dead antelope, and even a hippo.
Then Simba felt some swelling himself.
And by the looks of it, both Scar and Simba would pass as elephants or hippos in a heartbeat.
1333122.title: Skip to years later, Simba's a young cub an...

choices: "You two have brought peace to our two races..."
"You two lions have festered with our event for too long..."
13331221.content:
"More food sir?" Feta croaked, after 6 hours of feeding everyone was beat.
But the one who took most of the pain was Scar, he was a whale to what he was six hours before.
His matted fur covered the blob he'd become. Scar had become so blobby and so large that his stomach erupted with fat across the ground. It almost touched the elephant-hippo gaining grounds. Scar's face was coated with his dirty fur and fat. His face cheeks swallowed his face to the point of him not seeing anything ever again. Somewhere, Scar's face was present, but sadly, no one would see it again. That lead the glutton of a lion to never speak again, his cheeks were too fat to do so, he let out massive burps and loud grunts/groans though. Speaking of fat cheeks; his butt soared into the air, almost demolishing the rocky mountain behind him, it was his second greatest asset, two gargantuan buttcheeks, spreading across the plains, they would probably be half of Mt Kilimanjaro now. Both buttcheeks jiggled and bounced with pure fat overload. His tail was nowhere to be seen, the two black furry cheeks farted often and loudly.
Scar's blobby legs, immobile with fat, sat on either side of him, welcoming his newest and greatest feature. His stomach. It stretched out for miles upon miles, gurgling with sheer hunger and gluttony. Scar was badly painted to look like an elephant, and he did look like one too. The fattest one in the herd was probably a little fatter than Scar.
And on top of this massively-inflated beast. Was massively-inflated Simba.
Simba had taken quite the gain as well, sitting on Scar's gassy buttocks, he also rippled with pure fat. Now immobile. Simba really did look like a hippo now. Fake tusks and all. He could probably be mistaken for an adult male. Simba's gut was now rounded like Scar's before the six hour period of gaining. But he was a lot smaller than Scar before.
A massive hippo trudged towards the two blobs. It was definitely the smallest adult out of the herd. But was obese like the rest.
And it said-

He starts to develop a habit of overeating.
1343.content: What other reasons are there?

13432.content: what causes Mufasa to gain
13432.title: bigger king

1351.content: Okeydokes. What if she gets so fat by being spoiled, as the daughter of Simba and Nala she's an important figure, so she'd get some special treatment and a lot of extra meals, right?
1351.title: Fat princess

1352.content: Alright. Should Kovu be a cub or a full grown lion?
1352.title: Kovu.

13521.content:
Another day in the Outlands. Little food, less water. Due to that, most of the lions were skinner than normal lions. But they still did their best to live everyday. This included lions like Zira, Nuka, Vitani, and of course Kovu. Kovu, thhe young cub to be Scar's legacy and try to become the new king. But he was still a young cub. He didn't had much friends. The only friends he really had was his sister Vitani and the young girl cub he met before, Kiara. Kiara was the daughter of Simba, who was the king of the Pridelands. It was because of that, it made things complicated for him and Kiara to be friends. But Kovu still stay strong for he had too. Anyway, Kovu was taking a nap, while his sister, Vitani, wakes her up.

"Kovu! Kovu!" Vitani said shaking her brother.
"What? I was having a great dream." Kovu said.
"About what?" Vitani asked.
"Being king and having a lot of food serve to me." Kovu said.
"Really?" Vitani said.
"Yeah! I'm tired of eating so less." Kovu said.
"I agree. We barely get food here." Vitani said. "Anyway, let's go play."
"Do we have to? I want to nap some more." Kovu said.
"Kovu......." Vitani said giving a look.
"Fine." Kovu said.

Kovu got up and let Vitani lead the way to find something fun to do. So they went out in the fields and played for a bit. They were having fun for a while, but as they did, they had a sense of something.

"Hey Kovu." Vitani whispered.
"Why are you whispering?" Kovu asked.
"I think someone or something is here." Vitani said.

The two stayed quite and slowly moved. They peeked their heads up to see what it was and they see......
13521.title: Young Cub's hunger

135211.content:
It was Kiara trying to catch a butterfly.

"Who is that?" Vitani asked.
"It's Kiara." Kovu said.
"You know her?" Vitani asked.
"I met her once. She's suppose to be Simba's daughter." Kovu said to Vitani.
"Simba?" Vitani said shocked. "Then she is our enemy."
"Hold on." Kovu said. "She really not bad."
"Not bad? She is the daughter of Simba. The reason why we are all in the outlands." Vitani said.

While they were talking, Kiara happen to notice movement in the tall grass. She goes over there and see Kovu and Vitani.

"Kovu?" Kiara said.
"Oh. Hey Kiara." Kovu said.
"Hey to you. How have you been?" Kiara asked.
"Fine. Fine." Kovu said.
"Who's this?" Kiara asked looking at the other cub.
"Vitani. Kovu's sister." Vitani said not really in a nice tone.
"Nice to meet you." Kiara said smiling.
"Yeah. You too, but we got to go." Vitani said trying to drag her brother away from her.
"Gah! Sis! Come on." Kovu pleaded. "We don't have to go."
"Is something wrong?" Kiara asked.
"No. Nothing's wrong." Vitani said.

At that moment, Kovu and Vitani's stomachs both growled in hunger. Kovu's was louder.

"Hehehe! Sounds like you guys are hungry." Kiara said.
"Ma...maybe." Kovu said not wanting to admit it.
"Doesn't matter. There isn't much food where we are from." Vitani said.
"I know a great spot to get some food, if you want to come." Kiara said.
"Really?" Kovu said excited.
"Hold on." Vitani said pulling Kovu away to talk to him in private."What if this is a trap?"
"You're paranoid." Kovu said. "She wouldn't do that. Plus I'm starving. What do we got to lose?"

Deep down, Vitani knew he was right. She looked at Kiara and she looked nice enough.

"Fine. Lead the way uhhh....." Vitani said not remembering Kiara's name.
"It's Kiara." She responded. "Vitani, right?"
"Yes." Vitani said.
"Good. Now we are friends." Kiara said happily.
"Umm...friends? I don't think...." Vitani said unsure.
"Come on. Let's go." Kiara said.
"Move it sis." Kovu said with a smirk.
"*sign* I have a feeling about this." Kiara said.

So leading the way, Kiara toke Kovu and Vitani to a....
135211.title: Seeing Kiara again.

1352112.content:
While Kiara was leading Kovu and Vitani, Vitani wanted to talk to Kovu about this.

"Are you sure we should follow her?" Vitani said.
"I told you. We can trust her." Kovu said to her sister. "She's a nice cub."
"She's still the daughter of our enemy." Vitani said.
"Come on you two." Kiara said trying to rush them.
"Why are you taking us to this place with "food"?" Vitani asked Kiara. "You know we are from the Outlands, right? Didn't you daddy tell you not to trust an Outlander?"
"Yeah. I thought you were daddy's little girl." Kovu said chuckling a bit.
"True. But Kovu, you're nice. So I can trust you." Kiara said.
"Really?" Kovu said with a surprised face.
"And since Vitani's your sister, I can trust her too." Kiara said.
"Wow....so you really are that trusting?" Vitani asked.
"Yep. You got to give trust to earn trust. That's what daddy told me." Kiara said.
"Wow. Your dad sound's great." Kovu said.
"That's why he's king." Kiara said.
"Even so, we are still on different sides." Vitani said.
"For now anyway. Maybe things will change one day." Kiara said.

Vitani became silent. She didn't really know how to respond to Kiara. Even if her dad was an enemy to all Outlanders, Kiara herself didn't seem all bad.

"Anyway. Here we are." Kiara said.

Kiara had led Kovu and Vitani to a very green, lucious and liveful oasis. Beautiful plants, running water, and true lion's paradise.

"Woooooah!" Kovu and Vitani said.
"I know. Pretty amazing, right?" Kiara said.
"I'll say." Vitani said.
"Where did you find such a place?" Kovu asked.
"My friends Timon and Pumbaa show me this." Kiara explained.
"You mean the meerkat and the pig?" Kovu asked.
"He prefers to be called Mr. Pig." Kiara said.
"Your friends with a pig? Don't you usually eat them?" Vitani asked.
"Timon and Pumbaa are different. They helped raise my dad." Kiara explained.
"Oh." Kovu and Vitani said. Then at that moment, there belly growled more.
"Yeah that's great and all Kiara, but....food." Kovu said.
"Oh. Right. This way." Kiara said.

Kiara led them to a bush filled with berries. Kovu and Vitani were not impressed.

"This is it? It's just a berry bush." Kovu said.
"No offense, but we were expecting...meat." Vitani said.
"Well, I'm too young to go hunting, so this will have to do." Kiara said.
"Ha. Figures!" Vitani said.
"Well...are you two old enough to hunt?" Kiara asked.
"No." Kovu and Vitani said with there heads down.
"Come on. Try them." Kiara said.

Kovu was hungry enough to eat anything so he grab a few berries. He ate a few and he liked them.

"Hmm....not bad." Kovu said. "I like them."
"Really? Let me try some." Vitani said while grabbing a few into her mouth. "Hey! Pretty good. Not meat, but not half bad."
"Yep. There are plenty more fruits to try here." Kiara said.
"Cool. Cause I'm still hungry." Kovu said.

So Kovu, Kiara and Vitani decide to stay awhile and have some more fruit.
1352112.title: The Oasis.

13521121.content:
After a while, Vitani and Kiara had already ate their fill. But Kovu was still chowing on some more tropical fruits. He really enjoyed eating them, even if it wasn't Zebra or Antelope. Actually he ate some much that it show with his belly.

"BUUURRRPPPP!!!!!!!" Belched Kovu. "This is really good." Kovu said having some more berries.
"Wow. You're really eating a lot." Vitani said.
"I'm hungry. I can eat more." Kovu said.
"Hehe! Kovu's quite a pig, is he?" Kiara said.
"A pig?" Kovu said with a confused face.
"Haha! She's right. Look at your pot belly." Vitani said patting Kovu's belly.

It's was true. Kovu was starting to get a little chubby. Not too chubby, but chubby enough to have his belly stick out. Kovu happen to notice this himself.

"Huh. I guess you right." Kovu said. "Haha! I actually like the feeling."
"Figures that you would." Vitani said chuckling.
"Hey. I rather be a little chunky than bone skinny." Kovu said.
"I actually can agree with that. Expectly the way we don't eat." Vitani said.
"I just choose to stay skinny enough." Kiara admited.
"Figures Miss Princess would." Kovu said.
"Haha. Good one, bro." Vitani said.

After some more laughs, the three realized how late it was getting.

"Uh oh!" Vitani said. "We better get home."
"Guess you're right." Kovu agreed getting up.
"I better get going too. My dad will worry." Kiara said.
"Thanks for showing us this place." Kovu said.
"Yeah. You're alright princess." Vitani said.
"Your not so bad yourself." Kiara said.
"Can we come here again?" Kovu asked.
"Sure." Kiara said. "Bring your appetite."
"Don't worry. He will." Vitani said.
"Watch it, Vitani!" Kova said angry at her sister. Kiara giggled. "Also, let's keep all this a secret. Just the three of us."

Vitani and Kiara nodded their head and agreed with Kovu. With that, Kiara waved goodbye to her friends as they when back to the Outlands.

"That Kiara, she's not so bad." Vitani admited.
"Told you." Kovu said.
"But even so, she's still Simba's cub. Sooner or later, we will be enemies." Vitani said to Kovu.
"I still think we can make things work." Kovu said.
"You really seem sure of her." Vitani said. Then an idea came to her. "Oh...my...gosh! YOU LIKE HER!"

Kovu cheeks went red.

"WHAT? NO....I....JUST....." Kovu tried to explained.
"Look. She's still....." Vitani tried to say.
"Our enemy. I know. But...she just feels.....different."
"I'm not gonna tell you what to do bro. Just be careful."
"Ok. Also, she's still just a friend."
"I hope it stay that way."

With all the said, they were on their way home to their family.
13521121.title: Kovu gets a pot belly.

135211212.content:
It was the morning and Kovu just got up. He was still a little chubby from yesterday, but he still was as hungry as ever. For breakfast, the lions were able to hunt down a zebra. Since they had to share the zebra with everyone, Kovu didn't really get to have much. But he was ok with that, since he know where to get more food if he is still hungry. After his small breakfast, he walked over to Vitani to talk to her.

"Hey Vitani." Kovu said.
"What is it, Kovu?" Vitani asked.
"Let's head over to the oasis." Kovu said.
"You really want to go again?" Vitani said.
"Well yeah. I mean the fruits and berries are not meat, but it's still food." Kovu said. "Not to mention, I'm still pretty hungry."
"Figures that you would, tubby." Vitani said chuckling.
"Watch it sis." Kovu said a little ticked.

So Kovu and Vitani go back to the oasis and Kiara was there waiting for them.

"Hello you two." Kiara said greeting her friends.
"Hey Kiara." Kovu said. Vitani just waved.
"So do you to want to play?" Kiara asked.
"I...would prefer to eat. I'm really hungry." Kovu said.
"Ah. So you're here to eat again?" Kiara asked.
"He's been a bit of a pig lately." Vitani said.
"Hey!" Kovu shouted angrily at his sis.
"Heehee!" Giggled Kiara. "It's ok that you like to eat Kovu. It's just healthy."
"Thanks! Now if you excuse me....." Kovu then left Vitani and Kiara to get some fruit.
"That's my brother thinking about his stomach." Vitani said.
"So Vitani, do you want to play?" Kiara asked.
"I suppose I could....for a while." Vitani said.

While Vitani and Kiara played, Kovu went to stuff his face with some of the fruits from some of the trees. Kovu knew that fruit was not better than eating zebra or other types of meat, but the fruit was not bad. So Kovu enjoy eating more of it. He ate a few striped melons, some bananas, and some other tropical style fruit. He continue to gorge on more and his belly continue to grow a bit more and more. After a while, Kiara and Vitani were done playing and Kovu was just relaxing by a tree with half a coconut as a drink with a bamboo straw in his paw and a full belly.

"This is the life." Kovu said. "I hope it's like this when I'm king."
"Haha! You be king?" Kiara said overhearing him.
"Hey! I could be a good king." Kovu said.
"Well you defientely have the hunger of one." Vitani said.
"Good one, Vitani." Kiara said high fiving each other.
"Since when did you two became best friends?" Kovu asked.
"Since you were stuffing your gut." Vitani said. "So are you ready? We got to get back."
"Ugh. Fine." Kovu said not to happy.

So, Kovu and Vitani said goodbye to Kiara again and heading back to the outlands. While they were walking, Vitani took a good look at her brother.

"Well I have to say, you are REALLY letting yourself go." Vitani said.
"So I'm a little bigger? So what?" Kovu said.
"A little?" Vitani said know it wasn't just a little.

The truth is, Kovu was really fatter. Not only was his belly close to touching the ground, but his legs were thicker, his body was pudgier, and his face was puffer.

"Alright. So I may be overeating now. Like I said, I rather be fat than skinny anyway." Kovu said prideful.
"Yeah, but sooner or later, you might end of hippo size." Vitani said poking his belly.
"Well, it's not like you are that skinny anymore." Kovu replied.

Vitani was nowhere as big as Kovu, but her belly did extended a bit more than it use to.

"Alright, maybe I have some small pudge, but it's not like yours." Vitani said. "So watch out with all your weight."
"Yeah. Yeah." Kovu said.

As they walk more, they happen to run into something. To their surprise, they find.......
135211212.title: The next day....

1352112122.content:
There it was. An dead antelope just lying down on the ground. Kovu and Vitani didn't even need to hunt it down so finding it was lucky.

"Woah! An antelope." Kovu said.
"Wow! This is quite lucky." Vitani said. "Guess we better carry this to the others."
"Hold on." Kovu said halting his sister. "Are you sure?"
"Huh? What do you mean?" Vitani asked.
"If we bring this to the other lions, how much will be left for us?" Kovu said.
"Are you saying we should eat this ourselves?" Vitani said.
"Well...yeah." Kovu said with a smirk.
"But you just ate." Vitani shouted.
"So. This is ACTUAL meat." Kovu said. "We should let this slide."
"But the WHOLE antelope?" Vitani shouted out.
"Come on. I think we could handle it. I know I can." Kovu said.

Knowing that Kovu would never let this go, she had no choice but to agree.

"Fine. But remember, this was YOUR idea." Vitani said.

So the two cubs dig into the antelope. Vitani was only hungry enough to eat the hind legs of the antelope. Kovu however, ate way more than the legs. He ate parts from the chest, flank, and face areas. Heck, he ate practicely all of the antelope. He now had an even bigger belly now, touching the ground and making him a bit wider.

"BUUURRPP!' Belched Kovu. "So full. But it was worth it."
"You really are a pig." Vitani said.
"Haha! Guess I am." Kovu said patting his belly.

So with the eating done, Kovu and Vitani finally went back home.
1352112122.title: A dead antelope.

choices: Stuff Kovu with a large amount of food.
Pull a few pranks on Kovu.
13521121222.content:
It's been a couple of days and Kovu continues to go to the oasis with Kiara and Vitani. The main reason, of course is to eat and eat some more. Kovu and Vitani are still keeping everything secret from Zira and the other outlanders. But keeping it a secret for so long may not last. I mean, Kovu was already getting pretty big before, but now, he was getting quite large. All the feasting for the fruits and some zebras wasn't making him any smaller. The same can be said about Kiara and Vitani. They weren't as fat as Kovu, but they were both defientely chubbier. Currently, Kovu was in the Outlands home just laying down. That is, until his stomach growled. So he knew what that meant. So he went of to get his sister, who was napping.

"Vitani! You ready to go?" Kovu said to his sleepy sister.
"Let me guess. Your belly is growling again?" Vitani said getting up.
"You know it." Kovu said smiling.
"*sign* Alright. The fruit is fine and all, but you got to control your hunger, bro." Vitani said to him.
"Like you are one to talk." Kovu said poking his chubby sister.
"Don't poke me." Vitani shouted. "I've been hanging with you. Of course I was gonna gain a pound or two."
"Haha! Excuses. Excuses." Kovu said and laughed.
"You know. With the weight we both gain, both mom and the other lions will start asking questions." Vitani said.
"I think we will still be fine. I don't think mom cares much about our extra poundage." Kovu explained. "Otherwise, she would have said something."
"True, but what about Nuka?" Vitani asked.
"What about him?" Kovu said.
"Nuka is suppose to watch the both of us."
"He can barely watch himself. I mean, look at him."

Kovu and Vitani then turn to their older brother. Nuka was currently scratching himself,....from termites,.....again. Really, he was not in a "watching" mood, nor was he respondsible to watch anyone.

"You're right. Let's go." Vitani said.

So once again, they headed to the oasis. Kiara(who was as chubby as Vitani) was already waited for them.

"Hey guys." Kiara said greeting them.
"Hey Kiara." Said Kovu and Vitani.
"It looks like weight has gotten to you too." Vitani said.
"Yeah. My mom has been on me about that. But my dad doesn't seem to mind." Kiara said.
"At least the two of us are not like Kovu." Vitani said.
"Heehee. Yeah. He's close to a pig than lion now." Kiara said.
"Watch it you two." Kovu said a little ticked. "I don't need to listen to you two."

Kovu walked away to find some food.

"There he goes again." Vitani said. "Always thinking with his belly."
"Hey. That gives me an idea." Kiara said.
"Huh? What kind of idea?" Vitani asked.
"Heehee. Do you want to have some fun with Kovu?" Kiara asked Vitani.
"Depends on what you mean by....fun?" Vitani said.
"Well....we could...." Kiara then whispers to Vitani what idea she had in mind. Vitani replied with a smirk and a snicker.
"That could be fun." Vitani said to Kiara.

Kiara's idea of have fun was to.....
13521121222.title: A Few Days Later.....

135211212221.content:
Vitani and Kiara set up a large amount of food including more fruit and a couple of antelopes and gazelles. The food was all placed in a big pile. Kovu notice and was quite curious.

"What's with all the food here?" Kovu asked.
"Well, since you seem to have such a big hunger, the two of us decided to gather some food for a little feast for you." Kiara said.
"A feast?" Kovu said with his mouth starting to water.
"This is also to test how much you can really eat." Vitani said.
"We were even able to get some meat." Kiara mentioned.
"I noticed." Kovu said.
"So can you still eat?" Vitani asked.
"Of course." Kovu said sounding bold.

Kiara grabbed an antelope leg and went over Kovu to feed it to him. Kovu's mouth was full of antelope.

"Mmmph! Mmph!" Kovu said with his mouth full.
"Vitani and I thought it would be fun to feed you ourselves." Kiara said.
"So we hope you're ready." Vitani said.

With that, the feeding of Kovu began. Kiara grabbed more gazelle legs for Kovu to eat. He enjoyed them, but was having a hard time keeping up with chewing. Vitani got some berries and dropped into Kovu's mouth. The two cubs continue to feed more and more food to Kovu. His belly began to bloat up more and more. The girls began to increase the feed speed so much that Kovu was barely able to have time to shallow. Kovu started to notice how much his belly has expanded. After a while, Vitani and Kiara continued to feed Kovu.

Kovu's current weight: http://www.furaffinity.net/view/16227204...

"Wow. Look at that belly of yours now." Vitani said.
"Mmmmphh." Kovu said with food still in his mouth.
"Guess he really CAN pack in it" Kiara said. "We still have some food left. Should we keep going?

Kovu was looking pretty full. Odds are that he has each much more than he normally should. Kiara and Vitani decided....
135211212221.title: Stuff Kovu with a large amount of food.

1352112122211.content:
Vitani and Kiara continue to feed Kovu some more gazelle meat.

"Have some more gazelle." Vitani said stuffing his mouth with more food.
"Be sure to eat it all." Kiara said.

Kovu ate more and more of the chunks of meat. Kovu layed down on his back as his belly bloated up more and more. Kovu seemed to be handle the feedings quite well. But he was get close to the size of a kid hippo. After some more zebras, gazelle and fruit, Kovu was really full. It showed with the way his belly was groaning.

"Soooo... full." Kovu said.
"Wow Kovu. Surprised you were able to handle it all." Kiara said.
"You really have a king sized appetite." Vitani said. "Bigger even."
"Well this belly of mine defientily shows." Kovu said. "I don't think I can even more proper now."
"Don't worry. I'll help roll you home." Vitani said. "See ya, Kiara."

Vitani then started rolling her brother home. On a full stomach, this was hard for Kovu to handle. But they had to get back home to the Outlands. After a while, they made it back and Kovu spend the rest of the day laying down and digesting his meal.
1352112122211.title: To feed Kovu some more.

13522.content:
He starts gaining when he is first seen as an adult in the movie

He starts gaining after the movie
13522.title: Full grown lion

135221.content:
Kovu had been through a lot of training, since he was a young cub and was now a young adult.
His mother Zira had trained him well, but to Kovu deep down he didn't want to be like this, he wanted to be happy not a trained killer.

It was the day for Kovu to infiltrate the Pride Lands, Zira's plan was in motion, she had ordered Kovu's brother and sister Nuka and Vitani to start a fire while Kiara was on her first hunt, even though Kovu knew the plan, he was planing on something different: he wanted to see Kiara again and this was his chance.

Kovu had rescued Kiara from the fire and had asked Simba if he could live in the Pride Lands, for now he was allowed in, Zira however did not know Kovu was following his own plan and not her's.
135221.title: Into the Pride Lands

choices: Bring it back to Pride Rock
1352211.content:
It was early in the morning, Kovu was waking up by the large rock outside the den of Pride Rock, he knew he wasn't fully trusted in the Pride Lands but that didn't bother him too much, it was expected due to him being a former Outlander.

Kovu saw kiara coming out of the den, he wanted to build up trust in the Pride Lands so he offered a hunting lesson to her.

"Hey Kiara I was wondering if you wanted to go on a hunting lesson with me," Kovu said trying to be friendly. Kiara replied:"I guess I could use some practice, sure, let's go."

Out in the fields of the Pride Lands, Kovu was showing Kiara how to move more quietly and stalk up on prey, they were in the tall grass watching some antelope grazing. "OK, now keep low to the ground, feel the earth under your paws and then attack," Kovu said.

Kiara nodded and stalked to the antelope, she crouched and jumped after one. The chase was on. The antelopes scattered in panic but thanks to Kovu's training Kiara easily took one down. She was in triumph.

"Thank you, Kovu, for all your help," Kiara said hapily.

"Nothing to it," Kovu said smiling.
1352211.title: Hunting lesson

13522111.content:
"Let's dig in," Kiara said, "I bet you're hungry"

Kovu nodded, he was hungry and he had never had a meal as fresh as this, being an Outlander there was very little food so he was looking forward to having a decent meal.

Kovu and Kiara started to eat the antelope and Kovu was amazed at how good it tasted he had never had such great food in his life. With every bite Kovu was more and more focused on eating, kiara was only hungry enough to eat the forelegs of the antelope however Kovu ate the hind legs, the belly, face areas, he almost ate the entire thing, Kiara was surprised that Kovu could eat that much. When Kovu finished he licked his muzzle and belched.

It was going unnoticed to Kovu until now that he had a small potbelly, but It didn't seem to bother him.

"Are you okay?" Kiara asked, looking at Kovu's larger stomach.

"Yeah, I feel great, I haven't had such great food in my life." Kovu said smiling.

"You look tired," Kiara said.

"I guess I am a little." Kovu replied, lying down.

"I'll leave you to rest," Kiara said, "I'm going to head back to Pride Rock, will you be alright out here?"

"Yeah I'll be fine, see you later." Kovu closed his eyes and went to sleep with a full belly.
13522111.title: Breakfast

choices: Next morning, simba talks to Kovu
135221111.content:
Kovu woke up about midday, the sun was high in the sky and animals roamed the PrideLands. He yawned and stood up, he still had a small potbelly from his meal earlier, Kovu didn't mind, it in fact he was actually feeling hungry again.

He knew it was only midday but that didn't stop his rumbling belly, since there was no-one with him he would have to hunt on his own, that wasn't a problem he was a skilled hunter, so he decided to go to a zebra field.

Kovu eyed a large zebra, he knew that wold satisfy his hunger, he chased after it, his potbelly slowed him down a little but he was still fast enough to catch it, the zebra was on the ground in minutes.
Kovu ate the zebra, bite after bite, with every mouthful of meat he indulged more and more and his belly grew bigger.

Kovu amazingly managed to eat the entire zebra, he now had a large amount fat covering his body, his legs had thickened, his face looked more puffy and his belly hung down almost touching the ground, even his tail had thickend with fat. His newfound weight made walking more difficult, his legs brushed against each other causing him to waddle.

It was at that moment that Kiara came back to check on him, she was shocked at Kovu's size, she had to ask:

"What happend, are you alright?"

"Yeah i'm great, I love it here." Kovu replied

"I can see that," Kiara said, pointing at his oversized belly, "do you want to go back to Pride Rock?"

"Sure I need a rest anyway," Kovu replied waddling beside his friend.

They reach Pride Rock and Kovu lied down on his fat stomach and went to sleep in the den, Kiara lay beside her tubby friend as the sun descend over the horison.
135221111.title: Kovu's hunger

choices: Simba gets lionesses to hunt for Kovu
1352211111.content:
Kovu wakes up the next morning, the sun rays illuminated the Pride Lands and animals roamed the fields. In the den of Pride Rock it was very common to see lions and lionesses lounging around, however it was uncommon to see a lion as fat as Kovu in there, he had put on a lot of weight from yesterday's meal and he was now about to leave the den.

At that moment Simba came in to the den, Kovu was a little nervous at what the king might say to him.

"So, enjoying the food here, tubby Kovu?" Simba asked chuckling.

"Uh yeah, " Kovu replied, nervously looking at his large belly.

"Don't be nervous, I just wanted to say that, I was concerned about you being an Outlander but now I can clearly see you do want to be a part of the pride." Simba said.

"Thank you, Simba," Kovu said gratefully.

"Hakuna matata," Simba replied.

"Simba, I was wondering, could you help me with something?" Kovu asked.

"What is it?" Simba asked curiously.

"Well because of my recent weight gain, I don't think I can hunt and I was wondering if you could catch something for me."
1352211111.title: Tubby Kovu

13522111111.content:
"Sure thing, tubby Kovu," Simba teased.

"Hey," Kovu said jokingly.

Simba and Kovu walked through the fields of the PrideLands - well Simba walked, Kovu waddled - and eventually came across a herd of gazelle.

"Ok, stay down while I hunt one, tubby Kovu," Simba teased again.

"That name is going to stick isn't it?" Kovu smiled.

"Well if you keep eating I might have to call you 'obese Kovu'," Simba chuckled.

Kovu rolled his eyes. Simba started chasing the gazelle herd and took one down, to Kovu's delight it was a large one. Kovu smiled as he went over to Simba.

"Thank you, simba," Kovu said.

"No problem tubby Kovu, just remember what I said would happen to your name if you get any bigger," Simba chuckled again.

Kovu laughed, "sure."

As Simba walked away Kovu began feasting on the gazelle, he once again endulged in the flavorous meat, he ate and and ate, and he gained more and more weight, despite the prey being large it didn't bother Kovu. He eventually finished his large meal, licked his muzzle and took a good long look at his fatter body.

His legs had thickened up more almost to the size of tree trunkes, he could still waddle but only just, his tail had fattened up to the point where it was too heavy to lift, his belly bulged with huge chunks of fat touching the ground and widening him and if it wasn't for his mane you would be able to see a second chin.

By this point it was evening, Kovu began very slowly waddling back to Pride Rock his belly dragged along the ground making him slower , Kiara came by to find Kovu and suppressed a laugh at her obese friend. No words needed to be said they both started laughing and headed back to Pride Rock.
13522111111.title: Food for Kovu

choices: Kovu eats some of the hippo
Kovu eats most of the hippo
135221111111.content:
It was midday in the PrideLands, and all the animals were roaming the fields, there was one exception, Kovu. With each passing day he had become lazier and fatter, and Kovu loved it. As the obese lion opened his eyes and woke up, his giant belly rumbled. Kovu knew he was getting fatter each day but he didn't mind, in fact he kind of liked the feeling of his extra soft body.

Kovu slowly stood up and waddled out of the den his giant belly dragging along the floor. As he emerged from the den entrance he was met by Simba.

"Hey, obese Kovu," Simba said smiling.

Kovu laughed, "Yeah, I thought you would say that."

"I did warn you," Simba chuckled, "but never mind, I just wanted to give you somnething."

"Really, what?" Kovu asked.

"Follow me it's just round here," Simba replied.

Simba led Kovu to something that made his mouth water. A fat hippo!

"Me and a few other lionesses hunted this for you, it's all yours, obese Kovu," Simba said.

"Are you sure, you're okay with my eating?" Kovu asked.

"Nothing wrong with a large appatite, besides I can see you enjoy being large." Simba replied pointing to Kovu's giant belly.

"In that case thanks, but when I'm done with this you'll need to think of a bigger name to call me." Kovu said and Simba laughed.

As Simba walked away Kovu started eating his colossal feast, knowing he would get bigger.

13531112.title: Some other reason.

135311121.content:
It was an ordinary day for Timon, as he was searching around the jungle to find some good bugs to eat.

It usually was him and Pumbaa doing it together, but this time Timon wanted to see if her could find anything "extra special" that he wouldn't have to share with anyone else.

He had heard that in these particular parts there was would live some extra big worms under the tree logs, and given how he enjoyed the slimy taste of them he wanted to find one.

Looking into a closed up area of the jungle Timon saw a big log, laying by itself. "The bigger the tree log, the more worms should be found under it." Timon thought as he turned over the log.

Then you can imagine his surprise when he turned it over, and instead of a bunch of small worms he found one HUGE worm! It was probably about as big as he was!

"This will be my dream meal." Timon thought, as he thought of how to eat this thing.

One way he always enjoy eating his worms was to swallow them whole and then let them wriggle around in his belly, but with this enormous one that might not be so easy.

Luckily he had learnt a secret trick to make the worms do as he wanted. By taking a bite of a special flower (that was containing a very strong smell), he would give his mouth a very strong scent that would make the worms want to crawl right into it.

The taste of the flower was pretty awful, but Timon knew it would all be worth it for when the worm would come for the smell in his breath. After eating it, he just laid down on the ground, and just wait for the worm to come to him.

As he was breathing out (and letting the smell spread out through the air.) the worm picked up the smell, and started heading towards the source. As it came close to Timon's mouth instead of getting scared, it got only more interested as it's new "home" seemed to be both warm and wet.

As he laid on his stomach Timon could feel the big worm entering his mouth. Trying to contain himself and not bite down into it, Timon let the worm find it's way through his mouth and down his throat. (He at least had to give the worm a few tastes from his tongue as it went down.)

He could feel the one end of the worm entering his stomach, and still he had the other end of it still outside of him! This made Timon wonder if he would even be able to contain it all.

As he swallowed down more and more of the worm he had to turn around, and lay on his back in order to put less pressure on his belly.

After much swallowing and stuffing Timon had the last of the worm past his lips, and he could close his mouth and "gulp" one last time.

Looking down he could see that his small body looked really stretched. He was so full that he could barley move from his current position, and his skin being so thin that you could see the white worm moving down in there.

"Oh my god! I feel as stuffed as a sausage!" The meerkat though as he felt himself shake around a little, from the worm inside trying to get out of him.

As he was feeling so satisfied with himself he notice that someone has been watching him while he ate his meal, but who?

"HA HA HA!!!" Laughed Shenzi. "Look what we have here." Shenzi smiled evilly knowing that Timon was to frightened and/or stuffed to move. "Wow!" Snarled Benzi. "Look at the size of that thing, it's as stuffed as a hippo who ate the rest of its herd..." Ed (of course) laughed HYSTERICALLY after Benzi's bad relation.
Shenzi's smile got bigger with bloodlust for the swollen meerkat. "Say...how's about we get a much BIGGER meal..." Shenzi growled gleefully. Benzi knew what she was hinting. "Yeah." Added Benzi. "A much BIGGER meal." Ed laughed again. This time Benzi giving him the evil-eye. Ed shut up almost as he said it.
Shenzi barked just to scare Timon then laughed insanely, as did the rest of the hyenas.
Timon on the other hand had NO idea what they were hinting at. He'd never been the smartest meerkat in the hole.
"Uh...Shenzi?" Said Benzi.
"What?!" She barked.
"Do you think Scar would like this?" Replied Benzi in a soft whisper so Timon couldn't hear.
"No." Murmured Shenzi. "He'll love it! And what's not to love, a meerkat as big as Africa? Please, we'll never go hungry again!"
"If you say so." Said Benzi more confidently. Just then, Benzi grabbed Timon by the scruff, and they started to run out of the jungle, into the desert, and into an oasis. (to take a quick water break, Ed killed a small zebra and is now gnawing on the bone stupidly.) Benzi never let Timon go, along the long run. Sometimes him and Shenzi would switch. Timon preferred Benzi holding him by the scruff, he wasn't nearly as rough as Shenzi was. Although he didn't like being grabbed by the collar for six hours.
Timon had drifted to sleep. Dreaming of yummy, yummy, bugs. Finally-
"WE'RE HERE!!!" Shenzi screeched.
Timon jolted awake and saw that his stomach was still the plump-size it had been before this hyena crisis. Timon looked up and saw his fate right in front of him. He knew that he would be here for a long, long, LONG time.

Right in front of Timon was the most glorious/disturbing thing he has ever seen. A chocolate waterfall. Complete with gummy animals.
"Uh, guys?" Timon questioned.
"WHAT?!" Snapped Shenzi. Timon flinched.
"Is that what I think it is...I mean- is that REAL?!" Studdered Timon.
"OF COURSE, that's what you think it is. What do ya think? Am I stooopid or somethin'?!" Shenzi said sarcastically.
"No, no." Assured Timon.
"That's where you is gonna live" Benzi said with Timon's collar in his teeth.
Benzi dropped Timon. "Thank god," Timon groaned as he was dropped to the ground with a small 'thud'. The hyenas turned to leave, but just as they seemed to be going...
"Don't even THINK about coming back. You understand?" Warned Shenzi. "We'll be back in a few days to see your 'progress'...now enjoy yourself...while you still can move...HAHAHAHAAAA!!!" The hyena's laughed trailed loudly through the savannah as the left running. "Probably gonna tell Scar..." Timon groaned. "Now, what do they expect me to do?" He said as he stared at the heavenly sight of melting, fattening, chocolate.
Timon's stomach gurgled for food. "*sigh* Guess it's just you and me Stomach."
It gurgled again. "Huh? I guess I'm hungry. Now, let's check this thing out. Sha'll we?"
He strolled over confidently as he stepped on a few gummy gators on his way to the chocolate haven.
SPLASH!
"Ahh..." He sied as he did backstrokes in the choco-river. He swam waist-deep to where the chocolate fell. The waterfall roared as he stuck his head under. With his moulth open he gobbled up all the chocolate he could before running out of air. He gasped for air as he came back out.
Little did he know, he was getting fatter every gulp he took. After his first encounter he had gained 50 more pounds. He was heavy. Almost obese. But he could still move. Speaking of 'but' all the chocolate went directly to his ass. He was growing buttcheeks as big as grapefruit. His stomach had become flabbier and dragged down to the floor. His cheeks were oranges. His eyes were starting to be blocked by his cheeks. Each flabby arm seemed to have weighed a ton. He could still move them in front of him and behind. But just barley. His legs on the other hand were puffy and las large as hippo legs. They were the only thing keeping him from landing on his back. And beneith all of this was his small (now stubby) tail.
Timon burped. He seemed satisfied not knowing that he was becoming an elephant. "Let's go for another dunk."

13531112122112112221.title: Timon becomes fatter than her and eats her

135311121221122.content:
Simba had been under Timon and Pumbaa's wing for a while at this point, and he was very close to reaching his full adult size. His mane had mostly grown in, with just a patch or two looking a bit shabby, and his body had developed into its lithe form, somewhat lanky as his all-bug diet still wasn't quite enough to support his still-growing nature. He had been spending time with Pumbaa, wandering the jungle, when the warthog mentioned he hadn't seen Timon for a few hours. The two of them decided to split up and find out where the meerkat had gone. As he walked, the young lion saw the hyenas wandering away from somewhere quickly, laughing to themselves, and he knew something was wrong.

Reversing the hyenas' steps, Simba quickly discovered the chocolate fountain, and at first he had no idea what he was looking at, at least until he saw Timon splashing under the waterfall. While the meerkat was enjoying himself, all but his head and arms were underwater (or under chocolate, to be precise), and he thought the meerkat was struggling and getting pulled under the waterfall's tides. "Don't worry, Timon, I'm coming!", the lion yelled, as he took a running dive into the water.

Of course, Simba had no idea that the chocolate was thicker and more viscous than normal water, so he was taken aback when he landed with a SPLAT! and knocked the wind out of himself. This led to the lion doing what he thought the meerkat was doing, flailing around and drinking some of the chocolate in the process. By the time Simba had caught his breath, he came to a new realization, that the chocolate was delicious, and he started taking sips, then gulps, as he recovered and swam over to Timon under the waterfall.

"Timon, are you OK?", the lion said. "Are you kidding, Simba? I feel great right now! In fact, I challenge you! Swim over here under the waterfall and let's see who can drink the longest before needing air!"

"Well, sure, if you really want to," the lion replied, maneuvering under the waterfall and getting in position. "3, 2, 1, go!", Timon said, and the two started gulping down the chocolate as fast as they could. About a minute later, Simba finally sputtered to a gasp and swam out of the water. "Uncle!", he said, "you win!" The meerkat, gloatingly, started swimming onto shore, gloating all the way. "I knew I could beat you!", he said, as he slowly pulled his massive self out of the chocolate. To Simba's shock, his little meerkat friend wasn't so little anymore. In fact, he was absolutely massive, fat puffing out from every angle and rounding almost every visible body part.

If that wasn't enough, the lion was even more shocked when he had difficulty climbing out of the liquid himself. Looking himself over, he was easily 100 pounds heavier, if not more, his flanks twice their size and his entire underbody hanging a foot lower than it used to.

"Isn't this great?", Timon said.
135311121221122.title: Simba

1353111212211221.content:
Simba licked his lips and contemplated the sudden changes occurring to himself and Timon. Despite having swollen about five times bigger than he had been, Timon seemed perfectly fine with his weight gain. He could move freely still with no issues somehow and happily laid down under a nearby tree. And... hakuna matata, of course... why worry about this? Tons of food and extreme comfort. What's so bad about that? "Well, yeah, this isn't bad at all," Simba started to say.

"I'm glad you agree! Stick around for a little while, won't you? I'm feeling sleepy from all this food and I'm going to take a nap," Timon said. "Let me know if anything happens or anyone comes by." Almost immediately, the meerkat fell into a food coma, his body needing all of his energy to digest his massive belly full of chocolate.

Simba decided to wander around the area of the waterfall, but didn't see anyone or anything. He went upstream to see if he could find its source, but he found the large stream stemmed straight from a hole in the ground on the edge of the jungle. Try as he might, the lion couldn't find anything more. The hole came from underground, it looked natural, he had no explanation for it. He walked back to the bottom of the waterfall and bent down to take just a sip from the chocolate to quench his thirst. Instead, it just reminded him of how good the drink tasted. It took him only a few seconds to take another sip, then another. Then, throwing abandon to the wind, Simba decided to dive head-first into the chocolate, taking in a few mouthfuls as he swam under the surface and back up. For a minute he swam back and forth, drinking as he went, before finding himself under the waterfall itself. He treaded in place and let the chocolate fall into his mouth, drinking in the rich treat, losing himself in its taste.

A few hours later, Timon finally woke up from his nap, fully refreshed, his belly smaller as it wasn't full anymore, but his body thicker all around due to the digested chocolate that became pure fat. Simba called out to him from the edge of the pond. "Hey, Timon, you're awake!" The obese meerkat looked at his lion friend stunned to see him...
1353111212211221.title: "Well... yeah!", Simba replied.

135312121.content:
"Timon, Timon!" A voice yelled. Timon was snug in a small pile of leaves in his burrow underground. He wiggled a foot and mumbled- "Unnh, comin Ma..."
"TIMON!" The voice made Timon jump out of bed immediately. It was his Ma, the short and stout meerkat that has raised him all his life. "Aw Geez Ma.." Timon muttered, rubbing his eyes. "Did ya hafta wake me up this early?!"
"Sure I did honey, cause today's your birthday, YAY! And for your present, your Uncle Max and I thought of the most thoughtful thing..."
"What is it?!" Said The male meerkat, intrigued.
"We're kicking you out!" Am responded gleefully, Uncle Max, as if on cue blew a tiny party whistle.
Timon's expression changed completely, "But Ma-" he began,
"No buts, the only butt I want is yours out the door!" Am commanded with a large smile on her face.
"Ma what's the reason behind all of this?!" Timon begged
"Well, we still want you son, but we applied you for a job to start a new colony! Somewhere else! Aren't you excited?! Everyone's celebrating!" Ma explained. "There's a leaving ceremony and everything!"
Timon frowned, and began to pack his bags, he could hear the laughter coming from the main chamber.
"Oh honey, don't be like that, take this as an opportunity to make a 'new you' I bet you'll be the biggest meerkat the world's ever seen!" Then Ma kissed him, "Now I can't be late for the leaving ceremony, see you out there!"
"Fine, if they don't want me, I'll show them, I will be the biggest meerkat they have ever seen, I WILL!" Timon exited to the ceremony with reluctance and sorrow, everyone was cheering and smiling but for a different reason, they wanted to be rid of him. As Timon walked down the center, meerkats with tiny trumpets blew, crowds screeched.
"Welp, this is the one moment everyone's gonna pay attention to you, you better enjoy it buddy-boy." Timon mumbled to himself, then like magic, Timon waved and smiled, beginning to actually enjoy himself, but when he reached the end of the line. All the crowds scattered, without even a "goodbye".
"Lousy guys anyways, I'll show them! I'll be so big, that they'll be absorbed in my- biggness!" Timon stammered, "Just you wait!"

After hours of being in the hot desert, Timon saw something in the distance, it looked like a person.
"Hello?!" He shouted, "Are you okay sir, or mam?!" No reply, Timon began to get closer only to see it was-
