135322211.content:
Pumbaa slipped around a corner, kinda slyly, he was half way up the hill which led to Rafiki's tree. He knew hyenas roamed at night so he had to be careful.
Pumbaa felt bad for not bringing his buddy, Timon along... But someone had to watch Simba, he was growing up, an almost-matured teenager.
As Pumbaa crept up the tree-made stairs that led to the top of the tree, the warthog smelled something...Something good...
135322211.title: When Timon and Pumbaa are raising Simba

choices: He sees how much he gained
1353222111.content:
He smelled something good. Better than grubs! Better than beetles! (Which were his personal favorite) It smelled like actual food! He hasn't had food in so long, not since his days in a zoo, but that's another story.
Pumbaa finally had reached the top of the stairs and saw a HUGE banquet laid out. Fruits, meats, nuts, veggies, delicious bugs, and stuff he hasn't even seen before! Like any good pig, Pumbaa, (without a second thought) gobbled up a wooden tray of fruits, it was probably the most amazing thing he has ever had! He wolfed down the seven other trays of the same fruit. Delicious!
Pumbaa smacked his lips. Now he was hungry, STARVING in fact. He had to have more! He jumped on the table swallowing anything he could possibly see. (One in a while he swallowed a wooden plate, and that was gross).
Pumbaa ate a whole 'nother tray of meats. Didn't know what kind of meat it was, but it suuuure was delectable.
Tray after tray, plate after plate, Pumbaa almost swore the once nicely set dinner never ended until-
1353222111.title: He finds food and eats it all

choices: He puts a spell on Pumbaa to eat literally everything in sight
He fattens up Pumbaa greatly with a replenishing meal
13532221111.content:
"What are you doing?" An angry Rafiki said. "Uhhhhhh....*urp*" Pumbaa replied blankly as he tried to think of an idea. Just then he tried to make a run for the staircase he entered in on, but Rafiki caught him by the ear. "Uh, uh, uh." Rafiki said seriously. "You started the meal, now you are going to finish it. This is what you wanted, no?"
Pumbaa was terrified he was breathing heavier than usual. He couldn't really speak. He'd never seen the baboon be so seriously angry.
"Err...." Pumbaa stuttered. "Oh, yes, yes, I see...You wanted this. You had a vision." Rafiki put extra emphasis on the 'vision' as he spoke to the frightened pig.
"Well...no, actually, me and Timon needed-" Pumbaa was interrupted by the seemingly now excited, old, monkey.
"Shush." Rafiki hit Pumbaa in the face lightly to shut him up. "I know what you came for..." He smiled pretty terrifyingly at the warthog. "I know what you've always desired...and that will come true...right...now."
13532221111.title: Rafiki enters

135322211111.content:
Without another word, a blast of white light burst through the small windows of the tree. It could of been lightening, but it was too bright for that. Poor Pumbaa was extremely confused. He didn't know what Rafiki was even hinting at before. Soon the white light swarmed around Pumbaa, it picked him off the ground, shortly it turned green and it smelled rancid, like a dead zebra left in the hot, blazing, Savannah, sun to rot. All the smelly light became a ball floating above Pumbaa, it forced him to open his mouth, Pumbaa reluctantly agreed, and he swallowed the stinky mist. After the 'spell' Pumbaa started to feel weird. His stomach began to growl visciously.
"Man, I'm hungry. Well, I, uh, better get going Rafiki, nice to run into you here!" A still confused Pumbaa semi-politely told the creepily happy baboon. Then the cursed, tusked, pig turned around and left.
About halfway back to the jungle, Pumbaa (without him knowing) started snacking on anything he could find; grass, dirt, bugs (which was normal for a warthog like Pumbaa) , and sometimes he even tried to eat rocks! After some thinking Pumbaa finally started to eat,
135322211111.title: He puts a spell on Pumbaa to eat literally ever...

choices: A predator finds him (not Simba or Nala)
1353222111112.content:
"Wow, I'm so hungry, and these rocks, they look, so, GOOD!" Pumbaa started diving into the medium-sized pile of rocks beneath him, and he somehow are them without chipping a tusk.
First one, then seven, then thirty, he was eating so fast he started to sweat massively, he had never eaten anything so fast in his life, in fact he had never been a pig this much in his life!
"Umph, ergh, ungh," Pumbaa groaned as he chowed down the stones. He hated every second of it, but he ate them anyways, Pumbaa closed his eyes the whole time he was pigging out.
All the rocks came flocking to his stomach, his chubby belly first was a small pot-belly, then it turned into a monster that nearly had touched the floor, he started to develop more of a butt as well, each big cheek was the size of an overripe grapefruit, he started to grow a third chin as well (he already had 2), soon Pumbaa ran out of rocks to eat, and man was he stuffed, he let out a small burp and laid on his back, and stared at the stars... Suddenly-
1353222111112.title: Rocks

13532221111121.content: Who will this predator be?
13532221111121.title: A predator finds him (not Simba or Nala)

135322211111211.content: Maybe someone else we know?
135322211111211.title: The Hyenas

choices: A fat, somewhat crazy, although motherly crocodile (Mama Godi)
135322211111212.title: Someone new

13532221111122.content:
"Pumbaa? Is that you???" A familiar voice asked. Pumbaa jumped (he tried anyways, his stomach got in the way). "Uhhhhhh, I can explain Timon!" Pumbaa hesitated, he wasn't completely sure it was Timon anyways. "Did you get it?" Timon asked impatiently, not seeing Pumbaa's size. "Er...Yeah Timon, it's, uh...Right here! " The bloated warthog said, as he tried to get up.
Timon waited (not so well) he tapped his foot rapidly. "Say, what's takin' so long?" The impatient meerkat whined. "Timon, I can't get up." Pumbaa was embarrassed to state this.
"You, you-WHAT?!" Timon yelled. He fell onto his slightly fatter friend's body, it bounced him back up like a rubber ball hitting a trampoline. Without another word Timon tried to lift his buddy up. But failed. Pumbaa started to munch on the reachable grass. He started to swell pretty frantically. "Ungh, erf, Timon, I-ech, can't, stop." The feeding warthog pleaded as his body started to round out.
Timon gasped, he'd never seen Pumbaa this hungry/fat, he started to roll his bloating chum back to the-
13532221111122.title: Timon finds him

choices: He wakes up and bribes Simba to give him more food
135322211111221.content:
Timon started to budge the fattening pig to the jungle, slowly yet surley,,thankfully the jungle wasn't too far away, otherwise Timon might of been crushed. Pumbaa left a trail of the grass and dirt he was eating, gaining every step of the way.
When they finally reached the jungle, Timon rolled his friend into his stomach so he would be less uncomfortable. "Don't worry buddy, I'm gonna make you a secure area." Within 20 mins Timon had made a medium-sized shack out of twigs and grass, he built it around Pumbaa of course. There was nothing edible in sight, the ground was made out of Pumbaa's least favorite, wood. Well, twigs to be exact. Pumbaa had gained quite a bit since their first encounter. His legs dangled off the ground because of Pumbaa's great belly which sprawled out onto the twig floor. Pumbaa's cheeks were a lot bigger. Both of them. His butt had gained more though. It was the size of a hyena pup. His cheeks were noticeably bigger as well. He had gained many more chins as well. (3). "Now big buddy, you stay here, I'll think about what to do with you in the morning. " Timon walked away, hoping Pumbaa wouldn't interrupt or ask questions, and he didn't, then Pumbaa started drifting to sleep...
135322211111221.title: Jungle

1353222111112211.content:
'NO!' Pumbaa thought as his eyes jotted open. I must have more food! I'm sooooo hungry!
Soon Pumbaa saw a shadow slink near the prison he was in. Pumbaa gulped and sank lower to the floor. All the hiding was for nothing, because the fierce shadow was only Simba!
(Simba is a teen now so he has red patches of fur growing out of his head, and starting his mane, he is a lanky cub, but a well-fed one as well.)
"S-Simba! What are you doing up past your bedtime?!" Pumbaa wheezed while slumping down into the darkness to hope Simba doesn't notice.
"Pumbaa," A matured Simba started. "I'm not a cub anymore, plus Timon is trying to find something anyways..."
"Oh, right...Sometimes I forget that you're not a cub anymore....Now, Simba..." Pumbaa said in a loud whisper.
"I'm so hungry, and I don't have the skills to hunt down a....hmmm....gazelle....yeah a gazelle. And I wanted to try something new, Y'know?" Pumbaa stuttered.
"I see what this is all about..." A suspicious yet playful Simba started, as he began to walk closer to Pumbaa's wood-covered, fat-hiding, den.
"Ya-ya do?!" Pumbaa said, hunger soon faded into fear, he slumped down even further. His head was barley visible in the light anymore. The only thing Simba could see was his eyes, and now the warthog's eyes were out of sight.
"You want me to test out my nighttime hunting skills!" Simba was excited to even think about it, One of Simba's new hobbies growing up was nighttime hunting, for when he got into a fight with Timon or Pumbaa, and when he didn't want to eat his least-favorite, stink bugs...Simba was overjoyed to hear this from his morbid, hiding, gaurdian.
"Sure!" Pumbaa agreed. He relaxed a bit more, his belly grumbled loudly, his rejoice turned into hunger, and soon Simba was off...
1353222111112211.title: He wakes up and bribes Simba to give him more food

13532221111122111.content:
"Gazelle...Gazelle...." Simba repeated to himself as he slyly slid out of the jungle. He was afraid to forget, and Simba knew he was prone to this as well. "Gazelle...Ga-zelle." Simba tried to make the word sound more fun so it would be more interesting to find.
As Simba repeated the same word over and over again, he was greeted by the dry clay crackling beneath his light feet. This brought Simba back to when Timon and Pumbaa found him...but that's another story. Anyway, Simba traveled for what seemed like miles but really was a couple of feet, there was a small patch of grass not to far away from his hideaway of a home. "There HAS to be Ga-zullz there!" (Simba had decided his new word for 'gazelles' was 'ga-zulls'.)
He pranced silently and quickly over to the dry-grassed realm of abandonment. 'Abandonment' is a strong word. The truth is, it WAS occupied, but by the wrong people. (animals.) Instead of 'happily-sleeping' gazelles, there were even 'happier-sleeping' hyenas. There were at least twenty-something of them, each were different in structure and spots, but all the same in width, each hyena was pleasantly plump, but that was the only good way to put it.
'Wow, I've never seen a hyena so fat before!' Thought Simba impolitely but truthfully.
Each hyena was fast asleep, not to mention drooling and groaning in gluttony.
'That's weird, I've never seen a hyena that close before and that fat, but shouldn't they be awake at this time of night?' Simba thought again, stepping over one of the bigger hyenas in the pack. 'They must of eaten all of the ga-zullz...I know! I can give Pumbaa a hyena! He said his taste was striving for something new!'
'Now how am I to do it? They'll notice if I drag them that far, amd they hafta be at least 150 pounds each! Maybe just one. One hyena. That's all. The rest will be ga-zullz.'
Simba gently put his maw around the overweight hyena that he stepped over's leg. It flinched and grunted, but didn't wake up thankfully. It was one of the biggest of the patch, but definitely not THE biggest. This one was weighing around 210 pounds. But Simba heard VERY loud snoring coming from a cave within the hyena-patch. He could only imagine what monstrosity was hiding in there.
'Maybe 500, no 1,000 pounds!' Simba entertained himself by guessing the exact weight of the hyena-boss sleeping within the rocky den. He had made quite a bit of progress, he was already back to the cracking clay he had set foot upon earlier.
The rest of the way, The lion-tween thought about what Pumbaa had been doing the whole time, sometimes Simba's mind would dart back to the fattest hyena in the lot of pigs that was the old gazelle breeding point. He wasn't aroused by it, he was more interested by it, after he gave Pumbaa his prize, The young lion would run back to the group of chubs to check it out some more.
He couldn't believe that the hyena hadn't woken up yet. But as soon as Simba thought that, he was there. With is unseen protector, inside the makeshift hit Timon had made for him.
"Pumbaa, in back! Look what I got!" Simba parted away from his snoozing find. Pumbaa let out a full scream when he saw the whale of a beast.
"I said my taste was varied, not a death wish!!!" Pumbaa exclaimed.
"But aren't you proud of me!" Simba grinned.
"Proud, of course, but, AHHHHHH!"
"Don't worry, it's asleep!" Simba replied cheerfully.
"That doesn't make a difference! What happened to the gazelle?"
"This technically is the gazelle, Pumbaa. What's left of it anyways. Inside the hyena."
"Alright, alright," Pumbaa finally gave in, Simba nudged it closer to Pumbaa, reluctantly, The hog of a hog swallowed the hyena whole. (not vore, the hyena is not alive) Simba waited for his mission giver to say something. Two minutes later the pig let out a tremendous burp.
"'Scuse me." Pumbaa finally responded. "Now Simba, do you think you could get...more of these hyenas?"
13532221111122111.title: Follow Simba

135322211111221111.content:
Simba bounced from side-to-side with joy, "Oh yeah Pumbaa! There's a whole lot of them!" Simba exclaimed at the top of his lungs, "Shhhhhh" Pumbaa shushed loudly "Don't let Timon know, ok?"
Simba nodded in agreement, "It will be our little secret?" The adolescent cub winked, "Our little secret..." The shadowed hog burped back, "Now go get me somethin' good!"
Before Pumbaa could finish, Simba was off, he passed the dried clay quickly, and into the grassy field.
When he got to the field, Simba prodded a smaller hyena, (a 500 pound one), it's tummy rippled and the animal grunted and shifted it's position, but other than that nothing was too special about this one...
Simba carefully crept across the plateau, blobby hyenas everywhere he turned, but none caught his eye, they were all pretty small, then Simba remembered- The Big One...
The beast's snore still rumbled the land, Simba prayed it didn't pass gas, otherwise Simba wouldn't know what to do or where to hide of that happened.
When Simba entered the den, he was greeted with a-
135322211111221111.title: During the feeding

1353222111112211112.content: What else could it be?
1353222111112211112.title: Something else (not a hyena)

135322211112.content:
"No, no.." The ape insisted. "You started this, now you finish it." Rafiki smiled wickedly.
Pumbaa was too busy digging in to worry. He sat on the table, legs spread and wooden plates stacked all around him, Pumbaa picked up the dishes and piled them into his mouth.
Of course he was too oblivious to see he was gaining weight rapidly. It all went straight to his belly, it began to turn blobbier and start to cover the table in a sea of flab.
"Nice, nice." Rafiki said with a devilish glint in his eye. "You will be VERY useful indeed..."
Pumbaa couldn't hear the wise (yet creepy) old ape, all the hog could hear were the sounds of him smacking his lips, grunting, and sometimes even burping or farting.
Pumbaa packed on the pounds, the meal was too good for him to pass up, he'd never had something so good in years. And his stomach agreed. His butt, cheeks, and chin(s) for that matter,,did not. They started to swell with blubber as well. Pumbaa's gut had almost broken the table, it spread like a heavy sheet. Pumbaa's legs started to become useless and small compared to the rest of his gluttonous body. His bottom legs just sat there, slowly being pushed into his belly. His top legs have almost stopped moving, Pumbaa's gut was way to fat to reach over or around. They would soon become to immobile to pick up a single dish.
"Urp. A little, urp, help please?" Pumbaa asked, embarrassed that as if on cue, his arms couldn't pick up and put a dish into his maw.
"Oh, no problem..." Rafiki smiled, he fed the warthog another dish, this time breaking the table. Pumbaa lay flat on his back, as he soon saw what he'd become. The only visible thing apart from his belly was Rafiki sitting on top of it.
Pumbaa grew worried, was this his plan the whole time? To turn him into an elephant?
Pumbaa wasn't to far off, Rafiki smiled as he force-fed Pumbaa now beans. But why beans?
PLBBBBBBBBBBBBTRTTTTTTRRRRRRRRTTTTT!!!
That's why beans, Pumbaa knew he was being punished, and he wanted it to stop right now, this was the last straw. He wouldn't do it again.
"Mmmph, erregg!" Pumbaa tried speaking but his cheeks were to big for him to talk over.
"What was that?" Rafiki questioned. "Oh, you liked the beans! Here you go," Rafiki realized he had no more food to fatten the already immobile pig with.
"Oh well, you're gonna hafta wait for tomorrow." And just like that, Rafiki hopped upstairs, as Pumbaa say there, reclining on his two bubbles of buttcheeks. In the dark and all alone...
135322211112.title: He fattens up Pumbaa greatly with a replenishin...

choices: He grows to big for the tree
He gets propelled to his stomach
1353222111121.content:
Pumbaa had slept well despite not lying in his back. He was woken up crudely by a stick whacking him on his thick skull.
"Rise and shine! Heheheh!" Rafiki giggled. "If nothing starts then it never will happen!" Then Rafiki was off, he started force feeding the hog once more, Pumbaa shut his eyes tight in gluttony and in fear.
The massive warthog felt himself blob out more, he was becoming an elephant, his belly was definitely his greatest feature. It was now Pumbaa's only table to feast off of, it started to ooze down the steps of the tree, his chest was also quite a sight, manboobs being as large as he was before this fattening, his butt was also a great ass-et. The two blubbery bubbles rose off the ground and almost touched the ceiling, they were almost elephant sized in width and in height. His face cheeks transformed into overgrown grapefruit, leading to his many sagging China which became his belly and the whole cycle started over again. His arms, and legs have been sucked in almost completely, Pumbaa can no-longer move them in the slightest, each one is as fat as a small tree's trunk. His tail had stayed the same throughout all of this, it was painfully pressed against the wall due to Pumbaa's massive girth.
The whale of a warthog opened his mouth to protest but all that came out was a large belch, Rafiki seemed stunned, then happy.
"It's working!" He skipped around the now Pumbaa-filled room, and crawled (with struggle) back on Pumbaa's chest. "It's working!" He repeated.
The mass of blubber tried to question what was working but an even louder burp took the speech's place.
Rafiki jumped for joy again, and started feeding Pumbaa faster as he chants 'it's working, it's working'
Soon, Pumbaa felt the bit of a rumble beneath him, then,
BLAAAAAAAAM!
Pumbaa had crashed through the tree and let out an even more significant belch, it sounded like a lion's roar from miles away.
Soon,
1353222111121.title: Tomorrow

13533.content: Shall we go with the hyena clan with Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed, or With the other Outlanders featuring Vatani, Nuka, and Zira?
13533.title: Hyena Clan, or other Outlanders

135331.content: Shall we go with Shenzi, Banzai, or Ed.
135331.title: Hyena Clan

choices: A bunch of plump herbivores and odd grass
A stockpile of food gathered by lionesses
1353311.content:
After the incedent with Scar's rule, him perishing at the fangs of hyenas and the regrowth of vegetation, the savannah's ecosystem went into a phase of stability, except for hyenas. Three in specific actually; those being Bonzai, Ed and the she-hyena, Shenzi. The three just lived in the elephant graveyard and gnawed on the bones while attempting to tackle any stragglers down if they get close. Not the smartest idea, but they weren't the smartest either. Shenzi was the first to speak up. "Bonzai... How long have we been here?"

"Uh... About a season..." He was a bit distracted with Ed, fighting over a bone.

"And how long has it been since we had any meat?"

"Hm... A few days ago, I think."

"Ed swallowing a bug does not count." The mentioned dim witted hyena chuckles with his wide grin. The female hyena sighed and rubbed her face. "That's it. I'm leaving. I have enough vitamin D to make me a bone statue. I want prey. Unless either of you want to be a sacrifice, don't bother following me..."

          She turns and storms off with morbid determination. The males would follow, but they didn't have a need to do so. She was the smartest of the bunch, but they didn't know it. She had peaked from a few ribs at the grasslands wondering what there is to look for. She soon noticed something in the distance.
1353311.title: Shenzi gain

13533111.content:
Shenzi was oddly surprised at the wide buffet options on the horizon. The gazelles were portly, the zebras were plump and the rest were packing fat as well. "Why is it just now we find... Well, I find this. Those mutts can't find a hippo in clear water." She huffed and used the odd, wide, tall and pinkish grass to jump a zebra from behind.

          She bit on the neck and dragged it to the grass to hide the more gruesome details. The equine whines didn't scare off the grazers as they continued to eat the strange plants. Shenzi cared less and started to devour the meal she prepared herself. The meat practically fell off the bone, dripped flavor and felt nice in the neglected stomach she had. It was taking a while to finish the whole zebra as her weight starts to increase in her abdomen from the meal. It was almost sundown once she was finished.

          Besides the pile of bones and the bulge in her gut that looks like she swallowed herself, plus some extra of course, nothing else seemed to change. The other herbivores were still grazing and might have gotten fatter as well. Something was off, but she was too stuffed to continue at that time.
13533111.title: Big prey, easy target

choices: The grass turns predators into immobile prey
The grass is super addicting and fattening
135331111.content:
Shenzi sniffed the grass. It smelled sweet. Like nectar. She looked around and saw a portly warthog much on some as well.

"That's odd." Shenzi that thought. "Warthogs don't usually eat grass." She turned and saw a cheetah, almost as large as a hippo chew on some grass as well. "What's going on here?!"

Shenzi took another sniff of the grass. One little bite wouldn't hurt. She just wanted to see what all the fuss was about.
135331111.title: Fat grASS

1353311111.content: What does the grass turn Shenzi into?
1353311111.title: The grass turns predators into immobile prey

13533111112.content: Are you sure you want hippo?
13533111112.title: The blobbiest hippo

135331111122.content: We'll fatten her up nicely...
135331111122.title: No more choices!

135332.content: Which of the outlanders will it be? Vitani, Nuka, and Zira?
135332.title: Outlanders

choices: They found one zebra and one antelope.
They found several zebras and antelopes.
13533211.content:
In the outlands, it was a very close to being more of a wasteland. Hardly any food or water and a few lions laying down. One of them happen to be Vitani, Kovu's sister sleeping. Then she woke up when she heard a roar. It was her mother, Zira with an announcement. All the lions, including Nuka (Kovu and Vitani's older brother) was also there. With a bit of a termite or flea problem. So he was just scratching.

"Attentions everyone!" Zira said. "For the next two weeks, I will be going out to train our future king, Kovu." Kovu was a little shy standing beside his mom. "So, I'm gonna leave someone in charge until I come back." Nuka kinda jump for joy thinking it was gonna be him. "Vitani....your in charge."

After hearing that, Nuka's jaw drops.

"WHAT????????" Nuka said. Nuka was not happy. Vitani was the opposite. She laughed at her brother when she heard those words. "But mother....I'm the oldest." Nuka said. "True, but Vitani has good traits." Zira said. "Just deal with it." Vitani said.

With that said, Zira and Kovu left. Leaving Vitani in charge and an pissed off Nuka. Vitani love the fact she like calling the shots. Then she happen to hear her stomach growl. She was hungry.

"We need to get food. Some of you guys need to hunt for some Zebra and Antelope." Vitani ordered.

The lions agree and went out while she stayed and wait. After an few hours.....
13533211.title: Vitani's in charge.

choices: Her stomach growls for more food.
Nuka is still jealous of her sister.
135332112.content:
The lionesses finally came back from hunting and they were lucky to find 5 zebras and 3 antelopes.

"Hahaha! We hit the motherload today." Nuka said. "We never get this much from hunting." Looking at the delicious meats made Vitani drool. "Okay. I'll take one of the zebras and one of the antelopes." Vitani said. "Wait!? You get a whole zebra and antelope?" Nuka said. "I'm hungry and I'm in charge." Vitani said. "Plus there is still enough for all you guys."

With that said, Vitani dive into the zebra and started to eat it. The other lions went for the other zebras, but Nuka still felt smug with Vitani still. Mainly because she wanted a whole zebra and antelope to herself. Vitani started with the legs. To her it tasted tender and meaty. So she finish the backlegs and went up to the other parts. As she ate, her eating was starting to take it's tone on her belly. She continue to eat more and more quicky. After a while, she was done with the zebra and went for the antelope. Just like zebra, she quickly began to devour it. The other lions were surprised to see Vitani, a little cub, eats so much. After a while the antelope was now nothing but bones, and Vitani now had a belly that was filled with meat and was touching the ground.

"That was good." Vitani said rubbing her belly. "I'll think I'll take a nap."

Vitani decided to rest and let her food digest. Later......
135332112.title: They found several zebras and antelopes.

choices: The next day she got even hungrier.
1353321121.content:
In the middle of the night, Vitani's stomach started to growl again. She got up and realized that she was getting pretty overweight after the two carcasses she ate. Her belly was touching the ground, her legs where starting to get a little pudgy, and her faces started to get a little fat. So she went outside to see if there was any food left.

She looked outside now and she found a zebra still leftover. "No one is eating this." Vitani said. "Might as well help myself." She began eating the leftover zebra. It was a little cold, but she didn't care as long as it was food. After a while the zebra was nothing but bones. Vitani was rubbing her belly satisfied, now stuffed with zebra. Not to mention, she was fatter from eating that. It was a bit harder for her to even walk. It was more of a waddle now. Then she went back to the cave, landed down on her back and went to sleep. Her stomach groaned thoughtout the night.

Vitani started to dream.

She dreamt of herself on a stone throne and several lions were obeying her and was bringing her tons of food, including gazelles, zebra, and....hippos? She just saw herself eating all them and growing bigger and bigger. She then became the size of a hippo and then she woke up.

"What a weird dream." Vitani said, and then her stomach started growling again.
1353321121.title: Vitani gets hungry again.

13533211211.content:
Vitani's stomach growled louder and louder. All the food she ate had already been digested. She was still pretty fat from the food she had yesterday, but she didn't care. She then call all the lions and sent them to get more food. She then sat at a stone throne with her belly sticking out.

"I think I can get used to this." Vitani said.

Vitani kept thinking about the dream she has had. Being that big excited her a bit. A while later, some lions came back with a few more zebras, gazelles and get this..... a hippo or two. Vitani didn't waste time and began to eat like she hadn't been eating for days. All the lions were in shock of how the little lion eat. Vitani's belly grow even more. After two zebras she decided to go for the hippo's. It was very thick and fatty, but she ate it like there was no tomorrow. Few hours later, Vitani was full. But she was now at a massive size. Her belly, the biggest part of her was keeping her paws from the ground by at least two feet. Her paw were thicker and her fat was definitely fatter.

"What's with you sister?" Nuka asked. "You been eating like crazy. You ate the hippo's and are closer to an actual hippo yourself!"
"So I gained some more weight. It's not that bad." Vitani said. "In fact........."
13533211211.title: Vitani grows hungrier.

135332112111.content:
Vitani tended to abuse her power. She would always send out everyone to get her more food and eat most of it herself. During the time, her belly was now the size of a normal lion. The rest of her body was just as fat looking to. Currently, she was eating a zebra leg.

"I have really let myself go." Vitani said looking at herself. "My leg can't even touch the ground now."

She wasn't worried about it for too long. It just meant that she would have to get more lions to help her. As long as she got food, she didn't care. Not even if she was the size of an elephant. She decided to take another nap. So she does that and then........
135332112111.title: A few days later......

choices: When Zira and Kovu return to the outlands......
1353321121112.content:
Here's what Vitani's current size is if you want a reference.
http://www.furaffinity.net/view/12231087...
Now on with the story.

Once again, Vitani's stomach growls ever so loudly. Seem's like she could not get full for a long period of time. She was already big enough to lose her mobility. But with all the lions in the outlands at her command, it's not like she needed movement. She called out for her brother Nuka.

"*sarcastily* What is it dear little.......OH MY GEEZ!!!!!" Nuka shouted as he takes a good look at her not-so-little sister. "What's has happening to you?" "So I've been eating more, so what?" Vitani said. "So what?!?" Nuka said. "Look at yourself. Your close to a kid hippo." Nuka then poked at her blubbery body. Her belly jiggled a bit and it may have made Nuka laugh a bit. "Quit poking me." Vitani said. "Yeah! Yeah! So what will it be this time? A whole hippo?" Nuka said with a chuckle. "Actually yes." Vitani said.

When she said yes, Nuka's jaw dropped. "I WAS JOKING." Nuka said loudly. "Well I'm not. In fact, I would like two." Nuka then felt outraged. "I NOT DOING IT." Nuka said. At first it seemed like Nuka wouldn't budge, but then Vitani thought of something. "Mother left me in charge. You wouldn't want me to say anything BAD about you, do you?" That got Nuka's attentions. "Waitwaitwait!!!!" Nuka said. "Please don't." and then Nuka started to beg. "Or.....I can talk you up and just maybe, mother will give you more respect than ever." Vitani said.

Nuka got to thinking. If that happened, Nuka may finally be accepted by his mother and may even be the one to be king over Kovu when they take over the Pride Lands. With those thoughts in mind.......

"Umm.......Nuka, do we have a deal?" Vitani asked.
"Deal!" Nuka said.

After that deal, Nuka agree to get the other outlanders to bring Vitani any food she asked for. No questions asked. As long as Vitani was fed she was happy. The lions were able to get her the two hippos she asked for. She ate both of them and got even more fatter. She may have been full for now, but it wouldn't be long before she would want more again.
1353321121112.title: Her stomach growls again.......

13533211211121.content:
It's been over a week since Zira and Kovu left for training. During the time Vitani continued to use her power of being in charge to make the others lions get food for her. With this, Vitani had grown to become quite a bit of a big size. By big I mean GINORMOUS!!!!!!! She went from being a small amount of chubbiness, to being as big as a kid hippo. Now her belly has grown to the size of a large elephant. Her head,cheeks, and legs were still pretty pudgy, but her belly was defiently the largest thing about her. It was mostly a big round shape.

Vitani was busy finishing the leg of a gazelle. "This is the life." She said with joy. "Too bad that mom and Kovu will be back in a few days, then I won't be in charge. Still, It was fun while it lasted." Vitani didn't really sweat by the thought of not being the leader anymore. She didn't even cared about how Zira or Kovu would react to her new size when they come back. She was still happy. The only thing that could make this better is more food to fill her belly.

She called her brother Nuka once again. "What can I do for you now my dear blob of a big little sister?" Nuka said laughing and poking her belly again. "Real funny, Nuka." Vitani said looking down at him from her belly. "Anyway, mother and the little fleabag of a brother, Kova will be back any day now." Nuka said. After that, Nuka tries to scratch off the actual fleas on him. "So, remember our deal sis?" "Don't worry. I'll tell her." Vitani said. "Now if you wouldn't mind, I'm hungry again." "Yeah, I could guess that." Nuka said. "I got to say, you have quite an appetite for a little cub. You have even outeaten most of the other lions."

Currently, the only thing she ate was the gazelle leg and with a belly the size of a elephant and the hunger to match, she was pretty hungry. She then had an idea. She decided that she wanted a feast with as much food as possible. A major feast to end all feasts. She wanted this to included zebras, gazelles, fish, hippos, elephants, and even some fruit. Anything good to eat, she wanted it. Nuka actually liked the idea as long as he and the others outlands could eat too. She agreed to that. However, to make a feast like this, it may take a day or two. Vitani got a little pouty, but agree as long as she had something to hold her over. Nuka gave Vitani a zebra to hold her off. Then he and the other lions went off on a hunt. Vitani just waited in the cave and rested on her belly.
13533211211121.title: A week later.......

choices: Nuka and the others lions came back with the food.
The lions still haven't come back yet.
135332112111211.content:
Waiting for all the other lions in the cave for close to a day or so, Vitani was starving waiting for them to return with the food. She began to take a nap to get food off her mind. She then had another dream.

In the dream, she was back to her normal size. In front of her, was a mountain of savory meats. Looking at that the huge amount of zebra, antelopes, among other things, made her drool.

"So.....much.....food." Vitani says to herself. "And it's all for me."

With that said, she leaped into the pile of meat and started to eat away. After few minutes, Vitani was no longer skinny, but began to get chubby again. Then, the chubbiness became fatness as her belly touched the ground. Vitani continue savoring each bite of meat pile. In a matter, of minutes, Vitani was back to the size of elephant and still growing.

"I may be big, but still have more to go." Vitani said.

Vitani continue to eat more and more of meat mountain. Once again getting bigger and bigger and bigger still. The only thing stopping her from eating more was the dream ending. Vitani woke up back into reality covered with drool over her mouth. Her belly continued to growl even louder.

"They better come back with the food soon." Vitani said to herself a little peeved.

After a few minutes..........
135332112111211.title: Vitani gets a weird dream.

choices: Next day, Zira and Kova finally come back to the Outlands.
1353321121112111.content:
After what seemed to be close to forever to Vitani (it was really only a few minutes after the dream), Nuka finally came back with the other lions.

"We're back!" Nuka said smiling. "Man, do we have a haul." Hearing that filled Vitani with eagerness and excitement. "Well, bring them all in." Vitani said.

So each lion came into the cave, hauling in a few herds of antelope, zebra, gazelle, a few tropical fruits, and a few hippos. It was't like the amount in her dream, but it still all look good to her. At that moment, her stomach rumbled and growled as loud as a lion's roar. But after a whole day of not eating, what would you expect?

"Finally! Food!!!!" Vitani shouted. She tried to reach out for a gazelle, but she forgot, due to her massive blobby body, with tiny paws, she can't really reach any of the food. So she had to ask for the others help. "Ummm.....can you guys feed me?" Vitani said. "What? Are you kidding?" Nuka said while ripping off a zebra leg. "But I can't reach anything....and I'm starving." Vitani said weeping a bit. "Ehh....you three, go feed her blubberiness." Nuka said to three of the lions while he was eating.

Three of the lions formed a type of line. One lion was near the food, one lion was near Vitani to give her the food, and the third lion was in the middle to pass the food down. They first gave Vitani a whole antelope to start. As usual, she went on to tare it apart. Eating away at it like there was no tomorrow. After she finished the antelope, she wanted another one. She did the same to that one leaving nothing but bones. Then the lions past her a zebra, which was also eaten in no time. But of course, she was still hungry.

After an hour or so, Nuka and all the other lions had there fills with small pudgy bellys, but Vitani was far from being full. Her belly grew a few inches more, tight with all the meat (and some fruit) she has eaten. Nuka was still surprise of her little sister's warthog sized hunger. Irony is, she was eating a warthog when he was thinking it. (Don't worry. The warthog was NOT Pumbaa.)

"Vitani, don't you think you had enough?" Nuka said with concern. "Are you kidding?" Vitani said. "We still have plenty of food and I'm still hungry." They were still plenty of meat left over. Some were half eaten, but still good. Not to mention there were a hippo or two still untouched. Even with that, Nuka still didn't like her case. "Have you looked at yourself?" Nuka said. "You're bloated up so big that your belly is most of your body, and your paws can't even touch the floor." The other lions also agreed she was eating too much. This started to make Vitani a little peeve.

"Maybe you all forgot, but I'm in charge." Vitani said. "I'll say when I had enough." The other lions still holded there ground and think she should stop. But then Vitani mention something. "Mother left me in charge and her words are still law in the Outlands. You don't want to upset her when she gets back do you?" Vitani says. The lions were silent for a bit. Nuka, however, still didn't want to back down. "You can't scare me with mother." Nuka said. "Do you want to take that risk with her?" Vitani said.

Nuka stayed silent for a minute, Nuka was already on bad terms with his mom. One bad step, and Zira might disown him as her son. Nuka didn't want to risk that. Sooooooo.........

"Everyone, you heard her. Fill her till she's full." Nuka said.

Nuka and the lions group up to Vitani and fed her more food. Like before, she would stuff her face if not to get full, than to increase her already massive belly. As long as she was in charge, she had all the lions to do what she want.
1353321121112111.title: The great feast awaits!

choices: Zira was impressed with her weight and leadership.
Zira was shock and a little angry with Vitani.
13533211211121111.content:
After a good two weeks, Kova training was done for now. Zira train tried to make Kovu more cunning and vicious. But he was still a cub, so that didn't really happen. She did help him get a little stronger and less shy. After being from a isolated jungle, they finally headed back to the Outlands.

"It feels good to finally be heading home, right mom?" Kovu said. "Ah, yes. I hope your sister kept everyone in order." Zira said. "Why did you made Vitani in charge?" Kovu asked. "Like you, Vitani has great potential. When you both become older, I want her to be your second in command." Zira said. "Ok. But....uhhhhh what about Nuka?" Kovu asked. "Nuka is.......special." Zira said knowing why she didn't pick Nuka in the first.

After a while, Zira and Kovu had finally reach the Outlands. Nuka was on lookout and sawed them. "They're back! EVERYONE!!!!! Mother and Kovu are back." Nuka shouted from a large rock getting all the lions attention. Then he walk down to greet his mother.

"Welcome back, mom!" Said Nuka expecting a hug (which he did not get). "Hello Nuka. Did everything went well?" Zira asked. "Yeah......about that....." Nuka said trying to explain. "What did you do?" Zira asked. "I didn't do anything. It's Vitani! She's.....well....." Nuka said. "She's what?" Zira asked. "Maybe you should see for yourself." Nuka said.

Nuka decided to take Zira and Kovu to the cave. Confused, they decided to follow him to see what was up.

"Here she is, mom." Nuka said revealing Vitani. Who was no longer such a small cub anymore. After two weeks, she bloated up to beyond the size of an elephant. Her face was even fatter with bigger cheeks and four or five chins. Her belly was big and blobby. It had grown at least a few extra feet since the feast.

"Hello mother. Hello Kovu. Welcome back."

Kovu and Zira were stunned on what Vitani has become. A massive blob of a lion. After what seemed like over a minute.........
13533211211121111.title: Zira and Kovu's return.

choices: Months later after all the weight lose......
135332112111211111.content:
"My oh my. Vitani, what has happen to you?" Zira asked. "How did you get so....big.....and blobby." Kovu said poking her massive belly and watching it jiggle. "Why does everyone have to poke at me?" Vitani thought.

Vitani explained that during the past two weeks when she was in charge, she tend to get the other lions to get her food. She has also gain a bit of extra hunger urges, which is why she is as big as she is.

"I see." Zira said. "Hehe! She in trouble now, right mother?" Nuka said. "No." Zira answered. "No?" Kovu, Vitani and Nuka said shocked. "In fact, I'm impressed." Zira said. "Not only did you lead others well but you shown that you have quite the cabilities for quite the little cub." "So, I'm not in trouble?" Vitani said. "No you are not." Zira said.

Vitani was happy. If she could jump, then she would. But, Zira did had some other things to say.

"However, you are too big and inmobile." Zira said. "My plans for our future involves you mobile. So, starting today, you have to lose that weight." Vitani's mouth dropped. "ALL OF IT????" Vitani said. "Yes. Now I will be checking things with the other lions." Zira said as she left. Nuka was right behind her. Still pissed that Vitani didn't get in trouble. But at least he didn't have to listen to her. Vitani was a little upset because she kinda like the weight.

"*sign* I can't believe I have to lose all this fat." Vitani said as she pat her belly. Then she felt some more pokes from Kovu. "Heheh! You are so blobby." Kovu said laughing. "Quit poking me!" Vitani said looking red.
135332112111211111.title: Zira was impressed.

choices: Vitani lost some weight, but was still chubby.
1353321121112111111.content:
For the next couple of days, due to her massive amount of weight gain, Vitani was force not only to go on a diet, but had to lose all the weight she gained. But it the stomach the size of a hippo or two, that was gonna be hard for her. Zira had a few of the lionesses help her with execise methods. Nuka was in charge of keeping an eye on Vitani to make sure she didn't try to cheat on her diet.

After Vitani's "workout" for the day was done, Kovu went to her huge blob of a sister.

"Hey Vitani." Kovu said poking at her belly again.
"Hey Kovu." Vitani responded. "Can you quit poking me!"
"I can't help it. Your so soft and blobby." Kovu said placing his back on her belly.
"Well......don't get use to it." Vitani said. "I still have to lose all of this weight soon. *sign* I was actually starting to like being big and fat."
"You actually don't mind being this blobby?"
"Nope. It's kinda fun."
"So is poking you and watching you belly wobble. Hehehe!"
"Seriously, QUIT IT KOVU!!!!!!"
"Hehe! Ok! Ok! Don't yell at your future king."
"Future King. Your not king yet."

Kovu then decided to continue to lay more on Vitani's belly.

"Hey! I'm not a throne." Vitani said with anger.
"Your right. But you are softer than one." Kovu said laughing a bit.

Seem that Kovu enjoyed teasing her sister on her blobiness. Vitani wasn't to keen on it.

After, another few weeks............
1353321121112111111.title: The next couple of days..........

choices: Vitani had her dream once again.
Vitani and Kovu were have the same dream.
13533211211121111111.content:
It been a while since Vitani started her diet routine and forced to lose all of her weight. At the moment, she downsized a lot from being the size of an elephant to a much smaller. Currently, Vitani was still quite chubby. Her belly still touch the ground, her legs were thick, and she was her body was wider. But she was able to move again. Vitani was still not too happy about her weight loss. She and Kovu went out to talk.

"Looks like you lost quite a bit of weight." Kovu said poking her belly again. "But you still pretty chubby."
"I still don't mind this weight." Vitani said. "And for the last time, QUIT POKING ME!"
"If you like the weight so much, why don't you ask mom to keep it on?"
"That would be nice. But I would really like to be big like the last time."
"Was it really that great."
"To me, it was. I kept getting this dream of me getting fed tons of food and getting bigger and bigger."
"That's a weird dream."
"I still like it."

It was a long day and Vitani and Kovu got to sleep. As they slept........
13533211211121111111.title: Vitani lost some weight, but was still chubby.

choices: Kovu talks to his sister about her dream.
Vitani protests from doing anymore working out.
135332112111211111111.content:
Vitani once again, had the dream she had several times over. Her on a throne in front of a mountain of food. But this time, it was more than ever.

"This dream again?" Vitani said to herself. "Well, I'm not complainin. Just hungry."

Not even thinking, Vitani quickly dive in and went for the meat. Munching on a few of the zebra legs, antelopes, and hippo hinds. Since it was a dream, Vitani's hunger seemed endless. After a while, Vitani return to having the belly the size of an elephant and she enjoyed it.

"I missed being this big and huge." Vitani said patting her blobbish. Then she took a look at the food left over and it still looks their was plenty more to eat. "This is only the beginning."

With that said, she continue to eat even more from the mountain pile of meat and continue to grow bigger and bigger. Her body became even more blob-like. Her paws were being to be ingupled by her fat, and her face and got even more blobby. Vitani grew more as if she was being to cover a bit of outlands. It seem like in the dream Vitani wanted to test her limit, but before she could, she woke up. It was her brother, Kovu.

"Sis? Sis, wake up!" Kovu said.
"Huh? Oh Kova. Why did you have to wake me up?" Vitani protested.
"Cause it's morning and it's time for your workout." Kovu said.
"Oh. That. *sign*" Vitani said not to happy.

Vitani stretched out a bit and went outside and left Kovu thinking.
135332112111211111111.title: Vitani had her dream once again.

choices: Resist and don't eat the Zebra.
Forget about what Zira said and eat.
1353321121112111111112.content:
Still being a bit on the chubby side, Vitani still had to workout daily to lose the weight. Nuka was still in charge of making sure she did her routine. Nuka kinda enjoyed bossing her sister for once. The two started by going on a jog around the fields.

"Come on, chubby bones!" Nuka said. "Move it to lose it."
"Yeah.....yeah......" Vitani said not to happy and a little tired.
"Don't you want to be small again?" Nuka said.
"Not really." Vitani said to herself.

The two continue to do more jogging and some other workout routines. After a while, Vitani got tired and layed on the ground.

"*huff**huff* Too tired." Vitani said.
"You can't be tired now. We got more to do." Nuka said.
"WHAT? ARE YOU KIDDING ME?" Vitani said in angrily. "How much more do we have to do?"
"Until you lose all the weight." Nuka said.
"Can I take a break at least? I didn't even had breakfast."
"Sorry. But strict diet rules." Nuka said with a smirk.
"Grrrrrr......." Vitani was not happy at all. She then let out an outburst. "ALL I BEEN DOING IS WORKING OUT FOR WEEKS AND STILL NOT GETTING OUT ANYWHERE. WHO SAID THAT I WANTED TO LOSE ALL THE WEIGHT."
"Woah, Woah, WOAH! Mother said you need to lose the weight. Don't blame me cause you as big as a mountain."
"I was NOT that big."
"But did you wanted to be that big?"
"Ah...........maybe...."
"Look, you are talking crazy."
"Whatever. I'm going for a walk.

Vitani got up and started walking by herself. Nuka watch her walk off and just shook her head. The workout took a lot of weight off her. Vitani's belly didn't even touch the ground anymore. Anymore working out and she might even be skinnier than she was before. The thought of that didn't really please her. With her dreams and stuff, she missed being big.

"Why did I had to lose all that weight? I didn't mind being that big." Vitani said to herself. "To make matters worse, I'm starving."

At the moment with all of her mourning, she smell something...familiar.

"Huh? That smells like......MEAT!" Vitani said excited.

She followed her nose and looked around. What she found, was a zebra who's time had passed. It was a little cold, but untouched. Vitani was pretty excited.

"Finally, food." Vitani said about to dig in.

But as she was about to, a few things came to her mind. If she eats the zebra, she would most likely gain more weight, but if she doest that, she might get into a bit of trouble with her mom. What to do?
1353321121112111111112.title: Vitani protests from doing anymore working out.

choices: Kovu, it's your sister's problem. Let her solve it.
13533211211121111111122.content:
After so much working out and so many days not eat, she said to herself to forget what her mother had said. She was hungry and she wanted to eat. So she rapidly nawed on the dead zebra. It was a good thing it was already dead, cause what she was doing to it was pure savage. She started with the whole body area around the ribs and belly. It may had been cold meat, but it was like high class steak to her. She then continue with the rest the zebra. Not even noticing that her belly was once again growing a bit. After a while, as always, there was nothing left but the bones. Vitani was happy and satified.

"That was good. I needed that." Vitani said happily. Then she took a look at herself. Belly touching the ground, extra pudge around her legs, chubbier face. She was getting fatter again. She was suppose to be losing the weight. Not putting it back on. "Uh oh. If mother sees me like this, I'll be in big trouble."

She really started to freak out. She like gaining the extra weight, but she couldn't enjoy it because of her mother. She would most likely put her on a even harder workout or worse. She needed help. Good thing there was one lion she could trust.

Meanwhile, back in the Outlands, Kovu was taking a nap. When he hears something.

"Psshh!!!! Kovu!" Said a loud whispered voice.
"Huh? Who's there?" Kovu said looking around a little. He looks at a rock near a distance and sees his sister Vitani hiding behind the rock.
"Kovu!" Vitani whispered loudly again. "Come here."
"Vitani?" Kovu then gave out a yawn. "*yawn*This better be good."

Kovu got up and walked to the rock where his sister to see what she wanted.

"Ok, what do you wa......HOLY TOLEDO!!!!!!!" Kova said reacting after seeing Vitani.
"Yeah. I know." Vitani said.
"YOU GAINED WEIGHT AGAIN?"
"Quiet! Please."
"But you're......"
"I KNOW!"
"What happened?"
"I....found a zebra and was kinda hungry, so I ate it."
"The whole thing?"
"Yeah. This is not the first time."
"Oh man. Mom is gonna be so mad. What are you gonna do?"
"I don't know. Can you help me? Please? You are the only one I can trust."
"Ummmmmmm......."

Kovu wanted to help his sister, but he knows that he would be in trouble too if her mother finds out.
13533211211121111111122.title: Forget about what Zira said and eat.

choices: Few days later, Vitani was still the chubby size she was.
Few days later, Vitani had gotten a bit bigger than she was now.
135332112111211111111221.content:
Deep down, Kovu knew that he had to help his sister.

"*sign* Alright. I do what I can to help you out." Kovu said to Vitani.
"Yay! Thanks Kovu! I own you one." Vitani said.
"Yeah. Big time. Like "bigger than you were" big time. But that will be for another time in the future." Kovu said.
"So what are you gonna do?"
"You stay on the downlow. I'm gonna go talk to mom."
"WHAT?!?!? YOU SAID YOU WOULD HELP."
"I'm not gonna tell. I just gonna do something else. Just trust your brother."
"Well.....ok. I trust you."
"Good. Ok. I'll be back."

Kovu was going to walk over to see his mom. But before he did that, he poked at his chubby sister's belly again.

"Hehehe! Your belly always just so squishy."
"WILL YOU QUIT WITH THE POKING."

After a quick laugh, Kovu was officially on his way to see his mom. Also, he was questioning himself.

"What am I doing? What am I getting myself into?" Kovu thought.
"Ah. Kovu. What brings you here?" Zira said.
"Mom. Umm....I...."
"Have you seen your sister? Nuka said she ran off."
"She's fine. I just talk to her."
"And her weight progress?"
"She's.....doing ok." Kovu lied. "Actually, Vitani is why I wanted to talk to you about."

Zira then switch to a serious look and tone.

"Hmmmmm......what about?" Zira said to her son.
"Umm....well......." Kovu said starting to freak out. "What do I say? What do I say?" Kovu thought to himself. "Well, see....I was wondering if it will be ok if......."
"If......."
"If I can train Vitani for a while?"
"Train Vitani?"
"Yeah! If I'm gonna be future king, then I need to train my followers. Besides, you can't trust Nuka to do all that."
"HEY!!!!!!" Said Nuka who was nearby and hear that last comment.
"Hmmmm.....this is true." Zira said agreeing. "I expected you to take charge when you are older, but being ready at such a young age......" Zira looked pleased. "Very well. I'll leave Vitani to you."
"YES! Now I won't have to deal with the butterball." Nuka said in his thought.
"Thanks mom!"

Kovu then find his way out and walked back to his sister.

"Well........" Vitani said.
"I told her I would watch over you with your "training"." Kovu said with a sly smirk.
"Wait? So you are going to train me now?"
"Relax. You can keep the weight you have. Just need to keep it a secret. At least Nuka isn't watching over you."
"True. He would just rat me out to mom if he had the chance."
"Yeah! So keep away from Mom and Nuka for now."
"Right. Thanks bro." Vitani said giving her brother a big hug.
"Don't thank me now. Hehe! Cause you own me SOOOOO much for this." Kovu said devilish.
"What did I get myself into?" Vitani said sweating a bit.
135332112111211111111221.title: Kovu, Help your sister.

choices: Vitani laying back in her den.
1353321121112111111112212.content:
It's been a few days since Kovu ask Zira that he could train Vitani. By training, he really meant watching her so Zira wouldn't find out about her extra poundage and be forced to lose it all. Since that day, she didn't lose a pound, but she did gain a few extra more. That's what happens when you eat more and exercise less. Vitani's was currently fat all around. She could still move fine, but he belly did touch the ground and was quite round. Her legs had a good extra layer of fat. That and her face was fairly puffy. Now the only one who knows about this extra weight gain is Kovu. So he had to keep this a secret or he would be in big trouble too. Currently, Vitani and Kovu were out in the fields. Vitani was finishing off a antelope leg.

"Feels so good to gorge again and not care." Vitani said.
"Yeah. Just remember, sooner or later, mom might find out." Kovu said. "When that happens, we'll be in for it."
"You"re right about that." Vitani said. "What should we do?"
"We? This is your problem." Kovu mentioned.
"Oh no. We're in this together, bro." Vitani said.
"You're in deeper trouble than I'm in." Kovu said. "You're getting close to being the size of a baby hippo." Kovu then laughed a bit. But Vitani also had something to laugh about.
"Hate to tell you bro, but you're not so little anymore either." Vitani mention to Kovu.

The truth is, Kovu made a deal with his sister. The deal was, if Vitani ever found extra food, she would have to share with Kovu. If not, he might tell their mom or something else. So, Kovu has also did some extra eating. Now Kovu wasn't as big as his sister. He just had a extra layer of pudge around his body and belly area.

"Huh. Guess I do have a little extra weight on me." Kovu admitted.
"At your rate, you will be as big as me in no time." Vitani said chuckling a bit more.
"If that happens, I'll be in the same boat as you and get in trouble with mom." Kovu said.
"Do you think anyone has notice your extra weight?"
"Not yet. But let's hope they don't."

The two talked some more as time went by. Vitani currently had to hide out in a den where no one could find her. She still had to stay out of site from the other lions. Kovu went back home.
1353321121112111111112212.title: Few days later, Vitani had gotten a bit bigger ...

choices: Nuka notices Kovu weight gain, but isn't concern yet.
Nuka thinks Kovu is hiding Vitani from him.
13533211211121111111122121.content:
There Vitani was. Just sitting there in her den by herself it was a little small, but at least she could have some alone time. She was just laying on her back and looked at her belly.

"Hehe! Look at you." Vitani said to her belly. "You may not be as big as last time, but you will soon be big enough to to cover this tiny den. No, even bigger than that."

Vitani then turn around to her feet and got up.

"But I can't keep this up forever. Kovu can only cover things for so long." Vitani said to herself. "I don't want to have to lose weight and have to workout again."

Vitani still felt down and uneasy with everything.

"Well, I might as well enjoy things while I still can." Vitani said with pride. Then her stomach growled loudly. "Guess I'm hungry again. Getting food and sharing with Kovu isn't enough for my stomach. I need to find my own food. Just for me."

Vitani decided to go out and try to find some food. While she was out, Kovu was with the other outlanders, including Nuka and Zira. Nuka sawed Kovu and went over to talk to him.

"Hey! Mini-King! Where's your sister?" Nuka asked.
"Vitani? She's out." Kovu told him.
"Really. It's just that none of the other lions have seen her in a couple days. Is she ok?" Nuka asked.
"What? Are you concern?" Kovu said.
"Of course not. But the last time I sawed her, she got all ticky tacky with the whole training thing. Then out of nowhere, you want to train her."
"If I'm gonna be king soon, I knew to train others myself." Kovu argued. "Anyway, she's fine so don't worry about her."

Kovu seemed calm when he said that, but Nuka didn't seem convinced. Then, Nuka took a closer look at his brother's...body.

"Say Kovu?" Nuka said to his brother.
"Yeah?" Kovu said a little nervous.
13533211211121111111122121.title: Vitani laying back in her den.

choices: Was fatter than she was earlier.
Holding an Zebra in her mouth.
135332112111211111111221211.content:
"Kovu.....have you.....gain weight?" Nuka asked.
"Whaa.....WHAT?" Kovu said shocked. "N....n.....no!"
"Hmm.....it's just that you seem a bit....pudgier." Nuka said looking at his brother and poking him.
"If....I am gaining weight, it's only because I'm getting bigger normally." Kovu tried to say. "I mean, I can't stay a cub forever right."
"I.....guess you're right about that." Kovu said thinking it might be true.
"Yeah! So if it looks like I am getting bigger, it's because I'm growing more as a lion." Kovu said pridefully.
"Fine! Fine!" Nuka said. "Guess I can't argue with that."
"That's why I'm gonna be future king." Kovu said pridefully. Nuka gave out a annoyed look. "Now if you excuse me, I'm gonna be taking another walk."

Kovu then left his brother. As he left his eye distance, he began to run really quickly to Vitani's den. He was kinda freaking out that Nuka notice his weight.

"Aw man! Aw man! Aw man!" Kovu said worrying himself. "We are so in trouble."

Kovu finally made it to Vitani's hideout den. But Vitani wasn't there.

"Huh? Where is she?" Kovu said looking around the den.

He did happen to see a paw print on the left side wall of the den. Vitani told him that if she was out, she would leave a paw print saying that.

"So, she's not here." Kovu said. "I doubt she's exercising, so she must have gone out to find food again. I'm not even want to know what she's gonna try to eat. As long as she doesn't go overboard.

As he said that, a figure from behind came by it was Vitani.

"Hey Kovu!" Vitani said while Kovu was still looking infront of him.
"Vitani! There you ar........" Kovu said turning around just to be shocked. "Sweet pears and Antelope!!!!"

Kovu reacted this because Vitani was.
135332112111211111111221211.title: Nuka notices Kovu weight gain.

choices: Zira and Nuka wonder about Vitani.
Vitani and Kovu spend some more time together.
1353321121112111111112212111.content:
Vitani is back to being this size if you need a reference. http://www.furaffinity.net/view/12231087... Now back to the story at hand.

Vitani had gained a HUGE amount of weight than she had early. She pretty much return to being a massive blob of a cub. A fatter face, bigger rump, thick and pudgy legs, and and massive belly. So you wouldn't be surprised about the look on Kovu's face.

"Wah.....what happened to you?" Kovu said. "You're huge!!!!!!"
"Yeah! Isn't it great." Vitani said from uptop her belly.
"What did you eat?" Kovu asked.
"Just a zebra......and an antelope.......then some prickley catcus pears......and.....some of a hippo." Vitani admitted.
"ALL OF THAT? EVEN A HIPPO?" Kovu said a little ticked.
"I save you some things." Vitani said giving Kovu a hippo hoof and a catcus pears (small one).
"That's not the point. We have bigger problems."
"Bigger than me?"
"Uhh....yeah! Mom and Nuka are wondering where you are? That and to make matters worse, Nuka is noticing that I'm gaining weight too."
"Heh. Told ya you were gaining too. You didn't........"
"No. I didn't told them anything. But this is getting harder and harder to keep secret."
"Then what should we do?"
"I just have some extra pudge I can still lose. But you........"
"No way. I'm not gonna lose this weight again. It's too hard."

The two thought about their situation. Vitani would be in major trouble for regain her weight and Kovu would be in even bigger trouble for keeping it all this a secret.

"Let's worry about it for another day." Kovu said.
"Ok!" Vitani said.

Kovu then looked at the hippo hoof and pears with a not to happy look.

"Seriously. This is all I get?" Kovu said.
"It's not my fault I have a hunger bigger than an elephant." Vitani said.
"That and the belly of one." Kovu said once and poking her pudgy belly and chuckling.
"SERIOUSLY? What is with you poking me." Vitani said angrily.
"Can't help it. It's that you fat is so soft and blobby." Kovu admitted. Vitani just gave out a small sign.
1353321121112111111112212111.title: Was fatter than she was earlier.

13533211211121111111122121112.content:
It's been a few more days since last time. Kovu was still in charge to watch over Vitani's "Training". However she still continue to not lose the weight. Not just her, but even Kovu was starting to gain some extra pudge on him now. Actually, pudge was a bit of a understatement. His whole body was fatter than last time and his belly was buldging out even more almost touching the ground. Vitani was still just as big as she was with a few extra pounds. Currently the two were finish eating an zebra. Kovu stomach was groaning a lot.

"Urrrk! I think I'm to full to finish this." Kovu said holding the last zebra leg.
"Come on, lightweight." Vitani said. "You're not gonna be king with that attitude."
"Easy for you to say......" Kovu says looking at his stomach size compare to his.
"Alright, let me help." Vitani said.

Basically she forcefed the remaining piece of meat of the zebra to her brother. He didn't seem to fond of it as his belly groan some more. Vitani rubbed his belly a bit to make him feel a little better. It did helped him finish the rest of the meat.

"There. You at least ate it all." Vitani said.
"Ugh! Ok, I'm full now." Kovu said.
"Haha! You're still a lightweight." Vitani said.
"Hey! I'm not like you. I'm pretty sure you appetite is bigger than any of the lions combine." Kovu said.
"Yeah. You are most defiently right." Vitani admitted smiling a bit.

Kovu then lean on a rock to rest, looking on how much his belly has extended.

"I'm getting pretty fat now. It's gonna be hard to hide this from the others." Kovu said.
"Why worry about it? You're a growing cub." Vitani said.
"I already use that excuse on Nuka once. But now I'm defiently fatter." Kovu said.
"I know. Isn't it great?" Vitani asked.
"It's......ok." Kovu said. "But what about mom? It's been a while since you seen her and she expects you to be skinny by now. To top it off, I was suppose to help you lose way too, but instead I gain weight too. What are we suppose to do?"
"Meh." Said Vitani unfazed.
"Meh?" Said Kovu. "I can still try to lose some of this weight, but you........"
"Like I said, I don't really want to lose the weight." Vitani said.
"Well mom, won't be too happy about that."
"You're not gonna tell her are you?"
"No. I still have back....(even if I can't reach it.)"
"Thanks!"
"But still, you may need to tell her the truth over not telling her."
"Got any other ideas?" Vitani said not wanting to face her mother yet.
"You could lose all the weight."
"Still waiting for another idea."
"Well, what do YOU have in mind?"
"How about doing things this way for the rest of our life?"
"Really........." Kovu said giving her sister a look.
"Ok. Ok. How about...........
13533211211121111111122121112.title: Brother and Sister bonding.

135332112111211111111221211122.content:
"*sign* I guess we have to talk to Nuka." Vitani said.
"Nuka? Really?" Kovu said.
"He's the only one who can really help us." Vitani said.
"But what if he doesn't help us?" Kovu asked.
"Then we will have to face the music with mom." Vitani said.

At that moment, the image of their angry mother haunted the two cubs.

"For the record, you will get in a LOT more trouble then me." Kovu said.
"If I go down, you go down with me." Vitani growled.
"Ugh! Fine." Kovu said not to happy.

So Vitani and Kovu went back to the Outland's main front. With Vitani's massive weight, it was hard for her to walk. All she could really do is waddle. Kovu was still fine with walking, but there was no way no one could not notice his extra pounds. So Kovu goes to Nuka, while Vitani hides for now.

"Hey Nuku, bro." Kovu said.
"Hello runt or should I say, not-so-little runt." Nuka said.
"Ummm......"
"Don't ummm me." Nuka said. "I know you have been sneaking extra eating. Growing boy my butt."
"Don't tell mom, please." Kovu pleaded.
"Hahaha! As if I would miss the chance to rat you out." Nuka said.
"Well, I still not as bad as Vitani." Kovu said.
"Vi...Vitani? She's....not elephant big again, is she?" Nuka asked.
"No. But she is getting close to it." Kovu said.
"Take me to her." Nuka said.

So Kovu toke Nuka to the rock where Vitani was.

"Hey, big bro." Vitani said with a slight chuckle.

Nuka reacted by........

choices: A giant sized superhero version of yours truly.
A giant supervillain version of yours truly.

1421.content:
Once upon a time 25 years ago in 1988 during late spring or early summer, before Dodger the dog met Oliver the cat, Dodger was about to have his life changed forever.

One day Dodger the dog happened to notice a mysterious soft drink called nature's goodness and couldn't help but drink it anyway.

Dodger: Nature's goodness huh? Well as we mild mannered citizens say bottoms up.

But Dodger didn't know this particular soft drink could turn anyone into a giant monster of some sort until it was too late.

Dodger: *burrap* Ooh excuse me he politely said.

Then the impossible and unthinkable had happened as Dodger had now transformed into that of a giant monster as he was now looming over everyone and everything around him in the very city itself.

Dodger: What the? I don't believe this i'm practically a giant dog he said. Well i might as well see what it's like being a giant i guess he said.

And so the now giant dog then decided to try and take a few giant steps as he tried his best not to wreck anything around him.

Dodger: Okay that does it for taking a few giant steps. Now i have to either choose to be a giant superhero or supervillian or just be a mild mannered giant. Okay I've now made my choice and i will become....
1421.title: Before the movie

1423.content:
Dodger was bored. Sure, Fagin had money and wealth and a good financial investor who dealt with money and business Fagin had inherited after his loan shark's empire had fallen. When Dodger was frank, he thought that Fagin was not a smart man; but Dodger wasn't very smart himself and loved Fagin all the same. Dodger was thinking of this solely because Fagin was feeding his dogs then. Five bowls were filled to the brim with the usual dry dog food. Once Dodger had guzzled his food, he gently nudged Fagin and politely tilted his head and asked for more food. Although Fagin usually resisted at first, he quickly succumbed to Dodger's begging.

         Initially, all of Fagin's dogs gained a bit of sleek fat; but Dodger gained more weight faster than any other dog of Fagin's, a fact to which Fagin was oblivious. Francis was the first to notice, "Erm, Dodger," the erudite bull-dog quavered, "Do you think that you've, um, increased your waist-line a bit quickly?" Although Dodger had known what Francis met, he enjoyed playing dumb and pressing on to the most extreme bluntness, "What? Are you saying that I'm fat, Frankie?" Dodger asked in genuine defensiveness.

         "Francis," Francis snapped, "When will you ever learn that my name is Francis?" But in a more quiet, but more eerily intense tone, he responded, "Precisely, Dodger." Dodger chuckled, "Frankie, have you looked lately at yourself?" Francis looked stupefied and immediately muttered something incoherent and stormed off. Meanwhile, Fagin had walked into the kitchen to rinse his dishes. Dodger ambled up to Fagin and nudged him again. When Fagin looked down, Dodger walked to his bowl, grabbed it, and held it.

         Fagin got the message, but chuckled and shook his head. Dodger repeated his action, to the same avail. Dodger waited a couple of minutes and repeated the action and was surprised when he was still met with a no. Dodger waited until Fagin was done and did something which he hadn't done since he was a puppy and was ashamed to use such a tactic on Fagin: he used his puppy eyes. That finally broke Fagin.

         Dodger managed to wheedle out three bowls of food a night from Fagin slowly, but increasingly constantly. Moreover, although Fagin found an apartment in a rich neighborhood, Dodger found himself surrounded with working-class neighborhoods. Most notably to Dodger, there was a meat-packing plant with an employee which gave any edible refuse and any salvageable scraps from the factory to Dodger whenever the dog scratched at the back door where the man worked.

         Dodger had known the man since he was a puppy because the man had given him scraps from the factory which had kept Dodger alive. This was also the man whom Dodger had first used his puppy-eyes on. When Dodger scratched on the door, he saw the familiar face of the man who had saved him. Immediately, the man went inside and brought out…
1423.title: After the movie

14232.content:
The man brought out a bratwurst and a flank steak, both of which he proffered to Dodger, who snatched them in his greedy jaws and devoured the food. A moment later, when Dodger had finished, he went and nudged the man's arm and begged for more food. The man chuckled and replied, "Allright, I guess I can spare you a hamburger patty," which turned into two and a hot-dog before the man finally steeled and denied Dodger's request. Thus, a contented Dodger lay down for a nap in the yard.

         When Dodger returned home, he was hungry again and waited calmly for dinner. After he had eaten his usual three bowls, Dodger lay down for a nap. Einstein, however, thought something was off about Dodger. He seemed to look like a sausage, which was something Einstein had never seen before a dog. Although he said nothing, Einstein was wary of Dodger.

         When Dodger awoke the next morning and tried to rise, an ache sprang in his hind, right knee and caused Dodger to treat the knee gingerly. To Dodger's chagrin, Tito noticed and yapped, "Eh, boss, you ok? Is your knee bothering you?" Dodger smiled and answered, "No, I'm afraid it's an old injury that I may have aggravated."

         "By your weight," Dodger heard Francis mutter. Dodger snapped his head and growled, "Do you dare lecture ME on my weight, Francis," Dodger spat, with special vehemence reserved for the bull-dog's name, "Do you dare question me on my previous injuries, Francis? Do you dare question your leader, FRANCIS?" The last word was nearly a roar.

         Although Francis flinched slightly at Dodger's last word, the biting anaphora, and the sarcastic use of his name, Francis regained his composure and responded, "Dodger, I have heard that if a human can feel your ribs easily as he runs his hands down them and not see them, you are a healthy weight. I had Fagin do that to me today, and he could feel my rins with little effort. So I ask you: could you say the same? I detest your innuendos and blatant statements regarding my weight. You are wrong. I know that you have suffered much, but your weight exacerbates such injuries. And your ethos at the end intimidates me not at all."

         As Francis finished, Dodger sat stupefied. He was no match for Frankie in words, but he was still a match in a fight. As Dodger advanced Francis cocked his head and chastised Dodger, "Come now, we have no need to fight. Where we are, we don't have to fight to make a point." Dodger ignored him and continued to approach. Then, he noticed Einstein standing next to Frankie.

         Dodger felt like he had been kicked. To have two of his closest friends turn on him was shameful. Then, he noticed Tito, more than a match for any of them there, at his side. Rita stood by, watching carefully. She loved Dodger and admired his new pudginess, but she also didn't want to see both dogs poison a well and intervened, "Have you boys ever heard of diplomacy?" Rita asked. Her voice checked everyone in the room.

         Francis, recovering most quickly, responded, "Rita, I'd be very pleased if we were to, and I tried; but Dodger is acting as a barbarian." But Rita, seeing his ploy, responded, "Frankie, I'm not a dunce. I know you hit a sensitive nerve for Dodger." An exchange followed, which resulted in…
14232.title: …a copious supply of good meat.

142321.content:
Dodger grew increasingly irate at the debate between Rita and Francis. Eventually, after the debate had devolved into an "I'm right; you're wrong" mud-slinging fest, Dodger finally snapped, "Alright, diplomacy has gotten us nowhere. Let's take this outside, Frankie." Francis muttered something but accepted the challenge.

         Francis had analyzed how he would fight with Dodger. Because Francis was short of breath because of his nasal configuration, he would allow Dodger to attack before he would make a small motion to dodge. When Dodger had tired himself out or frustrated himself, Francis thought that he would then pin Dodger to the ground.

         Dodger had no plan, by contrast. He would just be fast and smooth and would knock Francis out quickly. Einstein and Rita would be the judges. As the two contenders faced off, Rita told both fighters the rules which both knew by heart. After counting down, the fight began.

         As soon as Rita said to go, Dodger lunged quickly at Francis, who barely managed to dodge the attack in time. However, Dodger, being unaccustomed to his new weight, was thrown off balance slightly, which gave Francis time to recover and prepare for Dodger's next attack. Dodger again lunged at Francis, who, this time, stood his ground and let the attack flow by him; and Francis then tried to lunge and pin Dodger to the ground. But being more accustomed to his weight, Dodger stopped and rolled out of the way.

         But Dodger took to long to stand and was knocked off balance as he was standing and had the wind knocked out of him. Before he could recover, Dodger felt felt the weight of Francis on him, trapping Dodger with his legs. Dodger struggled to no avail. Rita and Einstein were counting, "…three…four…five. Stop!" Dodger stood shakily and wearily. He had been thoroughly humiliated, by Francis no less. "Good game," Francis congratulated Dodger; but the defeated dog looked away. "Come now, Dodger, don't make this a shameful defeat," Francis whispered urgently.

         Dodger refused to acknowledge Francis, who sensed that he had poisoned a deep well. Dodger stormed off; but when Francis went to follow, Tito sighed, "Frankie, don't bother. He wants to be alone right now." This last statement proved to be untrue, however, when Dodger went to his friend at the packaging plant, the man who gave him a New-York strip, an Italian sausage, a couple of Kielbasas, and various lunch-meats, as well as copious scraps. These foods helped alleviate Dodger's foul mood.

         What further helped his poor mood was his stop at a bakery on the way home. The man there was throwing away his unused confections when Dodger walked by. When Howler nudged the man and pointed at the food, the man chuckled and gave Dodger whatever he wanted. This man would become another routine stop for Howler.

         When Howler had returned home and eaten dinner, he noticed Francis's approach; and Dodger heard the bulldog's question, "Dodger, I admit that I acted senselessly this morning. Please, would you forgive me?" To which Dodger replied, …
