1453112.content: Georgette wakes up one morning and looks into her full-length mirror as she does every morning. After seeing the state she's in from last night's sleep, she cleans herself up, does her hair and is now fully awake. She goes to the mirror again, only to have her jaw drop at what she saw. "W-W-W-What is THIS?!" She demanded to no one. She sees she has gained some weight, she now has a small belly on her once-slim figure. "This must be some mistake." She says to herself. "I must still be half asleep." She shakes her head, then looks at the mirror again, the belly was real. "This can't be happening! Not to ME!" She starts to break down in tears and loud sobbing, she was being a drama queen again. Hearing the commotion, Penny runs in. "Georgette! What's wrong, girl?" She asks out of concern. Georgette looks up at her and whimpers, tears in her eyes. "Oh, looks like you've gained a bit of weight. It's okay, don't let it get you down. No matter how much you weigh, you'll always be Georgette." Jenny smiles as she sees this is having some effect on the distraught poodle. She had stopped crying at least. "There, better? Let me know if you need anything. I got to go. Bye." And with that, Penny leaves and closes the door behind her. Georgette thought about Penny's words, then sits up proudly. She was right! It doesn't matter what she looks like, on the inside she's STILL Georgette, STILL the jewel of dog compititions! She looks at herself in the mirror again. "Hmm. Now that I think about it, it actually looks pretty good. I like it. In fact, this could be a trend." She faces away from the mirror. "(Gasp) That's IT! I'm going to make fat trendy! And I'll start by gaining as much weight as I can! "She gets exited thinking about it. "Look out world, bigger and more beautiful Georgette is coming to town!" She gets to work. Whenever she's fed, she makes sure to sneak in more food in her room. She grew fatter and fatter as the month's pass. By New Year's Day she was now...

Up in the dark parts of the city, their are some very shady areas that you don't want to go to. One spot is where two strong and fearsome dobermans chose to run things. The dogs are named Roscoe and DeSoto. Roscoe wears a red collar, while DeSoto wears a blue collar. Their owner is Bill Sykes, but the two have decided to do go out on their own for a while to make others fear them. Roscoe and DeSoto often go into dark alley scaring many stray dogs. They have been doing this now only to get their image up, but force others to do what they want. One of their wants......was food.

Roscoe and DeSoto forced strays to find food for them and give it to them. Even if they had to steal it. Everyday, any speck of food, just for the two of them. If anyone stray dog did now get them anything, the two dobermans would beat them up. Roscoe and DeSoto were mad power-hungry....or just mad hungry, cause the only thing the two requested was food. After a while, the tall, muscular dobermans, were starting to gain pudge. But it seems like they didn't notice. All they had in mind was power and food.

It has been a few weeks since the two started owning the back alley.......
1453221.title: DeSoto and Roscoe: Back alley fatties

Ronnie want to get back at Roscoe and DeSoto.
14532211.content:
Here is the current size of Roscoe and DeSoto. http://www.furaffinity.net/view/7882325/...
Now on with the story.

It's been awhile since the two dobermans became greatly feared by all the strays in the streets. Also, Roscoe and DeSoto have gained, quite a lot weight. The two were both massive. Their scariness was only matched by their size. Currently, it was the middle of the day. A line of a few strays were about to offer food to Roscoe and DeSoto again to make sure they do not hurt them.

"Why do we have to do this everyday?" Said a male golden retriever.
"Do you like living?" Said a scared female yorkie. "I mean the two were scary before, but now....look at the size of them."
"They get fat off the food we find, and we're stuck with scrapes. If anything....." Said a bulldog.

The golden retriever's name is Ronnie, the yorkie was Sherry, and the bulldog was named Rufus. The three are just stray dogs forced to find food for DeSoto and Roscoe. The were just three of the many other dogs. Rufus was the next to offer food. He had a few links of sausages.

"Sausages! Freshly smoked from the butcher." Rufus said.
"Excellent! You may go." Roscoe said pleased. Sherry was next.
"I have a big rack of ribs." Sherry said still looking scare.
"Looks delicious. You can leave." DeSoto said. Ronnie was up next.
"Here's a steak." Ronnie said throwing it down with the other food.
"One steak?" Roscoe and DeSoto said looking not to happy.
"It was all I could get." Ronnie said. "Besides.......you can lose a few pounds."
"Grrrrrrr......you little......" Roscoe said about to attack, just to be hold back by DeSoto.
"We'll let it slide, THIS TIME. But you better do better next time." DeSoto said.

Ronnie looked half scared and half angry.

"Now......GET OUT OF OUR SIGHT." Roscoe said. Ronnie than left with Sherry and Rufus.

As they left, the dobermans continue getting food.
14532211.title: The two dogs have gotten huge.

choices: Roscoe and DeSoto find a meat storage factory.
Roscoe and DeSoto found a food storage truck.
145322111.content:
The stray dogs were all done giving food to the two dobermans. Which left the two of them to eating. DeSoto was busy eating some smoked sausages while Roscoe was eating a steak. The two would continue to eat more of the delectable treats while talking about things.

"This is the life. Ain't it DeSoto?" Roscoe said. "All the dogs on the streets fear us and all this food is great."
"Hmm......yeah......." DeSoto said with a concern look on his face.
"What's wrong? You don't like the food?" Roscoe asked.
"No. It's not that." DeSoto answered. "It's that darn retriever. Ronnie, I think."
"That shrimp? Don't worry about him." Roscoe said. "Compare to us, he's small, frail, and weak. While look at us. We are big, bold, and powerful." Roscoe said as he patted his big belly than stuff himself with more meat.
"That's not what bugs me." DeSoto said. "He not only gave us only one steak, but he even talked back at us."
"So what? If we wanted to, we can squash him."
"Even so, it only takes one to start a rebellion."
"Then what should we do about it?"

While saying that, Roscoe and DeSoto belly's growled and they finish all of their food. There was nothing left but a few leftover bones.

"We're out of food." Roscoe said stating the obvious.
"I can see that." DeSoto said.
"Should we make the stray get us more food?" Roscoe said.
"I think we should try to get food for ourselves this time." DeSoto said. "Beats having them giving us small portions. I need a lot of food to fill this belly." DeSoto stated.
"I agree with that." Roscoe said.
145322111.title: Roscoe and DeSoto eat and still want more.

choices: Didn't work and they fall on their backs.
1453221111.content:
In the very late of night, DeSoto and Roscoe went off on their own. They try to find one of the city meat storage factories to satifity their hunger. Currently, they were outside the factory walls.

"According to most of the stray dogs, they got most of the offerings for us from this place." DeSoto said.
"Huh. The factory is so big, you think most of them would steal more food for us." Roscoe said.
"You wish. Believe or not, most of the strays didn't steal the food here. The workers just gave it to them." DeSoto explained.
"What?" Roscoe said shocked. "Is that why some of them food we get is smaller than it should be?"
"Yeah! Most of the strays are too nice and too soft to streal from others." DeSoto said. "Just like that golden retriever, Ronnie."
"Grrrrrr.......he only gave us one measely steak." Roscoe recalled.
"Which is why we are breaking in ourselves. The only think that can limit us is the amount of food in there and our stomachs. DeSoto said.
"Agreed." Roscoe said.

The two were done talking and had to find a way in. Two of the doors were locked and there was NOOOOO way they were gonna fit through any windows. They were able to find a door with no locks on it, but it was still locked from the inside. The two were in a dilemma.

"This.....is.....the only door....left." Said DeSoto, who was out of breath running around building.
"But....it.....seems.....locked too." Said Roscoe, just as tired as DeSoto.
"Ok. Let's ram the door." DeSoto said. "Using our weight should make it easy."
"Alright then." Roscoe said.

Both of the fat dogs took a few steps backs and counted down to get ready to charge.

"1......2.......3!" DeSoto and Roscoe charged at the door and.......

DeSoto and Roscoe being so fat now were heavy enouth to charge down the old metal door.
Both dogs landed on there butts from the impact. Dazed both DeSoto and Roscoe got up to see they both hit the mother load.

The factory was filled with ever type of tasty meat the two dogs loved.

DeSoto and Roscoe tails waged for what are waiting for the dog inside. Both dogs rushed over and started tearing away at the packages and dug into the meat.
It tasted amazing! Both DeSoto and Roscoe were filled with Joe as they eat there fill they comped and swallowed up the burgers and stakes like they were nothing.
Filling up there belly's with tasty food, DeSoto and Roscoe spent hours just eating everything thing they could find.

But soon there belly's were becoming too big and too full both dogs didn't notice throw there massive feast that there belly's were so large that they almost touched the floor it almost hurt that there belly's were so big but at the same time it felt so good to be so overstuffed

DeSoto and Roscoe tried to leave throw the broken down door but to there shock they found that they were too fat to fit throw the door

But as much as the two dogs tried they couldn't get out DeSoto and Roscoe were trapped in the factory and derided they had no choice but to stay the night DeSoto and Roscoe didn't really mind thoght as they now had more time to eat they spent the rest of the night eating up everything they could get there paws on filling there already overstuffed belly's till they couldn't even move

DeSoto and Roscoe got tired they looked around for a comfy spot to sleep and to their luck they found a big comfy couch in an office
DeSoto said "hey man, do you think we can get out tomorrow what if were still to big?

14532211111.title: Got the door opened.

choices: DeSoto and Roscoe decide to have another bottle.
DeSoto and Roscoe drank all the bottles.
145322111112.content:
DeSoto and Roscoe decided to check out the factory's dining room, where the employees would go on break or eat lunch. As big as they were, a bigger stomach means they can fit more in it. But they decided to see if there was anything but the meat products they just ate. When in the dining room, they see a table with a few chairs and 2 interesting boxes.

"Huh? What's in these boxes?" Roscoe asked DeSoto. The dogs smelled both boxes.
"I can't tell what's in this box, but the other one smells.....sweet." DeSoto said.

The two open both boxes. One of the boxes had a few bottles of something that looked like an protein shake, while the other box was a four layered square vanilla cake. Most lucky leftover from some employee's birthday.

"A cake?" DeSoto said.
"Looks like a lot leftovered. Guess the people don't have sweet tooths." Roscoe said.
"Meh! I'm not really a sweet fan myself......." DeSoto admitted. However, the cake did look tasty.
"Fine. I'll just have this all to myself." Said Roscoe about to dive in.
"Wait. I still want some." DeSoto said.
"Heh! Thought so." Roscoe said.

The two divided the cake in half and each ate their own. It didn't take to long to finish the cake leaving nothing but a few crumbs.

"Tasty cake." Roscoe said.
"Yeah! It was ok." DeSoto said. Then his attention went to the other box with the protein shakes. "Hmm, I think these bottles are what humans call "Protein Drinks".
"What are they for?" Roscoe asked.
"Humans drink them either to make them feel full or give them a boost of energy." DeSoto explained.
"Haha! I doubt that those tiny bottles will fill us up. But the boost of energy could be what we need." Roscoe said.
"Good idea." DeSoto said.

They were 12 bottles in the box. DeSoto and Roscoe to one each and open them up.

"Bottoms up!" Said the Dobermans before chugging the bottles. The content in the protein shake contain a hint of Vanilla. The two both thought the drinks were quite good. But what they didn't notice, while the shake churn in their stomachs, their bellies started to bloat up by an inch. However, they didn't notice.

"Wow. This isn't half bad." DeSoto said.
"Yeah. Past me another one." Roscoe said.
"Hold on." DeSoto said. "We still need to get out of this factory."
"Right, before the employee's show up." Roscoe said. "They won't be too happy with all the stuff we ate."
Let's take the box of shakes and find a way out." DeSoto said.

Roscoe agreed and put the boxes with the leftover shake bottles on his back. Even with their, the two didn't feel as tired as they should be. Guess the shakes actually gave them some energy. They looked around and to their luck, they found a double doorway they could go past.

"Look. We can defiently fit through that doorway." Roscoe said.
"Right! Let's go. We still got a job to do." DeSoto said.

They got both the doors open and were able to fit through........just barely. Even if they could have had some more meat, they didn't want to stay and get caught by the workers. Both Roscoe and DeSoto went back to their little alley hideout and brought the protein shakes with them.
145322111112.title: Scooping the dining room.

choices: The two notice their extra weight.
The two still don't notice and continue to have more.
1453221111121.content:
DeSoto and Roscoe just back at their hideout. Their usually go to an alleyway where the strays would offer them food. But this time, they are in an old wreckup and abandon house. It was still a few hours before it was time for today's offerings. Roscoe and DeSoto were both in the old house's living room staring at the box of the 10 protein shakes they had left.

"I'm a little down this was all we could bring." Roscoe said. "We should have at least eaten more of those meats."
"It couldn't be help." DeSoto said. "Any bigger and wouldn't be able to fit through anything. I mean look at us."

Currently, both DeSoto and Roscoe were huge. Defiently large the the average dog. Currently both dobermans had budging fat around their necks, their bodies lengths were longer, to top it off, their bellies were ginorous. Both of their bellies were the same size and large and sphere like. Not to mention hanging down to the ground. Roscoe took the box of shakes and divided them into two groups of five.

"Five for you and five for me." Roscoe said.
"Seems fair." DeSoto said taking his share.
"Ok. I gonna drink another one of these." Roscoe said.

DeSoto and Roscoe both got another bottle and drank them. Like before they enjoyed them, but they didn't notice that their bellies were slightly growing like last time. At least by another inch. But the two didn't notice again. They just enjoyed them too much.

"Man, it's just as good as the last time." Roscoe said.
"I'll say." DeSoto agreed.

After drinking the bottles, DeSoto and Roscoe.........
1453221111121.title: DeSoto and Roscoe decide to have another bottle.

choices: Finally notice the huge amount of extra weight and are shocked.
They notice the extra weight, but don't mind it.
14532211111212.content:
DeSoto and Roscoe still didn't notice the extra weight they were gaining from the shakes, so they decided to drink the rest of the protein shakes. DeSoto and Roscoe each grab their third bottles and drank them. Again, not noticing that their bellies growing even more. Then they drank their fourth bottle, there bellies grow again by even more inches. By the fifth bottle, both Dobermans were getting pretty fat. Not just their bellies anymore, but their necks, faces and legs. The two STILL didn't notice the shakes effects. But they did notice that there were on there last bottles.

"Looks like we are on our last two bottles." Roscoe said.
"Too bad. I could go for some more." DeSoto said.
"Oh well. Bottoms up!" Roscoe said.
"Bottoms up!" DeSoto said.

The two drank their last bottles and like last time, they grew even more. Both of them were now double their size since leaving the meat factory. After finishing the last bottles, both DeSoto and Roscoe.......
14532211111212.title: More shakes, more weight.

choices: Meanwhile with Ronnie and his friends.
145322111112121.content:
The two finally realized the massive extra weight they gained. The two gained so much weight, that their legs were now two feet from the ground.

"Wha....what the?" DeSoto shouted.
"Did we...gain even more weight?" Roscoe asked.
"But how? We weren't this big when we left the factory." DeSoto stated.
"Wait....you don't think......" Roscoe said.
"THE DRINKS!!!!!" Shouted Roscoe and DeSoto.
"What kind of protein shakes are those?" DeSoto asked.

Roscoe grabbed one of the empty bottles and read the label. He also took note to read the warning: Warning! Overdosing may cause bloating. Not tested on animals.

Reading that, didn't made the two very happy.

"So that's why we are so fat?" DeSoto said. "Overdosing and the fact it wasn't on animals?"
"Urk! Seems that way." Roscoe said before belching. "I don't feel so good."
"Urk! Me neither." DeSoto said.

Seems like the boys were dealing with another one of the shakes side effects. Combined with the meat they ate earlier the the several shake the feeling hit their stomachs. They were full. They were beyond max capicity full. They layed on their backs and the bellies groaned on and on.

"Uggh! I feel horrible. I don't think I can eat anything else today." Roscoe said.
"Me neither. Ugh! But what about the dogs offering us food today?" DeSoto asked.
"I don't even want to think about that." Roscoe said.
"Then....we'll go over there and offer them the day off this time." DeSoto said.
"Alright. Let's...ugh....go." Roscoe said still not feeling hot.

So Roscoe and DeSoto headed to their alley where the other dogs give them food. As usual, their was a long line of stray dogs holding food. One of the dogs was Ronnie. The Retriever from before. As the dogs noticed the increased sized of the two dogs, what shocked them more was what they were about to say.

"Attention strays!" Roscoe shouted.
"As of today, you all are lucky. We are giving you a free day." DeSoto said.
"What?" Shouted all the strays.
"Consider us being greatful for today." DeSoto said.
"Any food that you have is yours to keep." Roscoe said.
"Really?" Said a stray basett hound.
"Yes. But just for today." DeSoto said.
"Hmm....something is up." Ronnie thought. "Why are you guys doing this for us today?
"Do you want your food or not?" DeSoto said.
"Now all of you, be thankful and scram." Roscoe said throw a bottle telling everyone to leave.

All of the stray dogs left in confusion. But before leaving, Ronnie notice the bottle Roscoe threw.

"Huh? What's this?" Ronnie said sniffing and inspecting it.

He decided to take the bottle and show it to his two friends. Roscoe and DeSoto went back into their hideout to rest for the rest of the day.
145322111112121.title: Shocked by the weight.

choices: Feed Roscoe and DeSoto more shakes.
1453221111121211.content:
So Ronnie went to his friends, Rufus and Sherry and brought the bottle that Roscoe threw. The three of them stared curiously at it.

"Roscoe throw this. Any of you have an idea what this is?" Ronnie asked.
"Looks like some kind of drink." Rufus said.
"Let me see." Sherry said. "There is something on the label."
"What does it say? I can't read." Rufus said.
"You need to start learning." Sherry replied. "Ok. This is a Protein Drink. Wait! There is a warning on it."
"What's the warning say?" Ronnie said.
"Overdousing may cause bloating. Not tested on animals." Sherry read.
"Bloating? So that's it." Ronnie said.
"You think that Roscoe and DeSoto drank that stuff?" Rufus asked.
"Seems like it. I mean, you saw those two. They were even bigger than last time." Ronnie said.
"By the looks of this, it also had some fullness side effect." Sherry explained. "Probably why they didn't want to eat any of our offerings today."
"So that is what cause the two fatties to get full." Ronnie said.
"I didn't even think that was possible." Rufus said.

Then an idea popped up into Ronnie's head.

"Hehehe!" Ronnie said.
"Ronniiiiiieeee. What are you thinking?" Sherry asked.
"I have an idea guys." Ronnie said.
"What's your idea?" Rufus asked.
"I think we should.......
1453221111121211.title: Meanwhile with Ronnie and his friends.

14532211111212111.content:
"I say we give Roscoe and DeSoto a taste of their medicine again." Ronnie said.
"What do you mean?" Rufus asked.
"I say we find more of these shakes and make them drink more of them." Ronnie said.
"HAVE YOU GONE LOCO IN THE HEAD?" Shouted the little yorkie, Sherry.
"Here me out guys." Ronnie said. "You know that these shakes may be the reason those two didn't want food, right?"
"Go on." Rufus and Sherry said.
"...and did you also notice that their legs barely touch the ground anymore, right?" Ronnie said.
"Yeah. Go on." Rufus and Sherry said.
"Soooooo, the more shakes they drink, the less food they want to eat." Ronnie said.
"That makes enough sense." Sherry said.
"But the last thing we want is those guys any bigger." Rufus said.
"That is where you're wrong." Ronnie said.

Rufus and Sherry tilt their heads in confusion.

"The bigger they are, the less mobile they become." Ronnie said. "They can be as big as two house......"
"But even if that were the case......." Rufus said.
"....it doesn't matter if they can't move." Sherry finished.
"Exactly. They would be scary giants. But scary giants that can't chase anyone." Ronnie said.
"This idea still sounds crazy." Sherry said.
"But it's not the worst idea." Rufus said.
"Come on guys. What do you say?" Ronnie asked.
"If it means I can finally get back to eating normally, I'm in." Rufus said.
"I'm in too. Just as long as this doesn't go bad for us." Sherry said.
"Ok! First, we need to find more of these protein shakes." Ronnie said.

So Ronnie, Rufus and Sherry went off to find more of these protein shakes.
14532211111212111.title: Feed Roscoe and DeSoto more shakes.

choices: They waking up to see what the dogs were doing to them.
145322111112121111.content:
After some searching, Ronnie, Rufus and Sherry finally found a few cases of those protein shakes. The two cases they found had about 12 bottles each. So a totally of 24 bottles. With that in mind, the three dogs headed to Roscoe and DeSoto abandon hideout.

"This is a bad idea." Whispered Sherry.
"Give it a chance." Whispered back Ronnie.
"The first part I get, but sneaking into their hideout and feeding them the shake while they are asleep is SUICIDAL." Whispered loudly Sherry.
"Shhh! Quite Sher." Said Rufus.
"Yeah. The last thing we want to do is wake them up." Ronnie said.

The three continue in the abandon house and found Roscoe and DeSoto in the living room fast asleep on their backs with their ginormous bellies sticking out.

"There they are." Ronnie whispered to his friends.
"Look at them." Rufus said. "It's like they each ate a 3x sized wrecking ball."
"With bellies like that, they can BE wrecking balls." Ronnie replied. Sherry starts to whimper.
"Why do we have to do this?" Sherry said.
"We made it this far. No turning back now." Ronnie said.

With that said, the three took out the two cases of shakes and two funnel cones and slowed walked up to the dobermans.

"Ok. You two do Roscoe. I'll handle DeSoto." Ronnie said.

Rufus and Sherry nodded their head agreeing. Rufus and Sherry went to Roscoe liked Ronnie asked while Ronnie got close to DeSoto. They each put a funnel cone in each of their mouths, being extra careful not to wake them. After that, they open up the cases and pre-opened the bottles of the shakes.

"If this goes south, we are so done." Sherry said.
"Why are you so worried, Sherry?" Rufus asked quietly.
"I'm a little yorkie. These two could have me as a snack if they wanted too." Sherry said.
"Guess that's the least you can say for me or Ronnie." Rufus said.
"Shhhhhhh!" Shushed Ronnie.

After the two got quiet and realized that DeSoto and Roscoe were still asleep, Ronnie gave the others a signal. Sherry hold the funnel while Rufus pour the shake down Roscoe's gullet. Ronnie did the same to DeSoto, but by himself. They careful each pour one bottle down the funnel until the bottles were empty. After the first bottle, it didn't seem like it took any effect. So they each pour down a second bottle into them. Still being careful not to wake them. After the second bottles, it still didn't look like it took any effect on them.

"I don't think it's working." Sherry whispered.
"Keep pouring." Whispered back Ronnie.

So they pour down a third bottle to each out them and as they did, both DeSoto and Roscoe bellies started to expand. So the shakes were working. Giving them three bottles each so far, they each had 9 more bottles. A total of 18. The gang continues to pour more and more bottles down the dobermans hatches being sure to stay quite. They made it so Roscoe and DeSoto have drank 6 bottles each.

"So far, so good." Ronnie said.
"They are getting quite big now." Sherry said.
"I wouldn't be surprise if they can't even get out of this house now due to their size." Rufus said.
"That's the plan." Ronnie said. "Now let's pour in more."

The group goes back to pouring the shakes to them. But as they were about to get back to that, DeSoto and Roscoe seemed disturbed a bit and grunt a bit.

"Gah! Are they waking up?" Sherry said.
"I hope not." Ronnie said.

It seem like DeSoto and Roscoe tilt and turn a bit and then......
145322111112121111.title: Later that night.....

choices: Next day, Roscoe and DeSoto felt bloated and confused.
Next day, Roscoe and DeSoto don't know about the extra weight yet.
1453221111121211111.content:
DeSoto and Roscoe grunted and groaned because of the content in their stomachs. This made Ronnie and his friends feared that they would wake up. So the three stepped back from them.

"Pleasedon'twakeup!Pleasedon'twakeup!Pleasedon'twakeup!" Whisphered the three dogs.

But lucky for them, the two were still snoozing.

"*sign* That was close." Ronnie whispered.
"Can we go now?" Sherry whinned.
"Not yet. We still got 12 more bottles left." Ronnie said. "Come on. We made it this far."
"He's right you know." Rufus said.
"This is STILL suicidal." Sherry said.

So after the small scare, they went back to pouring the bottles into the dobermans. With both of them having 6 shakes each they pour in the seventh. Then the eighth, nineth, and tenth bottles. Their belly continue to bloat up more and more and more. Then after each of them had their 11th bottles, there were only two bottles left.

"Last ones guys." Ronnie said.
"Finally." Rufus said.
"Good thing too. These guys are taking a lot of space now." Sherry said.

What Sherry said was true. Both Roscoe and DeSoto bloated of so much, they may not even be able to get out of the living room now. But that was their problem. Not Ronnie and the others. So they pour in the final bottles and watch the two dogs bellies do their final bloat.

"Ok. We are done. Let's move." Ronnie said.
"Thank god." Sherry said. "Let's be sure to take the empty bottles and cases."
"Right. We don't want them to know it's us." Rufus said.

So taking the evidences, the guys got the heck out of there. Leaving the bloated dobermans in their sleep.
1453221111121211111.title: Nothing. They were still asleep.

choices: They decide to try somethings else.
14532211111212111111.content:
It was morning and what got the two dogs up was not the sun, but the belly aching groans of their bellies. Roscoe and DeSoto got up feeling horrible, not knowing about their little guests last night or what they did to them. But they did notice the extra increase of their sizes.

"Ugh! What happening? Why do I still feel so sick?" DeSoto said.
"You too?" Roscoe said. "Is it still because of those drinks still?" Roscoe said.
"I'm not sure, but LOOK AT US." DeSoto shouted. "We're ginorous!"
"I think we are too big for this room now." Roscoe said.

Even on their backs, Roscoe and DeSoto's belly were so big that they almost touched the ceiling of the room. It would be nearly impossible to get out of the room.

"Did the shakes still had some after effect?" Roscoe asked.
"I don't know what could have happen. We just need to find a way out." DeSoto shouted.

The two shook around so much, that the old house was starting to rumble.

"Careful." Warned Roscoe. "We don't want this whole place to crumble."
"That's the idea." DeSoto replied. "The only way we can get out now is to break a few walls."
"If we have to." Roscoe agreed.

So Roscoe and DeSoto move back and forward, making the ground shake and a few support beams fall out. It may be a bit too dangerous if they continue to do this.
14532211111212111111.title: Overbloated Debormans.

choices: Let the strays keep the food.
145322111112121111112.content:
It was dangerous, but if Roscoe and DeSoto ever wanted to get out. They had to wreck the house a bit. They had to use those big old bellies of theirs like wrecking ball. They needed to break at least one wall.

"Okay. On three." Roscoe said. DeSoto nodded.
"One...Two...Three!!!!!" The dobermans shouted.

Thr combined force was able to break down a wall to the outside. Buuutttt....they also knocked down one of the support beams to the house. Causing the entire house to go falling down and on Roscoe and DeSoto. Their hideout was now reduce to rubble, but surprisingly, the two were still okay. Guess those bellies of theirs help them out.

"There goes our hideout." DeSoto said sighing.
"Couldn't be helped." Roscoe said. "Just be glad we are still okay."
"Still can't believe on how big we got." DeSoto said rubbing his belly. "How did this happen? Was it really an after affect from the shakes?"
"Well, like last time, I feel too full to eat anything today." Roscoe said.
"But we can't skip today's offerings." DeSoto stated. "We already skipped one day. If we don't take any offers today, the strays will think something is up."

What to do? What to do? Were they really still take today's offers or would they just let the strays keep their food again?
145322111112121111112.title: Breaking down walls.

choices: The battle between the good guys and the bad guys begins.
Some unexpected help arrives for the good guys themselves.
145322112.content:
Whilst walking through the back alley they were in, Ronnie felt like he wanted to get back at both Roscoe and Desoto themselves. But the problem was both of them were absolutely huge, until Ronnie the golden retriever had an idea.

"Okay i have an idea that's going to involve only myself and Rufus gaining weight and getting big. We all know how huge and scary both those dobermans are right?"

"Right" both Sherry and Rufus said.

"Now here's how we're going to do this the right way without anyone getting hurt, as i just mentioned earlier both Rufus and myself are going to try and become just as big and fat as Roscoe and his brother are. Also both myself and Rufus awhile back stumbled across a weight gain gym for dogs that could help us beat both dobermans". Ronnie explained.

"Weight gain gym for dogs you say Ronnie? Oh yeah, i remember seeing that place one day." Rufus said.

"Are you guys sure you want go through with this? I mean it's gonna take a lot of training if you two want to beat those dobermans." Sherry said.

"It's the only way. Just give us a couple of weeks or so and both Rufus and i are gonna be gargantuan humongous gigantic as in big you'll see". He confidently told Sherry.

"Okay, well then good luck guys and when your training's done i'll be surprised when i see you guys are big fat and strong enough to take on those dreaded dobermans."

And so a couple of weeks or so passed, as both Ronnie and Rufus spent their time at the weight gain gym for dogs until their training was complete as both now huge dogs heavily waddled out of the gym itself with their heads held high.

"Rufus you ready to see Sherry and surprise her before we take on those two dobermans?" Ronnie asked.

"Mmm Hmm I'm ready when you are". Rufus replied.

"Alright then let's go." Ronnie boldly commanded.

Meanwhile Sherry could hear the sound of heavy footsteps, as her eyes widened upon seeing her now huge friends.

"Ronnie and Rufus, is that you?" Sherry asked as she noticed they were now quite bigger fatter and stronger than ever before.

"It is Sherry and now that we're done training, i'd say it's time to stand up for our fellow dogs and teach them bullies a lesson right Rufus"?

"You got that right" Rufus replied.

"Now it's time to take on Roscoe and Desoto". Ronnie said.

And so the three dogs made their way into the back alleyway where Roscoe and Desoto were as the other dogs couldn't help but be amazed upon seeing their future superheroes Ronnie and Rufus standing up against Roscoe and Desoto.

"What do you two want and where's our food"? Roscoe asked.

"Gentleman you ain't getting any more food and we're tired of you both bullying our friends" Ronnie said.

"That's right and now we hereby challenge you both to a tag team Sumo match. Do you accept our challenge"? Rufus asked.

"We do. We're ready now." Desoto answered.

And so all four of the challengers mainly the good guys consisting of the team of Ronnie the golden retriever A.K.A the golden warrior and Rufus A.K.A the iron curtain and the bad guys consisting of Roscoe and his Brother Desoto A.K.A the terror doberman twins of New York City gathered on the sidewalk from where the alley was, as Sherry and a few other dogs were doing play by play commentary while one dog filled the role of referee for the fight of the century.
145322112.title: Ronnie wants to get back at Roscoe and DeSoto.

1453222.content: How can they do that?
1453222.title: Roscoe vs DeSoto: The Bigger Dog

14532222.content: How about the drinking contest?

151.title: Which Bear?.

choices: He becomes really good at catching salmon.
He gets to experience bears preparation for hibernation, first hand.
1511.content: How does he gain weight?
1511.title: Kenai

choices: Ask For Help To Prepare To Hibernate?
15112.content:
It hadn' been long since Kenai decided to be a bear, with Koda, so things were still relatively new for him.
Such as learning about Hibernation.

This lesson was learnt, when he was walking along the Banks of the Salmon Run, one fresh morning, when he noticed Tug, the largest of al the bears he knew, stacking up a huge pile of Fish, which was taller than Kenai himself!

"Hey Tug!" Kenai greeted the larger bear; "What you doing here? There's enough Salmon here to las to Summer! We holding another get together, or something?"
"What!? No!" Tug seem surprise at Kenai's ignorance; "This is all for me, Buddy!"

This surprise Kenai, he did consider that, if Tug normally ate this much, that is probably way he got this large, couldn' help to ask; "You...usually eat like this?"

"No, It's Hibernating time!" Tug seem al the more puzzle, Kenai always did seem a strange type of Bear; "You Know, what that means!? We feed up and sleep all winter! Little Koda is going to do the same too!"

Kenai then remembered this detail; "Oh...Yeah! Right..."
This did concern Kenai, he has spend all his life as a Human, who don' need to hibernate. How would he be able to get himself to sleep for up to three or so months!?

What may he do?
15112.title: He gets to experience bears preparation for hib...

choices: A bit up river from the Salmon Run?
151121.content:
If Kenai is going to learn how to Hibernate, he's going to need help!

"Erm, Hey! Tug!" Kenai perks up; "You seem pretty big, Preparing for this I mean...Is there a place which can...You Know...get me as big as possible, for the Hibernation?"

"Well...You are new here!" Tug notes; "So, you'll need al the help you can get! Alright, I'll show you this little place, I know, that'll have you as big as me, in no time!"

Kenai follows Tug and soon the two find themselves...
151121.title: Kenai needs help...

1511212.content:
Tug lead Kenai throug the forest, but alwys making sure they could see the river to their right.
Soon, they come to what looks like a fork in the river, and that's when Tug gives a large smile; "Here we are!"

Kenai observed the scene, while the river forking to the right leads to what he knows as the Salmn Rn, the river that forks to the left seem a bit smaller, probably four times as wide as he is.
"What is this place?" He asks.

"The one river seems to become two here..." Tug explains, sitting at where the fork strts, making it so he can reach both rivers; "So, that means if the river heads two ways, so do al the other salmon!"
He points his paw, for Kenai to notice that, while mst of the salmon went in to the River he knows, there are still a number of them who take the fork river, probably thirty percent of them.

"So, you mean you can get them al here!?" Kenai asks, in surprise; "Why don' we put the Salmon rn here!?"

"This is a pretty small place..." Tug explains; "Think how difficult it would be for al of us, trying to ft in here!?"
Kenai does notice that Tug does have a point, this opening in the forest is onl large enough for three or four bears, at mst.
"So, You want to catch some!?" Tug asks.

Kenai nds and looks to the waters, he swipes his paw in and then, after some time, Kenai has a pile of Salmon as large as...
1511212.title: Salmon Place, Up River

15113.content: Kenai finds a place that has berries where once he eats it, he gains a couple inches in a matter of seconds.
15113.title: Magical Berries

choices: He tries to set a record in longest hibernation.
He tries to become a full grown bear by eating a lot.
1512.content:
How will the little bear become a big bear?

http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/Koda
1512.title: Koda

choices: Koda grew too big to move.
Koda wanted to be the biggest bear in the forest
15122.content: As winter was fast approaching Koda had seen the other bears start to gain weight and grow twice as heavy as they were during winter he did not understand hibernation he thought that they were gaining weight to grow bigger. The other cubs told Koda that the more they ate the bigger they grew. Koda thought that the more he ate the bigger he would become and would grow into an adault bear fast.
15122.title: He tries to become a full grown bear by eating ...

151221.content:
Determined to become an adult bear as quickly as possible Koda decided to put all his effort into eating.

At first he wondered what to eat. He could eat salmon's like the other bears, but there was two problems with that. 1. Many other bears where probably hunting in the river right now since it was a popular place to hunt in, and 2. The effort it would take to catch even one salmon would make him burn more calories then he would gain. "If I want to keep my food inside of me I must do almost nothing else but eating." Koda thought, remembering seeing some very fat bears that would do nothing but lay around lazily all day after eating.

Having salmon out of the picture Koda tried hard to figure out what else to eat, but all that came into his mind was berries and nuts. At first it felt like it wouldn't work, but then Koda slightly remembered a hidden place that had plenty of berry bushes and trees that was easy to shake nuts out of. Seeing this as his greatest plan yet Koda decided to go of to find it.

During the whole day Koda went his way deeper down the forest and further away from where the rest of the bear tribe was. As the sun was getting lower and darkness was starting to take over Koda felt that this might have been a bad idea and that he should head back to the others, but just as he was suppose to his eyes got a glimpse of something small and red hiding in the dense growing forest. Looking closer he saw that it was berries, but was it the one he remembers? A taste on some of them confirmed to him that it was in fact them.

As he let the taste stay in his mouth Koda could feel that these berries was really sweet and juicy, if he would ever have gotten a chance to taste candy it would probably have been the same thing. Feeling happier then ever Koda made his way through the thick growing bush and found inside a hidden clearing with even more berries and nuts then he remembers from last time.

Being more happy then ever before Koda started to eat like crazy of more of the berries. Since they where as sweet as candy Koda got both more addicted to eat them, and he also got the extra energy to do it like in a sugar rush. Plus unknown to him these berries seemed to have a bit of a bizarre side effect. They seems to have the power to make everything someone eats to get a bunch of extra calories as they where being digested. So the more he eat the more energy he would get and the more calories he would gain.

For Koda this was paradise. He would be in such a rush of the sugar that he wouldn't even notice that his midsection was starting to get wider. Not even when he was using his added body form to slam into trees and making it's nuts drop down on the ground. He was to busy to not lose his drive. "I can't believe that I have never been to this place much more often!" Kody thought to himself.

Unknowingly for Koda hours passed and it had been getting late into nightfall when he had finally managed to clean every single bush of its berries. Koda's brain started to slightly work again as all he could think about was to find more berries. Frantically Koda looked around hoping to find more of that sweet nectar of the forest. As the rush was getting lower the more desperate Koda became. He turned and looked in all directions possibly until he tried standing up which made him fall on his back. Getting completely out of his trance state Koda got a chance to see that it was in the middle of the night now, and on what those berries had truly done to him.

Looking down he saw that his normal looking paunch had now been stretched out to be at least three times its normal size. It looked like the little cub had swallowed down another cub. And while he had been able to still move his new body around before, his position of laying on his back made moving around down right impossible. He was stuck looking at the stars up in the sky, and on the moon that was shining down it's light to make it possible for Koda to see his new belly. "Not to shabby for my first day." Koda thought proud and patted his belly.

But his proudness soon turned into fear as he heard noises coming from the nearby bushes. In this unlucky position he figured out that he would become a great victim for any predator that would be lurking around, and he would not be able to do anything about it!

Luckily for him the mystical creature turns out to be none other then...
151221.title: Koda grews too big to move.

choices: Something else happens during the night.
1512212.content:
As he looked around frighten Koda could hear the sounds getting closer and closer. He could see in front of him how the bushes were starting to move as the creature was getting through it. At first Koda couldn't see anything but a dark shadowy figure approaching, but as soon the things walked into the moonlight Koda could make out what looked like big horns on the creatures head.

Koda instantly took and felt relieved over that it was just a moose, and even though he was just a lonely cub he know that it wouldn't take and hurt him. Taking a closer look he started to think that this moose looked familiar when he heard the noise of something else coming. Getting through the bushes was another moose, and this one was half-shouting to the other one. "Don't take all the beautiful grass for yourself. Leave some for me!" "Then you have to be much quicker getting here instead of walking so slowly!" The other one said in the same some what loud but still numbed voice. "I have a bad knee and you know it!" The second one said while tottering around like he couldn't see where the other moose stood.

Finally realizing who they where Koda shouted "Rutt and Tuke!", making them both twitch and blink a lot with their eyes. After looking around for some moments the moose's started to ask each other where they were, without the other on knowing the answer. After listening to their bickering for some time Koda shouted "Hey Guys!", making them both see the cub on the ground. "Hey." Koda said polite to them now when they where both looking at him. "Hey I know you." Rutt said, "Yeah aren't you that little bear that was together with that other bear?" Tuke added. "Yes I am." Koda answered happy. "See, I knew it, I knew it. You're that one, little bear...that is named..." Rutt said trying to figure out Koda's name. "Don't be silly now Rutt. We know this bear's name, its...its..." Tuke said before getting lost as well. "Koda", Koda said.

"Yes Koda! Of course! See, I knew it all the time." Rutt said snarky. "Then why didn't you say it then?" Tuke asked back. "Maybe because I would liked to challenge you." Rutt said and was on his way to fight Tuke when Koda asked, "Why are you both out here in the middle of the night?" "I have no idea but I think the reason for Tuke to be here could be because he has been sleepwalking, he does that a lot." Rutt said to Koda. "Oh, Like you hasn't been doing that yourself. Have I ever told you about how many times I have to follow you during the nights to make sure that anything bad will happen to you?" Tuke said back upset. "But you where both talking before, didn't you notice that?" Koda asked confused. "We where talking before getting here? I don't remember that." Tuke said. "Me neither." Rutt added, "So you where both sleepwalking and sleep-arguing when you got here?" Koda asked. "...Seems like so.” Tuke said after thinking for a moment.

"But what has happen to you kid? You're look much more rounder then last time we saw you." Rutt said and poked Koda's belly slightly with one of his hoofs. "I'm just trying to help myself grow and become the biggest bear around." Koda said proud while patting his belly with his front paws. "But how did you manage to feed yourself so much out here all alone?" Tuke asked. "I found these sweet berries that helped me getting the energy to continue eating even though I was already starting to get full, but I need to have more of them if I want to be able to reach full grown bear size." Koda said, "Could you help me find them?" "Sure kid, we would be most happy to help you with anything." Rutt said. "Just tell us what they looked like." Tuke added. "Well they...they..." Koda said before realizing the horrible truth. "Yes?" Both moose's asked eager to hear. "I don't remember." Koda said sadly. "I was soo into eating them that I didn't took the time to remember how they looked like, and now they are all in here." He said and pointed to his stuffed belly. "Well...that's really bad." Rutt said. "Makes it kinda hard to find them then." Tuke added.

After sitting silently for a while Koda asked "Would it be possible for you two to help me back home to Kenia and the others?" to them. At first the moose's looked prepared to answer "YES! Of Course! Just Follow US!", but then suddenly something hit them in the same sad way as the berries had done to Koda. "What is it?" Koda asked prepared for the worst. "We are actually not very used to walk around the forest during night." Tuke said. "Since we usually use it to well...sleep." Rutt added. "So that means that we two are both..." Tuke said, before Koda finished "Lost". "Yes." Rutt said, "We are all three right now lost." "Then what do we do now? Koda asked worried. "Do not fear little bear, Tuke and I will be here to make sure that you're safe." Rutt said. "And then tomorrow we start searching for the way back to your bear friends." Tuke added.

The two moose's then took and lied themselves next to Koda to protect him during the night.
1512212.title: Rutt and Tuke helps Koda.

choices: Get up on the highest mountain to get a good look on their surroundings.
Find the river and walk next to it.
15122122.content:
As the sun rise the next day Rutt and Tuke was first to wake up, using the time to get up and take a look at their surroundings.

While doing that Koda was starting to wake up as well, and as soon as he open his eyes Koda couldn’t believe what he saw. His belly that he got so big and round during yesterdays night, still looked just as big today. Things got even weirder when he put his paws on it and could feel that it wasn’t as full and heavy as of before, but more empty and lighter now. (To explain to everyone the berries Koda had been eaten last night had been having an Air Inflation effect on him, as of now while the food inside had been digested the berries had made sure that all the air that had been swallowed as well had stayed inside of him.) While Koda felt this was really strange he was still happy that his midsection weighed less so he could be able to move again. He could still feel his belly scratching the ground as he walked, but it wasn’t as much of an obstacle as of before.

When he finally managed to catch up to the moose’s he asked them what to do now. “We have been talking for a long time now about what to do.” Rutt said. “And we have so far not been able to decided what exactly we should do.” Tuke added. “You see, I think we should try to find the river and then walk along it until we find the rest of the pack.” Rutt said. “And I want us to go up to the top of the high mountains to get a better view of the area.” Tuke added. “So we thought this when you came, could you decide what we should do?” Rutt asked Koda.

At first Koda felt a bit unsure what to pick, but after some deliberation he to wanted them to…
15122122.title: The next day.

151221222.content:
"I think we should walk along the river." Koda said. "See, I told you that it is the smartest move to make." Tuke said to Rutt, who just tried to ignore him. "My plan was just as good as yours, it was all decided by the kid." Rutt tried to defend. "But still, the kid choose me." Tuke said proud of for once winning an argument.

Not wanting to waist any more time Rutt and Tuke and Koda made their way to nearby laying river. Once there they reached another problem. "Which way are we suppose to go now?" The moose's asked each other, expecting the other one to have the answer. "I know." The heard Koda say. "You do?" Tuke said. "Then tell us." Rutt added. "I got to learn that salmon always swim upwards against the stream, which makes it much easier for bears to catch it. If we just follow the stream the same way the salmon does them should meet another bear in no time." Koda explained. Both moose's was very surprised by the knowledge that this small cub had in him, and they decided to do as he said and go against the stream.

As they where walking alongside the river Koda suddenly spotted something. It was a small bush that was carrying some berries, but unlike the once that Koda had been eating before that had been red this ones where lightly green. Koda was on his way to run up and taste them, when his inflated stomach made him trip over onto his back. The moose's where quick to get to him, and asked him if he was all right. "Yes, but i need to get up, I need to taste those berries!" Koda said and was trying to quickly get up, which only made it harder for him. "Take it easy little cub. Are you sure those are the berries you ate before?" Rutt asked. "I don't know, I don't remember." Koda answered sadly. "Then I think we should let one of us test them, just to be sure." Tuke said to Koda. "I agree completely with you Tuke, so I suggest you do it." Rutt said, and started pushing Tuke towards the bush from behind him. "Wait, I do it?!" Tuke said surprised. "I'm so glad we are at an agreement again Tuke, now be nice and help this pore cub." Rutt said and pushed him all the way to the bush.

Once there and runs back to Koda (Still on his back) and looks on at Tuke standing right next to the bush with the green berries. "I-I have a bad feeling about this." Tuke said a bit scared. "Come on now, do it for the kid!" Rutt shouted back at him. "O-Okay." Tuke said before he got his head really close to one of its branches filled with berries, and took a big bite of it. He gave it some quick chews and then swallowed it. At first everything felt normal, but then he got a strong taste of...
151221222.title: Walking along the river.

choices: Tricking Tuke into eating more of the berries.
Koda tricking Rutt into eating some berries.
1512212221.content:
It took only a few moments before Tuke felt a horrible burning aftertaste take over his mouth and throat. In an quick haste he ran to the river to stick his head down and drink the water. He drank and drank in an attempt to get cooled down, and after 3 minutes of constant drinking he felt that the heat was gone.

Looking back at Rutt and Koda he could see that they where both staring at him awkwardly. "What is it guys...?" He started to ask, before he felt something big jiggle under him when he moved. Looking down he got shocked himself seeing that all that drinking had been giving him a huge water filled belly!

(It seemed that these green berries had a special kind of mineral that once digested would make the carrier's skin able to stretch out widely, and giving them the ability to store huge amounts of food or water without feeling any pain.)

While Tuke still stood there in disbelief of the new belly he had now got, Rutt had managed to get enough courage to walk up towards him. "What is this!?" Tuke asked scared while moving around a little, making his belly shake with the steps. "I have no idea, but this is very interesting." Rutt said and poked his friends hanging gut with on of his hooves. "Don't touch it! It might burst!" Tuke said scared, and moved away from Rutt. "Kid, did this thing happen when you ate those berries?" Rutt asked. "I don't remember it working that quickly." Koda said.

"And..." Koda started before stopping. "And what?" Rutt asked. "I'm not sure but...I don't think it feels the same. I'm not sure since I don't know how his feels." Koda said and pointed to Tuke that was just standing a bit away, still acting confused about his belly. "If I could get a chance to feel it I might be able to tell." The bear cub said. "I'll help you with that kid." Rutt said calmly, before shouting "Tuke! Get over here!"

"What is it about?" Tuke said as he walked over with careful steps. "You must let the kid touch your belly." Rutt said to him like it was something normal. "What?!" Tuke shouted surprised. "I want you to let him touch your belly." Rutt said clear. "I'm not doing that!" Tuke said once again in a shocking voice, and tried to walk away without tripping over, but Rutt cut his way off. "Don't you want to help the kid?" Rutt asked seriously. "Yes." Tuke answered calmly. "Then you must do this, since it's the only way for him to be sure if those are the same berries that he ate last night." Rutt explained. "Okay, but..." Tuke started before getting afraid. "But what?" Rutt asked. "I'm afraid I will get hurt by his claws." Tuke confessed. "Okay, now I understand, but don't be worried, I'm sure he will be careful." Rutt said comforting him.

Still feeling a bit unsure Tuke staggered to the small cub and let him feel on his belly with his small paws. At first Tuke was tensed about it, but after only a few strokes by the cub he started to feel more relaxed. It all felt so good, almost like a massage, so Tuke didn't even seem to notice at first when Koda stopped feeling him. Once he noticed that the cub had stopped Tuke let out a small sigh. "What was that?" Rutt asked with a smirk. "Nothing." Tuke answered back quickly.

Looking back at the kid Rutt asked "Did it feel the same?" "No." Koda answered disappointed. "While his stomach felt like it had more weight and was full of water, mine felt more how to say empty inside. Like it was just filled with air."

Feeling sad for not finding the right berries Koda walked of to rest under a tree. As he was just poking his still air filled belly he suddenly heard some weird noise back at the river. Going back he saw the moose's arguing again, this time it was because Rutt had started to make fun of Tuke's water filled belly. Their bickering got even worse and finally leads to Rutt...
1512212221.title: Hot and burning.

15122122212.content:
At first Koda didn't want to interfere, since they always seemed to be arguing, but once Rutt started to nudge his hooves and horns into Tuke's water balloon like belly against his will Koda knew he had to do something.

Just like Tuke he also had a very inflated belly. His was filled with air instead of water, but the principle was the same. They where both experiencing something that neither of them was really familiar of, nor was feeling completely comfortable with yet. So seeing Rutt pressing and pushing on Tuke's belly while he was still feeling uneasy with it really made Koda upset. He needed to teach Rutt a lesson, and he know just how.

While Rutt was busy still making fun of Tuke, Koda went over to the bush with the green berries. Once there he realize there was a problem with his plan. His plan was to force-feed Rutt some of the berries, but right next to the bush Koda saw a problem. He couldn't carry any berries on a stick since that would make Rutt aware of his intentions, neither could he store them in his mouth because that would have the risk of him eating some of them. So he decided to test something else.

Taking a moment to concentrate Koda then took and raised his front paws up in the air, and let his hind legs balance him. It wasn't anything strange seeing bears doing that, but since Koda had a belly that was filled with air he wasn't sure if it would work. Surprisingly his inflated middle actually helped him holding his body straight up, with the air working a little bit like helium. With his front paws now free Koda took and picked 12 berries before he felt that it would be enough.

Walking with the berries also proved to be easier then Koda would have thought, with once again the air inside helping lifting his body, making his steps easier to take. The only thing he had look out for was for rocks that he could trip over since his belly was also blocking a bit of his view. Luckily for him he didn't trip over anything, and found himself standing next to the moose's that was still to busy being angry with each other to notice him being there.

Seeing that Rutt was still picking on Tuke made Koda more convinced then ever to do this. Getting himself right next to Rutt, Koda made sure to get his attention by saying loudly, "Rutt! I want to show you something!" Rutt stopped being a bully to Tuke and lowered his head to get to Koda's eye level. "And what would that be..." Was all he would say before he just let his mouth hang open by the strange sight of the inflated Koda standing on two legs. In this position he could see just how big and round the bear cubs belly really was, and Koda saw it as the perfect moment to do his plan. Before Rutt even had a chance to do anything Koda took and stuffed on of his arms inside the moose mouth, and tossed the berries he had down his throat. He then drag his arm out and watch the berries take effect.

At first Rutt was just super confused over what Koda had just done, but then he started to feel the same horrible burning coming from inside of him. Without a word he rushed over to the river and dived his head down and started drinking for his life. Once done he looked back at Tuke and Koda who where both laughing out loud at him. He didn't get it first but then he remembered feeling the taste of some berries before it happen, and then he knew. He didn't even had to look down to be sure but he did, and it confirmed that he too now had a water filled middle. Being just speechless over the sudden change Rutt just stood there looking at himself while it was Tuke's time to speak. "Well,well,well Rutt. Looks like I'm not the only one with a big thirst." He said mockingly. "I even think yours is bigger then mine." He added, and walked close to him to confirm that Rutt's gut was at least a third bigger in size. "It was only because you ate a branch with four berries. That cub feed me at least a dozen berries!" He finally said and pointed a hoof at Koda. "Actually it was only 12." He answered back. "12 is a dozen!" Rutt said irritated.

"But tell me, why would you do this to me?" Rutt asked Koda feeling very sad. "I saw how you where making fun of Tuke having his belly filled with water and you wouldn't stop. I though you needed to be learned a lesson, and let you know how it would feel being made fun of." Koda told him in a very adult way. Rutt felt like a huge jerk now, laughing and calling Tuke bad names for something he hadn't even asked to become. Knowing now how bad it must have felt for Tuke, Rutt took a huge deep breath and said to Tuke "I'm sorry. I shouldn't have called you those bad names, and I should have stopped hitting your stomach once you told me to stop. Can you ever forgive me?" Taking a moment before speaking Tuke finally said "Yes, my friend." They both then walked up to each other to give each other a hug, but found their new huge midsections blocking them. They all three then laughed together at it, and decided to continue their journey to find the rest of the bear tribe.

Continuing their walk along the river they later meet...
15122122212.title: Sweet berry revenge.

choices: Rutt, since he was the biggest.
151221222122.content:
In the middle of the rushing river they saw big lonely male bear trying his best to catch some salmons, but without any success.

Koda was really excited seeing another bear, hoping that he could tell them how far away the other bears where. He shouted "Hey! Can you help us with something?" to the bear. The bear looked over at their direction and was very surprised by what he saw. Seeing a little bear cub with a ballooned out belly almost as big as the cub itself, and two moose's with even bigger hanging jiggling guts wasn't a very common sight. "What's...the problem?" He asked still not having taking it all in yet. "The kid here is lost and he's trying to find his friends and family again." Rutt said. "And we thought maybe you would know where they are." Tuke added.

At first the bear continued to stare dumfounded at them, but then his face started to get a more unsettling look. "I think I may have a slight clue of where they could be." He said, which got the trio very happy. "But I would like something in return." He said and licked his lips. "And what's that?" Koda asked.

"As you can see I have been trying my best to catch some salmon to feed myself, but recently the river hasn't been very rich on fish." He said as he started to walk towards them to the shore. "All the other bears decided to move further away from here and test another river for salmon catching." "So you mean they aren't even on this river?" Koda asked shocked. "Nope. They could be anywhere in this far wide forest, but I think they told me where their new place would be." "Could you tell me where that place would be?" Koda pleaded. "There is just one problem." The bear said. "And what's that?" Koda asked.

By now the bear was starting to get on dry land again, and all three of them could now really see just how big he actually was. As big as adult bear went he really was pretty big. Walking on all four his height was about the same as the moose's, and standing on two legs he would be twice as high. Looking at the three of them the bear gave another evil smirk and said. "I haven't been having myself a good meal in a long time, and seeing such a sight like this is to good of an opportunity to pass." They all three started to shake by fear of how much closer the bear was coming.

"I will tell you where the other bears are little cub if you let me eat..."
151221222122.title: A big mean and dangerous one.

choices: Continue to walk with this river.
Search through the woods after another river.
1512212221222.content:
With big powerful steps the bear made his way towards Rutt and Tuke, planning to have them for his dinner. “Hey! Leave my friends alone!” Koda shouted as he tried to block the bear from coming any closer.

The bears response to it was to pick up the well-rounded cub, throw him in the air, and then punch hi inflated middle like it was a beach ball. The impact sent Koda flying into a tree, with he then bounced of and into another tree, and then another, and then another. He became like a little furred pinball, flying from tree trunk to tree trunk, deeper and deeper into the forest.

With Koda gone there was nothing to protect the moose’s from the hungry bear. “P-Please Mr. Bear, d-don’t eat us.” Tuke plead. “We may look a bit plump, but our inside is actually mostly made out of water.” Rutt said and started rubbing his belly to prove it. “I don’t care. You still look like the preys of my dreams.” The bear said while getting closer to them.

In the woods Koda was starting to figure out that he had new ability, by choosing the right angle while flying towards his target he could actually control which way he would want to fly. Once he learned to get a hang on it he set the course to get back and save his friends.

Rutt and Tuke was on their way to become a bear’s dinner, when they heard something coming towards them from behind in a very high speed. “Duck!” Koda’s voice shouted, and the two moose’s hit the ground in response. Before the big bear could react he was hit in the face by Koda, (giving away such force like that of a cannonball) that it sent him flying back into the river, in which he was swept away from them. Koda was then sent right into something very soft that managed to slow him down. The water filled bellies of the moose’s. Looking up at them Koda asked if they where okay. Both of them showed great signs of pain in their faces, but Rutt tried to keep cool and said, “Yes…Yes we are. You saved us kid.” “I did?” Koda asked happily surprised. “Yeah, we though we would become bear food there, and then you just flew in and knocked him to the side of the forest.” Tuke said. “He actually only sent him into the river.” Rutt marked. “If he continues to follow the stream I’ll say he will be in the other end of the forest in about an hour.” Tuke said cleverly. “Sigh, Guess you have a point this time Tuke. Let’s get moving now before he decides to come back.” Rutt said, before they all three got up and started moving forwards.

“So what should we do now? He said that none off the other bears where hunting in this river.” Koda asked. “Well, we can either continue to walk upstream with this river and see if we meet any other creatures that could help us, or we could go off course and try to find another river behind the trees.” Rutt said. “Since this is your journey what way do you think we should take?” Tuke asked.

Koda thinks they should…
1512212221222.title: Inflated Koda to the rescue.

15123.content:
as Koda wandered off from kenai and the others, he heard hunters in the woods and dove under a log, terrified. he could hear them getting closer and his eyes went wide with fear. just as they stopped by his hiding spot something suddenly made a high ferous growl and the raced off. he was about to sigh in relief when two hands grabbed him.

crying out in fear he thrashed around, looking at his captor. he was meant with gentle eyes and a warm smile.
he looked at her and tilted his head, as she said "calm down little cub, i dont want to hurt you"
he stopped thrashing and caling out as she stroked his fur softly, she then began walking with him in her arms.

"i'll take care of you little one" he looked at her then pack to where the others where.

what does he do?

The started early one morning both seemed to gain the weight equally but as the days passed both went their own ways so each other could not see how the other looked, by three days rutt was four times his normal size and tuke was only three times his normal size. Tuke continued through the night while rutt stopped to sleep. By morning rutt was only five times his normal weight, but tuke was six times bigger since he started. At the end of the week both Mooses had grow ten times their size and had to ask for help to roll themselves to meet up to see who won. Both were surprised to see neither had won or lost they tied for he best eater.

Even though neither Rutt or Tuke were considered the smartest, these moose decided to be friends with Kenai and Koda. Overtime, they've been the "bestest" of best friends to both the bear and the cub.

One day in the fall, while waiting for them to come and play, Rutt and Tuke began to worry because they're outside of the Salmon Run, where the bears including Kenai and Koda lived. They were frightened because they might think another bear might come and attack them.

But all of a sudden they panicked as they see the shadow of huge bear coming towards. Suddenly they find out that it's...
151322.title: They want to try out hibernation.

choices: Ten times the size he was.
1513221.content:
Suddenly they find out that it's... Kenai. But the moose found out something different about him. He was bigger than he was before. Kenai was...

(how big the size?)
1513221.title: Kenai (but bigger)

15132212.content:
Kenai was ten times the size he was before. His belly is massive as a big boulder filled with rolls of fat, his front legs were very large tree trunks, his neck was even three times as wide as his whole head, even his cheeks looked like he stuffed a lot of salmon in his maw. He was jiggling all over his body whenever he stepped. When he was close to the moose, he sat down, where we see his moobs that sags five inches down.

But what he saw in the moose was horror. They were frightened they hold on to each other thinking that they didn't know it was him.
Suddenly Rutt blurts out, "Please don't eat us Mr. Not-Friendly Bear! We're just waiting for our friends Kenai and Koda to come out."
"Can you tell them...we're waiting out here...by this tree...right near this mountain, eh?" said Tuke, while still frightened.
Kenai sighed a little and said: "Guys it me, Kenai! Quit freaking out."

Rutt and Tuke suddenly stop crying and let go of each other, then suddenly find out it really is Kenai. They hopped out and examined him
"Gee...You're really huge, Kenai" said Rutt
"Yeah. You're a lot bigger than the last time we saw you, eh." said Tuke.
"You got that right." Kenai replied to them, "Last night, there was a lot of salmon that came to the Salmon Run, and boy are all those bears ready for hibernation."
"Hiber-what?" Tuke asked.
"Hibernation." said Kenai, "Every year in the forest, all the animals have to gain a lot of weight in order to survive the cold winter. But this is actually my first winter with the hibernation."
"So whataya do when it's winter, eh?" said Rutt.
"You hide in a cave and sleep through all of winter until spring comes." said Kenai, "And the best part, if you become really big and fat, you cannot feel the cold at all."
"WHAT?!?" said both Rutt and Tuke.
"I wanna do that, eh" Rutt replied back to Kenai.
"Yeah, me too" said Tuke.
"Well, you have to be really big in order to survive for hibernation,..." said Kenai, "...but I'm already halfway through."
"How long have you started, eh?" Tuke asked.
"A couple days after we last met." Kenai explained, "When a leaf falls off of a tree, it is a sign that winter is coming soon, and every animal must pack on the pounds. Even you guys have too."
"But we don't know where to start" said Rutt.
Kenai then explained to them: "It's actually hard at first, cause you have to fill your stomach at its maximum capacity, but after a couple of days you will get results. But winter is coming really soon, so I suggest you guys should start eating now."

Suddenly they all turned their head and they see Koda, who's now three times bigger than he was. Koda didn't look like regular fat bears, he was a cub. He was running and breathing heavily from getting his newly formed fat body up from the Salmon Run.

"Sorry about that guys. *huh* *huh* Did I miss anything?" said Koda.
"Not really, Koda." Kenai answered, "I was just telling Rutt & Tuke about hibernation, and how they need to get bigger in order to survive the harsh winter that's coming up."
"Oh yeah, can't wait to sleep through with this" said Koda as he sat down and put his front paws on his belly.
"Wait, that's Koda?" asked Tuke.
"Of course." said Kenai, "Now there's two options. You guys can either get fat on your own, or we can help you out, even though your diet is different from us bears."

Rutt and Tuke decided for a little bit and after agreeing on
15132212.title: Kenai explains why he's bigger to Rutt & Tuke.

choices: A pond with grass by the stream.
151322122.content:
Rutt and Tuke decided for a little and after agreeing on, Rutt said, "I think it's best if you guys helped us out."
Tuke then said, "Yeah. You did say winter is coming up real soon, eh?"
"Of course. Now let's get to it." said Kenai while he turns his head to Koda, "Hey Koda!"
The chubby-cub Koda stops rubbing his belly and responds to Kenai, "Yeah?"
"Best be leaving the Salmon Run for a little while." said Kenai, "We're gonna get these mooses into shape before every single leaf in the forest will fall."
"Okay" Koda replied.

After that, Kenai tried to get his big front paws onto the ground, and after three times trying his paws touched the ground and were stable. The bear Rutt & Tuke thought he once was, was a gelatinous mass. His huge body jiggled everywhere when he passed Rutt & Tuke, still confused.
"Guys are you comin' or not" said Kenai.
The mooses were still confused about the big bear's newly formed body. All of a sudden Koda comes rushing passed them with his chubby body.
"I'm comin', Kenai" said Koda.
Once he caught with him, Kenai said, "I know you're comin', Koda. But I was talking to these guys."
No response from the mooses.
"GUYS!" Kenai angrily asked.
Suddenly Rutt & Tuke realized.
"Oh...Gee" Rutt answered.
"Yeah, we're comin." Tuke replied.
"Then let's go." said Kenai, "Winter might come in a couple days. So let's get a move on."
The mooses then followed the big behemoth bear along with his puffy sidekick.

After thirty minutes of going downstream from the Salmon Run, Rutt & Tuke see Kenai and Koda stopping at...
