15232222.content:
What if after the events of The Aristocats, as time goes by, Marie simply grows more spoiled, lazy, greedy, and self-indulgent?

She is wealthy and pompous after all, and she was a bit of a brat to begin with anyway.

She could just begin to overdo it when it comes to enjoying the benefits of her stature, consistently sampling all the fine cuisine she can get her paws on, maybe even considering herself a connoisseur.

Or at the very least, insisting that her "healthy appetite" is a quite noble trait, and her vanity allows her to easily overlook the way she puffs up more and more with every decadent little treat that passes through her lips.

That could work well, couldn't it?
15232222.title: Something more straightforward for Marie

choices: Marie was perfectly normal- her figure the same as ever.
Marie was fairly chubby. From her face to her paws, she just looked puffier.
152322221.content:
"Thomas- Thomas!" Duchess called out, a worried expression on the snow white cat's face as she searched for her mate around the house. "Thomas- where on earth-Oh!" She suddenly yelped, rounding a corner to find herself face to face with the rugged former-alley cat. He seemed surprised too, but chuckled after a moment.

"My oh my- Fancy meeting you here of all places." He said, with a charming little grin.

Duchess chuckled, "Ooohhh indeed it is- You know how rarely I every stop by this old place..." She said, before adopting a slightly more serious tone- though his presence made her a bit less frantic.

"Thomas, have you seen Toulouse, Marie, and Berlioz? It was meant to be suppertime nearly half an hour ago- they know to come when I call, but they didn't. They must either be out of the house or someplace they can't hear me."

Tom listened to his mate explain her problem, but as she finished he couldn't help but feel a smirk tugging at the corners of his mouth.

"Wh- why in the world are you smiling like that?" Duchess chastised.

"Sorry sorry- just....somewhere they can't hear you call, eh?" Thomas asked, leaning in with an eyebrow raised.

"why- Yes. Either that or they're outside somewhere, but I didn't see them leave and I've been..." Duchess hesitated, raising an eyebrow and chuckling a little as Tom held his look. He was giving her a look like he was waiting for her to catch on to some joke...


"...what?" Duchess asked, chuckling. "What am I supposed to figure out now?"

"Somewhere they can't hear you?" Thomas repeated again, raising his other eyebrow.

"Yes, they must not have heard me call because-" Duchess cut herself off, blinking, before giggling. "Ohh- of course! Ah- how silly I feel-" she said, shaking her head before quickly jogging up the stairs, Thomas following her up.

As Duchess approached the doorway to the Attic, she nosed it open gingerly- Hearing the familiar sound of enthusiastic freeform swing music. She chuckled gently, before raising her voice.

"Hello up theeeerrree!" She called, hearing the music pause- followed by the familiar face of Scat Cat poking his head over the railing.

"Ayyyy, how's it hangin', Miss Lady of the House?" He asked, tipping his hat casually. His face was followed by the smaller face of Toulouse.

"Oh- hey mama!" He waved. Duchess smiled warmly,

"I hope you aren't keeping my children up there! Suppertime was a half hour ago-"

"oh- Whoops! Sorry 'bout that!" Scat Cat called back.

"Oh it's alright- just finish up so they can come on down!" Duchess called, Scat Cat giving her a slick thumb's up.

-

Soon enough, Duchess found herself joined by her family in the kitchen. Thomas had followed her back down, and had seated himself by her side.

The first one down the stairs was Toulouse, followed quickly by Berlioz. And, trailing just a bit behind, it was Marie- fussing over her pink bow. Apparently it had come undone and she had to fix it.

(Now- what state should Marie start off in this story?)
152322221.title: Spoiled pampered doughy snob, Marie!

choices: Granted, and her bowl was twice as big as her brother's- and still overflowing
Denied, and her bowl was still the same size as both of her brother's.
1523222212.content:
Trailing slightly behind her brothers, Marie hobbled down the stairs at a slightly belaboured pace, rushing over to join them in the kitchen.

"huff...huff...Here I am, mama!" Marie yelped, her pudgy face wobbling subtly when she talked.

"You're getting slower!" Toulouse teased, prompting Marie to roll her eyes and scoff at him.

"I was just taking my time! It isn't ladylike to barrel down the stairs as fast as you can." The portly white kitten said defensively.

"Oh you were going as fast as you can alright- it just wasn't very fast at all." Toulouse taunted. Marie's little face scrunched into an offended scowl, and she was about to say something back when Thomas O'Malley spoke up.

"Hey now kids, cool down there. You all ended up in the same place didn't you?" He said smoothly, as he gave Marie an affirming look and nod, "Ain't nothin' wrong with takin' the slow road." He said, before grinning a little and winking at Toulouse. "Of course, that don't mean you gotta take it slow all the time."

Duchess chuckled, "Indeed. Come now- I'll have no more bickering during supper. Our dishes are already prepared." She said, leading them over to their neat little line up of food bowls- One for Thomas, one for her, one for Toulouse, one for Marie, and one for Berlioz. Arranged neatly in that order.

Marie had gotten slower, short of breath from trying to keep up with her brothers. The posh young cat's eating habits had been drifting more and more into decadence. After the little adventure which had prompted Thomas O'Malley, Scat Cat, and his little entourage to move in with them, Madame Adelaide choosing to use her home for a stray shelter, Marie had taken to a sort of hedonism, spending much of her time luxuriating in attention and respect of all the other cats, taking the time to indulge in her wishes to be ladylike, patrician, and growing rather gourmand- emphatically eating whenever she got the chance, consistently lounging on a nice warm pillow with a small stockpile of delicacies.

This lavishing lifestyle which she so readily engaged in had affected her figure thoroughly. She even seemed to be proportionally more overweight than Scat Cat. Her great round belly filled the space between her legs, thick haunches hugging its shape as it hung past her knees, to about her ankles, when she stood on all fours. Her face seemed to be one big soft sphere, wide jowels and bulging chin which hung low, shaking when she moved and pinching her little snout between them. The bow around her neck was redone several times over to be looser- and still it looked tight on her, making her face appear extra puffy.

And yet, she would continue to eat- and eat, and eat and eat and eat. Spoiling herself with heaps of rich, savory treats, sometimes even demanding that members of Scat Cat's band go and bring her something more to eat, as she just lazily reclined on a cushion nearly as plush as her own headquarters. Well, demanding, requesting, or pleading- whatever would work best.

Considering her gluttonous tendencies, Marie had- several times over as her appetite grew- requested more food at actual meal times. From increased portion sizes, to a new bowl that could hold increased portions. Of course, that was up to Duchess, Thomas (to a lesser extent), and the new butler- who had been hired to replace poor old Edgar.

As they all sat down to begin their supper, Marie took her place at her own bowl. Her continued requests, to increase her food intake even more, had all been...
1523222212.title: Marie was fairly chubby.

choices: After supper was (finally) finished, Marie having eaten several extra courses...
A week later, Marie having eaten meals with more than one course every day now..
15232222121.content:
Shrugging off her brother's offending comment, Marie eagerly- but politely, with the elegant gusto of a well mannered individual who was simply enjoying a meal- dug into her supper. Of course, she ate far faster than either of her brothers or even Duchess and Thomas. Despite her highbrow self aggrandizing attitude towards herself and her habits, her gluttonous nature was obvious.

Marie took big bites from the enormous portion size she'd been given, being sure to get as much as she possibly could into her mouth at once every time.

Her little bowl had been replaced with a full sized one, and subsequently- an actual spare serving bowl from the collection of dishes intended for humans. It was about two or three times the size of either of her brothers' bowls, and even then it was filled to the absolute limit of its capacity, the food piled up several inches above the top of the bowl.

Marie's fat jowels wobbled gently as she ate, eager to indulge in the fine high quality feed which had been provided for her meal. Even though her large, distended, broad belly was already full- she'd been eating from a plate of sweet fruit up in the attic before dinner, and eating a package of biscuits one of the stray cats had managed to obtain for her before that.

Since she'd been actively working to keep her stomach constantly full, Marie's weight had been skyrocketing recently as every behemoth meal and snack she gleefully luxuriated in consuming was inevitably digested into more and more fat, the small white cat puffing out further and further with flab each day.

Even now, her stomach was full enough for every bite of food she swallowed to visibly make it grow larger- tighter- more packed than it was before, inching closer and closer to touching the ground, spreading wider and wider, forcing her pudgy limbs to spread more and more to make room for her own growing girth.

After managing to finish her meal first, despite the fact that it was the largest of all- Marie's bloated face wobbled gently as she pressed a paw to her mouth, trying to suppress an unladylike burp. The motion of which causing the doughy life preserver of jowel, cheek, and chin fat practically engulfing her little head to quake subtly.

"Momma!" Marie spoke up, catching Duchess and the other's attention. "I've already finished my éntre. May I have a second course, please?" She asked sweetly, this was a new request from her- though not too surprising. The corpulent cat, who'd already gotten visibly larger from just the one course, had been trying to find more and more ways to coerce still more food for herself.

"Of course she'd ask for seconds..." Berlioz muttered, prompting a raised eyebrow and a scoff from Marie as she glanced his way, her bulbous neck and face fat dressing into thick folds as she turned her head slightly to the side.

"Oh, excuse me for having a healthy appetite that I want to sufficiently fulfill. I suppose I should starve myself." She spat, prompting Toulouse to roll his eyes. Marie turned back to Duchess, pouting as best as she could- her large shining eyes framed by her cherubic cheeks. "Please momma? I did finish early..."

Duchess hesitated, before sighing. "Oh...alright- After all, how else is a growing girl like yourself supposed to fill out properly without a hearty diet?"

Marie beamed delightedly, licking her chops as her bowl was refilled, with just as much as before. She began to stuff herself yet again, and she was absolutely planning to beg for a third course after she glutted herself again- maybe even a fourth!
15232222121.title: Oversized and overfilled, perfect for overfeeding

choices: A few craftier cats try to come up with a plan to sate Marie's endless appetite
While being carried (being both immobile and lazy), Marie gets stuck in a door!
152322221212.content:
After successfully soliciting multiple courses being a regular feature of every meal she had- Four a day, the gourmand little kitty having added a whole extra meal for herself- the already extravagant intake of food Marie choked down on a daily basis erupted to a downright obscene amount.

Her huge serving bowl being filled past its brim like it was already took an absurd amount of food, but to then have it refilled- up to five or even six times in a row to appease her expansive appetite, Marie was easily putting down multiple full size bags of food every meal. Not to mention the fact that she was almost perpetually eating anyway, with the constant stream of snacks being given to her by the dozen odd eager to please former stray cats who were lodged in the home. Some were willing to really suck up to such a high-class figure as Marie, even fulfilling requests she had to keep on feeding her in her sleep, so she wouldn't need to "starve herself"- going so long without eating.

Nobody was willing to try and stop Marie's ceaseless indulgence, her immediate family was either too laid back and permissive or too polite and permissive to say anything, aside from some light teasing from her brothers. Though all in all, everyone in the house- from her Momma to Tom, to the small staff keeping the place running to the strays living in the shelter, even to Scat Cat and his band- Everyone seemed perfectly willing to spoil Marie's brains out, politely obliging her frequent requests for even more.

And so...she got fatter.

And fatter.

And fatter.

Frequently binging to the point where her belly became taut, only to keep on eating the second she digested enough to fit more in- lard began to steadily pile on to the young wealthy cat.

Her white furry belly blimped out like an avalanche of flab, pushing all four of her little legs apart even as they grew thicker and thicker as well, until she was lifted off the ground- her stomach larger than her legs were long. Not that that stopped her from eating.

Her rump had filled out tremendously, bloating out with flabby heavy mass, rotund yet soft and depressed by its own weight. Same as her face, having accrued so much fat that it had a great big squishy set of bowels, which wobbled and jiggled and squished around her little face. Her limbs were also doughy thick dollops of fat, hanging off her torso and resting on her sprawling belly, her little paws poking out. Even smaller parts of her body like her snout and her toes had a good inch or two of fat on them.

Since all her fat was so soft, but so heavy- she had the vague appearance of a great big dollop of icing. Maybe several enormous bags of dough stacked on top of each other- one huge one for her belly, two big ones for her butt, four smaller ones for her limbs, and a slightly littler one for her head- the shape of a tiny cat mostly swallowed up, buried in the veritable ocean of fat, only apparent in the little soft face and pudgy wiggling toes sticking out. Her greedy little mouth often readily opening, as a helpful cat would feed it strawberries dipped in cream, or pieces of cooked chicken- more and more and more food to make sure this growing girl would keep growing.

All told, at this point Marie had managed to eat herself up to a weight of nearly 600 pounds.
152322221212.title: A week later, Marie's weight skyrockets

15233221.title: Yes, them.

choices: He decides to crash down at Duchess's mansion.
152332211.content:
So what's the story about Scat Cat?

http://i157.photobucket.com/albums/t63/l...

http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/Scat_Cat
152332211.title: Scat Cat.

1523322111.content:
Several months after the events of being kidnapped by their own butler and then saved by an alley cat Duchess and her kittens lived a happily life back at the mansion in Paris. They had even let the alley cat named Thomas O'Malley become a part of their own family, for saving them. Things were now starting to get back to normal, with the inclusion of Thomas becoming a new husband to Duchess and a father for her three kids. It was a relaxing and rich life they lived with no problems or surprises to come.

That was until one day when there was a knock on the door, and when Duchess opens it she was greeted to none other then Scat Cat. She remembers him as the lead singer and trumpet player from a very jazzy band that allowed Duchess and her kids to stay and crash at their place, before they themselfes started to jam so heavily that they literally "crashed" it.

She hadn't seen him or the other cats in the band in months, but she still remembered how Scat Cat looked. He had had a very simple outfit, consisting of a black bowler hat with a red stripe going around it and a red bow tie. She also remembers him always carrying around his trumpet that must be his most precious possession. But mostly Duchess remembered him for his body. She had heard about alley cats living a much simpler life with more time to be lazy and get bigger, but she hadn't seen anyone quite with a body like him He had a body that if it could speak it would say that it wasn't to picky when it comes to food. Having that black fur and such a big nice belly made him actually look kinda "cuddly" for Duchess.

Seeing him now standing in front of her she saw that he still wore the same outfit as before, looking a bit slightly worn now but still the same. He still carried around the same trumpet as well. His body didn't seem that much changed either, "But I wonder if he hasn't been losing some pounds?" Duchess thought to herself as she looked at him.

Getting back to her senses Duchess said, "Oh goodnees! This was certainly an unsuspected surprise visit of you. I have to once again thank you and your friends for saving us in the past." "No problem my lady," Scap cat said in his raspy jazz voice. "A cat and his friends does only what's possible to help a lady and her kids in need." "Yes, but hadn't you been there the kids and I would have certainly been shipped in a crate to Timbuktu." Duchess said taking one of his paws and shaking it gently, "I would be prepared to do almost anything to help repay you for your heroic work." "I'm glad you said just that miss Duchess," Scat cat said tricky, "You see since we saw each other last time things hasn't been going so well for me and the band. Many of us got different interests and went their own different ways. Some wanted to travel to London, Some to Rome, and some to Madrid. But for old Scat Cat not having much monkey in pockets things seemed dark. That is until I remembered my old friend, and now your great husband Thomas O'Malley told me about what a great place he had heard you and your kids where living in." Hearing this made Duchess wonder what her husband wonder what he had been bragging about to other cats before their love was true. "I told him that if it was true he should take the chance to live as a king. Especially if it meant he would get to live it with a beautiful queen like you." Scat Cat said and kissed Duchess paw like a gentleman, making her blush her cheeks slightly. "He told me he had been starting to feel something between him and you, and I said that he should do what his heart tells him is right." Duchess felt relief now thinking back to her worries that he had only been seeing her as luxurious status symbol. "After saying that he told me that if I things went well between you two and not so good for me, I could just get here and have myself some roof above my head until I was on my feet again."

Realizing what he had just asked for Duchess asked for Thomas to "get here this instant!" Hearing his wife wasn't happy lead Thomas to quickly rush to the door meeting Scat Cat who was halfway in already. "Thomas O'Malley, that wasn't yesterday." Scat Cat said and gave his paw a good shake."S-Scat Cat? What are you doing here?" Thomas asked slightly confused. "You should know." Duchess said upset, "You where the one to give him an invitation to our home if needed." "Feeling like he hasn't been paying much attention to what's been going on Thomas felt really confused now. "Did I say that?" "You did my friend," Scat Cat said flanking in. "You told me that I could get search for you for help if you would make it big, and I got to say that with this..." Scat cat said feeling the new diamond decorated collar Thomas was now sporting. "I say you have been making it pretty big." Starting to remember what he might have said last time seeing Scat cat now Thomas was starting to get a little sweaty standing there with them. "Well?" Duchess asked Thomas with her arms crossed. "I might have made a little promise to him some time in the past..." Was all Thomas could say before seeing Duchess walking away angrily. "Ohno, Scat Cat don't move!" Thomas said before chasing after Duchess. "Alright I won't!" Scat Cat shouted back as he stood still in the middle of the room.

Duchess walked into another room before stopping and letting Thomas catch up. "Wait, Duchess!" Thomas shouted, "Can you tell me what's wrong?" "You don't know that?" Duchess asked frustrated. "You just go around and gives other cats promises to live with us without telling me." I know I said to him that I was prepared to do almost anything to him for saving me and the kids." Duchess continued talking without giving Thomas a chance to speak, "But I just can't let any unknown street cats to walk inside my house. How do I know that he won't try to steal anything, or invite some of his friends without my permission?" Looking at Thomas for answers she saw him just stare blankly for a moment before realizing it finally was his turn to speak. "I only did this once, and Scat Cat is the most trustworthy friend I know." He said. He got himself on his knees before saying to Duchess, "I swear that if he's would create any problems I will toss him out personally." Looking at him for moment Duchess sighed and said "Okay I trust you." Thomas got so happy over Duchess decision that he gave her a huge hug that surprised the white lady. "But I'm still not sure how the kids will feel of having a stranger cat living with us."

As Duchess and Thomas got back to the entrance of the mansion where they left Scat cat, they found him standing at the same place as before but with the kids climbing all over him. "I stood still as I promised but the kids tried thier hardest to make me move." He said while one of the kids tried to tickle him, another tried to battle his tail, and the third tried to play his trumpet. "It's okay, you can move now." Thomas said, much to Scat cat's relief. "Kids, I know this will sound strange, but this stranger here will be staying here with us for a short while." Duchess tried to explain to her kids. "What are you taking about mom?" One of them asked. "He's no stranger." The second one said. "He's Scat cat." The third one said. "You all remember him?" Duchess asked surprised. "Yeah!" They all three said. "He was one of the most funny and friendliest cat we ever met." one of them said.

Looking at how happy her three children was to meet Scat Cat again Duchess looked at him and said, "Since everyone else in my family would be more then happy to share our home with you, I think I myself would be honored as well." "Well, thanks everyone for the great welcome, I'm very thankful to be under the same roof as you" Scat Cat said gladly. "Is there anything you would like to have us share to you?" Duchess asked nicely. Just as Scat Cat was about to answer his big stomach started to growl loudly. The kids found it very funny and Duchess found herself giggling a little at it as well while saying, "Some food I guess?" That would sit fine." Scat Cat said as he was being lead by the kids to the dining room.

"I really hope you know what you're doing." Duchess said to Thomas as they followed. "Trust me, he will keep himself clean." Thomas said trustworthy.
1523322111.title: Visits by an old friend.

choices: Scat cat takes and explores the franche cuisine.
The kittens tries to make Scat Cat a bigger bed.
15233221111.content:
Later at the dining room the kids helped Scat Cat get comfortable as he sat down in one of the chairs. "Are your kids always this nice and helpful?" Scat Cat asked as they helped stuffing a napkin under his bow tie as a bib. "There just so happy to get to meet someone they haven't seen for a while, that they don't want to risk making him feel uncomfortable. "Duchess explained."That's no risk of that happening." Scat Cat said relaxing, "I don't think even the grand hotel in Paris would give someone this great service."

"Well, If you are all set now would you like to hear what the kitchen can bring you?" Duchess asked. "More then anything else." Scat Cat answered. "Well, We got an nice and well cooked salmon dish, a crispy and honey glazed chicken dish, a healthy but still delicious salad, some nice little cheese crackers and grapes as appetizers, and finally a nice great bowl of some delicious sweet cream for dessert. To all dishes includes small bowl of milk to drink from." Duchess said as she listed all the dishes they could offer him.

"Is there anything in particular you would like to have?" She asked. After sitting and thinking about it for a short while Scat Cat finally answered "Yes." "I'm sorry, but yes to what?" Duchess asked confused. "Yes to everything." Scat Cat explained. Duchess at first just nodded, and was on her way to tell the kitchen staff what to cook when she realized what he had said. "I'm sorry, but...Did you say everything?" "Yes, everything my darling." Scat Cat said like it was the most natural thing to say. "You really want to have 3 main courses, including a appetizer, a dessert and a bowl of milk next to it?" "Pretty much, yeah." Duchess brain was a bit confused for a moment before saying. "I don't want to sound like I don't let you choose what you want to eat but, you know that it is a lot of food where talking about here?" "Yes." "And you still want to have it?" "Yes." "Okay, Okay, got it." Duchess said as she headed to the kitchen.

As she went of the kids walked up to Scat Cat. "Why do you want to eat so much?" one of them said. "One of those dishes is often enough to feed us all for one day." Another one of them added. "Well, you see kids this belly here..." Scat Cat said and tapped his paw on it, "Really likes food. And since I and the band broke up my belly hasn't been able to get to have a good meal in a long time. So I'm now using this as a way to give back to my belly all those great food dishes that it hasn't been able to get these last months." "Wow." The red furred one named Toulouse said as he jumped up to the chair next to the one Scat Cat sat, and the stretched over to feel on his belly. "So does that mean your belly has a life of its own?" "He he, You could say that my friend." Scat Cat chuckled, "I try to see my belly as a friend that you would like to try and treat as well as possible, and not having been able to give it any good treats for a long time makes me feel guilty for not being able to make it happy." He said looking at the kid who he himself was looking at his own belly trying to see it as what Scat Cat had described to him. "But now you are going to be treated like king." Scat Cat said slapping his belly. "Being able to eat just as much as you want, with nobody telling you that you have had enough."

After saying that Duchess was coming back from the kitchen together with servants who had Scat Cat's food on plates. Filling up the table where all kind of beutiful looking dishes that also smelled just as good. Licking his lips in excitement Scat Cat wasted no time in eating it. His manners were at first like a gentleman when he started with the crackers and grapes. On the salad too he eats it gently and didn't rush it. It wasn't until he reached the main courses when his belly took over control. The salmon and the chicken both got taken in huge chunks that filled his mouth as he chewed it, he then use a bit of the milk laying next to him to help wash it down. As he ate his stomach started to get stretched out by all the eating and making itself an obstacle for him to reach for the food. Halfway into it he had to jump up on the table to be able to reach the food and continue eating it.

When it was finally done Scat Cat jumped down back to the chair and then down to the floor to find himself a place to lay and rest his stuffed belly. It was now around twice as big as it was before he had his meal. Walking to a nice pillow laying in a corner Scat cat could feel his belly pressing his legs aside a little as he walked, making him take wider steps. When he reached it Scat Cat laid his back down at the pillow, giving himself a chance to see himself just how much food he had managed to fit inside there. After having this great meal his belly now was about 6 inches long, 4 inches wide, and stood out 3 inches. Duchess walked up to him and asked if he had enjoyed his meal. "Oh yes my dear, best meal in a long time." Scat Cat said rubbing his full stomach. "Then I shall leave you now so you can get a chance to rest." Duchess said as she walked away, giving him a chance to rest.

As he tried to rest his head and go to sleep the three kittens walked up to him to get a closer look themselves. Seeing the kids looking at his swollen gut Scat Cat smiled, patted his belly and said "Impressed?" "Oh, yes!" they all three said almost at the same time. Once again Toulouse was being a bit more curious then his sibligns as he walked up to Scat Cat and asked, "Can I feel it?" Liking this little kittens curiosity Scat Cat said, "Yes, you can test and feel it." but he wasn't prepared for what the small cat was planning. Without any warning the little kid took kit and jumped right on top of his belly. Scat Cat was taken completely of guard by this and lost the air in his lungs for a second as the small kitten hit his stomach hard. Toulouse then took steps across the small but soft area and laid himself in a sleeping position. "It's so soft that it's better then the bed. I'm going to sleep here tonight." "Can we get to sleep with you?" The female kitten named Marie asked. "Sorry, can't. I've already called dibs on it." Toulouse said with his eyes closed. "Hey, that's not fair!" Marie shouted. "Yeah, let us also get to test the belly bed!" the third kitten named Berlioz said before they both to jumped up on Scat Cat's belly, trying to wrestle Toulouse to give them some space.

Being not able to say anything before, Scat Cat now took his chance and shouted "Stop! If you are going to sleep on my belly, you will have to sleep together." "But we can't." Toulouse said. "And why not?" Scat Cat asked. "Even if we want to share it with each others it's not big enough space for us all three." Toulouse explained. Thinking a bit Scat Cat got an idea. "Listen all three of you. I can help you, but then I need something." He said. "What?" They all three asked at the same time. "I want you to get that bowl with cream for me." He said and pointed up towards the table.

Doing as he said the three kittens managed to get the big bowl of cream back to him. As he got the bowl Scat Cat took it to his mouth, and then started to constantly swallow it. He didn't focus it on tasting the cream (even though what he did taste tasted fantastic.) but to get it all inside him. With his steady pace the three kittens could only watch in awe as his stomach started to grow out before their eyes. It became larger, wider and higher as he kept on taking in all the cream. When he finally was done he put the bowl away, and had now a stomach that was three times as big as when he had first entered their home.

Giving a small burp Scat Cat then said. "Is it big enough for you all three now?" The kittens jumped up on it and had after a few moments each found a good spot to sleep on. "Yes, this is great now." Toulouse said. "As soft as a pillow, and as warm as our mom's heart." Marie said. "The most wonderful bed I've ever felt." Berlioz said. "Then I hope you all can start to go to sleep now. We wouldn't want your parents find out you're still awake this late." Scat Cat said before falling asleep shortly before the kittens did the same.

During the night they both dreamed things. Scat Cat dreamed about how much more fantastic food that he could be testing, while all the three kittens had the same dream about making Scat Cat into the biggest and greatest bed of all time.

What happens the next morning?
15233221111.title: "Best meal in a long time."

choices: A music manager. (sent there by Duchess)
152332211111.content:
Waking up the next morning the first thing Scat Cat had to do was to get the three kittens off his belly. Giving it a little careful shake he managed to wake up all three of them. "Uh, What's happening?" Marie asked. "Is it an earthquake?" Berlioz asked. "No, it's just Scat Cat." Toulouse said still being half asleep. "What do you want Mr. Scat Cat?" Marie asked polite. "It's the next day now, and I would like to get myself some breakfast before my stomach tells me to." Scat Cat said. "But why's that so important?" Berlioz asked before Scat Cat's stomach started growling, making it shake so violently that it made all three kittens fall off. "Well, that was the reason why I wanted you of before I was getting really hungry." Scat Cat said before getting up and walking straight to the kitchen.

The following weeks was turning out to become some of the most wonderful days in Scat Cat's life. Every day he was introduced to all new kind of amazing treats that the kitchen staff of the mansion could cook up. Everything from small pieces of cheese that you bite of from a toothpick, to big things like a big juicy piece of beef, or a huge cod that was served whole with it's head intact (Once Scat Cat was done everything left was a nice cleaned skeleton of the cod). And to finish it of he always had a glass of luxurious vine to wash it down with, which always leaved him a bit light headed and caused hiccups which made his whole body twitch.

Duchess still didn't appreciate Scat Cat staying at there home, but sadly she seemed to be the only one thinking that. The kids really love him since he was there own personal sleeping bag, and Thomas was just happy to sit and talk old memories with an old friend. Duchess didn't want to take away everyone's fun, but she didn't either want Scat Cat to just live on their assets without doing anything. She tired to several times talk with him about it, but every time he just says that he's practicing and making music that he will use to get a contract on a studio before he can move out of the mansion. Duchess had to take his words on it since she had heard him sitting and practicing on his room almost every day for around some hours, and she didn't know how long making music would take.

But what she didn't know was what Scat Cat was really planning. He had been practicing his music yes, but the reason for it wasn't to make his music sellable, it was to prepare for a reuniting concert that he would have with his former band. He had secretly been writing letters that he had sent out to each of his former band members to invite them all over to Duchess Mansion for a surprise gig. The surprise being that she wouldn't know about it. The plan was then was to invite all other cats that lived nearby into it. There they would throw a giant party where everybody would eat and drink as much as they could take, before every single cat would have eaten so much that everybody would look as fat as him. "It will be one heck of a night." Scat Cat thought to himself.

One day when preparing himself in the mirror Scat Cat took a good look at just how much his body had changed since he got here. He could see that he had got some added chins and his neck was starting to disappear. His arms and legs was more thicker and forced out wider thanks to his huge belly. It had been big since day 1 and was big enough for the three kittens to rest on it, but now it was in such a huge size that either Thomas or Duchess could probably get enough room to curl up and sleep on it. Maybe even both of them at once. After being done looking Scat Cat tried to put on his bow tie (that he had taken off before getting to sleep), only to discover he couldn't! He tried to stretch it and force it around his thick swollen neck, but all he could do was to tie a small knot around it and making it look like he was wearing a strange neck band instead. "Well," He thought while looking at his reflection, "You know you're getting really big when even my wardrobe is not fitting." He took it off and looked at the long band in his hand, and then laid it next on a table before putting on his hat and leaving.

On his way to have his breakfast he met Duchess, who stopped to talk to him. "Say, aren't you missing you're bow tie?" She asked. "Well...I though it was starting to get old, so I ditched it" Scat Cat said. "Are you sure it has nothing to do with this?" Duchess asked and slaps his gut slightly. "Maybe a little." Scat Cat admitted. "Oh, and would you be so kind to do me favour?" Duchess asked. "And what's that?" Scat Cat asked. "I'm going to give myself a nice relaxing bath, and if there is a knocking on the door could you take it?" "Of course I can do that for you." Scat Cat said happily. "Thanks." Duchess said and walked up the stairs.

Shortly after promising it Scat Cat heard a knocking coming from the door. Walking over and opening it he was being greeted by...
152332211111.title: A learning of the French kitchen.

1523322111111.content:
Opening the door he was slightly surprised to see that his entire band had arrived to the mansion at the same time. (He had been counting that they would drop in one at a time with a few days in-between, but now they where all standing here.)

There was Shun Gon, the Siamese cat that could play both the piano and drums.
There was Hit Cat, the English one on the acoustic guitar. (And he seemed to also be a part of the so called "New Age" movement that seemed to be growing.)
Peppo, the Italian one on the accordion.
And finally Billy Boss, the big tall Russian one that was on the cello.

They where all a bit surprised themselves, seeing that their trumpet playing friend had become this big.

"Wow. Just look at you!" Peppo said amazed by his friends new fatter frame.

"You are like, huge man." Hit Cat added, lifting his hippie glasses to really make sure he wasn't hallucinating.

"And here I thought I always was going to be the biggest one of the group." Billy Boss said and patted Scat Cat's back, laughing at his own joke.

"He's so big, he makes Sumo fighters back in home-country look small." Shun Gon added, looking most shocked of them all by Scat Cat's size change."

"He, He. This is what spending a month in fine society does to you." Scat Cat said as he patted his belly, while letting his friends inside.

Inside the house they where all just as amazed by the size of the house like they had been on his size.

"So you live here now?" Shun Gon asked.

"No, but Thomas does." Scat Cat answered as he lead them around, showing the luxury. "Marrying one of the rich girls will give you all this."

"Wow. I really need to find myself a young rich feline." Peppo said to himself.

During this tour there would be a stop at a very special place.
1523322111111.title: His former bandmembers.

choices: The cats have a huge feast.
15233221111111.content:
As they reached the kitchen area Scat Cat's friends decided to some "exploring" on their own. (They had all been eating very little on their travels to the mansion, and now they really wanted to each have a real meal that could leave them satisfied.)
At first Scat Cat didn't noticed that his friends wasn't behind him (mostly because he was to focused to point at all the expensive looking things to impress them.), but when he did he quickly figured out that food was the most likely reason for them to leave.

As he entered the kitchen he could see that all four of them where taking different stuff from the pantry and cooking their own favorite meals out of it. (Duchess and her family liked to try out things from all different parts of the world, so finding something to suit both the English, Italian, Russian and Chinese kitchen was actually quite easy.)

Since it was such a huge kitchen all four of them had more then enough space to work on their meals.

Peppo was making a Spaghetti Bolognese, using a pasta machine to make the pasta straws, and cooking what smelled like a super delicious pasta sauce.

Hit Cat was strewing up a beef stew filled with beef, potatoes, and several kind of vegetables.

Shun Gon was putting up tray filled with small samples of carefully made Sushi bits. He also was making some pasta, but in his case it was Noodles.

And Billy Boss was making a soup with home made bread next to it to dip.

Scat Cat first wanted them to stop what they where doing, but the wonderful smell of all the different dishes that was being made was enough to make him let them continue. (Plus since he still hadn't had breakfast he felt like he could maybe have some of it, once they where finished.) He was pretty surprised also by how large portions of food they all made. Even thought each one was made just for the cat making it, it still looked like it could be enough food to give 1 or 2 other cats a great meal.

What happens next?
15233221111111.title: The Kitchen.

choices: Scat Cat is forced to eat all the food to not let Duchess know the thruth.
152332211111112.content:
Right when they where just about done with the cooking and had started to plate it all, Scat Cat could hear the sound of footsteps coming down the stairs. "Duchess!" He thought. "She must be finished with her bath, and have probably heard all the commotion in the kitchen!"

She was on her way, and if she saw Scat cat's friends here she would definitively figure out everything.

Just when Scat Cat's four feline friends was about to dig in to their creations, Scat Cat told them about Duchess coming and that they needed to hide.

"But can't we finish our food first?" Hit Cat asked.

"Or at least start it.?" Peppo added.

Scat was about to answer when they all heard Duchess voice around the corner. "Scat Cat. Is that you in the kitchen?" She said.

"No, Now!" Scat Cat whispered, and pushed his friends from their finished plates. He saw the open door to the pantry, and quickly stuffed them all inside and closed the door just when Duchess came in.

"Scat Cat?" she said, confused over what he was doing.

"Oh, hey Duchess." Scat Cat said, trying to act cool over the whole situation.

"I..." She said, before seeing just how much stuff that had been made in the kitchen. "What is all this?" She asked.

"Uhm, food?" Scat Cat tried to give as a good enough answer, but he could see in Duchess's eyes that she wouldn't take it.

"I...just felt like making some breakfast for myself." Scat Cat said, trying to sound as honest as he could.

"You never want to do anything remotely related to work. You always asks the staff to make all kinds of meals for you."

"I know, and that's why I decided to this time do it all myself. Just so they wouldn't need to work so hard in the kitchen today." Scat Cat said, and started to sound more and more convincing in what he said.

"But why is it so much plated here? It looks like just one of these dishes would be enough to feed even your big stomach." Duchess said.

"You would think so, but I'm actually so hungry today that I felt for eating more then I usually do." Scat Cat lied. (Even thought he was feeling very hungry at the moment, not even he believed that he could eat a four course meal at once.)

Unknowingly to Duchess and Scat Cat the door to the pantry had opened up a little bit, and Scat Cat's friends where peeking out to see how everything was going. (Luckily Duchess had her back turned against them, so she didn't notice the other cats watching it all.)


"What is going on?" Hit Cat asked.
"It looks like Scat Cat is making Duchess believe that he has made all the food for himself." Peppo answered.

"He's big, but can he really eat all of it?" Shun Gon asked confused.

"If he touches my Soup I will go out there and stop him!" Billy Boss said angrily, and was about to step out when he got stopped by the others.

"No! If you do that she will throw us all out!" Peppo said, while he and Hit Cat was holding Billy Boss still.

"Guys, something is happening." Shun Gon said, and the other three also looked back at the opening.

But what was happening?
152332211111112.title: Scat Cat hears something.

1523322111111122.content:
"Okay. I will just make a sandwich to myself. You can take and have your meal while I make mine." Duchess said, and started preparing her sandwich.

Knowing that she would find out about his friends if he didn't keep getting her attention, Scat Cat knew he had to start eating one of the dishes.

"I think they will understand." Scat Cat thought, as he started eating Peppo's pasta dish.

"No! Not mine!" Peppo said, while the others cheered a little over it not being their dish that got eaten.

"Just you wait, he will get to yours as well." Peppo said to the others.

"Even though Scat Cat didn't like eating something that his hungry friends had made for themselves, he had to admit that it tasted amazing. So good in fact that even before he knew it he had already finished the dish before Duchess had even started prepping for her sandwich. Looking down he could see that his stomach was looking about as big as it tend to do after a meal, and he still only felt half full after what he had eaten.

"Maybe I could have time to eat one more thing before Duchess is finished." Scat Cat thought, feeling really excited to taste the others things his friends had made.

"Oh! Looks like he's going for your dish next, Hit Cat." Peppo said, and he was right.

Scat Cat walked over to the big bowl of English Stew, and he was so eager to eat that he decided to sweep it down with no spoon. He lifted the thing to his mouth and swallowed it all. The sauce, potatoes, meat, and vegetables all when down his throat, with no signs of taking it slowly. (He had it all touching his tongue before it went down, so he got a chance to also taste it.)

Once again he had finished the thing much quicker then he had planned, and all that proved what he had done was his now very bulging stomach.

"That was your food Hit." Peppo said, with Hit Cat simply giving a depressing "Aw, man." as his response to it.

Looking at Duchess he saw that she had just finished he sandwich, and was about to start eating it. "I might as well join her in the eating instead of just standing here." Scat Cat thought, and while he did feel very full right now, the smell of the remaining food was enough to make him want to have more.

"What to pick?" He asked himself as he looked at the bowl of noodles, and the soup with bread next to it. "Well I already have had something that was close to soup so..." Scat Cat thought as he reached for the noodles.

"He's going for your noodles, Shun." Hit Cat said.

"Oh no. Why, oh why me?" Shun Gon said to himself, as he could clearly hear Scat Cat slurping up his noodles.

At this point Scat Cat almost didn't remember his friends hiding in the pantry, and that it was them who made this food. He was just enjoying it so much that he didn't even thought about how loudly and sloppy he was eating. He was slurping up noodle strings loudly and smacking his lips every time he had finished swallowing one. This process of eating several pieces of noodle at ones when one for a small time, and just as quickly as with the two previous dishes Scat Cat finished it up with an empty bowl and an even fuller stomach.

At this point he had now made his belly about twice as big as it usually is after full meal, and he even felt like it was starting to hurt a little.

Looking over at Duchess, it looked like she was almost finished with her sandwich. "I guess I wouldn't need to eat the last one." Scat Cat thought, but seeing the soup bowl with fresh bread to dip into it looked so good that he couldn't help but wanting to finish what he had started.

"As long as she hasn't finished her meal I should continue eating." Scat Cat thought and did just that.

"Just like I thought. He isn't leaving any dish untouched." Peppo said, from watching from the pantry.

"Okay, I haven't eaten anything for a long time, and I'm not letting that fat cat my own made meal!" Billy Boss said, and the other three tried there best to keep him from opening the door fully.

"Don't do it!" Peppo said.

"Don't let us get kicked out!" Hit Cat added.

"Can't you just eat something here?" Shun Gon asked, and that's when it hit them all.

They where inside a pantry. Filled with FOOD. It wasn't anything stopping then from taking something to please their hunger. In fact Scat was pretty much doing his best to not let Duchess notice that they even existed. The least they could do was to take advantage of that.

"Let's dig in!" Peppo said, and they all started immediately to dig in to all the kinds of food the pantry held.

Scat Cat himself was also heavily digging into what was left for him to eat. He knew that you should first dip and eat the bread next to the soup, so he made sure to take them in quickly so he could get to the main star of the dish. Just like with the stew he decided to skip the spoon and gulp it all down. This was even easier to take down then the stew, since the only solid thing from the dish (The bread) had already been taken care of.

Once finished he cleaned his cheeks from food remains, and saw looked over at Duchess to see that she had finished her sandwich since long, and had pretty much stared at his whole display with the soup. She didn't looked as shocked or disgusted as she looked "Fascinated" over it. Looking down Scat Cat could see at least one reason to why she would think so.

His belly.

After four meals that all was the size of what he would be use to eat Scat Cat's belly now was about three times the size it use to be when he was completely stuffed. He could also feel it, since the pains of eating so much now started to come.

Holding his hurting stomach in his arms Scat Cat looked up at Duchess and said, "See. I told you that I was that hungry."

"I guess you where right." Duchess said, before deciding to leave the kitchen and Scat Cat alone.

Or so she though as Scat Cat immediately went to the pantry to tell his friends that the coast was clear and how sorry he was about eating their food. But as soon as he open the door, he got a bit surprised by what he saw.

Inside the pantry laid all four of his band friends on their backs, with big bellies and a very emptied pantry. They all looked very stuffed, but none of them could even get close to Scat Cat's belly size. (But they all looked to be about the same size he was when he had been having his first meal at the mansion, so they where going in the right direction.)

"Hehe, should have know better then to let four hungry cats hide in a pantry." Scat Cat jokingly said, as he helped them all up.

"Well you ate all the food that we made for ourselves, so we thought this would make it more even." Billy Boss said, as he got pulled up by Scat Cat.

"If you all now follow me to your secret hiding place where you will be hiding, I will promise that I will bring you food there regularly." Scat Cat said.

"Will it be as much as this time?" Peppo said jokingly, and Scat Cat said back that "He would do his best to try and live up to that."

When he gets back to his dorm he finds something.
1531222.content:
James P. Sullivan was stressed out, only a week until OK competed in the most rigorous challenge yet:
The Urchin Race.
He didn't know what was in store for the big challenge, all he knew that it was a race, and it had urchins. And his team had signed him up for the one that conquered that challenge.
It sounded dangerous, but Sulley was up for it, he wouldn't let Mike or the other members of OK see that he was truly terrified for what was in store.

"Why are they even making me do this?" The monster mumbled to himself while walking to the track field to train. "It's all some dumb game, it will be over before I know it."
The night sky shimmered with promise.
Sulley grunted and he was off, like the agile fit monster he was.
Suddenly-
Something hit him.
Literally.

Out of nowhere came something hard and rough that hit Sulley in the face.
He angrily best the thing away and kept running, then came another one that hit him in the rear, he dismissed it and kept running.
But the objects kept on coming and coming, it eventually came so bad that Sulley had to stop running completely.

"That's how it's gonna be when you run that race." A familiar voice spoke, it was Mike, Mike had stuffed a tennis-ball machine with bath loofahs. "Ya gotta be faster than that ya blue ball of tub."
Sulley gritted his teeth and tried to ignore Mike as he walked off the field in silence.
"What?! I'm just trying to help! We need-you need to win this!" Mike called out after him, Sulley turned around furiously,
"Win? Win?! Is that what this is all about?! I'm sick and tired of this stupid competition! Y'know what?! I'm done being 'OK'." Then he stormed off leaving Mike in the dark.
1531222.title: Urchins that make him gain weight

15312221.content:
"This is all just-ridiculous." Sulley muttered to himself, walking at a steady pace back to his dorm, not daring to so much as look behind him.
On his way back, he walked past the ROR frat house. They were throwing a big party for Randall who was competing in the challenge against him.
Everyone was invited to Randall's party, even the professors. Everyone except OK.
Sulley scowled at the huge house, he knew he had to win this. But how?

Then it hit him.
Literally.
Again.
Mike was standing an inch away from him and he threw a loofah at Sulley's head.
"Wishing you were there huh?" Mike stared at Sulley disappointedly with his eye.
Sulley then smiled, he got an idea.
"Mike, don't worry, I'm gonna win this. There's no way I'm letting ROR win. OK is the best frat."
That brought a knowing smile to the cyclops's face, "I knew you would say that."
"Now go! We will win this!"
Then Sulley ran as fast as he could to the grounds of the next challenge.

It was so dark he couldn't see a thing, but he was sure that if he got to know the course, he would be sure to win it.
Sulley climbed over the construction fence with ease, he knew that no one would be there this late at night.
Sulley was prepared to see the most terrifying course imaginable since everyone was obsessing over his terrifying it would be.
But to his surprise- it was the most simple course he had ever seen. Just a straight run with zero twists or turns. It wasn't even that lengthy as well.
The blue monster was...let down.
"It hasta be the urchins, that's what's difficult about it." Sulley assured himself,
He climbed a ladder upwards and saw four large wooden boxes with the words "DO NOT TOUCH." On them.
Rules would hafta wait, Sulley needed to see these urchins, and fast.

Sulley carefully opened the lid of the nearest box, inside the box were at least millions of tiny, glowing, bright green urchins. The beast had to stifle a laugh, "This is what is so scary?!" He chuckled while reaching out to grab one.
In the midst of his silent laughter, the urchin's spiked puffed out and jammed themselves into Sulley's hand.

"Ow!" He cried out, when suddenly: the hand that he was holding it in began to puff and swell out and get bigger. Soon he was left with an enormous hand.
Trying to get the urchin off, Sulley shook his swollen hand as hard as he could.
In the middle of the chaos with his hand, Sulley lost his balance and grabbed onto the box of urchins for dear life. Sulley saw the urchins close to pouring out on him.
Out of choice Sulley fell, the fall was nothing too major but the urchins spilling out of the box was. The blue monster ducked for cover, but one stuck to his butt, he could feel it puff and swell up, then another hit his tummy. That began to feel heavier and heavier and closer to the ground.
But the last urchin, fell right into the bloating beast's maw. Sulley reluctantly swallowed it, scared for his life. Then all of a sudden, something surprising happened:
Sulley liked it.
The urchin was delicious, the best thing Sulley had ever eaten. He looked around the small arena and saw that it was full of them.
Suddenly: Sulley lost every care in the world and began stuffing himself with urchins, getting fatter and fatter with every bite. He on purposely stuck two on his asscheeks to make them get bigger and bigger until they were larger than a couch.
The greedy beast knew that this would be a long night.
15312221.title: On his way back to the dorm he finds something,

choices: He gets to the party and inflates everyone else

153122211.content:
Sulley grabbed five with his giant hand and stuffed them into his bloating face cheeks. The urchins were so deliciously crunchy, he let out a sigh of pleasure.

Everything on him had swollen up, and he loved it. He felt so big and in charge. He had trouble walking but once he had gotten the hang of it he moaned when he felt his cankles and asscheeks rub together while walking. His blue guy almost reached the floor as it jiggled and swayed.

Sulley realized it was almost morning so he grabbed a whole handful of urchins and started to make his way back to his dorm.

Once he got back he got excited, he plopped his massive blue ass on Mike’s bed and examined the urchins. Why was everyone so scared of them? They turned Sulley into a sexy beast.

Suddenly, an idea struck the blue blob, he put on a new tighter shirt to expose his rotund gut and a pair of shorts which were now practically daisy dukes on him. His blue ass so close to shredding them.

He made his way to ROR one bloated waddle at a time.

15333111.title: Always wanted to try his food a lot of food

choices: Remy's weight starts to cause problems
153331112.content:
Remy sat in Linguini's chef's hat, paws tightly in his hair, and whisked him around Gusteau's kitchen. He made Linguini sprinkle spices, pour various liquids, stir, and mix the soup in front of them. It smelled wonderful. Remy lifted the ladle towards his head and made him lift his chef's hat.

"What are you doing little chef? What if someone sees you!" Linguini whispered.

Remy leaned forward and sipped the soup. It tasted even better than it smelled. Remy could taste every individual ingredient run across his tongue. Remy leaned his face forward into the soup and greedily slurped all of it down. A small bump appeared on his otherwise flat stomach, but Remy did not notice.

"It could use more thyme," he thought to himself.

He had Linguini put his hat back down and then had him grab a handful of thyme. He sprinkled a measured amount of it into the soup and then mixed it thoroughly. He once again had Linguini lift the ladle towards his hat.

"You're scaring me, little chef," He whispered, trying to be inconspicuous.

Remy dipped his snout into the soup and gulped it down. He was right about the thyme; the soup was perfect after adding that one simple ingredient. He finished off the ladle's worth of soup and then dipped it back down for another round. He finished off the second ladle and then jumped when he noticed his belly. It had rounded out to a little under the of a tennis ball. He had Linguini return to cooking and did not sample anything else for the rest of their shift.

***

Linguini stepped outside of the restaurant after finishing his shift. He took his hat off, put Remy on the ground, and looked at the soup filled rat.

"You can't do that little chef! I know the importance of taste testing, but you've produced perfect soups without taste testing in the past! And anyway look at yourself; you're getting fat! I can't hide a fat rat in my hat!"

Remy dropped his ears. Linguini instantly felt bad.

"Oh little chef... you know I'll feed you at home, and I'll even sneak you ingredients to eat, just don't test the soup. people could see you, and that's not good for either of us."

Linguini packed up his things in preparation for the moped ride ahead of them, but before they left, Emile appeared.

"Hey Remy!" he scampered over to him. "I see you finally took my advice and put on some weight! Maybe you won't be so miserable in the winter now."

"Emile I haven't put on weight, I just needed to test something for work."

"Say that to your belly! You're bigger than me!"

Remy got a good look at himself. Emile was right, Remy was noticeably larger than he was.

Linguini started to turn around and Emile scampered into the shadows.

"Okay little chef, let's go."

***

Linguini arrived at Gusteau's for the early shift.

Before he placed Remy into his hair, he reminded him "No taste testing."

They walked to the station and began to prepare the first soup of the day. It was not long before the delicious smell wafted up to Remy's sensitive nose. He tried to hold himself back, but he couldn't help it. He had linguini set down the ladle he was holding, and pick up one almost 2 times bigger. He lifted a ladle-full of soup up to the hat and leaned his face into the soup.

"Little chef no!"

Remy wasn't listening. He gulped down the ladle. He forced Linguini to get another one, then another one. Remy was in the process of slurping down his 4th when somebody noticed Linguini holding the ladle to his head.

"Linguini! what are you doing?"

"Oh I was just... inspecting the bottom for dirt," he said quickly.

"get back to work."

Remy's belly had ballooned outwards to the point where he had to reach over it to grab onto Linguini's hair. Remy felt like a hefty rock sitting on his head.

The shift went on without any more interruptions.

***

Linguini slammed the back door closed and then grabbed hold of Remy, talking to him while he was still in his fist.

"This is a problem! Your body literally squishes in my hand!"

He placed him onto the ground.

"Can you even run away?"

Remy tried. His legs were just long enough for him to drag his chubby body across the ground at a snail's pace.

"I really don't know why I trusted you."

Remy drooped his ears, knowing it would win him over.

There was a long silence, and then Linguini said, “Fine… you get one more chance, but that's it!”

153332111.content:

After been only getting a vague description of that some bonds that needs to be repaired, Merida and her mother was trying to find out what exactly it meant. They needed to figure it out fast since they only got until the second sunrise to brake the curse before it would be permanent.

They rest under a tree as shelter for the night, since the castle would be a bad place to be in with her mothers state.

The next day knew that the first thing to do would be to get some breakfast before starting to search for the answer. After testing simple things like berries and the water Merida found a great way to get food, getting fish from the river. Along the river they could see a lot of fish swiming and jumping across the river, a couple of those would keep them feed for the day.

While her mother watched Merida took and used her hunting skills to catch some fishes, which they then cooked over an open fire. When the fish was cooked the both started to eat. Queen Elinor tried at first to eat just as elegant as she had been doing before in her life, but sooned found out that with her new bear paws it wasn't that easy. She realized that she would be forced to eat it more like an animal would, which she did.

After eating a whole salmon Elinor got a real hunger for it and decided to try and catch some more. Once in the river she found that to be as much harder then she thought as well. Merida was just looking on and laughing at her mothers failed attempts, and then started to walk up to her to offer her help. But as she approched Merida saw her mother acting a bit strange, and when she got closer she growled at her. Taken completely by surprised Merida took and backed off, letting her mother hunt for fish on her own. It all felt so weird to her. It was like it wasn't even her mother anymore, but a real bear standing infront of her.

After some more failed tries her mother finally took and catched a fish which she swallowed whole. After doing soo her mother started to act weird again, and looked around like she didn't know where she had been a moment ago. Merida was at first unsure to walk up to her, but she could see in her eyes that it was mer mother looking at her again. Once together again there was a small silence at first, but then Merida tries to figure out what had happen.

Since her mother couldn't speak as a bear Merida made sure to include every detail and watch every single expresion that her mother gave as help. "What just happen mom was that when you couldn't catch a fish at first you became more aggressive and wild, and once you finally caught one fish and ate it you became normal again." She could see that her mother looked completely shocked over hearing this. "What I guess is happening is that your hunger some how helps releasing the so called beast from inside, and eating food helps putting that under control." She could see that her mother had a hard time believing this reason for her acting. "Yes, I know that it dosen't make any sence either, but it's the best explanation I can find." Her mother seems to accept the whole explanation better now.

"Now the first thing we need to do is to give you lots of food to eat." Merida said and saw how her mother gave a very surprised facial expression by what she said. "We need to do this to make sure that the beast inside of you stays there longer." Merida said and saw how her mother was holding her front paws on her stomach area as to tell her something. "You may look fat afterwards, but it's what must be done. The only thing left is to think out what to do to feed you well?"

After some moments of thinking Merida finally got an idea that was...
