1542321.content:
Gadget and Zipper was exploring the abandoned observatory of Prof. Nimnul, looking for supplies for her inventions. Zipper buzzed around the upper shelves looking for things that Gadget requested of him to find and Gadget was on the decks for anything that looked remotely interesting.

As she searched a cabinet full of odd and half done experiments she found a bottle of pills at the back of everything. "Golly what do have here," she said inquisitive as she pulled the bottle out of the cabinet. Zipper flew down to see what Gadget had found. She examined the bottle and at first glance it was nothing special. The bottle was white with a simple hand written label and stood at the same height of Gadget. One the label she read 'Increase I.Q. supplement'.

This peaked her interest as she looked around for a notebook. She found one not too far and opened it looking through the pages. And there she found it, half way through the book she found the experiment. "Looky here Zipper," she called out. Zipper flew to her as she began to read.

"Intelligence enhancer, can increase one's intelligence for about 8 hours," she said with amazement, "Wow Zipper who would have known he could make something like this!" She then walked back to the bottle and opened it. "Huh, it's still full. I guess Prof. Nimnul never used it. It good thing that he did not or we would have been in trouble."

She then grabbed the bottle and put it into her makeshift wagon. Zipper buzz something worrisome to Gadget. "Don't worry Zipper I'll make sure it is safe before I do anything with it. Now let's head home it starting to get late."

They jumped onto the wagon as they drove out the the observatory to the Ranger's headquarters. What both did not see was the sign above the cabinet that said 'failed experiments'.
1542321.title: Yes.

15423211.content:
It was a slow day at the Ranger's headquarters. Monterey Jack and Zipper was off on a little adventure, most likely involving cheese, Chip and Dale was at the police station hoping to find a mission, and Gadget was home working on her latest invitation.

Gadget was having a hard time with her newest creation. She has been trying to get this machine working for the past month and she can't figure out what is wrong with it. Right now she has just been looking at it hoping for some sort of inspiration to pop into her head. "Why can't I figured this out," she said in frustration.

She hopped off her chair and began pacing back and forth across her room. She looked around her room to see if there was something in her room that can help with her problem. That's when she'd eyed the bottle at the corner of the room. "No, I shouldn't. I have not tested it yet," she said trying to discourage herself. She then looked back at her invention and then back to the bottle. "Well maybe one pill won't hurt," she said as she approach the bottle.

She opened the bottle and took out one pill. The pill was smaller then normal pills, as if it was made for someone small. She held it for a bit feeling nervous about what she's about to do. "Well bottom's up," she said biting into it and in no time she ate the entire pill.

Gadget just stood the waiting for something to happen. Soon she began to feel a tingly sensation in her head, and as soon as it started it ended. Wondering if it work she walked back to her table and examined the invitation. Almost instantly she know what was wrong and she squeaked in excitement. "It work, golly it work," she jumped with joy. She quickly got on her chair and began working on the device.
15423211.title: Next day

154232112.content:
Gadget had been in her room all day only leaving for food. She even barely notice her friends return, as she was too focus on her device. When she began to feel the pill's losing its effect it was already 5 o'clock in the afternoon, 8 hours after she took the pill.
She sat on her chair feeling exhausted as she looked at her device. "It's almost finished," she said softly, "that pill help me do more in one day then in an entire month!"
She felt her tiredness grow as she was struggling to stay awake. "This must be a side-affect of those pills," she said as she got up from her chair. She slowly walked to her door and opened it. Just her luck Chip was walking by.
"Hey Chip I'm a bit tired today so I'll be going sleep a little early."
"Now, but its only 5 in the afternoon? What about dinner, Monterey is cooking a new cheese dish he just learned today," he said looking concerned.
"Sorry Chip but it's been a long day for me. Tell Monty to leave some extra for me if I wake up later."
"Ok Gadget, you go rest I'll tell the gang."
Thanking him Gadget closed the door. It was not uncommon for Gadget to pull all nighter or be so focus on her work that sometimes she would not com out in days, so Chip did not feel anything was out of the ordinary as he walked to the main room.
Gadget closed her door and walked to her bed falling on to it too tired to change her clothes as she covered herself with her blanket drifting off to sleep.

It was almost 5 hours into her sleep when she began to move around in her bed. She then opened her eyes and got out of bed. "Why that was a great sleep!" She then felt a rumble from her stomach. "Golly that sleep made me hungry, hope there is some food."
She left her room and into the kitchen. There on the stove there was a large pot half her size that smelled like cheese. She went to the pot and took it to the table. Opening it and it was half full of some cheese stew. She licked her lips and grabbing a large spoon she started eating.
After several minutes of eating she dropped the spoon on the floor and grabbed the pot lifting the it up over her head. Drinking the rest of the stew in a matter of minutes while spilling some of the content of the stew on her jumpsuit. With a belch she place the pot back down on the table.
She rubbed her small belly as she walked to the fridge. Inside was full of cheese, fruit, and pastries. Right away she started to devourer the content of the fridge. Within a half hour she emptied the entire fridge.
Still hold on to her grown belly she walked back to her room. As she walked through her room she past a full body mirror. When she saw herself in the mirror she gave a small squeak in shock. "Golly, what a ugly suit I'm wearing," she said as she inspected her cheese covered jumpsuit. She then unzipped her suit allowing it to drop to the floor.
Now she looked at her underwear clad body. "Ah much better." She looked at herself once more as she began to frown. "Wow, look how skinny I am! I guess I should get more food," she said as she patted her small bulging belly.
She went to her closet and looked for clothes to wear. After a while of searching for the right clothes she finally chose the right ones that she wanted. She was wearing a short pink jogging pants and a large white crop top.
She walked out of the Rangers headquarters and saw the Rangers Plane. She hopped in and looked over the controls. "Um how dose this work," she questioned as she scratch her head. After pulling a couple of leavers and pedals she gave up. She hoped out and climbed down the tree instead, heading to the city.
154232112.title: Something else happen

1542321121.content:
She walked down the street with a dizzy look on her face feeling content with herself. She took her time getting to the city for she had to stop for ever crumb of food she found discarded in the park, from the half eaten sandwiches to discard chips.

She soon crossed a toy store and upon seeing she slowly but eventually got an idea. "Ohh, I better go clothes shopping," she said as she looked at her clothes. "There is nothing to wear at home."

Finding a crack that was big enough she squeezed through into the store. She then wondered around the store until she found what she was looking for; the doll section. Squeaking in delight she began taking clothes off the dolls that was similar to her size and after taking several that she liked she when to a display of a catwalk and began to try out her selection.

She strutted down the catwalk wearing her selection as sexually as she can, swaying her butt side to side. One of the clothes was a black tube top while another was a red two piece dress. But after walking down the walkway several times she finally settled on one she loved. It was a white gown dress that hugged her body tightly. Her belly now extended further from her then before she left was front and center, and as a bonus the dress was extra stretchy. With a piece of string she tide her hair into a bun and walked out the store.

After squeezing herself through the crack and with her new dress she yelled into the city, "tonight I party like there is no tomorrow!" And with a loud grumble from her stomach it gave its sign of agreement.
1542321121.title: New clothes make a new mouse.

choices: That night as one sleeps, one awaken.
15423211211.content:
Gadget woke with a knock on her door.

"Yes?" she murmured as she slowly got up rubbing her eyes.

"Gadget, it 10 o'clock, are you coming for breakfast?" Dale asked.

Gadget's stomach growled giving her answer. "Yes, I'll be there in a moment."

"Ok," Dale answered, then walking away.

Gadget slowly got out of bed rubbing her head. "What did I do last night," she thought feeling a bit of a headache. Then her stomach growled again making her grab it. "And why am I so hungry."

She got out of bed and went to her closet. Changing out of her sleeping clothes and into her jumpsuit as she noticed something strange. As soon as she zipped up her jumpsuit it felt tighter, especially around her chest and rear. She looked around her inspecting the suit but couldn't find anything wrong with it, but she didn't think about it too much as her head ache.

Then she turned to her desk where her latest invention lay. All of her memories rushed to her remembering what happened yesterday.

"Oh yea, Professor Nimnul's pills!" She rushed to her invention looking over her it.

"Golly, it worked!" She became excited by the progress she made yesterday, but soon she began to lose her enthusiasm as realized that she didn't remember what she improvements she did to it.

Her stomach growled but she ignored it as she began to panic trying to figure out how fix this problem. She then saw the bottle of pills in the corner of the room.

She stared at it for a bit debating whether or not to use it again, but decide to go for it.

Opening the bottle she grabbed one of the small pills staring at it before putting it in her mouth, swallowing it, and just like yesterday it took a while before it's effects took place. She can feel a rush in her head almost feeling like a high.

She went to her door and opened it, "Dale, can you bring my breakfast to my room, I got work to do!"

She didn't wait for a responses as she rushed to her invention and got to work.

---

Dale was in the kitchen when he heard Gadget called from her room for him to bring her breakfast to her. He sighed, knowing Gadget well enough not to argue with her about things like this when she was very focused on one of her gadgets.

But at this moment he couldn't focused on her right now, he was trying to find out who ate all of their food yesterday.
15423211211.title: Late next morning

154232112111.content:
The clock struck ten as everyone at the Rangers headquarters was fast asleep, that is, except one particular inventor creeping out of her room.

The plumping mouse was wearing her white dress from yesterday, her hair in a bun and a misgivings grin on her face. She knew what she wanted and she was going to get it. She quietly moved through the headquarters approaching the kitchen. Within seconds of entering the room she quickly went to the fridge.

Upon opening it she became disappointed as there was only some fruits and vegetables. Quickly she moved to the shelves only to find flour and oats. Her stomach growled telling her to eat making her feel annoyed that they was nothing to eat in this darn place. With a disappointing sigh she left the kitchen and toward the front door.

---

She grew frustrated as the streets was clear of trash tonight. Her stomach growled commanding her to find food as she headed to the city. Lucky she knew the best place to get food.

After an hour and a couple of garbage diving she reached her destination, a large grocery store. With a squeak of excitement as she rushed into the store. Inside the store was silent as the shelves was full of cans and package goods. She rushed down the isles toward the food she most desired; candy.

The whole isle was filled with package pastries, candy and chips. Her mouth watered thinking about all of the food she will eat. Without a moment notice she climbed one of the shelves and tore open the closest bag to her and dove into it. Within minutes she finished, existing the bag with a slightly larger belly. Licking her fingers she moved to the next bag, which was a bag of chip. With even less time she finished, her mouth covered in crumbs.

She hopped from bag to bag leaving a trail of empty bags discarded on the store floor. One bag was filled with cheese puffs half the size of her. Another was filled with white powder mini donuts. With each bite her face became messier and her stomach became fuller.

With every bag it was getting harder to walk as her belly grew inside her stained white dress. She didn't feel guilty about stealing all this food as she tore open her tenth bag. She was having the time of her life gorging on fatty and sugary treats. Her stomach was as tight as a drum stick out quite a bit looking like she was several months pregnant. Even after her belly ache she kept eating as if that's all she knew.

An hour has passed and the engorged inventor lay at the back of one of the shelves unable to move with over twenty bags of sweets was packed into her stomach. With one paw she rubbed her painful belly and with the other reaching for more food. Her stomach was so stuffed it was hard to breathe, let alone walk. But even with her stomach hurting, she still craved for more, as if her brain didn't know when she was full. Her breasts was being pushed up by her belly, covered by crumbs and dust. She licked her face try to clean all of the cheese dust and powder sugary. Although she still hungered she was starting to get another feeling; thirst.
154232112111.title: That night as one sleeps, one awaken.

choices: A headache to end all headaches
1542321121111.content:
She laid there for a bit as she waited for her stomach to digest some of food before heading out to find something to drink, although she didn't have a choice given the size of her belly pining her down. When she did feel that she could move she placed her paws under her belly and with a lot of strain lifted herself up slowly until she was standing. It looked and felt like it was over twelve months pregnant and that's after it going down! She then moving one hand onto the wall slowly walked to the entrance of store. Normally she didn't want to move but she was motivated to get a drink regardless of the pain was telling her.

Finally outside, she moved slowly down the street. She didn't know where she was going but her feet pulled her forward to an unknown destination, she just hope it would led her somewhere where she can be quench.

It took her a while but finally found what she was looking for; a night club. And right below the night club was a small version of the big one made just for mice like her. She waddled to the small club as she noticed a small sign next to the entrance. She had a hard time reading it but she eventually did it. It read 'Free Girls Night! Free Drinks till 3'. After realizing what it said she smiled a wicked smile. She quickly dusted herself off trying to clean herself up as much as possible before entering the club.

The music was blasting from the human club through the roof as several mice and rats dance on the dance floor. There was several standing tables scattered around the club and a sit down bar at one side. She immediately went to the bar grabbing a set.

"What would you have, deary?" asked a fat balding rat.

She looked around at the multitude of small bottles of alcohol trying to make a decision.

"How about the cheese vodka, miss, it's the best." a male voice came from the seat next to her.

She didn't notice that one of the attendees grabbing a set next to her soon after she sat. She turned to see a sleazy looking rat with a sleazy smile on him. He wore a simple leather vest and was a little banged up in the looks department.

"Ooh that sounds nice, bring as much as you got and keep it coming," she said to the bartender. With a shrug he left to the back.

"So baby, what's your name?" the rat spoke up.

"Oh I'm..." she started but paused. She couldn't remember her name! She really never needed to the last two nights she was out. She thought hard trying to remember anything what she was calling. Everything in her head was fuzzy at best as she didn't need to think except for food.

"It's, um.. It's Ga.. Ga.. GARNET! Yes Garnet, it's Garnet!" she bounced with excitement.

The rat almost fell off his chair from her outburst.

"What a beautiful name Garnet," he started composing himself, "I'm Rapper, nice to see a beautiful girl around these parts." he said as he looked at her paws for a ring. Then he moved his eyes to her gigantic belly, "are you expecting soon?"

She looked at him puzzled, "expecting? I'm not expecting anything."

"Okay... And where are you from, although I don't know how you are going to get back to heaven with wings."

"Wings? I'm not a bird. And I live in a tree not this place called heaven."

"Jackpot," he though, "I found a stupid one. Has a bit of a belly but she still has a beautiful face, and look at that tits and ass. I'm going to have fun with this one."

And just before he could make his move the drink came, a glass containing the vodka and its bottle. Immediately she grabbed the glass and gulped it down fast. Placing the cup down she grabbed the bottle, drinking it as fast as possible.

Rapper watched in amazement as she finished the bottle in no time. Before he could react she called the bartender for another bottle.

"Wow, you are a thirsty girl, aren't you?"

"You have no *hic* idea," she said as the other bottle came and started drinking again.

"Well then, I know a place where you can get as much to drink as you want," a sleazy smile crept on his face.

Garnet was already on her third bottle before looking at him. She now looked like she was about to fall asleep as she let out a hiccup.

"Oh I don't know *hic* I don't want to move at the *burp* moment." She then grabbed her forth bottle.

"Come on babe. It will be fun, believe me." He was now grabbing her arm.

"*Burp* well?" she thought as she drank her fifth.

He was now trying to pull her away from the bar. But before he could continue a bystander came up to the bar and slapped some money onto the bar table.

"I bet ten that the girl can't drink a bottle of whiskey!"

"I bet two," said another one cried out from the other side of the club.

Wapper looked around seeing that several club members was looking at them, more specifically at her. He barely noticed but she had now down five bottles of vodka. All he was trying to get her drunk so he could have his way, not have her drink the whole bar, and he had to pay for all this too!

"You're *hic* on!" Soon she grabbed a bottle of whiskey that the bartender brought and down it. As so as she finished she had to hold on to the bar to keep herself from falling off the chair. The other bottle came and downed it the same as the other one. As soon as she finished she looked like she was going to puke.

BURRP!

Everyone cheered!

Soon bets came pouring in to see how must she can drink before throwing up or passing out. Garnet was ecstatic, grabbing the next bottle of alcohol. With each bottle she drank the slower she gulped as her stomach was having a hard time finding room. But she didn't care, with a belly full of food and alcohol she was having the time of her life.

---

Dawn approached as she was surprised she found her way home. It was a slow and painful waddle to get here. She was kicked out of the club because she drank too much, but she did make a killing from all those bets she won. If she had a choice she would have went food hunting after all that alcohol she drank but she had a strong urge to return home.

With a stupid grin on her face she waddled up to headquarters door. Luckily for her, her stomach shrank when walking back home. Her stomach slowed digesting all of that food and alcohol. If she was sober enough she could have felt her body putting on fat.

She squeeze herself through the door with a pop making her fall unto her face. She let out a long burp before giggling. Eventually she got up and walked to her room.

Closing the door behind her she quickly took of her dress now standing in her now tight underwear. With a final slap to her belly she plopped herself on to her bed, quickly falling asleep.
1542321121111.title: A night at the club.

15423211211111.content:
Gadget woke up with the worst headache she has ever had. It felt like her head was splitting apart. Everything hurt as she shifted in her bed and if it wasn't for her headache she would have felt that she now sported a large beer belly.

Groaning in pain she slowly got out of bed trying to remember where she got this headache from. Sometimes she gets headaches when she works all night long, but she remembers that she went to bed early at six last night. She stomach growled but she was too much in pain to notice.

She walked away from her bed rubbing her temples not noticing how heavy she was from yesterday. She now weighed over fifty percent heavier than she did two days ago. She was wondering how she would remove the pain when she then remembered the pills. Yesterday morning she too had a headache, although much weaker, and after taking a pill the headache disappeared.

The bottle was still in the same place as it was yesterday, so she lumbered herself to it unscrewed it. Quickly she took one pill out swallowing it. It took a while before she felt the becoming familiar tingling of her brain. In the beginning it was a bit painful with the tingling sensation but soon her headache vanish as she sighed in relief.

Soon ideas flooded her mind gaining a urge to continue her invention. She went to her closet grabbing her jumpsuit. As she pulled it on she discovered that her butt and breasts felt very tight and a little bit with her stomach when she zipped her suit up, but thoughts of her invention quickly pushed any concern she had with her suit. Ignoring her jumpsuit's tightness when she walked she went to her work table beginning on her project.
15423211211111.title: A headache to end all headaches

154232112111111.content:
Chip was becoming worried about Gadget. She has been in her room for a week without ever leaving it. He knew that when she was inspired she would lock herself away until she was done, but it was hard not to be concerned. He had a small meeting with Dale and Monterey concerning Gadget but they said not to worry about it.

Even though everyone says nothing is wrong, something was off. When ever he would pass her door a strong smell would permeate from her room, something sweet and salty, and something alcoholic? He couldn't tell, he just hope she was alright.

---

Gadget was working hard on her latest invention and totally unaware of the changes to her and her room. Ever since she started taking those pills she had tunnel vision for her invention and nothing else. Because of this she haven't noticed the changes happening around her.

Her room was a mess with things that her other half brought home from her trips to the city. A few bottles of alcohol lay about with crumbs of food of food she brought home. Also discarded clothes lay about with pieces of machinery across the room. The room stunk with the smell of food and unwashed clothes. But Gadget didn't smell anything as she was to focus on what she was doing. She even didn't notice that she began to smell too from being unwashed for a week.

But the biggest change was her. She has grown massive over the past week, almost tripling her size. Her jumpsuit barely fit her as she had to keep it unzipped so her now gigantic bust and belly spilled out. Her breasts was now bigger than her head being held up by a makeshift bra that her other half had made. Her stomach hung low over her waist still taunt from last night binges. Her suit held tight to her shelf of a butt and expansive legs restricting her movements. If she had any awareness of her change she would have freaked out, but the pills prevent her from seeing anything besides her invention.

In fact she has grown addicted to the pills as it helped her with those morning headaches and helped her with her invention. She just grew and changed without her noticing as she worked.
154232112111111.title: And The Cycle Continues.

154332222222222211.title: Lucky it is.

1543322222222222111.content:
Out in the farm, all 99 pups were out taking laps around the farm. Why were doing that? It was because today they were once again all being trained by small, but tough Lieutenant of the Bark Brigade named Lieutenant Pug. He was running everyone ragged. Expectly Lucky, Cadpig, and Rolly.

"Come on. Move it cadets." Pug shouted at them.
"Ugh! We've been running around the farm for hours." Lucky said tired.
"Can't we at least take a break?" Cadpig said just as tired as Lucky.
"Could we...*huff*....at least...*huff*...stop for a snack?" Rolly asked panting.
"Typical whining from you three cadets." Pug said. "Why can't you be like Captian Tripod?"

Tripod was basically Pug's star pupil and the best of all the dalmatian cadets. He only had three legs, but it never stopped him from being as fit as he is. He told fitness as a big important part in life. Tripod was actually nearby Lucky and the others.

"See. Look at him. The perfect solider." Pug said.
"Thank you sir." Tripod said.
"Oh bother." Lucky said in his head.

After 20 minutes, they were all done running. Good thing too, cause everyone was tired.

"Okay. That's enough running for the day." Pug said. All the pups layed down to the ground. Lucky sat beside not by Rolly or Cadpig because they were a bit further out. Two of the pups.

"Thank goodness that's over." Lucky said laying.
"Good. Good. All of you cadets are making good progress." Pug said. "You pups might be close to ready when the cats invade." Hearing that, everyone groaned.
"Not this again with the cat invasion." Lucky said.

Pug always feels that one day, the cats will invade and take over.

"You all have to be ready if that day comes. To motivate all of you, I shall now tell you one of my many war stories." Pug said. Once again, all the pups groaned.
"Again? You got to be kidding." Lucky said not to happy.

Lieutenant Pug went on and on about "blah blah battle" and "blah blah cats". Lucky as well as some of the other pups were getting bored. Then Lucky's stomach started growling. He was hungry.

"This pup's got a case of the munchies." Lucky said. He then looked at the two pups he was with. There names were Wags and Scooter. "Hey Wags! Scooter! Can you guys cover me while I get a quick snack?"
"Will do." Wags said.
"Just be quick. You know how Pug can be." Scooter said.

Wags and Scooter then went in front of Lucky to cover him so he could sneak out. After some "Excuse me." and "Coming thru." Lucky was able to sneak out.

"Good. Now to find a quick snack." Lucky said. "I feel as hungry as Rolly."

Lucky looked in the troth, but their was no kibble to eat. So he decided to look somewhere else. After walking, Lucky just happen to bump into a box.

"Huh? What's this box?" Lucky said investigating the box. As he does, the box reads LT. Pug. "So this must be Lieutenant Pug's stuff. Do I risk getting in trouble by opening it?" Lucky felt Pug would be too happy about him opening up his stuff. "Know what? I'm gonna risk it."

Lucky then open up the box and sawed.....
1543322222222222111.title: Lucky's big gain.

choices: His belly started to bloat up a bit.
15433222222222221112.content:
The box was filled with these bags of military styled dog food. There were a lot of bags and each was the size of a small bag of potato chips. Lucky was interested in the dog food.

"A bunch of bags of....some kind of dog food?" Lucky said. "Military dog food. Pug must have have these during his "war" days." Lucky then takes one of the bags. "I wonder if these taste any good?"

Lucky open up the bag and it's content looked like wood pellets and sawdust.

"Is this really food? I don't even know if I want to try it." Lucky said. But his belly was really growling loudly. "Meh...I'm hungry enough."

Rolly toke a few from the bag and put them in his mouth. Surprisingly, it was actually quite tasty.

"Hey. These aren't bad. Not that great, but not bad." Lucky said. He then a rest of the food in bag. "Pretty good stuff. Not too bad." Lucky then throws away the bag in a nearby trash can. After he finished the bag, Lucky....
15433222222222221112.title: Pug's Special Military Food.

154332222222222211121.content:
Lucky's belly started to gurgling weirldly. "Huh?" Lucky's reacting was. The next thing he knew, his belly expanded a bit. His belly was now close to the size Rolly's was, but slightly bigger. "Woah! What happened.?" Lucky shouted. Lucky then do a loud belch.

"Ughhhh.....what was in those things?" Lucky said. Then he rubbed his belly. "Now I feel like Rolly. That and my belly feels like a stuffed sausage.

Lucky then realized that he still had to go back to the others.

"That's right. I better go back before Pug finishes his story." Lucky said to himself.

Lucky then rushed back, still feeling full from the military kibble. He went through the dalmatians like he did last time with some " Pardon me." and "Coming thru." and made it back to his spot by Wags and Scooter. Pug was still going on about his war story.

"I'm back." Lucky whispered.
"Took you long enough." Scooter said. Then Scooter and Wags looked a Lucky's belly.
"Did you had a snack or a buffet?" Wags asked.
"I"ll explain later." Lucky said.

So Lieutenant Pug still went on with his war story still.

"So my troops and I would spend days, weeks even on battlefield." Pug said. "We barely had the time to eat or drink water. So in these type of situations, the science division developed a special type of dog food."

Hearing that got Lucky's attention.

"Special dog food?" Lucky asked.
"Just eating a bit of it was like eating a day's worth if food." Pug said.
"That's what I must have been what I ate." Lucky thought.
"We made sure not to eat too much of it. Otherwise, we would haven ended up to with a bulging belly." Pug said.
"Uh oh. Guess that's what happen to me." Lucky said.
"The last thing you want is to be big and bloated when the cats invades." Pugs said. "If that....actually happened then...."

Images of the cats taking over went into the Lieutenant's head and he started to shake in fear. Everyone one of the pups started to stare at him in concern. Pug noticed.

"Ahem....that's all for today. Dismissed." Pug said.

Pug lefted and the same for all the dalmatian pups. Lucky still had corcern on the snack he resently had.

"So the box that I found was Pug's stash of military kibble developed to serve as a food supply." Lucky said to himself. "Well I defientily feel full just from the one bag. I better get some rest til this belly's settled."

Lucky went over to the barn to rest and watch some TV. When he went into the barn....
154332222222222211121.title: What's was in those?

choices: Lucky proceeded with trying to lose the weight.
1543322222222222111211.content:
In the barn, was Cadpig and Rolly was some TV. Lucky didn't know how they would react to the extra pudge in his belly, but it wasn't like he had anything to lose.

"Hey guys." Lucky said.
"Hey Luck...." Rolly and Cadpig said before turning to him. They then took a look at Lucky and realized how much bigger his belly was. They reacted by being a bit surprised.
"Woah! Holy kibble and gravy." Rolly shouted.
"Lucky, what happen to you?" Cadpig asked
"So...uhh...you guys notice the extra weight?" Lucky said.
"Only from a mile away." Rolly said.
"I got hungry during the Lieutenant story, so I sneaked out so I can get a quick snack" Lucky said. "I found this box of Pug's Military dog food and took a pack from it."
"The same Military dog food that Pug mentioned in his story?" Cadpig said.
"I'm pretty sure." Lucky said. "I didn't know it would be so filling."
"Were they any good?" Rolly asked.
"They were okay. Not great, but not bad." Lucky mentioned. "Anyway, just came here so I can rest and digest. I'll worry about losing this belly later."
"Okay then." Cadpig said.

Rolly then went to Lucky and started poking his belly. It felt soft and squishy.

"Hahaha! And you guys still call me the pudgy one." Rolly said laughing.
"You still are Rolly." Lucky said.
"I'm not fat." Rolly said not like being called that.

Cadpig then looked at both Rolly and Lucky.

"Actually Lucky.....you're slightly bigger than Rolly." Cadpig stated.
"Wait? WHAT?!?!?" Lucky shouted.

Cadpig was right. Lucky was a little bit rounder than Rolly.

"Haha! Who's the fat one now?" Rolly said laughing.
"Ugghhh. I'll lose it soon enough." Lucky stated. Then his stomach groaned. "Right now, I'm just gonna lay down."

Lucky then went over to some hay and lay down and rubbed his belly.

"That feels better." Lucky said. "I just need a while and then I can work on losing this gut."

Lucky then took a quick nap.

"Do you really think he can lose the extra weight?" Cadpig asked Rolly.
"Take it from me. It isn't as easy as it looks." Rolly said.

A few hours laters.....
1543322222222222111211.title: A chubby Lucky.

choices: No more. Focus on losing the weight you have now.
15433222222222221112111.content:
Lucky woke up after his nap feeling a bit better. He was still as chubby as ever though.

"That nap was just what I needed." Lucky said to himself. "But I still have this belly." He then poked his belly and realized how squishy it was. "Guess I better start losing this."

At that moment, he heard the dinner bell rang.

"The dinner bell." Lucky said. His stomach then growled. Lucky couldn't deny that he was hungry. "Guess I an hungry. Alright. I'll get some dinner first. Then I'll lose the weight."

Lucky then headed to the chow tower and the troth to get some kibble. A couple of the other pups were there too. He went over near Rolly and Cadpig.

"I see you're up." Rolly said to Lucky.
"Yeah. I came here for dinner." Lucky said.
"I thought you wanted to lose weight." Cadpig said.
"I do. But I don't want to skip eating." Lucky stated.
"You are starting to sound like Rolly." Cadpig said. "Heehee. Guess you now have a lot in common and not just big bellies."
"Heeeeeeey." Lucky and Rolly said.
"I'm NOT Rolly." Lucky said in a fit.

While eating some of the kibble on the troth, a pup happen to bump into him. It was Patch.

"Whoops. Sorry Rolly." Patch said thinking Lucky was Rolly.
"Rolly? Patch, it's me. Lucky." Lucky said to Patch.
"Lu...Lucky?!?!?" Patch said surprised. Then he bursted into laughter. "BWAHAHAHAH!!!!!"
"STOP LAUGHING!" Lucky shouted.
"Ha..haha...sorry. I'm just not used to seeing you...." Patch said.
"Fat? I know." Lucky was still steamed. "Can we talk about later? I want to eat first."
"Okay. Okay Rol...LUCKY. I MEAN LUCKY." Patch didn't want to tick off Lucky again by calling him Rolly again.

Lucky was still ticked, but he was too hungry to care. So he continue to eat some more kibble. After couple of minutes, all the other pups had their fill, including Rolly. But Lucky still felt hungry. The troth still had some kibble left.

"Ugh. I'm still kinda hungry." Lucky said to himself. "Should I still eat some more kibble?"
15433222222222221112111.title: Dinner calls.

choices: During the rest of the day, other pups noticed Lucky's new weight too.
The next day, Lucky started his workout.
154332222222222211121111.content:
Lucky's belly still grumbled and there was still plenty more kibble in the troth. So Lucky decided to eat some more to satisfied that stomach of his. He then takes bigger bites from the troth. He always like the kibble, but he doesn't usually eat THIS much.

After a few minutes, the troth was empty now and Lucky was full. Also, his belly expanded a bit from the amount of kibble he just polished of. Cadpig and Rolly were surprised.

"That was some good kibble." Lucky stated and rubbed his belly.
"Umm...you are not concern about much you ate?" Cadpig asked.
"Yeah. You ate more than I did." Rolly said. "Also, it looks like you added a few more to body of your."

Lucky than realized that they were right. His belly was almost touching the ground. His was now even more rounder than Rolly (Didn't think that could happen). Lucky then started to freak out a bit.

"GAH!" Lucky screamed. "I didn't even think I ate so much. Why was I so hungry?"
"Take it from an expert. Bigger belly means you need more to fill it up." Rolly said.
"Ugghhh...now I got more weight to lose." Lucky said.

Lucky's stomach then groaned a bit. Saying after his eating, he was too full to want to do anything else.

"On second thought, I better just start first thing tomorrow." Lucky said.
"Okay. But don't be surprised if you if you get lazy." Cadpig said.
"Hey. I need time to digest." Lucky said.
"Whatever you say.....'Rounder me'." Rolly said chuckling.
"I'M....NOT....YOU." Lucky shouted.

So Lucky decided to lose the weight another time.
154332222222222211121111.title: Lucky's still hungry.

1543322222222222111211111.content:
Lucky decided that, while he’ll work to drop this Weight tomorrow, maybe a walk about the Dearly Farm would have it so he didn’ feel so bloated.

So, Lucky walks (or more so Waddles) through the Drive way, outside the Dearly Farm House, heading in the direction of the Barn.
As he does so, many of the Puppies about the Farm couldn’ help notice Lucky. At first, they thought it was Rolly, but even they knew Rolly wasn’ THAT big!
The Pigs looked up from their sty, and first mistook Lucky for one of them, before Mayor Pig started laughing, so loudly that he had to stick his snout in the mud, to muffle the sound.

Some of the Dalmatians try to leap from Lucky’s path, in fear they would be crushed under that gut, which dragged across the ground, or some more felt tempted to poke it.

Each step Lucky took, the more aware he grew of everyone staring at him.

As he was about to reach the Barn, Someone blocked Lucky’s path. It was…
1543322222222222111211111.title: During the rest of the day, other pups noticed ...

15433222222222221112111111.content:
Mooch! He’s a Grey, no good, Mongrel, who came with the Dearly Farm, when Roger & Anita purchased it. Mooch often liked to spend his time picking on the other Dalmatians, or taking their stuff, and just cause he’s larger, he thinks he has the right…though, with Lucky’s shape, the two were almost equal in Size!

Looking towards Lucky, Mooch raises a sinister smirk, and starts with his taunts!
“HEY! Look what we got here! Someone must of got a Novelty Size Soccer Ball!”
Mooch barks to his Gang, standing behind him. This Gang was made up of Lucky’s litter mates: Wizzer, Dipstick & Two-Tone. While they were usually Okay, when ever they were about Mooch, they would often join in on his antics, such as laughing about what he just barked.

“Knock it off Mooch!” Lucky growls under his breath “Just get out the way, and let me in!”
“You really think you can!?” Mooch circles about Lucky, and smacks Lucky’s shape with his paw “I mean, Look at you! I don’ think you’d even be able to set paw in their, without your Rump getting stuck in those Doors! What you do, Wide Guy!? Swallow the Blob!? Hey! That’s what we should call you! Blobby!”
“Good one, Mooch!” Wizzer laughs; he tends to do that, about most of Mooch’s cracks.

Mooch keeps it up “I bet the Cows on this Farm will think we got ourselves a Holstein, by looking at you! Tell me, How much you charging for others to have a bounce on you!? How about it, Blobby!?”

Mooch’s taunts started to get to Lucky, anger boiled inside of him, as Mooch and his Gang blocked any path he tried to get around them.

“Well, I can see it must run in the Family!” Mooch barks more “You’re wider than that Rolly Polly! You’re Rolly Polly Times Ten!”

What does Lucky do?
15433222222222221112111111.title: Mooch

154332222222222211121111112.content:
“I…AM…NOT…ROLLY!” Lucky’s anger gets the better of him, and he dives towards Mooch, the adrenaline allowing him the strength to lift his heavy form from the ground and fly in the mongrel’s direction!

For a split second, Mooch’s eyes widen and then…

SMACK!

Wizzer, Dipstick & Two-Tone gasped, as they gaze at the sight.
Lucky, with all his flab on top of Mooch, growls down towards the mongrel, who struggled to pull himself from the weight atop him.
While this was a struggle for Mooch, Lucky didn’ even have to put any effort in. He was so heavy, that even Mooch’s strength couldn’ lift him.

Lucky then notice Wizzer, Dipstick & Two-Tone grovelling before him.
“Lucky! We’re so sorry!” Two-Tone whimpers.
“Yeah, We were only playing!” Wizzer joins in “Your Shape is not bad! It’s…Nice!”
“PLEASE DON’ SQUISH US!” Dipstick begs.

Lucky’s eyes then widened, as he realized what he had just done. He looks down to Mooch, who was getting exhausted about trying to get Lucky’s weight from him.

Many thoughts went through Lucky’s mind, but most dominantly was…
154332222222222211121111112.title: React!

choices: Tell the Gang to raid The Pantry, for more Food!
See If He Can Get More of Lt. Pug’s Military Food!
1543322222222222111211111122.content:
Lucky was amazed with himself! He had never before been able to take on Mooch, so easily!
Mooch always acted like he had the right to pick on them, since he was bigger, but now the tables are turned, with Lucky being the Larger Pup, and Lucky knew just what to do with it!

“Alright, Mooch!” He looks down, to the Mutt under his flab “If you want me to get off you, You promise not to pick on me, and make me the Leader of this Gang!?”
“Alright, ALRIGHT!” Mooch groans “Just get your Bulk off me!”

Suddenly, this shape of Lucky’s was starting to feel pretty good! Maybe that’s why he had been so hesitant to loose this weight? Maybe, he actually liked it!?
If he was able to take on Mooch, at just this shape, just think of what he can do, if he became larger! He’d be able to do anything he wanted!

He looked to the Gang, which he now lead, and decides to…
1543322222222222111211111122.title: This shape isn’ so bad!

choices: Breaks the frame of the Dog Door!
15433222222222221112111111221.content:
Lucky decides that’s it would probably be best to ease his way in. If he took Lt. Pug’s Food again, he may find himself immobile, before he gets a chance to take his size to his advantage!

“Follow me!” Lucky tells the Gang, and he leads them back to the Dearly Farm House, Mooch himself dragging his paws behind.

As they reach the House, Dipstick asks; “Erm…Hey, Lucky…? What we doing here?”

“We’re going to break in to the Pantry!” Lucky answers “You’ve stolen from there before!”
“Well, Yeah. But that was cause Nanny left the door to it open…” Wizzer notes “How we suppose to get in, this time!?”
“I have a plan!” Lucky smirks…He didn’ really have a plan, though he usually does, but he is a quick thinker, on his paws, and would often be able to figure something out, should an issue arise.

Wizzer & Dipstick enter first, through the Dog Door of the Kitchen, with Lucky following…However, this caused an issue…Lucky got stuck!
His large shape was squishing against the frame of the door, from his middle section.
“So, This is how Rolly feels…” Lucky thinks to himself, but if Lucky is able to find his way out of issues like this, he can too. He barks to the Gang; “Come on, Guys! You got to help me get through this door!”

Wizzer & Dipstick take Lucky’s front paws, while Mooch & Two-Tone press against his Tail Side, and the group attempts to get Lucky through. Lucky also helps, by kicking his hind legs, though his kicks to sometimes cause Mooch to get kicked in to Lucky’s flab.

As the struggle continues, Lucky…
15433222222222221112111111221.title: "Let's Raid The Pantry!"

choices: He Tells The Gain To Stack Up and reach the Door Handle...
He uses his Body to break down the Door...
154332222222222211121111112212.content:
CRACK!

Lucky bursts through the door, taking the frame of the Dog Door with it!
Now, the Dog Door was stuck around his Waist, very similar to something that happened to Rolly, at the Devil Downs Dog Track!

Mooch observed this and raises a smirk; “Hey! What I tell you! He can’ even use a door without…”
Lucky glares to Mooch, who then meekly backs down, not wanting to get crushed again.

Lucky then looks to the Pantry door, inside the Kitchen, to see that it is indeed closed.

Lucky eyes about, seeing if there was a way to open it up, when he got an idea!
154332222222222211121111112212.title: Breaks the frame of the Dog Door!

choices: They are able to make their way back to Mooch's Wagon...
1543322222222222111211111122122.content:
If he was able to break the Kitchen Door with his shape, Maybe he can do the same for the Pantry door!

“Now…Let’s see if this works…” Lucky waddles up to the Pantry door, and he begins slamming his body agains it.
The force kept making audiable thuds, like someone was constantly flipping a mattress, but after a minute or two of constant force, the Pantry door brke open with another crack.

Lucky saw the pantry door within, seeing all the food that was stacked there, and all of it for him…well…Maybe, he’ll let the Gang have some too.
“Alright, So far, so good!” Lucky nods.
“What do we do now, Lucky?” Wizzer asks.
“Get whatever you can from here!” Lucky instructs, and on that command, the gang does so.

Wizzer started to pile up some boxes of Doughnuts, and push them along with his head.
Dipstick was picking up boxes of Cookies, though whenever he dropped one, he would reach to pick that one up, but then would make him drop the other one he was holding, and then, to pick that one up, he would drop the box he had just picked up!
Two-Tone couldn’ decide what to get. The Fruit Soda looked good, but then, so did the Cola, but didn’ Cola rot your teeth? Fruit would probably be more sticky too…
Mooch picked up some Popcorn, though was thinking of keeping that to himself.

As they got the stuff, Lucky himself was actually treating himself to more of the snacks. Taking some Liquorice Laces and slurping those up, and also spraying a can of whipped cream straight in to his muzzle.

They raid the Pantry more, before…
1543322222222222111211111122122.title: He uses his Body to break down the Door...

15433222222222221112111112.content:
Slinking his way from the Oak Tree, to the double doors of the Dearly Farm Barn, was the creature which Lucky knew as: Scorch!

Scorch is a Grey Ferret, which is like a Weasle, only worse. Scorch is also an animal of Cruella's, need one say more?

Lucky growls to Scorch, as it was most likely he was up to no good here!
Probably either spying on the Dearly's, for Cruella, or trying to see if he can get a bite out of Spot, a Chicken friend of Lucky.

Scorch hears Lucky growling and looks toward him. The ferret practically did a double take, seeing what shape Lucky was in, and began howling out a naslely laugh, at Lucky's predicament!

His laughter was immediately halted, when Lucky started barking and started charging towards Scorch, causing the ferret to scream and retreat in to the Barn.

Scorch was able to get a distance ahead of Lucky, cause Lucky's weight slowed him down a bit.
While it was amusing to watch Lucky waddle after him, Scorch knew that he needed a place to hide.

But where?
15433222222222221112111112.title: Scorch

choices: He reaches the top, to Scorch!
154332222222222211121111121.content:
"Come back here, Scorch!" Lucky barks, as he waddles closer to Scorch.

Scorch looks to a Ladder, which leads up to the Hay Loft, and an idea forms in the sneaky ferret's mind.
He quickly scurries his way up the ladder and when he got to the top, he peeped his head out, so that it can be visible to the black & white blob below!

Lucky himself was still searching the lower levels, of the Barn, for Scorch. He couldn' see him anywhere, though that is most likely cause he is hiding. It's not as though Scorch would just give his location away!

Suddenly, the noise of taunting ferret echoes in the air, causing Lucky to perk his ears and look up, seeing Scorch waving his front paws about, in the Hay Loft!

Lucky did have a feeling there was something not right about this, but Lucky knew that Scorch had just cornered himself up there!

Lucky approaches the ladder, and starts to climb it.
"You're Dog Meat, Scorch!" Lucky calls as he ascends, thoug his girth rubbed agains each step he set paw on!
His weight on the ladder caused a couple of creaks, with step he made, until...
154332222222222211121111121.title: The Hay Loft

1543322222222222111211111212.content:
SNAP!

One of the weaker steps on the ladder broke, just as Lucky placed his weight on it.

With a Yelp, Lucky fell from half way up, and landed with an impact so hard, the entire Barn felt it!
Fortunately, Lucky's girth cushioned the fall, at least it's good for something!

Scorch burst out with hysterical laughter, and leapt from the Hay Loft, bouncing on top of Lucky's belly (sticking up in the air), and ran out of the Barn, likely on his way back to Villa Devil.

Lucky struggled trying to get back on his legs, but they were so stubby in his shape, it was quite difficult.
As he struggles, Lucky proclaims; "Alright, That's it! No more stalling! This weight is going down, NOW!"

Should we follow Lucky's efforts, or see what Scorch is doing?
1543322222222222111211111212.title: The ladder breaks!

choices: Girth up the others in Lucky's group!
15433222222222221112111112122.content:
Scorch was still laughing, as he went through th ferret door of Villa Devil!

That Lucky Pup, and that group he hangs out with, are always getting in the way of his, or his Human's plans, and yet today, the lead of the group wound up being like an upturned turtle!

The thought of Lucky still like that made Scorch smirk more deviously than ever!

He then sprang an idea!
15433222222222221112111112122.title: Follow Scorch

154332222222222211121111121221.content:
It would probably be too difficult to get every Pup, in Lucky's Gang, as Plump as he was, and even then, that Rolly would probably be use to it!

Scorch remembered that one time, Cruella tried to take advantage of that addiction that Rolly had for gnawing shoes, so maybe he can adapt that?

And then, Scorch realises that Cruella could use this to her advantage too!
He could lure Lucky to Villa Devil, some how make him eat all the food in the place, and not only would Lucky be helpless blob, but Cruella could press charges agains the Dearly's, when she sees what Lucky has done!

Scorch gives a sinister grin, and gets to work setting his plan in to action!
154332222222222211121111121221.title: Make Lucky even Plumper!

1543322222222222111211111212212.content:
Back at the Dearly Farm, Cadpig & Rolly had found Lucky, and helped him back on his paws.
They saw that Lucky was now serious about dropping the weight, and agreed to help him as much as possible.

Cadpig provided a book, about weight loss; "Self Control A Day: How to Keep Obesity Away", while Rolly was giving his suggestions on how to keep his weight down.
Lucky found it ironic that Rolly was the Pup, of all Pups, giving this advice, but the support was appreciated.

"So, You got a plan for what you can do, Lucky?" Rolly asks, as Cadpig fits a sweat band (similar to Tri-Pod's), around Lucky's head. Lucky would have put it on himself, but his flab got in the way.
"As long as I can cut right to being back to my normal shape, I'll try anything!" Lucky answers, but thinks about it; "I feel like...running through the forest!"
"Okie Doke!" Rolly wags; "Let's get some lunch first!"
"Rolly!" Cadpig barks; "Your skill of failing to understand the situation is surpassed only by your appetite! If Lucky has more food, he may have a relapse!"
"Can we just get one Mouth full?" Rolly begs.
Cadpig snaps; "No!"

Lucky considers this, he did feel awfully hungry, but Cadpig was right, if he ate, he would be back to step one!

What does Lucky do?
1543322222222222111211111212212.title: Back to the Dearly Farm!

15433222222222221112111112122121.content:
"Cadpig is right, Rolly!" Lucky tells his Brother; "Sometimes a small bite can become a feast, and if there is one thing I do not want, it is to get obsessive! Now, let's do this, before Thunderbolt starts!"

"I'll...join you guys later..." Rolly starts to creep away "I just remembered that I got to...Help...Nanny with...Soap scents...or...Pie Baking!"
He takes off, in the direction of the Chow Tower.

"Tell me, that's not going to be what I'll become, is it?" Lucky asks down, to Cadpig.
"Relax!" Cadpig assures "When it comes to Dedly Sins, You're more Pride than Gluttony!"
"Okay, Okay! No would have worked!" Lucky glares slightly, but starts to waddle to the Forest, with Cadpig bouncing along side him.

Lucky does his best, when running through the forest, but his shape made it so that he ran, as fast as Cadpig could walk!
"Oh Man! Is this exhausting!" Lucky pants, as he runs.
"What are you talking about?" Cadpig asks "We've only gone less than twenty yards!"
Cadpig eyes Lucky, a bit, and suggests; "I'll run on a head, and I'll meet you at the Old Bridge!", she bounces ahead, and it isn' long before she is but a white spec, in the distance.

Lucky groans more, what he wouldn' give for something to eat or drink!
Maybe, if he took that Shortcut, through the woods, he could get to the Old Bridge quickly, and be back to the Farm, in no time!
No! He made a vow to drop this weight, and he is a Dalmatian who shall stick to any plan he makes!

What does Lucky do?
15433222222222221112111112122121.title: Start Exercise Now!

choices: Follow the source of the Scent!
154332222222222211121111121221211.content:
No! Lucky wanted to drop this weight, and you do not do that by trying to exercise as little as possible!
Besides, Cadpig was the one who showed him that Short Cut, so it's likely she'll be waiting there, If Lucky did try to take it!

It's like what Tri-Pod claims; "No Pain, No Gain!"
Lucky then realised, just how serious his condition is, if he's using Tri-Pod as a role model!

He continues to run more, with his stomach groaning with each yard he makes!

He stops to take a breather, as he does every hundred yards, but as his gasped for air, his nose twitched.
There was some kind of scent in the air, nothing like the forest green, or the mud of the path...it had a...juicy sense to it! Could it be what he thinks it is!?

But, Cadpig warns of temptation, and how the mind plays tricks when you're really hungry!
It's probably just a squirrel or raccoon...or maybe, a big juicy T-Bone Steak!
154332222222222211121111121221211.title: Take The Long Way...

choices: Take the risk and eat the steak.
1543322222222222111211111212212111.content:
Lucky knew that he had to resist temptation, but the scent was too good to miss out. It was because of this, Lucky had to at least find out what the source was. So Lucky decided to follow the scent.

He walks for a few secs looking around the forest to find out what that smell was coming from. After a bit of a walking (or waddling) he finally found the source. Turns out, it was a juicy T-Bone Steak. It was there just resting on a plate on the ground. It looked really tasty.

"It really is a T-Bone Steak." Lucky said to himself. "Just setting right here...on a plate...it the middle of the forest...where no one else is around."

Lucky saying that realized that all of this was JUST too good to be true. It HAD to be a trap. Lucky was smart enough to see that. He knew if Cadpig was here, she would tell him to ignore it. So that was what Lucky though he should do.

But then again, the steak look too delicious to pass. Even if a pup wasn't Rolly. Lucky had to either take the risk or just leave it.
1543322222222222111211111212212111.title: Follow the source of the Scent!

choices: A Trap Is Sprung To Catch Him!
Lucky notices a trail of Steaks!
15433222222222221112111112122121111.content:
Lucky decided to chance it!
All this exercise had made him hungry, and cause of this girth, his appetite had increased fourfold!

Besides, Lucky rationalism to take it was that he was owed a T-Bone Steak, after Swamp Rat got one, for Cadet of the Month, and besides; Finders Keepers, Losers Weepers!

Lucky dived to the steak and practically gulped all the juicy meat pieces down, within seconds, and it felt sooooo good!
His stomach seem to murr as Lucky ate more and more, until it was Lucky gnawing on the bone pieces of the steak.

As he was...
15433222222222221112111112122121111.title: Take the risk and eat the steak.

choices: A storage room filled with food.
154332222222222211121111121221211111.content:
The next thing you know, a giant net came from above and fell on Lucky. Lucky was now trap by the net and couldn't get out off it.

"Hey! What's the big idea?" Lucky shouted trying to get free. It was no use.

Then out of the bushes, Scorch came out and did some maniacal laughter.

"Scorch!!!" Lucky shouted. "So this is your doing."

Scorch nodded and say "Uh huh." in a weasel like matter.

"Grrrr....Let me go before I ring that big tail of yours under your neck." Lucky threated.

Ignoring what he said, Scorch still refuse to let Lucky go. He then took out a little red wagon and put Lucky on it. It was hard because Lucky was so....heavy, but he was able to do it. Scorch did several panting after that lifting. He then pull the wagon to take Lucky somewhere.

"Hey! Where are you taking me?" Lucky asked. "Let me go."

Scorch had no intention of letting the pup go. He had big plans for Lucky. BIG plans. Scorch toke Lucky to the DeVil Mansion and to....
154332222222222211121111121221211111.title: A Trap Is Sprung To Catch Him!

choices: Tempt Lucky to eat all of the Food, willingly?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112.content:
Scorch did struggle to pull the Wagon along, though he was once able to pull Cruella's Golf Cart, though he did have motivation of getting Spot there...them again, making Lucky even more helpless worked as motivation too.

Soon, he and Lucky reached a book case, to which Scorch pulled out a title about Ferrets, causing the book case to slide open.
Inside, Lucky's jaw dropped at the sight!

A LARGE hall, with a Gothic Church like style, was revealed, but as far as the eye can see, there was piles on mountains of food!
Steaks, Drum Sticks, Crackers, Kibble, If it was an eatable group, you would find it here!

"And, I thought Cruella's closet was huge!" Lucky eyes, he knew Scorch could have what ever he wanted to eat, but never something like this! It did make Lucky wonder why Scorch would try to eat Spot or take their Eggs, though it's most likely that Scorch liked a fresher taste.

Lucky struggles more, to get fre from the net, but to no avail!

Scorch walks towards one of the food piles, and takes a drum stick.
He looks to Lucky and gives a devious grin.

What does Scorch do?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112.title: A storage room filled with food.

choices: Gives In To Temptation And Eats!
15433222222222221112111112122121111122.content:
Scorch realised that, even if he did force feed Lucky, it would only encourage Lucky more to drop the weight. However, if he was some how able to make it so Lucky binged willingly, Lucky would be his own down fall, in a beautiful way!

Scorch approaches Lucky, with the Drum Stick, and holds it close to Lucky's nose.
The aroma of the stick entered Lucky's nostrils, with such a good scent, that it almost made Lucky give a dreamy expression, for a second.
Lucky shook his head from the trance, and tried to move his head away from the stick. This would be difficult, partly to his bulging neck, and partly to Scorch always was able to get in Lucky's muzzle.

The scent grows stronger, and Lucky's stomach growls more, as if it wants to reach out and grab the drum stick itself.

Lucky...
15433222222222221112111112122121111122.title: Tempt Lucky to eat all of the Food, willingly?

154332222222222211121111121221211111222.content:
Lucky couldn' take it! He had been starving himself all day, and one T-Bone didn' feel enough!

With a growl of the stomach, Lucky barks; "Give me that!", and bites the drum stick out of Scorch's paws, and began to gnaw on it! He gorged on it so fast, that it was just the bone in under eight seconds!

Scorch grinned and slicked around Lucky, pulling the net off him, and before Lucky could regain his senses, he ran from the room, waving and laughing, as he slammed the door behind him.

Lucky snapped from his taste buds, when he realised that he could now move from the net, and that it was just him, in a room filled with good, juicy food!

What does Lucky do?
154332222222222211121111121221211111222.title: Gives In To Temptation And Eats!

choices: He starts to eat that Pile!
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
Lucky starts to drol at the food about him, and he dives in to the nearest pile.

Within Minutes, he had devoured one of the large piles of meat, and it was starting to show, with his shape swelling an extra Rolly or two in Size!
Lucky didn' pay much attention to this, since he was too caught up in this food!

If this was the meat that Cruella gave Scorch, it was no wonder he always wanted more!

Lucky looks towards the next pile and approaches it, when...
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.title: Continue to Feast

choices: Cadpig tells Lucky what will happen...
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
As Lucky was next to the pile, the scent of the meat streaming in to his nose, his other sense, hearing, picked up something coming from the door.

"Huh?" Lucky looked towards the entrance, where sounds of click and grunting clucks echo in to the room. After some seconds, the door swings open, revealing Cadpig, standing on top of Rolly, with Spot's beak jammed in to the key hole of the door.

"Why am I always on the bottom?" Rolly looks up at Cadpig.
"Cause, according to architecture, the higher something is, the heavier the foundation needs to be! And, truthfully, you're not really the light weight among us!"
"Hey, I'm not as Fat as Lucky i-WOAH!" Rolly's head jolted up in surprise, seeing Lucky, causing Cadpig to be flung in to the wall behind him.

Spot also noticed this, once she had pulled her beak from the door, and walked up to Lucky; "Woah! You two weren' kidding, when you told about his new shape!"
She then realised what type of meat Lucky has about his muzzle, and fainted when she saw the pile of drum sticks next to him.

"Lucky!" Cadpig barks, running up to her Brother; "What are you doing!?"
"Dining Fine!" Lucky tells Cadpig, his barks a slightly deeper and gruffer tone; "I'm going to feast, like No Puppy has feasted before!"
"Oh, Papa! Can I join you!?" Rolly pants, but shrinks down again when he sees Cadpig glare to him.

"But, you were the one who vowed to drp this Weight!" Cadpig notes; "But, you've only gotten larger!"
"Well, Yeah..." Lucky nods, massasing his shape slightly; "But..."

"Do you realise what's going to happen, if you keep eating like this!?" Cadpig asks...
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.title: Cadpig, Rolly & Spot show up!

1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
“It was you, concerning about your health, that made you want to get back to Normal Shape!”

“It’s not that!” Lucky tells Cadpig; “It was when Scorch got me stuck on my back!”
Lucky eyes his shape and moves it slightly; “However, I think I can learn to adjust well to it! Rolly can handle it, so I can too!”
Rolly didn’ know if he should take that as a compliment, or not. Lucky continues.

“I though that this Weight would be nothing but bad for me, But my Luck has REALLY been getting better, since I first put on Weight! Must be cause my Horse Shoe is getting bigger, the more I eat!”

Spot, who had recently awoken from her panic induced faint, looked up; “Lucky, You Know as well as I do, you make your own Luck! Your Spots don’ have anything to do with it!”

“But, I am making my Luck!” Lucky insists “By gaining! Come on! Look at this! We’re surrounded by Food! What we struggle to get, with the Cadet of the Month, I can get whenever I want!” he grabs a T Bone Steak, from one of the piles and stuffs it while, in his Muzzle.
“Sounds good to me!” Lucky barks, muffled with the meat in his muzzle; “Don’ you think so too, Guys!?”

Rolly himself seems more and more convinced, the more Lucky barks.

But what about Cadpig?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.title: Lucky Stands For His Shape...

choices: A Future Of Eating Sounds Appealing…
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
“NO!” Cadpig snaps “Don’ you realise how this will affect you and everyone You Know!?”

Cadpig starts on what she predicts will happen; “If you keep eating like this, you’ll become an Eating Machine! You’ll consume an entire Chow Tower worth of Kibble in one sitting, and yet still feel a need to fill your bottomless yearn! Roger & Anita will be force to sell each and every one of us, just to keep up with the payments to feed you, before having to sell the entire Farm to Cruella, if she hasn' already sued them for it, from all you've consumed here today! But then, by this time, you’ll just be a Blob of your former self! Your brain set on auto pilot, and the only thing that your mind transmits is the need to keep moving your muzzle to Chow!”

Lucky imagines this, him with Girth the Size of the Dearly’s Puppy Bus (if not larger) slowly chewing and chewing as more food is brought to him by an exhausted looking Roger & Anita. Cadpig continues.

“You’ll become a laughing stock! Freak Shows would pity you! And then, when al but the Stars above are consumed, your metabolic system shall over load and your Body shall just explode!”

This imaginary explosion snaps Lucky from his imagine Spot and back to looking at Cadpig…
How does he take to this?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.title: Cadpig's Caution

choices: Escape Villa Devil With The Others?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
Lucky yelps at this, covering his paws with his ears; "GAH! Okay, Okay! I get the idea!"

"Good, Next time, tell me when you get hungry, and I'll tell you that again!" Cadpig seem to give a grn, but got back to focus; "We need to get you ot of here!"

"Why are you much easier on him eating, than you are me?" Rolly asks Cadpig.
"Cause, there's a higher probability that Lucky will listen to me about his shape, than you!" Cadpig answers.
"It is not Fat!" Rolly insists.

"The Door's Open!" Spot claims "Let's get back to the Farm, before Scorch or Cruella shows up!"

Lucky is about to follow, but he eyes at the food about him. He was nervou to even look at it, in case it causes him to become like what Cadpig claims it would, however it then makes Lucky think of the reason he got stuck here...Scorch!

Lucky growls at this, but an idea comes to mind...Something that would definately give Scorch a taste of his wn meat!

What does Lucky do?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.title: This Scares Lucky Straight!

choices: Make Him Think That Lucky Has Eaten The Food?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
"HEY GUYS!" Lucky barks, causing Cadpig, Rolly & Spot to skid to a halt and look back at him.

"Why are you hesitating, Lucky!?" Spot asks; "Cruella might catch us here!"
"You aren' needing another intervention, are you?" Cadpig asks.

"No!" Lucky grons; "I've got an idea! Scorch thought he could use my shape against me, right!?"

"Right...?" Cadpig slowly nods.
"Well, I think it's time we teach Scorch just how difficult it can be!"

"Woah, Papa! Are you thinking, what I think you are thinking?" Rolly's eyes widen.

"That's right!" Lucky grins "We're going to fatten up Scorch!"

"How we suppose to get him here, though!?" Spot asks "It's not like he'll just sit down and let us do that to him!"

"I have a plan!" Lucky wags his plump tail side.

How do they get Scorch?
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.title: Getting Even With Scorch!

choices: Scorch Has Pack On A Considerable Amount Of Weight!
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
Lucky took a look towards Spot, the chicken. She notice this and tilted her head; "What? WHAT!?" She squawks.

----

Scorch relaxes, stretch across his large purple cushion, in Cruella's Bed Room. It was only a matter of time, before Lucky has consume al of his Food Vault, and just think how he can taunt Lucky then!

Suddenly, he looks up and eyes to the entrance in the room. There stands that Chicken, who always hangs with those Dalmatians...or, as Scorch likes to call her; "Entree"!
She seem to be dress in what looks like tree leaf, around her waist area, and she seem to shake it about, like a Hawaiian Dancer!
Scorch grins deviously at this, licks his muzzle and starts to chase Spot.

Spot gives an anxious sounding cluck and races down the Hall, just staying ahed of Scorch by the tip of her tail feathers!
Scorch wasn' even paying attention to where he was chasing her, al he saw was his next meal, in front of him.

Suddenly, Spot stps, looks to Scorch and calls; "NOW!"

"Grab him!" Scorch suddenly felt a large force land on top of him, and pin him to the ground.
Scorch suddenly realise where he is! He is in the Food Vault!
In front of him, Spot smirks to him, as well as the Runt known as Cadpig, and the regularly Plump one; Rolly! But, where was Lucky?
Scorch then realise, the large, heavy object, that has him pinned...IS Lucky!

"Nice Work, Spot!" Lucky chuckles, as he looks down at the Ferret trapped under him.

"You think that can hold him?" Rolly asks.

"Well, if my Experiance with you, when you rll on top of me, in your slep, is anything to go by...Scorch shall be secure there, for quite some time!" Cadpig nods; "What we do now, Lucky?"

"We do what he plan for me!" Lucky smirks, almost as devious as Scorch; "Stuff Him!"

And so, for the next couple of minutes, the Dalmatians and Spot stuff any morsel of food, they can get their paws on, in to Scorch's Muzzle, with Cadpig moving Scorch's muzzle, so he can chw and Lucky rubbing him with his paw, so he can swllow.

Scorch was admittingl starting to feel stuff.

After some more minutes of feeding, the Dalmatians see...
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.title: Chasing Spots

choices: More Dalmatians, To Help With Feeding Scorch
1543322222222222111211111212212111112222.content:
The Dalmatians look at Scorch and see what shape, he is in.
While there is some gain, it only seems to have given Scorch a pot belly, at the most.

He then leans down to Cadpig, and whispers in to one of her large ears.
Her expression seems to lighten up, the more he whispers, before she gives Lucky a nod and bounces from the room.

"Where she going?" Spot asks Lucky, who grins confidently and tells the Chicken.
"Just wait and see!"

Lucky shfts his weight a bit, causing Scorch to cough and stick out his tounge.

Scorch's expression seem to react to the taste of these, it seem to taste pretty good to him, before his eyes suddenly widen and his body begins trembling.

The Ferret's cheeks seem to puff up, and noises of growling are heard as Lucky notices that Scorch's legs are starting to bulge.

1543322222222222111211112.content:
It was the next day and Lucky was up bright and early. Today he was gonna start his workout to lose that extra weight. After some stretching, Lucky walked outside the barn.

"Okay. Time to lose this belly." Lucky said to himself. "No more being rollier than Rolly."

Lucky was currently larger around the waist than Rolly. His belly was touching the ground and his legs were starting to gain pudge too. The same for his cheeks that were starting to look puffy. Puffiness aside, Lucky began his workout.

Lucky started running laps around the farm. He continue doing laps for.... five minutes. After that, he spend one hour laying down on the ground on his back. So the working out was a fail.

"*huff* *huff* How can I be so tired already?" Lucky said panting heavily. "Even Rolly doesn't get this tired."

As Lucky continue to lay down, his belly growled loudly. He was getting hungry.

"No. No eating. We are suppose to be on a diet." Lucky said to his belly. His belly didn't listen. "It doesn't even matter. We already missed breakfast."

Lucky then realized that he was talking to his stomach.

"Great. I'm talking to my belly as if I was Rolly." Lucky said. His belly then growled louder and louder. After that, he decided to give in.

"Fine." Lucky said getting back up. "Let's get something to eat."

Lucky decided to go get something to eat. He decides...

"Guess I'll get more of Pug's Military food." Lucky said. "I'll just have to be REALLY careful this time."

So Lucky went back to where he found the box of Pug's Military food. Lucky for Lucky, he found the box in the same place before. He open the box and toke one of the bags and quickly opened it.

"Okay. This time, I'll only eat a bit." Lucky said.

Lucky then ate one piece of kibble. But his stomach still growled for more. Lucky then ate two more pieces of kibbles. His belly still growled.

"Hungry STILL?!?" Lucky said getting peeved.

It seem like it was gonna take more than just a few pieces just to fill him up. Lucky decides to....

1543322222222222121.title: Rolly it is.

choices: Find a extra bag of kibble.
Finds some leftovers from their owners.
15433222222222221211.content:
It was a regular day in the farm. It was just about lunch time and all the pups were ready to eat. A certain chubby pup was already first in line of the kibble troth. Behind him was Lucky, Patch, Two Tone, and Cadpig. As well as the other 90 something pups. The thing is, that for every meal, Rolly is always first to be in line for the past couple of times. Rolly's belly was grumbling loudly.

"Is it time to eat yet?" Rolly said with a hungry belly.
"There he goes again." Lucky said.
"Well it is Rolly." Patch said.
"Hey. I'm a growing pup. I can't help that I eat a little more than the average pup." Rolly said.
"Little is a understatement." Cadpig said.

Then Nanny, the caretaker, came by with a wheel barrel and a few large bag of kibble the pups were yipping cause they were ready to eat.

"Now now dearies. Be patience." Nanny said. She then opened the bags and poured them down the troth. "Okay. Now help yourselves pups."

Now even waiting a second, the pups started gobbling away. Rolly was eat the most and pretty quickly too. The others didn't seem to fond of it.

"Hey easy Rolly." Lucky said. "We can't all eat as fast as you."
"It wouldn't kill you to eat slower." Two Tone said.
"You eat slow, you eat less." Rolly responed with kibble his mouth.
"It doesn't mean eat like a pig." Cadpig said. "Irony since I have PIG in my name."
"I always eat this way. No reason for me to change." Rolly said.

After a few minutes, all the kibble was gone. But Rolly stomach still growled.

"There goes my belly again. Any more kibble left?" Rolly asked.
"Dude, we just ate." Lucky said.
"Figures he's still hungry." Patch said.
"I can't help it. When the tummy growls, it wants food." Rolly responded.
"You really got to do something about that hunger of yours, Rolly." Cadpig said. "Plus the troth is empty anyway."
"So you're better off forgetting about it." Two Tone said.
"Yeah so let's just play." Lucky suggested.

Rolly belly continued to growl.

"You guys go ahead. I'm gonna see if I can get more food."
"Okay." Lucky said.
"Just try not to be 'you' too much." Patch said.

With that said, Lucky, Cadpig, Patch, and Two Tone left Rolly. Rolly was still hungry and wanted to have something for his starving belly. Rolly goes out to...
15433222222222221211.title: Rolly and his hunger trouble.

choices: Rolly decides to go to the pups.
154332222222222212111.content:
Using his high keen sense of smell, Rolly tried to find some more food for himself. While the time, his stomach also growled still.

"Don't worry, ol stomach of mine. I'll find some food for us." Rolly said to his stomach. "There has got to be something to eat."

Rolly continue to sniff more and more until he started to head to the storage barn wondering if there was food, he open the door and searched inside. Looking around he happen to find a big sack of dog kibble.

"Alright. Kibble!" Rolly said happily. "I don't think no one will mind if I get some."

The sack of kibble was at least 3 times his size. Clearly it was not meant for one pup alone. But you know how Rolly can be with his hunger.

Rolly tried to grab the sack, but fell on him. He was okay though. He then used his teeth to open the sack releasing a few piece of kibble.

"Just a few pieces of kibble..." Rolly said to himself.

He ate a few pieces. But then the few pieces turned into several. Then the next thing you know he started eat a meal's worth. But of course he wanted more. He gobbled down more and more pieces of kibble. He was eating about a third of the sack and it was started to show. His belly was starting to bloat up. After a few minutes, the sack was now empty. Rolly's belly was now larger and rounder.

"BUUUUUUURRRRRPPP!!!!!!! Rolly bleched "That was good."

Rolly rubbed his rounder belly and was satisfied. Being full now, Rolly decided to go out and join his family. It was harder for him to walk with his larger belly, but he got use to it.
154332222222222212111.title: Find a extra bag of kibble.

choices: Rolly stomach growls too much to listen to others.
1543322222222222121111.content:
Lucky and Cadpig, along with Two Tone, Patch, and Spot the chicken, were all playing catch with a red ball. They were also curious on whatever Rolly was doing.

"You guys think Rolly is okay?" Lucky asked them. "Shouldn't one of us keep an eye on him?"
"It's fine. It is Rolly after all." Patch said.
"You're right about that. That pups always thinking with his stomach first." Spot said.
"He was always on the big side." Two Tone said.
"You're not really on the "slim" side either." Cadpig stated.
"This coming from the one with "pig" in her name." Two Tone said to Cadpig.
"It's irony that's my name. Even though I'm the smallest pup here." Cadpig said.

While they were talking, they happen to hear a voice calling "OUT OFF THE WAY." The pups and Spot turn at the direction and see something round and white rolling at them. They all shouted for a second and got hit the white round ball. But it wasn't a ball. It was Rolly. Still fat from the kibble he ate.

"He...hey guys." Rolly responded.
"ROLLY!!!!!" Shouted everyone else.
"What happen to you?" Lucky asked.
"You look like you ate a whole sack of kibble." Spot stated.
"I.....actually did." Rolly admitted.
"Seriously?" Lucky and Cadpig said.
"Again. It's Rolly." Patch said. "And after him rolling at us, that adds up to the point."

While Rolly was still on his back on the ground, the others observed Rolly for a bit.

"Well you are defientily rounder now." Two Tone stated while pointing his belly. It was also kinda wobbly. "Squishy too."
"So maybe I overdid it a little." Rolly said.
"A little? Rolly, overdid it is an understatement." Cadpig said. "You are now overweight. You were already on the big side before."
