"Cadpig is right. You have to control that hunger of yours." Lucky said.

Rolly knew that his brother was right. So he had to at least try to listen to them.

"Okay...I'll...try my best to control this belly of mine." Rolly said while patting his belly.
"Good." Lucky and Cadpig said.
"Now...umm...can you guys help me up? Please?" Rolly said trying to get up and failing.

All the pups and Spot sighed and then tried to help him up. They knew that him with this extra weight was gonna make this a long day. Rolly agreed to try to control his hunger, but can he really control that stomach of his? It's a mystery. The next day....
1543322222222222121111.title: Rolly decides to go to the pups.

choices: Rolly continue to do constant snacking (ehh...eating).
Rolly still try to control himself.
15433222222222221211112.content:
It was morning and the pups just had breakfast. Rolly did his best to eat only an fair amount. Rolly was still pretty chubby from yesterday. Even if he ate an fair amount, he was still pretty hungry. It is Rolly after all. His stomach growled loudly.

"Come on stomach. We just ate breakfast." Rolly said to his stomach. It continues to grumble and growl. "We promised the others that we would control ourselves." His stomach growled even more. "I know breakfast was more of a light snack then what we usually eat, but we promised the others we wouldn't over do it. So come on." His stomach did not listen to him. It just growled louder and louder. It wouldn't stop until he gave in. "Alright! You win. I'll get something else." Rolly's stomach stopped growling after he said that. "Now, there has got to be something to eat."

With that said, Rolly decided to find something else to eat. There was no kibble left in the troth and their wasn't any extra bags in the farm storage this time. So the only place Rolly could get food was the kitchen in the house. He goes through the doggy door (a bit of a tight squeeze, but gets out) and goes into the kitchen. But he had to be sure no one was watching him. Most of the pups were outside and the other pups were watching Thunderbolt on TV. No ones was in the kitchen, so this was the perfect time to get something.

"Okay. The coast is clear." Rolly said to himself. So Rolly open the fridge and looked around to find some slices of meat, cheeses, and some other stuff. "Perfect stuff for a quick sandwich." Rolly said. He then grabbed some bread and placed a slice down. He then topped the sandwich with slices of ham, turkey, swiss cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, bacon, more ham, and then place the second slice of bread on top. With an olive and toothpick. The sandwich was as tall as he was. "This should be good enough." Rolly said while eyeing the sandwich.

With that said, Rolly picked up the sandwich and a quickly gulped it down. He did a small blech and then used to toothpick to get out the junk in his teeth. His belly extended a bit after eating the sandwich. "That should hold me off til lunch." Rolly said. His stomach didn't growl this time. So he was satisfied for now. But he had to make sure no one knew about his extra "snack". Rolly knew that he promised not to overdo it to the others, but it seems like his stomach was calling all the shots.
15433222222222221211112.title: The Stomach gets what it wants.

154332222222222212111121.content:
Even after the others told Rolly to control his hunger, he still didn't listen. For the next couple of days, Rolly continued sneaking in extra snacks during the days. Whether it was sneak eating more extra kibble while the others weren't looking, finding some unfinished scraps, or eating a turkey leg from the fridge, Rolly did it all. Each time he did slowly added up the pounds he was gaining. Rolly was getting more rolly by each passing day.

One day, Lucky, Cadpig, Patch, Two Tone, and Spot were all curious on Rolly.

"Do you guys wonder if Rolly is okay?" Lucky asked the others.
"He should be fine." Spot said. "But then again....."
"Knowing Rolly, he will let his hunger get to him." Patch said.
"Has he even did anthing to lose the weight?" Cadpig asked.
"Last time I saw him, he was still on the...large side." Lucky said. "Actually...now that I think about ir, I think he's put on a few more."
"Did he really?" Two Tone asked. " I haven't really got a look at him tor a while."
"Alright guys. Let's go find him." Lucky said.

The pups and Spot decided to find Rolly together. Rolly was currently finishing off a blueberry pie. The crumbs and pie filling were all over his face.

"Ugh...stomach, you are so bad." Rolly said to his stomach. "We were suppose to stop overeating. But look at us now." Currently Rolly's belly grow an extra inch from before. It was also getting hard for him to walk cause his belly would get in the way. Rolly thought he could rest, but some angry pups came by wanting to shout at him.

"ROLLY!!!!!!" Shouted Lucky, Cadpig, Spot, Patch, and Two Tone.
"WHAAAAA!!!!" Shouted a shocked Rolly. Then he looked at everyone. "Oh! Hey...guys."
"Don't 'hey' us." Lucky said. "You were doing extra eating again."
"What? No I wasn't." Rolly said nervously.
"No you won't? Then how do you, um, explain the EVIDENCE ON YOUR FACE?" Spot said to Rolly.

Rolly did still had pie in his face. So he quickly licked it all off.

"I...can explain." Rolly said trying to come up with something. Nothing came explain.
"You were still doing extra snacking, were you?" Lucky said.
"It was only the pie. I swear." Rolly said. It was a lie of course.

Cadpig went over to observe Rolly's belly size.

"Hmm...the diameter of your belly, definitely has increased." Cadpig said.
"Well that figures." Patch said.
"What have you been eating" Two Tone asked.
"Umm...just a sandwich. A tall sandwich. Extra kibble, leftovers, a turkey leg, half a pizza, rib tips, a ham, and...that pie." Rolly said.

Hearing all that, everyone else was stunned.

"We shouldn't be surprised. Yet we are." Spot said.
"I know I keep saying this, but it is Rolly." Patch said.
"Rolly! You have to do something to control yourself." Lucky said.
"I tried. But it's like my stomach has a mind of it's own." Rolly said.
"You have to work on your willpower, Rolly." Cadpig said. "Willpower is the best way to control yourself."
"You might want to start having that." Two Tone said to Rolly.
"Yeah. We are only looking out for you." Lucky said.
"I know." Rolly responded. "I'll try my best to control this belly."

Rolly then tried to get up, but his belly was too big to make him move easy. So he...once again rolled to move. Saying bye to the others before rolling away.

"Rolly is really letting himself go." Spot said.
"That stomach of his is going to get him in trouble." Two Tone said.
"That's why we need someone to look after him." Lucky said. "Make sure he doesn't get in trouble."
"So who then?" Patch asked.
"I was thinking...you Patch." Lucky said.
"Me? Why me?" Patch asked.
"Well you are tough, strong, and you do have a good eye...Patch." Lucky said.
"HAHAHAHAHA!!!!! Eye! Patch! Eye Patch! Hahaha!" Spot said laughing. The pups gave out a serious look at Spot. "Get it? Cause his name's Patch...and he has a good...eye." Spot started to feel awkward.
"Anyway...." Patch said ignoring the joke. "Don't you guys usually look out for him?"
"Knowing Cadpig, she will most likely give Rolly this spiritual talk making him want to eat more." Lucky said.
"So true." Two Tone said.
"Hey! I resent that." Cadpig said not liking the comments.
"Fine. I'll keep an eye on Rolly." Patch said. "Last thing we want is Rolly to be even more rolly polly."
"HAAAAAAAA!!!!!! Rolly! Polly!" Spot said laughing. "Get it. Cause his name is Rolly...and he's"
"We get it." The pups said not inpressed.

So pups decided that Patch had to watch over Rolly.
154332222222222212111121.title: Constant snacking or Constant eating?

choices: Be a good boy and use your willpower.
Listen to your stomach. Go for the kibble in the truck.
1543322222222222121111212.content:
During the next few day, Patch keep a close eye on Rolly to make sure he didn't try to sneak anymore extra eating. So far, he was still doing a good job. Rolly only ate when it was time to eat. Anytime he tried to sneak a snack, Patch would take it away from it. Rolly and his stomach weren't happy about it. But it was for his own good. He didn't gain any extra pounds, but his current weight lost: zero pounds. Rolly's legs still barerly touch the ground due to his belly lifting him a bit. Because of that, he had to roll to move. Patch had to help him lose some of the weight.

So at a part on the fields in the farm, he brought Rolly for some workout sess.

"Okay Roll. Time to lose the belly of yours." Patch said to Rolly.
"Uhhh...do I have to workout?" Rolly whined.
"You have to. You can barely walk like that." Patch said.
"I don't mind rolling. Rolly IS my name after all." Rolly said.
"Yeah. And not too long you almost rolled us over." Patch mentioned.
"Sorry about that." Rolly said.

At that moment, Rolly's belly grumbled. Patch heard it as well.

"Rolly......" Patch said with a look.
"I'm starving. I haven't ate anything in a while." Rolly said to Patch.
"Willpower bro. Willpower." Patch said. "Now. Try some pushups."

Pushups were..difficult for Rolly to do with his current state. Not that he was any good at them to begin with. He was huffing and puffing just trying to do one.

"Gh..aahhhahhh." Rolly grunted trying.
"This...isn't going to work." Patch stated. "You can stop now."

Rolly stopped and then layed on his back still panting.

"Huf...huff....hufff. That was hard." Rolly said. Patch just shook his head.

While Rolly was still panting and Patch was still watching him, a truck came by to the farm.

"Huh? What's with the truck?" Patch asked.
"Oh. That's the kibble delivery truck." Rolly said getting up. "It comes from the dog kibble factory every week to delivery the kibble for us."
"Really? A whole truck?" Asked Patch.
"Well there are 101 of us here in this farm. We need a lot of kibble." Rolly said.
"Make senses." Patch said.

Rolly's stomach growled loudly again.

"Easy belly. Willpower, remember?" Rolly said to his stomach. But as he sees the truck and hear his growling belly. A few things come to his mind. "Hmm.....I bet that truck has a lot of extra kibble." The idea of eating more made him drool. His stomach seem to really want to go for the kibble. But he knew Patch's was still watching him.

Rolly was feeling conflicted again. Should he still listen to Patch and not go for it. Or should he listen to his stomach and sneak in some kibble.
1543322222222222121111212.title: Keeping an eye on Rolly.

choices: Meanwhile with Rolly in the truck...
Meanwhile, Patch heads to the others...
15433222222222221211112122.content:
This was a once in a lifetime chance Rolly had to eat all the kibble he want. He couldn't say no to that even if he tried. So he decided to go for the truck. But he needed first to distract Patch. He had an idea that might work.

"Hey Patch?" Rolly said.
"What is it Rolly?" Patch asked.
"How come you wear a rope, instead of a collar like everyone else." Rolly asked.

(In the 101dalmatians series, Patch wears a rope around his neck. He's also a bit on the buff side. http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/Patch)

"Well I glad you asked that Rolly." Patch said looking a bit happy. "Remember when I would always rough with some of the other pups? See, when I still had a collar I...." Patch went on and on about stuff. When he was going on about the story he looked away from Rolly. Rolly felt that this was a perfect opportunity to head for the truck.
"Now's my chance." Rolly said to himself.

Rolly then rolled to the direction for the kibble truck. The two worker guys were currently grabbing the big sacks of kibble and brought them into the farm storage. Rolly had to wait a bit so he wouldn't get caught by them. One moment of waiting, the sack lifters weren't around the truck. So Rolly toke this as a perfect time to get to the back of the truck, where the kibble was. It was hard for him to get up on the truck.

"Gah!!!! This is so hard." Rolly said trying to get on the truck.

After one big pull, Rolly was finally able to make it inside the back of the truck. He panted a bit. But stopped to see a few sacks of kibble still on the truck. "Food! Thank the heavens." Rolly said. Rolly took no time opening one of the sacks and started eating away the contain inside. But what Rolly didn't is that the delivery workers were done with the delivery already and close the truck's back door. Rolly stopped eating when he heard a loud door slam. "Huh?" Rolly said with his mouth full of dog food. He then realized the door was closed. "Uh oh! I think I'm I'm going for a ride now." Since the delivery was the done, the truck was now heading back to the factory, with Rolly still in the truck.

While all of this was happening. Patch was still going on about is story and didn't know Rolly was gone. "So that's why I wear this rope now. Pretty good story, huh Rolly?" Patch said finishing his story. But after hearing no respones, he looked around finally realized Rolly was there. "Rolly? Rolly? Roll?" Patch started to have a panicked look on his face. "Oh man. Lucky and the others are so not gonna be happy about this."

So Patch freaks out about losing Rolly and Rolly was off to, who knows where exactly.
15433222222222221211112122.title: Going for the kibble in the truck.

154332222222222212111121222.content:
Patch lost is brother Rolly and didn't know he was a stoeaway on the dog kibble truck. To be precise, it was a Kanine Krunchies truck. Patch was currently freaking out. He tried searching all over the farm. But there was no Rolly to be found. Realizing this, the only Patch could do was tell the others.

Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot were currently all in the farmhouse watching TV. Patch had a really nervous look on his face. He didn't know what to say.

"Uhh....hey...guys." Patch said nervously. Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot turned around to Patch.
"Patch? Uhhh..." Cadpig said.
"Where's Rolly? Aren't you supposed to watch him?" Lucky said.
"See...here's the thing. I've kinda....lost them." Patch told them. The others freaked out after hearing that.
"You...LOST Rolly?!?!?" Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot shouted.
"How could you lose Rolly?" Cadpig said angrily.
"I turned my back on him for one second..." Patch said. "He just disappear."
"Where was he the last time you were with him?" Lucky asked.
"Okay. I was trying to get him to exercise to lose some of that weight of his." Patch said.
"That seems like a lost cause." Spot said.
"Anyway, I was telling him the story on why I wear this rope instead of a collar after the kibble truck came in and..."

When him mention kibble truck and Rolly, all of them were thinking the same thing and what had happened.

"You guys don't think...." Cadpig said.
"That Rolly would be crazy and hungry enough to..." Lucky said.
"Oh come on." Patch said. "Do you guys really think that Rolly would...."

Patch stopped talking while Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot gave him a look.

"It's Rolly!" Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot saided at the the same time. Patch started to sweat. Then he ran to where the truck was. Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot also ran and followed them. They went to where the truck was.

"This was where the truck was." Patch told them.
"It's already gone." Lucky said.
"And so is Rolly." Cadpig stated.

Lucky observed the ground and sawed the tire tracks

"Come on guys. We have to follow these tracks. They should lead us to the truck and Rolly." Lucky stated.
"Okay. Let's go." Spot said.
"I'm guessing you want me to come too?" Patch asked.
"Well you were the one to lose him." Cadpig said to Patch.
"Fine. But we better get a few more paws on deck." Patch said. "Odd are, we're gonna need help rolling him home."

The the others nods their heads agreeing. So they went to get a few more pups help. Meanwhile with Rolly in the truck, there were several empty sacks and one uberly fat Rolly. His belly was now four times it's last size. Rolly was just laying down rubbing his belly.

"BUUUUUURRRRRRPPPP!!!!!!!" Rolly bleched. "That has got to be the best meal I have had ever." It was defientily the most Rolly has eaten in on setting. Sure his belly was full....enough, but be was still wondering where he was heading. "I wonder where this truck is heading to now?"

After a couple minutes of driving, the truck stopped at....
154332222222222212111121222.title: Off to find Rolly.

choices: Rolly urges take over him and he goes into the factory.
1543322222222222121111212221.content:
The truck made a complete stop to the factory. Rolly was pretty off where the truck stopped at. "Huh. Seems likes the truck finally stop. Where I am now?" Rolly said to himself. Then something came up to his head. He just pretty much ate the truck remaining content. So he was almost 101 percent sure that the workers weren't not gonna be happy about it. "Uh no. I might be in trouble." Rolly said starting to panic even more.

With Rolly's current size, there was no way he could make a run for it. As Rolly worried even more he heard some voices coming from outside the truck. It was the workers.

"Hey! Looks like we are done for the day." Said one of the workers.
"Shouldn't we get the remaining bags from the truck?" Said the second worker.
"Nah. Just leave them. They ain't going nowhere." Said the first worker.
"Good point. My back is killing me after that last delivery." The second worker said. "Why did they wanted so many dog food?"
"They have 101 dogs over there." The first worker said. "Haven't you heard of them?"
"Oh yeah. The 101dalmatians!" The second worker said.

The two walked away from the truck, leaving Rolly safe for now.

"I think I'm finally safe." Rolly said taking a sigh of relief. He also decided to attempt to get up. His belly defientily was much more heavier now. His legs couldn't touch the ground anymore. "Ugh. I'm feel like such a pig. But it was worth it." Rolly said patting his bloated belly. " Might as well see where I am?"

Rolly got out of the truck by rolling at the door to get it opened. The door opened but he went falling down the ground. His belly cushioned his fall. So he was fine. He looked outside to see where he was. He found out he was in the Kanine Krunchies Factory. "Kanine...Krunchies...FACTORY!!!!!" Rolly shouted. "I'm actually in front of the Kanine Krunchies Factory." Right now, Rolly was feeling beyond joyful. His belly grumbled a bit. As if he was still hunger. "Wait? You actually want more?" Rolly said to his belly. "But was just ate three or five full sacks of krunchies already. We really shouldn't." Rolly belly continued to growl more and more still. "Aren't we big enough? We're already so big that walking regularly isn't possible now."

Yet again, all his stomach did was grumble and growled louder and louder. What's Rolly to do? It seems like he didn't have any willpower to control himself. He tried the best to control his eating habit and muster any willpower he had. In the end.....
1543322222222222121111212221.title: Rolly and the factory.

choices: Rolly takes a break and is too full.
15433222222222221211112122212.content:
Even after just finishing and the dog food in the truck and having a massive belly, Rolly's belly still hunger for more. Having treats from the actual factory was too big of an opportunity. So willpower was out of the window.

"How can't resist going into a factory filled with Kanine Krunchies?" Rolly said to himself. "I have to go in and have some. At least a bit."

Rolly's mind nad stomach were made up. So he rolled his way to the factory doors. Inside was several machines making pounds of Kanine Krunchies like clockwork. Seems like everything was automatic and there were barely any workers around. Which was a good thing for Rolly. He was currently looking at the machines and see all the kibble being made. His mouth began to water.

"So much kibble. I think I'm in Dog Heaven." Rolly said to himself. His belly growled a bit. "Just wait a little more o'stomach of mine."

Rolly didn't want to just randomly eat kibble off the converbelt. So he rolled a little bit more to the back of the factory. After rolling so often, he was starting to get a little on the queasy side. It happens when you have a semifull stomach. "Urk! It will be worth it. It will all be worth it." Rolly rolled until he found the kibble storage room. He sawed the huge door and the sign that said "Kanine Krunchies Storage room". "Hmm...this room seem interesting." Rolly opened the door and he finds the room filled to the brim with kibble. Rolly was in awe. "Woooooaahhh! The truck was an appetizer compared to this." Rolly said to himself. "Well time to dig in."

Rolly then dive into the kibble and starts eating away. As always, he enjoys each and every bite. He shouldn't still be hungry, but his stomach says otherwise as he continues to eat more and get bigger from it.
15433222222222221211112122212.title: Into the Factory

154332222222222212111121222121.content:
Rolly continues to gobble down more kibbles and his belly was expanding more and more. Not only his belly was getting rounder, but also his legs got thicker and his cheeks started looking more puffier. Rolly was enjoying eating the kibble, but he started to feel some pains in his stomach. He was getting full.

"I think....I...eaten enough." Rolly said with his mouth full. He shallowed the kibble in his mouth. "This kibble is always good. But now I think I'm full." Rolly rubbed his belly and sawed how big he was getting. "I don't think the others will be happy to see how big I gotten?" Even if there was plenty of kibble, Rolly felt that he ate his fill. But the growl of his belly says otherwise.

"Wh...what? You still want more?" Rolly said to his stomach. " I know there is still more. But I'm full enough. Not to mention, my size." Rolly's belly growled some more. Rolly looked at the kibble and starting to feel ill. "I really don't want to eat more. This is a bit much for even me." His stomach growled more and more. "Come on. We don't need anymore." His belly grumbled more and more still. "Why don't I have any willpower?"

Rolly knew the only way to get his belly to stop was to eat some more. So, that what he had to do. Rolly would continue to eat more and more of the kibble in the storage room.
154332222222222212111121222121.title: Rolly eats more and more.

1543322222222222121111212221211.content: An hour later Rolly ate...
1543322222222222121111212221211.title: One hour later....

1543322222222222121111212221212.content:
Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot, along with Patch, Two Tone, Tripod, Jewels, and Wizzer to help them find Rolly. They followed the truck tracks to the city. But they still had a way to go to get to the factory.

"Okay everyone. We need to find Rolly." Lucky said taking the lead.
"We wouldn't have to find him if someone would have kept an eye on him." Cadpig said not too happy with Patch.
"I said I was sorry." Patch said. "It's not my fault. I didn't think he could move as well the way he is now."
"Well, when it comes to food, anything could get him moving." Tripod said.
"You're right about that." Two Tone said laughing.
"I don't see why we all had to come." Wizzer said.
"Come on. Rolly is our brother too." Jewel said.
"By the look of the tracks, it seems like the truck is leading to the factory." Spot said.

Everyone stopped for a second.

"Rolly..." Lucky said with a freaked look on his face.
"Alone..." Cadpig said with the same look.
"In a factory..." Spot said with a freaked looked as well.
"With food?" Patch, Two Tone, Tripod, and Wizzer said freaked too.
"We better find him. FAST!!!!!" Lucky shouted.

The others nodded agreeing with Lucky. The five of them ran and ran tell they made it to the Kanine Krunchies Factory. They quickly when inside, but didn't see Rolly around.

"Looks like Rolly isn"t here." Tripod said.
"Let's keep looking." Jewels said.

Everyone looked around the factory for Rolly. Then Spot happen to hear some munching in a huge door.

"Uhh...guys? I think he's in here." Spot said.

Everyone came over to the door and opened it. When they opened it, they were stunned on what they saw. The room had several crumbs of kibbles on the floor and a massive white round blob. It was Rolly. He was HUGE! He was currently laying on his back. His legs were currently covered by his fat. He was at least the size of a small car. Rolly's belly was stuff to the brim.

"Ro....Ro......ROLLY!?!?!?!?!" Shouted everyone.
"Uh...hey...guys." Rolly said.
"What happened?" Cadpig asked.
"Like you really need to ask that. You can tell what happen just by looking at him." Tripod said.
"Looks like you had quite the buffet, ey Rolly?" Two Tone said.
"I'm sorry guys. I just don't have any willpower. My stomach just has a mind of it's own." Rolly said. "It just kept telling me to eat."
"That figures." Wizzer said.
"Rolly....what are we gonna do with you?" Jewels said.
"There is no way he can get back on his home." Tripod said.
"Better start pushing." Lucky said.

The pups and Spot got behind Rolly and started to push him.

"One....Two...Threeeeeeee......" They said as they pushed Rolly big round body.
"This...is gonna take a while." Patch said still pushing.
"Sorry...." Rolly said.

Everyone would continue to push Rolly. After a few hard pushing and Patch getting flattened at one point, they were able to take him home back on the farm.
1543322222222222121111212221212.title: The group of pups try to find Rolly.

15433222222222221211112122212121.content:
It's been a few days since Rolly's....uh...trip to the Kanine Krunchies Factory. Rolly's large size surprised everyone of the other pups. As well as Pongo and Perdita. He had to roll every single time he had to go somewhere. Be would often roll over on the other pups and flatten them by accident. It was because of this and his size, Pongo and Perdita said that he had to lose some of that extra weight.

Rolly was currently with Lucky and Patch. Rolly was complaining about being hungry.

"I'm starving!!!!!" Rolly shouted. "Can I get just a 'tiny' snack?"
"Like we said before, no." Lucky said.
"Yeah. You are on diet mode now, big guy." Patch said.
"Ugh! I hate this whole diet thing." Rolly said laying on the ground.
"Well you should have thought of that when went on your raid trip." Lucky said.
"How I am gonna lose all this weight? I can't even properly touch the ground." Rolly said in a fuss.
"Don't worry. We called some to help train you." Patch said.
"We're sure he will help you get back to your old self." Lucky said.
"Really? Who?" Rolly asked.

Lucky and Patch looked awkward for a bit, then looked at each other, then looked back at Rolly. Rolly's additude started to change.

"Who did you call?" Rolly said looking serious.
"We...kinda called...." Lucky said trying to stall.
"We told Lieutenant Pug." Patch said.

Rolly became silent for a second.

".....Lieutenant Pug? LIEUTENANT PUG?!?!?!?" Rolly shouted loudly.

Lieutenant Pug or LT Pug is the lieutenant of the Bark Brigade that trains cadets. He is also a bit of a drill dog. http://101dalmatians.wikia.com/wiki/Lieu...

So having him as a trainer wasn't gonna be fun for Rolly.

"I have to have Lieutenant Pug train me?" Rolly asked questioning it.
"Look. We all talked to everyone and he is the best guy to help you out." Lucky said.
"For all you know, it won't be too bad." Patch said.

Then the three pups heard a loud whistle.

"That's HIS whistle." Lucky said freaking out.
"Let's get out of here before he makes us run laps around the farm." Patch said just as freaked.

Just like that, Lucky and Patch ran off.

"He..Hey!!!! Don't leave me alone." Rolly pleaded.

Rolly then looked in front of him. There he was. The small dark green pug with a toothpick in his mouth and wearing aviator glasses. He looked around Rolly's body. He then put his paw in Rolly's belly and realized how jiggly and blobby he was. He then spits the toothpick and is about to say some thing.

"I must say cadet. In all my dog years, I have never seen pup who is more of a whale than a dog." Lieutenant Pug said.
"Hey! I'm no whale." Rolly said not to happy about Pug's comment.
"With the blubber on you, I seriously doubt that." Pug said poking his belly. "No matter. I here to put you in fighting shape Polly."
"It's Rolly." Rolly said telling him to say his name right.
"Rolly. Polly. Whatever. Cadet. It's time to start training." Pug said.
"So you can really get me back to my old weight?" Rolly asked.
"Old weight? I'll train you so hard, others won't recognize you." Pug said. "Now. Push ups. 100. Go!"

Rolly tried to do push ups, except for one problem. His paws didn't touch the ground due to that belly of his. So the push ups were more of belly ups.

"This is gonna take some work." Pug said.
15433222222222221211112122212121.title: Rolly's workout.

choices: A bit on the buffer side.
154332222222222212111121222121211.content:
It's been about 2 months ago since Rolly's training with Lieutenant Pug to lose all that weight. During the time, no one has really seen him in a while. Lucky, Cadpig and Spot just finish having lunch and started wondering where he's been.

"I haven't seen Rolly in a while." Lucky stated.
"Same for me." Cadpig said. "Not even during breakfast, lunch, or dinner."
"Lieutenant must be training him endlessly." Lucky said worried.
"Poor Rolly. But I hope he loses some of the weight." Cadpig said.
"I pretty sure he at least dropped a few pounds by now." Spot said.
"Let's just hope he did. I don't think anyone else wants to get rolled over and flattened by him again." Cadpig said.
"By that you mean, Patch, Freckles, Penny, Wizzer, Spot...." Lucky went on.
"I couldn't feel my spine for a week." Spot said.
"Dottie, Dipstick, Frizzly, oh...and me." Lucky said ticked when he mentioned himself.
"He really did a number on a few of us." Cadpig said. "But besides that, what has he been up to now?"

While the three of them wonder about Rolly, Lieutenant Pug showed up.

"ATTEEEEEENTION!!!!!!!" Shouted Pug.
"Waaaah! LIEUTENANT PUG!" Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot shouted surprised.
"At ease, cadets." Pug said.
"Where's Rolly?" Lucky asked.
"Is he okay?" Cadpig asked.
"You didn't kill him with all that training, did you?" Spot said.
"On the contrary, I put him in tip top shape." Pug said. "Now, look at the new and improved pup."

They turn around and looked at the direction that LT. Pug. They turned around and it was Rolly. But they were shocked to see him, be Rolly was now......
154332222222222212111121222121211.title: A couple of months later....

choices: Rolly runs into some of the other dalmatians.
1543322222222222121111212221212112.content:
Rolly showed himself and he wasn't his old self. He was now skinny. Like super skinny. There wasn't an ounch of fat around any part of his body. He had no potbelly and his face was no longer puffy looking. He was now a regular weight pup. This gave everyone a huge surprise.

"Hey guys!" Said the skinny Rolly.
"Ro...Ro.......Rolly?" Lucky said stunned. "Is that really you?"
"Yup. It's really me." Rolly said.
"Wow! You look really....really..." Cadpig said.
"Skinny?" Rolly replied. "I know."
"I was gonna say great, but skinny works too." Cadpig said.
"I never thought I would see the day that you would look like this." Spot said.
"Cadet Rolly here now is the proper weight for a pup his age." Lieutenant Pug said. "He's even a pound or two lighter than that. He's also lighter on his feet and faster. He's a real solider now."
"Well that's get and all but, how do YOU feel, Rolly?" Lucky asked.
"Great actually. I've...never felt better." Rolly said sounding a bit unsure.
"Rolly, you know nothing was wrong with you before." Cadpig said. "You were okay the way you were before."
"Yeah. But everyone was always calling me.....you know." Rolly said.
"Fat?" Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot said together.
"I wasn't fat." Rolly said not liking being called fat. "I was just....well-shaped."
"Yeah. Shaped like a circle." Spot whispered to Cadpig and Lucky.

The gang heard some ringing. It was the lunch bell.

"Time for lunch." Lucky said.
"Let's go." Cadpig said.
"Okay." Rolly said.
"Remember to control yourself, cadet." Pug said.
"Yes sir." Rolly responded.

So, Rolly, Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot head over to get some food. While going to the troth.....
1543322222222222121111212221212112.title: Skinny Rolly?!?!?

choices: Rolly does his best not to overeat.
The others pups start worrying about Rolly.
15433222222222221211112122212121121.content:
While walking to get some lunch, they happen to notice some of the pups. It was Patch, Two Tone, and Tripod.

"Hey guys!" Lucky said.
"Hey Lucky." Patch said. Then he happen to notice the skinny pup beside them. The same for Tripod and Two Tone. "Uhhhhhhhhh......."
"Who's the stud with you?" Two Tone said.
"This 'stud' just happens to be Rolly." Cadpig stated.

Patch, Two Tone, and Tripod looked at each other and them chuckled.

"Hahahah! No seriously. Who is he?" Tripod said still laughing.
"It really is me." Rolly responded.

Hearing that, everyone changed from laughing to being in total shock.

"Rolly? So it really is you?" Tripod said still surprised.

Tripod, Patch, and Two Tone got closer and observed Rolly some more.

"Wow Roll. You look....WOW!" Two Tone said still stunned.
"Yeah Rollser. We can barely tell it's you." Patch said.
"Well Lieutenant Pug made me look work out like crazy to look like this." Rolly said.
"Well we didn't expect you to be this thin." Tripod said.
"I don't even know if we should still call you Rolly." Patch said.
"I'm still Rolly. Just a little lighter now." Rolly replied. "Can we get lunch now?"
"That defientily something you would say." Lucky said.

So everyone went into the troth and got some kibble. Even Spot, who for reason like to eat dog kibble sometimes to get closer to the others. But the thing is when they were eating, Rolly only toke two gulps and that was it.

"Okay. I'm good." Rolly said.
"Huh. But you only had two bites." Lucky said.
"That's small even for you." Cadpig said. "Actually, that's small for any pup."
"I'm still trying to keep it light guys." Rolly said. "My willpower is much stronger now."
"But...aren't you still hungry." Spot asked.

Rolly stomach growled at that moment. He WAS still hungry.

"Just one a tiny bit more." Rolly replied.

By tiny, this time, he actually meant it. He only toke one more piece of kibble and ate that.

"Okay. That's enough." Rolly said.
"That was only like....one piece." Lucky said.
"Don't worry about it. I'll be fine." Rolly replied. "I'm going now."

Even though they was plently of kibble left, Rolly still left.

"That's all Rolly's gonna eat?" Spot said. "Even if he is skinny now, that's not like him at all."
"I'm starting to worry about him again." Cadpig said. "First it was about him overeating. Now I think he's under eating."
"We shouldn't say anything yet. But we should keep an eye on him." Lucky said.

Rolly may not be overeating. But under eating might be even worse. A few days later......
15433222222222221211112122212121121.title: Rolly runs into some of the other dalmatians.

choices: Decide that some of them should gain weight.
Makeba feast of food even Rolly couldn't resist.
154332222222222212111121222121211212.content:
For the next couple of days, Rolly still did under eating. Instead of overgoring like he usually would, he would only have a few bites of kibble a meal. Sometimes skipping a meal completely. Rolly was not acting like himself at all. Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot we really starting to worry about him.

"Guys, I'm really starting to worry about Rolly." Lucky said stated the obvious. "He's not like his old self at all."
"He's been eating lesser and lesser." Cadpig stated. "That can't be healthy for anyone."
"He's gotten so skinny I'm starting to see his ribcage." Spot said.
"This his gone long enough. We need to do something." Lucky said boldly.
"Should we talk to him about this?" Spot asked.
"At this point, I don't think he will listen to reason." Cadpig said.
"We got to think of something." Lucky said while rubbing his chin with his paw. "Cadpig, Spot, get a couple of pups to the barn. It's time for a meeting."

Cadpig and Spot agreed with Lucky and did what he said. A few minutes later, the barm had at least 30 of the pups in the barn. This included Patch, Two Tone, Tripod, Jewels, Dipstick, Wizzer, Penny, just to name a few. All of them were curious on what this was all about. Then Lucky went up to the front.

"Hello everyone. Thanks for coming." Lucky said to everyone.
"Why did you called all of us here Luck?" Patch asked.
"We have a bit of problem with Rolly." Lucky said.
"Rolly? Isn't he skinny now?" Tripod said.
"Yeah. So what the real problem?" Two Tone said.
"That IS the real problem." Lucky stated.
"Huh?" Said some of the pups.
"See, Rolly has not only been eating less, but skipping meals as well." Cadpig said.
"Skipping meal? Rolly? That doesn't sound like the Rolly we know." Patch said.
"That doesn't sound good. A pup still needs his protein." Tripod said.
"Exactly." Lucky said. "Spot, explain them what could happen."

Spot then came up to the front with some sketches and a stand. Starting with a sketch of a underweight Rolly.

"See, here's Rolly's current state. Slightly underweight. More than the average pup should be." Spot said pointing at the sketches with a stick. "If this keeps up, his body will suffer from lack of proper nutrition. Which can result in....." Spot than showed off more sketches of what could happen. "Weaken muscles, frail bones,.....even...."

The last sketch was a tombstone that said "Here's lies Rolly." Everyone gasped at the thought that it could happened to Rolly.

"OKAY! We can NOT let that happen to Rolly." Patch said.
"Thin or not, we need the old Rolly back." Jewels said.
"So, what should we do Lucky?" Two Tone asked.
"Like Jewels said, we need the old Rolly back." Lucky said. "But odd are, talking to him about it won't be easy."
"Then what should we do?" Cadpig asked.

Everyone thought deep about what they should do.
154332222222222212111121222121211212.title: Worried about Rolly.

choices: Lucky and the others find ways to gain weight.
Lucky and others gain a few and talk to Rolly.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121.content:
An idea came to Lucky's head. It was an interesting one. But it might work.

"How about some of us gain weight?" Lucky suggested.
"Huh?" Some of the pups said confused.
"I mean, think about it. Rolly was always one of the only ones on the heavy side." Lucky said. "Maybe that's one of the main reasons why he's made himself so skinny. But if there we a few more of us with his weight...."
"It might make him feel better about his weight." Cadpig said.
"So basically, you want us to gain weight....on purpose?" Patch asked.
"We only need a few of us. Enough of us to make him feel comfortable." Lucky said. "I'm willing to do it. Anyone else?"

The pups mumbled for a bit deciding what they should do?

"I'm in." Cadpig said volunteering. "Pig is already in my name anyway."
"I'm in too." Spot said.
"Okay. We still need a few more." Lucky said.
"Well it is my fault for not keeping an eye on him." Patch said. "So I guess I'm in too."
"Guess since I'm already on the slighty chubby side." Two Tone admitted. "Guess a few more pounds wouldn't hurt. Just as long as I can get back my girlish figure when this is over."
"I don't mind putting on a few either." Jewels said.
"I'm out." Tripod said. "With only three legs, I got to keep myself fit." Tripod then thought about things and then realized that there was an advantage to this whole thing. "Then again, if I gain some weight and later lose it, I might get stronger from it. Alright, I'm in too."
"Good to hear Tripod." Lucky said. "Okay. That should be enough of us. Remember, we're doing this for Rolly."

So Lucky, Cadpig, Spot, along with Patch, Tripod, Two Tone, and Jewels decided to all gain weight to try to get Rolly back to being Rolly. Meanwhile with Rolly, who was thin enough to see his ribcage, was by himself with a angry growling stomach.

"I know you're mad, but we can"t overdo anymore." Rolly said to his stomach. It growled really loudly. "I know. You're starving, but won't go food crazy again. I don't want to be fa....fa....slighty round anymore."

Rolly didn't seem to want to be his regular self anymore. But it wasn't healthy for him to keep not eating.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121.title: Decide that some of them should gain weight.

15433222222222221211112122212121121211.content:
The pups and...one chicken went to find ways to gain some weight. Lucky and Tripod went over to a troth and it was now full of kibble.

"That's an awful lot of kibble for just two pups." Tripod stated. "I mean we're not Rolly."
"Come on. We are doing this for him." Lucky said.
"But still...." Tripod said.
"Hmm....how about we make it a competition?" Lucky asked.
"I'm listening." Tripod said with a competitive smirk.

The thing about Tripod is that he is really competitive. Especially when it comes to challenging Lucky to anything.

"The pup who eats the most kibble wins." Lucky said.
"An eating competition, huh? You're on." Tripod said.

The two got into eating position by the troth.

"Ready....set....GO!" Rolly and Tripod said.

Both of them started eating the kibble. Lucky ate on one side and Tripod ate on the other. They ate quickly and fast. When the troth was half empty, both Lucky and Tripod's belly grew. They were gaining weight, but they seem more focus on beating the other. After a few, the troth was empty and the both pups have gain larger bellies. The two of them pretty much tied.

"BUUUUUURRRPPPP!!!!!!! I think we tied." Lucky said rubbing his belly.
"No way." Tripod said before belching. "I defientily won."

Lucky then pulled a level near the troth and more kibble went into the troth.

"Ready for round 2?" Lucky told Tripod.
"Still kinda full, but you're on." Tripod said.

While those two still compete with each other, elsewhere, Spot was carrying a wagon with some sacks of chicken feed. She toke one of the sacks and put it down to the ground.

"Okay. This some be enough to get started." Spot said.

She opened the sack with her beak and started pecking at the feed like a chicken would. A few at a time and really really slowly. Spot realized how slow the method was.

"This might take a while." Spot said.

Meanwhile, Patch and Jewels were inside the house going into the kitchen and heading to the fridge. The fridge was pretty huge and one can tell by looking at it, means it must have a lot of food.

"Wonder what's inside the fridge?" Patch asked Jewels.
"Probably a few things. Regular produce, some condiments, some meats." Jewels said.
"Let's find out, shall we?" Patch said.

Patch and Jewels opened the fridge and sawed the mother load. Sausages, ham, turkey, veggies and daily products, and other foods. Too much to keep track of.

"Woah!" Jewels said.
"Holy ground beef!" Patch said drooling.
"This should be a good amount of food to help us out. Right Patch?" Jewels asked Patch. Patch didn't responded. "Patch?"

Jewels turned around to see Patch already gobbling on a sausage.

"Patch!" Jewels shouted.
"What? I'm actually very hungry." Patch stated.

While Patch and Jewels were on their fridge, Two Tone took Cadpig to a secluded part of the farm, where a tree was.

"So uhhh.....why are we here, Two Tone?" Cadpig asked.
"You have to promise me you won't tell anyone what I'm about to show you." Two Tone said to Cadpig.
"Okay I won't." Cadpig said.

Two Tone open up this small door on the tree and opened up a secret compartment. Inside was several bags of snacks. Tons of them.

"Where did you get all of these snacks?" Cadpig asked.
"Save them. Sometimes I get a little greedy." Two Tone said.

Two Tone grabbed a bag of chips and started eating them.

"Well....help yourself Cadpig." Two Tone said.
"Oh. Okay." Cadpig said grabbing some jerky.

They started munching down on their snacks. So it seemed that each and everyone had their own ways of gain some weight.
15433222222222221211112122212121121211.title: Finding ways to gain weight.

154332222222222212111121222121211212112.content: after a solid week of constant eating, the are now....
154332222222222212111121222121211212112.title: A few days later.....

1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.content:
So it's been quite a few days for Lucky and the other pups. They have eaten quite a bit and....well....they're all gotten pretty fat. There were not even Rolly chubby. They were bigger and had huge bloated belly the size of beach balls. Currently, Lucky, Cadpig, Spot, Patch, Tripod, Two Tone, and Jewels were all down on the ground all with painful stomachaches.

"Gaaaahhhhh....." Groaned everyone.
"Stomach....so full...so much pain." Spot said.
"Ugh...now I know what a stuffed turkey feels like." Patch said. His stomach groaned more. "Actually...I ate a stuffed turkey." Hes stomach groans again. "Okay. Two."
"I ate too much ham and sausages." Jewels said.
"I feel like an actual pig now." Cadpig said.
"You are probably more than that." Two Tone said.
"Watch it, Two Ton!" Cadpig said to Two Tone.
"Two Ton?!?!?" Two Tone shouted not to happy. "I'm not nearly that heavy." Her stomach then groaned loudly. "But I feel like I might as well be. I had way to many snacks."
"Speak to my after having like six troths of kibble." Lucky said in pain.
"Seven troths." Tripod stated. "I still won the eating contests." Tripod's belly groaned even more. "Uggghhh....who's about who won when your stomach is in so much pain like this."
"Are you even sure this will work and Rolly will want to get back to his old self?" Spot asked.
"We have to try something." Lucky said. While he said that, Patch notice someone walking by. It was Rolly.
"Guess we are about to find out. Here he comes." Patch said.

Rolly was walking and his stomach growled more then ever. He was really hungry.

"Uggggghhhh!!!!! So hungry." Rolly said to himself. "But I don't want to end up big again."

While Rolly said that he looked at the group of bloated pups and chicken.

"Guys!?!?!" Rolly shouted. "Woah! Woah! Woah! What happen to guys?"
"Food. Just food." Spot said still down.
"We...wanted to gain a few pounds of weight." Lucky stated to Rolly.
"Wh...why would you do that?" Rolly asked.
"We wanted to make you more comfortable with your old self." Cadpig said trying to get up.
"You...want me to be back to my old self?" Rolly said with widen eyes.
"Yeah. We miss our rolly polly chubby pal." Spot said.
"So can you get back to your old self?" Jewels asked.
"Guys. I appreciate the gesture, but I don't want to be fa.....slight rounder anymore." Rolly stated.
"Rolly, listen." Tripod said getting up. "It's not healthy to starve yourself the way you are now."
"Who says I'm starving?" Rolly replied.

Rolly's belly then ratted him out by growling loudly.

"Your belly says otherwise." Two Tone said.
"Rolly, have you looked at yourself? You are starving yourself to the size of a twig." Patch said. "Keep this up, and you could...."
"I get your concerns, but I'm fine." Rolly said lying. "Now if you would excuse me...I am hungry so I get a quick snack. One dog treat should make me go for the rest of the day."

With that say, Rolly left the others.

"ONE dog treat?" Jewels said.
"Guess your plan didn't work." Tripod said Lucky.
"Sorry Luck." Patch said.
"We can't give up now." Lucky said. "We just need to push ourselves a little bit more."
"Uggggghhhhh......." Everyone esle shouted in protest.
"This better get Rolly back. I don't know how much my little stomach can take?" Cadpig said.
"Me neither." Two Tone said.
"Come on guys. For Rolly." Lucky said.
"For....Rolly..." The others said with lack of morale.

The other felt that they had to gain more weight to convice Rolly better. Even with their stomachs in pain. The same can be said for Rolly. But only his pain is hunger from starving himself.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.title: Stomach pains in two ways.

choices: Rolly ate a bit more again.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.content:
Rolly, who was still skinny as a rail still didn't want to return to his old self. But he could deny the fact that he was hungry. So he got a box of bone shaped treats and open it up. He toke one and slowly chomped on it. He then finished it off and close the box.

"There. That should be good." Rolly said to himself.

He then was about to walk off, but then tripped and shouted "Wooooooaaaahhhh!" He tripped because he was getting weaker muscles. It was like Spot said. Under eating has made him totally weak. To top it off, his stomach growled loudly for hunger.

"Ugh....I feel so weak." Rolly said to himself. "Guess I'm still hungry. But I can't eat more. I might overdo it again." Rolly belly still growled in protest. Rolly knew that he had to do something. "Maybe a few more...." Rolly then reopen the box and ate two more. "Maybe.....just a few more." Rolly than ate a couple more treats. Then next thing you know, he ate more and more of the treats. Before he knew it, he ate all the treats in the box. It was the most he has eaten in days.

"Gah! WHAT HAVE I DONE?" Shouted Rolly freaked out. "I didn't mean to eat that much. I mean, I felt better now...but still....." It wasn't like the box of treats made him gain anything, but he still ate more than he wanted to. "I need some water." Rolly said.

Rolly then head over to get some water. He went over to the water troth in the farm and drank a bit. Dranking the water made him feel more refresh. "Ah....that's so much bet....ter..." Rolly looked at the water and saw his reflection. It was the first time he got a good look at himself. He saw this super thin pups who's was beyond looking well. He notice how frail his face and leg bones look. Rolly didn't like what he sawed.

"Is....is that really me?" Rolly said looking at the reflection. "I knew I was getting skinnier, but I didn't know I was becoming this. I really am a twig." Rolly's stomach growled a bit. "What am I gonna do?"

Rolly was feeling conflicted. But he did realize that he could stay this way. So he at least needed to gain few pounds. But if he did that, he could risk overdoing it again. What to do? What to do?
1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.title: Rolly's Realization.

choices: Just go all out. You starve yourself enough.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.content:
It was the next day and Rolly still felt conflicted. More than ever. After looking at himself, he knew that it wasn't good to not eat. But at the same time, he didn't want to overdo it and become....surprisingly round again. Currently, Rolly was laying down thinking about everything.

"What do I do? What do I do?" Rolly said to himself. "Do I continue being skinny or...go back to being fa....slighty round again. Even the others gain some weight to make me feel better. I wonder how the others are doing right now?"

Meanwhile, Lucky, Cadpig, Spot, Patch, Tripod, Two Tone, and Jewels were still trying to gain more weight to convince Rolly. They were gobbling down some more junk food. Chips, cakes, pie, and a MASSIVE hoagie. Like a four foot tall hoagie that was 10 foot long.

"Come on guys. This is for Rolly." Lucky said taking a few bites of the hoagie. Everyone was eating something, but they weren't to happy about it.
"You keep saying that, but it doesn't make it easy." Cadpig said. "I feel that I'm gonna burst."
"I feel like that I should have burst days ago." Two Tone said.
"I just feel like I ate a hippo." Patch said.

The gang has gain quite a bit of weight since yesterday. Each gaining an extra inch or two then yesterday. Their bellies were overbloated to the size of jumbo beanbag chairs.

"Will this even really work?" Jewels said.
"Wasn't there some other way?" Tripod asked.
"We already made it this far. Might as well keep going." Lucky said. "Even I'm feeling pretty stuffed, but I'm still willing to push myself for Rolly. Come on guys."
"Fine...." The others said not too motivated.

While they continue to stuff themselves, Rolly still was hungry enough to eat something. So he went to the farm storage to get himself something.

"I have to eat something. I definitely don't want to starve to death." Rolly said. So he went into the storage and saw some sacks of kibble. SEVERAL....sacks of kibble. It seems that the Kanine Krunchies truck already came in today. This feels familiar. It's similar to the same thing that started all this. Only instead of one bag, there were many. Rolly felt that he was having an anxiety attack.

"So....so....so much kibble. Not again." Rolly responded. Then his belly growled louder than ever before. "Control yourself, Rolly. Control yourself. You don't want to overdo it again."

He slowly walked over to one of the bags and open it up. "Okay. Just enough to not be hungry anymore." He said. Rolly then started eating the kibble. Unlike the times he ate only a few, he actually at the average amount for a pup. But he was still, so he at more. As he ate, his skinny figure started to shape up. After a few minutes, the whole sack was eaten. Rolly has eaten a full sack of kibble again. Rolly wasn't as skinny as he was before, but he wasn't chubby or fat either. He was pretty much average pup weight now.

"What did I just do?!?" Rolly shouted. "I did it again. Eaten a whole sack of kibble." Why did I do that?" Rolly then looked at himself. "Then again, I don't look so boney anymore." Rolly said smiling. "Guess it wasn't so bad. I guess I should go now."

Rolly, feeling satisfied, wanted to leave. He ate a whole sack of kibble. He wasn't bone-skinny anymore. He should be good, right? But then, he heard this loud growling noise. A noise he is far to familiar with. It was his stomach again.

"No. Not again." Rolly said. "We just ate a whole sack of kibble. We should be fine." Rolly pleaded. But his stomach still growled loudly. "Not enough?"

Rolly then looked at the others sacks.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.title: Rolly is still feeling conflicted.

1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.content:
"Must....control....my....urges." Rolly said to himself. It was getting harder for him to control himself. But that was bound to happen since he has been starving himself for so long. It was like, part of him was telling him to stay skinny and not overdoing it. Yet part of him misses his former chubby self. He just didn"t know what to do. Willpower or Hunger urges? After thinking about it for a while, Rolly decided what he should do.

"You know what? I've been starving myself for weeks. Been cautious about my weight. Even doing whatever I can to stay skinny. So far, it has been the worst time in my life. Ever." Rolly said to himself. "Forget starving. I'm eating!!!!!!"

Rolly decided stay skinny was not worth it. So he ran to another sack and open it up and started eating more kibble. Instead of small bites, he was doing big chomps. He finish the sack and still wanted more. So he went to another. His belly started to have some added pudge. He then continue with his feasting. Meanwhile with the other pups, they were still stuff to the brim and feeling really bloated.

"Ughhh......this is the fullest I have ever felt in my life." Lucky said with groaning stomach.
"Can we stop now?" Cadpig said.
"Seriously. We'd stuffed ourselves so much, I feel that we stuffed ourselves more than Rolly did." Patch stated.
"This better be worth it." Tripod said. "I miss been active."
"None of us can even walk anymore." Two Tone stated. "We have to roll like Rolly."
"It is kinda fun rolling." Jewels said.
"Speaking of Rolly, where is he?" Spot asked.
"I haven't seen him since yesterday." Cadpig said.
"Maybe he actually went to eat something this time." Patch said.
"Better try to find him." Lucky said.

The pups and Spot walk.....I mean, rolled there way around the farm. They checked the troth, but no one or kibble was there.

"No kibble. So no one's here." Spot said.
"Well....might as well eat some more." Lucky said.
"LUCKY!!!!!!" Cadpig, Spot, Patch, Jewels, Two Tone and Tripod shouted not wanting to eat any more.
"It's for Rolly." Lucky said.
"You saying that doesn't make it easier." Cadpig stated.

Lucky pulled the level to the kibble dispenser, yet no kibble dropped down.

"Huh. Guess there's no kibble." Lucky said. Everyone else to a sigh of relief. "Guess we should check the farm's storage."
"Lucky dear, like we said, we don't want to eat anymore today." Two Tone said.
"We should at least look over there to see if Rolly is there. He was before." Lucky said.
"Okay...." Everyone else said.

So they went to the outside of farm storage. Before they went in, they heard a LOUD belch some the inside and felt some shaking.

"Wha....what was that?" Jewels said.
"A earthquake?" Spot said.
"I know that belch anywhere." Lucky said recognizing it.
"Do you think it was...." Cadpig said.
"Come on." Lucky said.

The gang opens the door and see a few empty sacks. Then they saw a pup with an abnormally large belly a bit smaller than theirs. It was Rolly. Once again, an overstuffed Rolly.

"Hey guys." Rolly said just laying the on the ground.
"Rolly!" Everyone else shouted.
"Your....your..." Lucky said.
"Slightly round again." Cadpig said.
"Let's cut the titles. I'm overly fat." Rolly admitted. "And you know what, I'm okay with it."
"But what about the whole 'willpower' thing?" Spot asked.
"I still do have willpower." Rolly said. "Look. I didn't all the sacks."

He was right. There were still plently of kibble sacks still left over.

"Seems like you still ate a lot." Tripod stated.
"I could say the same to all of you." Rolly said. "You guys look bigger than yesterday."
"That's because Lucky wanted us to do more eating." Spot said. "But it seems like it was unnecessary."
"Yeah. Seems like you are back to been your old self." Patch said.
"You are back to your old self, right?" Jewels asked.
"Uh huh. I may lose some of this weight I have now, but original round Rolly will be here to stay." Rolly said.

Everyone did some happy cheering that Rolly was back.

"So...does that mean we can stop overeating?" Cadpig asked.
"Yes." Rolly said.
"Good." Cadpig said.

Then everyone went down to the ground, groaning and rubbing their bellies.

"Thank goodness this is all over." Tripod said.
"Yeah. Good thing too. I couldn't eaten anything else if I wanted to." Lucky said.
"Earlier, you wanted to eat more." Patch shouted it like Lucky.
"It was fo Rolly. It was worth it." Lucky said. "I was being to strong one."
"I tell you what it wasn't worth? These stomachaches." Two Tone said before groaning some more.

The same for everyone else. There bellies were beyond the point of full.

"Don't worry. Stomachaches aren't the worst pain." Rolly stated. But he was stuffed too and his belly groaned as much as the others. "Forget what I said. It's definitely the worst pain ever."

Everyone just lay there on the ground for the rest of the day. Too full to do anything else. But everyone was happy that Rolly was back.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.title: Done starving.

1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.content:
The next day, things were getting back to normal. Rolly decided not to under eat, but also promised not to always overdo it. But it's Rolly, so that won't always be the case. Pongo and Perdy later found out about Rolly regaining some of his weight again. The same for Lucky, Cadpig, Patch, Jewels, Two Tone, and Tripod. They weren't too happy about the pups gaining all that huge amount of weight. That and they were all in trouble for taking food from the fridge and storage. Lucky told them that they did it so Rolly not be so skinny as he was and not under eat. Saying that lessen their punishment. However they still had to all weight. The same for Rolly. So this would be the second time for him. He wasn't too fond of the idea. Spot, didn't really get in trouble like the pups did, but she still wanted to lose the weight. She couldn't really get around with her big round body.

To lose all the weight they had to do some...extra training.....from Lieutenant Pug. The gang was all out in the fields wait for Pug to show up.

"I can't believe I have to lose all this weight...again." Rolly said complaining. "It was hard enough the first time."
"Look at the bright side. Your not alone this time." Cadpig said.
"We all need to lose the weight too." Lucky said. "But I'm not too happy about it myself."
"Speak for yourself." Spot said. "I missing flying short distances."
"I'm never gonna overeat again." Jewels said. "I ate waaaay too much food."
"Same from me." Two Tone said. "I want to go back to being Two Tone and not Two Ton."
"I don't really mind the extra weight." Patch admitted. "Once you get use to it, it's not so bad."
"I kinda want to get back to being skinny." Tripod said. "Like I said before, this would help me get a bit stronger. So for me, everything was leading to this."
"The problem is that we got to get train by.....Lieutenant Pug." Lucky said.

Everyone sighed of the idea of Lieutenant Pug training them ragged.

"I barely survive the first time." Rolly shouted indiscontent.
"Maybe it won't be so bad the second time." Cadpig said.

Then they heard a loud shout of the word "ATTEEEEEEENTION!!!!!!!!" from the distance. It was, none other than Lieutenant Pug. He had a very angry look in his face.

"LIEUTENANT PUG!!!!!" Everyone shouted in surprised.
"In all my dog years, I have never seen a more sorry lot of pup cadets in my life." Pug said. "You all look like you could be confused for beanbag chairs."
"Heeeeyyyyyy!!!" Everyone said not liking his insult.
"....and you. Cadet Polly. I thought I train you to know better." Pug said.
"Sorry sir. Skinny wasn't really me." Rolly said.
"Either way, I'm gonna train each and everyone of you pups and the chicken so hard that your tails will fall off." Pug said in his Lieutenant voice. Everyone else did a long sigh.
"Now, everyone drop and give me 2000 pushups." Pug said.
"2000?!?!?" Everyone shouted stunned.
"Did I stutter? Now do it, cadets!" Pug shouted.

Not wanting to make the Lieutenant any madder, they try to do the pushups. But again, it's a problem when you belly doesn't let you touch the ground. None of them were really able to do anything except grunt and bounce a bit.

"This.....is gonna take a while." Pug said before putting a paw into his face.
1543322222222222121111212221212112121122.title: All's well, doesn't alway end well.

1543322222222222122.content:
How about Cadpig, the female puppy?

http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/Cadpig
1543322222222222122.title: Cadpig.

15433222222222221221.content: Should Cadpig be tired of being small and get big instead.
15433222222222221221.title: Cadpig it is.

choices: Cadpig eats more food from the troth.
154332222222222212211.content:
It was a regular day in the farm. Cadpig was currently in the farm house watching TV by herself. She was watching one of those environment shows.

"It feels so nice to watch TV and not have to deal with the others craziness" Cadpig said to herself. Things were nice and quite....for three seconds. At that moment, Lucky, Rolly, Mooch, and a couple of other guy pups came over and pushed her from the TV.

"Come on. Thunderbolt's on!" Rolly said.
"I got it. I got it." Lucky said grabbing the remote and changing the channel.
"Hey! I was watching that." Cadpig said.
"Oh! Hey Cadpig!" Rolly said.
"We didn't see you there." Lucky said.
"Well now that you do. Change the channel back." Cadpig said. "I was watching something."
"Sorry runt. But we're watching our show now." Mooch said.
"Yeah! There is a new Thunderbolt episode." Lucky said. "You're welcome to watch with us."

Cadpig looked at the group and it was all boys. The big and tough boys mostly.

"I see this is gonna be one those guy things. I leave you guys to it." Cadpig said.
"Suit yourself runt." Mooch said.

Cadpig gave Mooch an angry stare and growl. Then she proceeded by walking out leaving the boys to watch TV. Cadpig was really angry. She didn't like Mooch calling her a runt. She also didn't like the fact that he was right. Cadpig was always the runt of the litter. Always being the smallest. She wasn't fond of it. She took her angry out by going to the troth and munching on some kibble.

"I can't believe those guys." Cadpig said angrily as she munches on the kibble. "Acting like they didn't see me. And that Mooch. Calling me a runt. I can't stand him. I can't stand being small."

As she eats more and more kibble. She hits a full point and stop. She then noticed that her belly was starting to stick out."Guess I overdid it a bit." Cadpig said to herself. "Better stop before I get too bi...." Then it hit her. Maybe the best thing to do was eat more and get bigger from it, she would be treated like the runt anymore. "Yes. That could work. Let's see how everyone is when I'm not so little."

So Cadpig decided to gain weight.
154332222222222212211.title: Can't spell Cadpig without "pig".

choices: She decided to wait until later, let her meal digest, not to risk bursting
She decided to finish ALL the kibble by herself, right now! She wanted to be BIG
1543322222222222122111.content:
Cadpig looked down at the troth, which was about halfway full. "Well, if I'm gonna do this, I guess I better start with what's already in front of me." She said, before digging in again- eating with a new aggressiveness, opening her mouth up as wide as she could and taking big gulps. She even reached into the troth sometimes, using both her forepaws at once to scoop in armfuls of kibble at a time.

Cadpig was able to choke down a pretty decent amount of what was left in the troth, but unfortunately, after a bit she had to pause. She was a very small pup, after all, and she'd been full even before she decided to actively try and stuff herself. So her stomach had gotten stretched taut awfully quickly, and she had to take a break.

Grunting and cringing in pain, Cadpig sat with her back against the troth and her hindpaws kicked out in front of her, groaning as she rubbed the painfully stuffed orb that was her belly. She also took this opportunity to look down at herself, and admire her handiwork.

She'd eaten a lot- her gut was distended significantly, protruding almost a whole foot from her body. It was visibly strained, the fur thinning a bit from being stretched so much, letting her skin appear slightly visible. The skin on her belly had a reddish tint, like it was stretched too far. Her belly was completely perfectly round like a ball and very firm, like a full bag of dog food. If she stood up straight, she would barely be able to get her paws to reach the ground, her belly being just a bit bigger than her tiny legs were long.

"Not bad, not bad at- ouch- all..." Cadpig remarked, cringing as she felt a pain from her overburdened gut. But thankfully, it quickly subsided. "It already looks like my belly's as big as I am...Geez...i really am tiny if this is all it took to double my weight..." She mused. She looked over her shoulder, checking to see how much food was left in the trout. She was surprised to see it was still a quarter full! That meant she'd only eaten half of what was in there! It made sense there was so much food, since that troth was supposed to feed all the puppies at once.

"I ate a quarter, there's a quarter left..." Cadpig thought out loud. She looked at her belly. "I'm already so full it hurts...and my skin looks really stretched... Maybe it'd be a really bad idea to keep eating...."

She kneaded her belly gingerly, using both her fingers on her front paws and her toes on her hindpaws to rub it, since it was big enough to reach both. "I'm double my original weight, isn't that already big enough?" She bit her lower lip, glancing over her shoulder at the kibble. "...though...imagine if I was triple my original weight...."

After carefully considering how much of a risk to her safety eating the rest of the kibble was, considering she already looked fit to burst- and comparing that to how much bigger she'd get to be, Cadpig finally made a decision....
1543322222222222122111.title: Cadpig eats more food from the troth.

choices: Uh oh- someone walks in on her passed out, in a vulnerable position!
Thankfully, she's able to sleep uninterrupted and wake up with it all digested
15433222222222221221112.content:
"Aaaahhh forget being safe- I wanna be big- ow-" Cadpig declared with a hearty, proud pat to her stuffed belly- the impact of which actually hurt a little. She took a deep breath, struggled to a standing position with her large taut strained belly pressing firmly on the ground- and psyched herself up for a moment before digging right back in.

It was hard for her- the more she ate the more it hurt, and she could feel her body trembling and giving in- but she just kept on telling herself- triple my size, triple my size- forcing herself to keep on shoveling more and more kibble into her maw. Even as her belly groaned, and swallowing got harder- she forced herself to gulp more down. Her eyes teared up a bit as she could actually hear her belly creak in a very concerning way, but she just kept shoving in armfuls of kibble with her shaking forelimbs- even as she felt her hind legs lose contact with the ground.

By the time she lapped up the very last lump of kibble, leaving the troth totally empty, Cadpig was wracked with intense burning physical agony. Her belly was absolutely enormous, at least- compared to her tiny body it was. Easily double the size it had been before, it was now impossible for her to reach the floor- instead helplessly pushing herself off the lip of the troth and just kinda falling to the ground pathetically, her belly rising above her as she panted like she just ran a marathon.

Her gut was as hard as a boulder, sticking out a bit more than twice the length of her little legs- the white fur was stretched thin amongst its massive surface area, which made the strained, irritated looking bright red skin visible, a gradient from a more healthy pink to red at the extreme bottom, with a bunch of angry stretch marks burning an even brighter red. Regardless- Cadpig felt amazing.

"I....did.....it...." She said, between heavy breaths, trying to touch her belly to rub it- wincing as she made contact and felt the sting of pain. "I'm....rrngg....amazing.... I'd like to see those....boys see me...now....ouch!" She cringed again, trying to catch her breath. "...ok....maybe not right now..." She admitted, realizing that- while big, for sure, she was too inflicted with crippling pain to be very impressive.

"Just wait....'til I....digest all this..." She said, snickering to herself- before wincing again, the laughter causing a sting of pain. "If I can eat all this...I can eat....anything....." She muttered, excited to imagine her next meal, how she'd choke it down all at once like the champion she was. She couldn't wait til she was sitting on the couch, all the kibble digested and distributed across her whole body, making her huge from head to toe! She'd scare off those boys for sure...

These thoughts ran through Cadpig's head, before a combination of physical exhaustion, food coma, and overwhelming pain caused her to black out, right there in the barn in front of the troth, steadily drooling as she lay slackjawed with a painfully engorged gut twice her size.
15433222222222221221112.title: She decided to finish ALL the kibble by herself

154332222222222212211122.content:
After being in a kibble coma for some time, Cadpig had finally opened up her eyes and woke up. She was still in the front of the barn troth, yet it seemed like she was twisting and turning in her sleep. Her big belly was close to suffering her. But she was okay as she got up.

Her belly still lifted her legs from the ground, but it was much softer now after digesting all that kibble. She pressed her belly with her front paw and realized how squishy it gotten.

"Wow. Looking at this belly, I must outweigh even Rolly now." Cadpig said to herself as presses on her belly.

It wasn't just her belly that had more. Her legs were a little bit of thicker and her face was even more chubby looking than Rolly's. She seemed pretty pleased with the extra weight she had put on.

"Look how big I have gotten." Cadpig said as she rubs her cheeks happily. "I would like to see Mooch call me puny now. Still, I feel I could be bigger."

As she said that, her stomach growled loudly. A sign that she her stomach was empty after digesting that kibble. She also now had room for much more food to cram into it.

Looking at the troth and kibble dispenser, she could always eat more kibble. Then again, she could always find some other food to eat around the farm. Cadpig decided to
154332222222222212211122.title: Thankfully, she's able to sleep uninterrupt...

1543322222222222122112.content:
Cadpig wanted to find someway to get bigger, but she had one problem with pigging out. She kinda had the stomach the size of a nickel. She got full too fast. So she needed to get some advice from an eating expert. She needed to talk to Rolly.

"I'm sure no one knows eating more than Rolly." Cadpig said to herself. "I'll go talk to him."

Rolly was still watching TV with the others. Cadpig went over and tap on Rolly's shoulder.

"Psst....Rolly!" Cadpig whispered to Rolly.
"Huh...what is it, Cadpig?" Rolly asked.
"Can I talk to you for a bit?" Cadpig said.
"But I still watching this." Rolly said.
"It will just be a moment." Cadpig said.
"Just talk to the shrimp already, tubby." Mooch responded.
"Who are you calling tubby?" Rolly said growling at Mooch.
"Rolly...." Cadpig said.
"Alright." Rolly said.

So the two went outside to talk for a bit.

"What did you wanted to talk about?" Rolly asked.
"First off, why are you hanging out with Mooch?" Cadpig asked.
"We're trying to get along with each other. We're still working on things." Rolly admitted.
"Okay. Anyway, I wanted to tell you about something." Cadpig said. "See I decided that I wanted to gain some weight to make myself a little bigger. But...I get full pretty easier."
"So you are going to me for some advice." Rolly said. "Seems like a way your are calling me fat, but I guess I can tell some things."

Some of the stuff Rolly told Cadpig including eating fast, constant snacking, among other things she could do. Cadpig listened to everyone she could tell her.

"Thanks for the tips." Cadpig said.
"Sure. Now I'm gonna head back inside now." Rolly said before running back inside to watch more TV with the others.
"Seems likes the best ways is to eat fast or eat constantly. Now, which should I try?" Cadpig thought.
1543322222222222122112.title: Advice from Rolly.
