154332222222222222222221222.title: Peg.

1543322222222222222222212221.content:
It's been a long day at work for Peg, and just wanted to rest for the evening. She sneaked slow in the house and dropped herself on to the couch still in her work clothes to get some shuteye hoping none will noticed her. "Peg, are you home? Get me some chips!" a loud voice coming form a recliner pointing to a large t.v..

         With a groan she yelled back, "Get it yourself!" "But Peggums," Pete whined, "I just got comfy, and the game just got good." She was hoping just for once he would not talk back, but she was too tired to care. She got up went into the kitchen grabbed one of the many bag of chips from the shelf and threw them at Pete hitting him in the head. "Thanks Peggums," he grumbled wile rubbing his head, "and can you make a bigger dinner today i'm extra hungry form work."

         She was now furious. "That no good, lazy, bottomless fat... ugh," she said under her breath unable to finish her sentence. She grabbed a bag of chips and began to eat it immediately. She then looked at herself and frowned. "All he wants is a trophy housewife, someone to just sit there looking pretty and cook for him," she thought wile grabbing a big handful of chips. "Well if that what he wants then that what he gets, a big, fat, housewife, and that will show him for being so selfish," she thought now stuffing her mouth with the chips.

         She began to make a large dinner this time more for herself then for Pete's sake. During her cooking she kept eating chip until it was all finished. That's when she realize she has eaten 4 bags of chips and was starting to fill full. "Peg, is dinner ready," yelled Pete form the living room. He always knew when dinner was ready. With that Peg's fullness was gone as it was began to be filed with anger. "Yes Petey," she answered as sweetly as she can trying to masked her anger.

         She called the kids to come for dinner wile trying to prevent Pete form eating before everyone came which made Peg more hungry. When everyone came P.J. and Pistol was surprise by the large dinner. "Woh mom, whats the occasion," P.J. asked wile taking his seat. "Oh nothing special, just felt like making more today," she lied.

         After saying grace everyone started piling on food on there plates as Peg was trying to match Pete plate food by food. If she wanted to intact her plan she need to eat like Pete. None payed attention to her, especially Pete, and that was a good thing this time around. She attempted to eat what she as put on her plate but found it quiet difficult to fallow. Pete made it look so easy to eat the way he did but she pushed on fulled by her anger.

         After an hour of eating everyone had there full. With distended bellies they all walking away from the dinning table to there respected rooms. Pete went to the recliner to watch a game while Peg still sat at the table rubbing her large ache stomach. Right now she was starting to regret her decisions until she looked at Pete siting in front of the T.V.. She then looked back at her stomach and smiled.
1543322222222222222222212221.title: A Large Peg

15433222222222222222222122211.content:
Its been 2 weeks since Peg started her plan and its been 2 week of always feeling full. It was hard the first week of eating, still feeling full even before the next meal. By the second week it became easier as she grew accustomed to the eating. She also began developing a habit of eating when she gets angry at Pete.

Also over the course of 2 weeks Pete began slowly distancing himself from Peg, even in the bedroom. On the plus side she started hanging out with Goofy more often. It started when she was so angry at Pete and all of the snacks was gone so she when to Goofy's house to vent some steam. After that they had tea almost everyday.

It was early in the morning as Peg was looking at herself in the full body in the bathroom. She was only wearing a frilly black bra and panties that was a bit too tight now. The first thing she notice was that her breast are now a couple cups bigger. Her stomach only had a little bit of fat, and her butt and waist was now much bigger, or at least bigger than usual. At least her face looked uninfected by her weight gain.

Peg then grabbed her pants of the rack and started to put it on. "Ugh," she groaned as was trying to get her pants up her now bigger rear. With a final pull she got her traditional white pants over her butt. She then got her pink sweater and put it on. It was much easier then her pants but it was starting to feel a bit more snugged then usual. "I need to buy bigger clothes," she thought.

"Hey Peg, when's breakfast," Pete bellowed from the bed.
"YOU GET IT WHEN I SAY SO," she yelled grabbing a big bag of chips off the counter top.
"Yes sweetie pumpkin," Pete said submissively.

She then stomped out of the bathroom and to the kitchen. She began making breakfast while stuffing herself with chips and even opened another without noticing. Over the past 2 weeks Peg has gotten better at making big meals quicker with help from the added butter making it tastes better.

"BREAKFAST IS READY," she yelled as she finished setting the table. The whole family came running down the stairs to the dinner room table. They started to pile food onto there plates and started eating. Peg made a quick look at her family before she began eating herself. Pete and P.J looked the same as before the increase in food. Pistol on the other hand had a distinct pot belly that started to stretch her clothes a bit.

After 30 minutes the school bus arrived. P.J. and Pistol jumped out of the table and kissed Peg good bye before heading to school. Soon after Pete got up with a lot burp grabbing his briefcase and headed to the door. With a quick good bye Peg was all alone at the table with still a bit of breakfast left. "He had been leaving more early to work the usually," she scowled at the door knowing perfectly well why.

This last week she also grew a new habit of having no leftovers. So she pulled all of the remaining food to her and started eating even if she still felt stuffed.

After another 30 minutes she finished the last of the breakfast, rubbing her big destined belly. She slowly got up groaning in pain and slowly walked to the couch and fell with a thud. She then drifted off to sleep while thinking about what she'll have for lunch.
15433222222222222222222122211.title: Keep going

154332222222222222222221222111.content:
"247," Peg said surprise but with a bit of joy while looking at the scale, or at lest tried to while pushing her now gigantic breast out of the way. She looked at herself one more time as she moved her hands across her body. Her face was a little bit softer but at first glance you wouldn't have noticed. Her breast on the other hand had grown considerably bigger, nearing the size of her head. A good portion of her new weight resigned there. Her stomach had only grown a little, now sporting a small pot belly. The waist was now wider then her shoulders making her butt so big that it had a small shelf. She now had an exaggerated hourglass shape, and she can't figure out if she should feel shock or existed about her body's development.

Peg dropped those thoughts as she looked at the clock. "Oh my it's almost 2, I'm running late," she said stepping off the scale. Wearing her traditional clothes, now bigger although still a bit tight, she walked out of her house. She can feel her body quake with every heavy step she made as she walked to her next door neighbor Goofy.

She rang the doorbell while making herself look presentable. Soon after Goofy open the door. "Well hello Peg come on in and make yourself comfortable," Goofy said as Peg walking unto the house. In front of her there was a coffee table with a large spread of snacks fill with chips and cookies. Peg walk to the couch and took a seat sinking in more then usual. Before Goofy could sit down near Peg she already had a plate full of goodies.

"How have you been Peg," Goofy said picking up his tea.
"Oh it's been a rough week Goofy. Pete have been a huge pain," she answered while eating a cookie.
"Oh it can't be that bad. Pete maybe going though a rough patch," he said trying to defend his best friend.
"He's been ignoring me all week. He barely speaks to me, he has been avoiding me, and he had not even kiss me in 3 weeks," she said angry now stuffing herself with more food, "I wondering if I'm still pretty." Although she knew perfectly well why. Goofy then place his hand on her arm trying to calm herself down. "Shucks Peg, your still as beautiful as ever and no one should tell you otherwise!"
"Thank you Goofy, you know exactly what I need to hear," she said as she grabbed his hand holding it tight looking into his eyes, "sometimes I wonder how things could have been." Goofy blushed removing his hand from her's "gawrsh Peg, I did not know you thought of me like that, but you was still dating Pete when I got married."
"I know," she now looking down, "Pete was much more carrying back then and I really thought he was the one." She then pick up her tea, "sometimes I thought about getting a divorce." Goofy spit his tea hearing what she said, "gawrsh Peg isn't that a bit extreme?"
"Maybe but I can't think of anything else that can get through his thick skull. The only reason I have not was for the sake of the kids and even that is starting to waver," she answered after eating one of the last cookies.
"How about I try talking to him. I'm his best friend after all, he'll listen to me," he said with a confidant smile. "Your sometimes to good for this world," Peg thought while drinking her tea.

After Goofy's conversation with Peg and Max returned from school he went to Pete's used car emporium. He walked into Pete's office to see him sitting at his desk. "Hiya Pete," Goofy said cheerfully. Pete looked up from his desk to Goofy.
"Oh hay Goof, what you doing here," Pete grumbled.
"Just want to asks you a couple things."
"Oh," Pete said more curiously, "what do you want."
"Well i was talking to Peg and she is feeling a bit neglected by you."
Pete frowned a bit looking at Goofy a bit peeved. Pete then got up and putting his arms around Goofy. "Look here Goofy, I'll be blunt, have you seen Peg as of late. She is getting a bit... you know... fat."
"Well yea, I guess Pete but I don't see what is so wrong about that?"
"Goof, what wrong is that she let herself go, lost her flare, no longer alluring. So I figured that if I spend some time away from her she might get the message."
"Don't you think that's a bit mean? Why don't you just talk to her?"
"Hahaha what do you think I am, a therapist."
"Well if your not going to talk to Peg about this then I will!"
Pete did not like this. "If you tell anything I just said I'll..." he paused as he got an idea. "Look Goofy I'll make you a deal, next month I'm going to take PJ on a road trip in the A/V , so if you keep quite what what I said abut Peg I'll take you kid too."
Goofy was taken aback about this and began to think about Pete's offer. Peg was really mad with Pete and more lying is not going to fix things. On the other hand Max would love to go with PJ and he would be disappointed of he found out he was invited only to be unable to go because of him.
"Fine Pete I won't tell Peg."
"That a boy Goof," Pete said as he slapped Goofy on the back, "Now go along and tell your boy the good news, and remember no telling Peg." As Goofy was walking out of Pete's office feeling defeated he has one last thought to give Pete. "You know what Pete, you're wrong about Peg, she's still as beautiful as ever," he declared as he walked out the door. Pete just grumbled at Goofy's remark and went back to his desk.
154332222222222222222221222111.title: One month later

1543322222222222222222212221111.content:
"WHAT DO YOU MEAN YOU'R GOING ON VACATION FOR THE SUMMER," Peg yelled at Pete. Peg and Pete was standing in the living room with Pete's luggage around hem.
"I decided that I need some time way from home and relax."
"And you don't tell me?!" As Peg's face was turning red.
"I didn't what you to worry about it," Pete lied as he looked at Peg from top to bottom. He could see how much she as grown these past months. Her face was starting to get rounder with a small double chin beginning to form. Her neck has also grown bigger too. Her breast would be the lust of any man at there size, as big as large watermelon, showing off a large cleavage through her too small pink sweater. Her arms was big and round while still being slender around her hands and wrists. Her belly was now a large potbelly, hanging shortly off her overly tight white pants. Her butt and waist so large that they can be her own wracking ball and starting getting to big for doorways. And her legs was surprisingly slender at the base of her feet, giving her an extreme hourglass figure.
"Worry?! Well I'll tell you what you should be worried about, you not going," Peg declared as she cross her arms under her breast.
"Peggums, I have been planning this trip for the last couple month now. Everything's already bought and planned for," Pete whined.
"Then tell me a good reason why I should let you go or so help me!"
"I'm taking both PJ and the Goof's boy with me," he said having a sly smile.

Peg didn't know what to say. Pete just guarantee his vacation. If it was just him she would immediately cancel all of his plans, but bringing the kids along was his insurance. "Why you slimy snake," she said as she stomp her foot. Then her grabbed Pete's shirt pulling him closer to her face, "you better make it thr best trip in the boys young lives and after you come back we are going to have a very long talk!" Pete pulled him self free and straighten himself, "well then we'll talk about you resent weight gain too and how you should get rid of it."
Peg just stood there with her mouth open in shock. She was about to blow when she heard PJ coming down the stairs behind her. "Hey dad, ready to go. Oh hey mom, sorry to hear that you couldn't make it." Pege quickly turned around with her best smile and hugged PJ. "Don't worry about that and just have a fun time with Max," hugging him tighter how speaking in a hush voice, "and if Pete does something shady, you tell me as soon as possible, ok."
"O-ok mom," PJ said feeling a little scared. Peg the gave PJ a big kiss on the cheek and saying good bye.
After sever minutes of packing up and saying good bye, Peg waited for the boys to be out of sight to stomped her way back to the house slamming the door behide her.
"AAAHH, that Pete is such a worm, using the boys at get his vacation," she fumed as she walked to the kitchen, "and telling me to loss weight HAH." She then she grabbed several boxes of butter from the fridge, "well then if he wants loss then he'll get gain!" She then tore into the first box of butter dropping 4 sticks of butter to the tabletop.
1543322222222222222222212221111.title: Next month

15433222222222222222222122211111.content:
It's been a couple hours since Pete's departure and Goofy was starting to get worry. Usually he was blissfully unaware sometimes of situation but he was not deaf. Hearing the commotion for his neighbors his knew that Peg was not happy, and recently when she was not happy she ate. So Goofy felt it was a good to check on Peg to see how she was doing.

He was in front of there door and gave a knock. He waited for a moment but got no response. He then checked to door handle to see that it was unlock, so he slowly opened the door walking cautiously into the house. As he enter his can hear noises from the kitchen. Fearing the worse he called out, "Peg are you alright?" All he got as a response was moans and grunts. He walked unto the kitchen feeling very nervous. Goofy was shock when he saw Peg.

There he saw Peg sitting on a chair that was clearly too small surround by emptied bags and boxes. She looked like she was in pain wile holding on a large bag of chips. She was slow eating wincing in pain every time she swallowed. Peg seemed to not notice that Goofy was standing in front of the kitchen with a shock expansion.

"Peg! What happen here?" He exclaimed as he ran to her side.

"Uuug, *munch* ," is all she said as she ate another handful of chips. Goofy took the bag of chips away from her.

"Ooh, give it back, I'm so angry right now," she said trying to reach for the chips.

"Oh no Peg, you had enough. Here, let me help you to a more comfortable spot." Goofy slowly began to lift Peg to her feet with great strain to Goofy, and slowly waddle her out of the kitchen to her couch. She plopped onto the couch with a loud crunch and a loud belch from Peg.

Goofy sat next to her as she rubbed her stomach moaning in pain. "Peg why do you do to yourself?"

"I'm just so tired of Pete's antics. Always selfish and not caring for this family, ouch. I just wanted to take something that he could no get beck on his own, oooh, my beauty."

"Oh Peg I already told you, your not ugly." He said rubbing her back

"I know Goofy but it's for him, but now I'm starting to loose control. For many years I have bottled my anger to him that now after releasing it I don't know if I can go back after this."

"Oh don't say that, with enough help you can do it!"

"No Goofy you don't understand it, it's not that I can't but I don't want to."

He looked surprise at her, "what do you mean Peg?"

"After doing this for this long I'm starting to like it. It feels good to realize every once in a wile, even if I over do it something," she chuckled as she rubbed her stomach. "But right now I still want to hurt Pete's ego."

Goofy sat there in silence processing what Peg just said. "Okay Peg, but allow me to help you. You can't do this alone without hurting yourself. And after this you will loss some of that weight, okay?"

"Oh thank you! You don't know what that means to me, and I promise after all this is over I will loss some of it," she exclaimed as she grabbed Goody into her breast for a hug.

Goofy then pulled away looking concerned, "what about Pistol? Won't she start to gain too."

"There will be some collateral damage, but don't worry too much, she's young. A little weight won't hurt."

15433222222222222222222212.title: Doughy Dolly

choices: After Dolly treks up the hill back home, she notices something right by her home
As she rests all the way at the bottom of the hill, Dolly notices something
154332222222222222222222121.content:
tka-tka-tka-tka-tka-tka-tka-tka-tka-tka

"C'mon....c'mon..."

Dolly muttered to herself, narrowing her eyes in focus, the sound of her skateboard's wheels clattering against the pavement filling the air around her. She kicked her left hindpaw off the ground a few times, attempting to speed herself up even more- not as if she needed to, she was careening down the sloped street faster and faster anyway, picking up more and more speed as she reached the sharp upward slope formed by the sheet of plywood she'd found, and placed over a cinderblock- building herself a remarkably unsafe makeshift ramp at the bottom of the hill.

A ramp which she hit like a train- the plywood snapping as she blew over it. But she was going so fast by then that she was well off of the ramp, soaring through the air. By the time it snapped.

Her eyes widened in amazement as she flew, ears flapping wildly in the wind as her skateboard tumbled loosely next to her. She let out a triumphant laugh, as the street shrunk further beneath her, she thrust her forepaws in the air excitedly, letting out a thrilled cry of sheer joy.

"WOOOOOHOOOOOOO-AUURGHK!"

Her reverie was cut off abruptly as she collided with a tree branch, the wind getting knocked clean out of her as it smacked her in the gut.

"Gyargh- grgkkh- oofh- frhhufg- gwah- yghh- hdjah- bluhgh- RRFH."

She let out a cacophony of pained exclamations, repeatedly cutting herself off as she tumbled down the tree, hitting a different body part against a different branch every other second, culminating in a rough groan as she fell the last few feet from the bottom branch, hitting the sidewalk hard. She lay there for a moment, silently cursing and clutching her torso, trying to catch her breath. Suddenly, she felt a painful stinging impact smack into her head.

"Ow! What the- Wha???" She said, her tone a mixture of disbelief and disappontiment as she picked up one snapped off half of her skateboard. Staring at it for a moment, stunned, she looked back up to the tree she'd landed in...and was promptly smacked directly in the face as the other half of her board fell out. "Agh! Gah- dangit!!!" She yelled again, clutching her face. After regaining her senses, she deflated, a sorrowful look spreading across her face as she picked up both halves of her skateboard, snapped clean in two. Her ears slumped down as she tried fitting then together like puzzle pieces. "No no no no- c'mon- c'mon..." She almost got it, but the moment she let go it fell apart again. She pouted at it, her eyes flicking from one half to the other, before slowly travelling over to the large hill she'd have to drag both halves back up, as her back, her legs, her head, and her...everything, still hurt like heck from the rough fall.

"....aaaawwww.........man...."
154332222222222222222222121.title: When life gives you lemons...I dunno, eat them.

"Sumo Doggy Kibble? I've never heard of them nor did I order anything from them, but anyway I better go rest up since I'm still hurting and whatnot." Dolly said as she opened the door and walked towards their own bedroom as she laid down on her bed as her brother Dylan walked by as he immediately noticed his sister was hurt as he immediately walked into their bedroom.

"Sis are you okay? Oh don't tell me you went and built that unsafe skateboard ramp, as I kept warning you not to build that unsafe skateboard ramp." Dylan said as he was worried about his sister.

choices: Dolly rushes home, excited about what she found
She decides to explore the place some more
154332222222222222222222122311.content:
"...ow....ow....ow...."

The soft grumbles and a repetitive wince of pain accompanied each individual limping step as Dolly ascended the hill, thank goodness she hadn't broken anything. She should've come up with some kind of plan for how she'd land after she jumped, but unfortunately she'd neglected to think that far ahead. There was no way she'd have been allowed to pull a stunt like that if she didn't sneak out and just do it, but it looks like all the warnings Dylan gave her about safety were right after all. Who knew.

She looked up wistfully at the air above her. God, it had been a fantastic jump though. In that moment before she hit the stupid tree she could've sworn she knew what it felt like to genuinely fly. She huffed in disappointment, examining the splintered halves of the skateboard she was carrying. It was a pretty bad break, not clean at all, jagged wood and bits of plastic. She wasn't sure she'd be able to glue it back together when she got home- she might even have to find a new one somehow. Where would she manage to get a new skateboard on the fly?

Suddenly, as she was finally on top of the hill, only about a block, block and a half, away from home- her nose twitched. She paused, perking up. She smelled something. Looking over to the other side of the road, she spotted a small group of human workers, loading some open-topped crates of what smelled like food into a little storage building, with a few shutter doors in front.

Dolly pricked up her ears, trying to listen to what they were saying.

"..chance that animals can get in through it?" One of them said to another. Dolly only caught the end of his sentence. The other human scratched his chin thoughtfully, before responding. "Hm...well, maybe. It'd have to be a pretty smart animal. But, so what if they can? This is surplus, it's gonna go to a compost heap or something, if a few animals wanna eat their fill, let 'em do it I say. It'll make someone's life a bit easier. Speakin' of easy lives, my wife was.." Dolly stopped listening at that point.

"A surplus huh?" Dolly muttered quietly to herself. "And there's a way for animals to get in. Well, smart animals... I'm a pretty smart animal..." Dolly quietly mused, forgetting about the stupid decision she just made that got her skateboard snapped. She watched the humans unload the last few crates of food, closing the shutter door behind it, and then drive off.

Dolly immediately ran across the street once they were gone, looking up at the storage space building. She scanned it for an entrance of some kind, before taking a few deep sniffs- and getting a whiff of the same scent from those crates. She followed the trail around the side of the building, to a little alleyway, where there was a door...a door with a clearly damaged lock, hanging loosely beneath the knob. Dolly stood on her hind legs, propping herself up against the wall, and bit on the handle- which pulled down with no resistance, the door swinging open. "Niiiice- free snacks!" Dolly grinned at the open doorway, before poking her head in.

It was like a supermarket in there! Well, a lot less clean and well kempt, but still! There were dozens and dozens of wide open bins lining the walls, forming little aisles- the place stretched back pretty far, meaning it was much bigger than it looked. Dolly hopped up and peered into one of the bins. It was full of hamburgers! Full hamburgers, half eaten, all kinds of toppings and stuff, all haphazardly tossed in and scattered around, falling off their buns and stuff. She looked in the next one and it was even more burgers! Unable to help herself, She stuck her head in- taking a big bite of one, it was still kinda warm! Then, after that, in the next bin were a buncha soft tacos! Or burritos- hard to tell since the tortillas had mostly flopped open, so it was just a mess of tortillas, beans, cheese, and ground meat, which Dolly promptly scooped up a mouthful of. She ran around, looking in all the bins. There was a bunch of melted ice cream with loose cones floating in it, which she lapped up like water- there were a bunch of slices of pizza, which she tore up and ate a whole one of. There was one filled entirely with buttery pasta, with nachos and all sorts of ingredients, hot dogs with every topping, popcorn and chips and pretzels, the gristly fatty cuts of steak. Dolly took a few heaping mouthfuls from every bin she looked in, pausing as she licked her lips, her slender, lean frame already showing a teeny bit of bloating around the midsection, as she licked her lips, eyes watering with joy.

"Oooohhh myy GOD! How long has THIS been here??? How'd we never notice it??? Is this even real- did I die when I hit that tree and go to heaven??" She said, to no one in particular. She looked up, her eyes catching a big ol' sign hanging above the shutter doors interior. "Expired Food Composting Center..." She read out loud. That gave her a moment's pause. She glanced at a nearby bin, filled to the brim with boneless buffalo wings, smothered in sauces.

Dolly gave the bin a suspicious sniff...

Followed by a hearty bite, scooping up more than seven wings at once, chewing them up, and swallowing- licking the sauce off her lips, smirking as she gave a satisfied pat to her now noticeably larger stomach, packed with illicitly acquired junk food, smirking and belching loudly.

"BBBRRRUUUUUUUURRRRRPPPP!!! Hehehehe- doesn't taste expired to me."
154332222222222222222222122311.title: Just across the street.
