1543322222222222222222221312.title: Delilah likes big dogs

15511.content:
What would make the most well trained of all the kings horses to lose his good shape?

http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/Maximus
15511.title: Maximus (The Horse)

155111.content: Is he aware of the changes his body is going through?
155111.title: He's spoild by fame.

choices: CUT TO Maximus ordering one of his massages
CUT TO Maximus ordering all the other horses to exercise
1551111.content:
After becoming a hero to the entire kingdom, Maximus became the leader of all the knights' and other horses. He was in charge of getting then ready for combat, but honestly, Maximus wasn't ready himself.

Once he was promoted, so was his caretaking. Every day, he would order himself a massage to make himself feel relaxed. Every day involved lots and lots of treats and goodies as everybody wanted to please the heroic horse. The love for him was shown with food.

Many fans of Maximus fed him all sorts of yummy things, and add that onto the kingly food he received as meals. Eventually, the food was starting to catch up to him.

Even though he was in charge of all the exercise drills, he never did it himself. That and the food resulted in quite the porky pony.

His white coat had far more to cover. Most noticeably, his stomach rounded out, hanging from his torso heavily. It hung almost as low as his knees! And it swayed and wobbled with every step he took. His cheeks were puffed up, giving him more of a "cute" demeanor rather than a tough one or a brave one. His thighs were extremely thick, and led up into his meaty, fatty hunches. And those led right into his rump. His rear end was larger than any horse, the two white, jiggly domes that made up his butt took up quite a lot of space in doorways and such. His neck was extremely thick, and he began developing a glob of neck fat that hung downwards from it, making his chin look like it had a rooster's waddle. And speaking of a waddle! His legs had thickened overall, and with his huge, blubbery belly in the way, he had to rock back and forth just to take a step forward.

Yep. He was a fat horse. But instead of being embarrassed when he realized his weight, he saw it as a sign of power. Large and in charge! And anyone who might've said otherwise would be forced to get out. He was in charge after all.
1551111.title: Yes.

choices: He tries to do an obstacle Course but has some difficulties.
His saddle doesn’t fit him anymore.
1551112.content:
Ever since the events that lead to him helping saving the kingdoms princess that was trapped by an evil witch while trying to catch a crooked thief Maximus, the horse to the captain of the guards, had been promoted to become the new captain of the guards.

What that meant was that he was supervising over all the kingdoms soldiers and horses, making sure that they were all in shape and that their equipment was of best quality. He made a system for patrols to walk around in the city at both daytime and nighttime to make sure that the streets was remaining safe for the town citizens. He inspected and tested all kind of new weapons that was made by the city blacksmiths to se if it was good enough for mass-producing. He even invented obstacle courses and fitness programs to make sure that everybody was in the best shape possible, both men and horses. When he was done it didn’t exist any soldier or horse that wasn’t in perfect shape, except for one. Him.

Being so busy doing all kinds of inspections, planning’s and approvals to do Maximus never got a chance to have time to do the same kind of training as his fellow horses, and that had the consequences of him becoming a bit more “unfit” then the others. Since all his work barley contained times of him moving from one place to the other Maximus body became very relaxed. The fact that the other things he did when not working was eating and sleeping didn’t help that much. When he eats his body didn’t move enough to be able to burn the extra calories it got, and when a workday was done he was usually so tired that he just went asleep without taking a chance to look at the changes his body was going through. He didn’t either wear any saddles or other horse cloths when working so he couldn’t feel how his growing body would have been making them tighter.

Even if he didn’t notice the changes of his body, everybody else did. All the soldiers and horses that where doing all their exercises and even the officers at the strategy meetings could see that Maximus wasn’t the same horse as before. To start with his neck was now much thicker and you could see a clear layer of fat making it bigger. His chest was puffing out and becoming wider by his weight. His legs while still being as thin and strong as of before, started to get absorbed by his fattening chest and belly. And speaking of his belly that was something. Like on all horses his belly was the number one sign that he was losing his shape. As is had gone from being one of his most thinnest and muscle filled area, to becoming big, round, and wide. Lastly every time he leaved a room everyone in it was greeted to his fatted up behind, that was like everything else bigger, wider, and full of fat.

While everybody very clearly noticing it they where all very afraid to tell Maximus about it. Being well known as the horse who legends tells about defeated a bandit gang of 20 persons all by himself made everybody afraid of what he would do to the one calling him fat. Even though he now looked like he could barley run a couple of yards before getting himself tired nobody wanted to take the risks.

But they didn’t have to worry because Maximus himself would very soon discover it on his own. What is it that makes Maximus finally realize what his body has become?

Maximus gets put into position as the new captain of the guards. His duties consist of inspecting every single soldier and horse is in top shape and their equipment is of good quality. Taking up so much time of his days Maximus doesn’t get time to keep himself in shape, but his new role doesn’t give him time to notice it either. Because of his men being a bit feared by their leader, no one dares to say anything to him about his weight. Until one day when something happens that makes it all sink in to him.

What was that?
1551112.title: Not knowing it yet.

choices: He gets into an accident, and can’t move for a long time.
A new younger, more fit horse shows up and takes Maximus job.
15511122.content:
A very important day for the kingdom was about to arrive. It was the day when the princess was rescued and reunited with her parents. To celebrate this there was going to be big parade throughout the whole city where Maximus and Eugene Rider (Previously known as Flynn Rider) where going to be the center of attention because of them both being the ones who rescued the princess in question. To reconstruct those wonderful events of that day both Eugene and Maximus was going to be dressed like they where a year ago.

For Eugene it was no problems getting dress in the same cloths he had been having for most of his life, the same couldn’t be said for Maximus. For almost the whole year Maximus had never been needed for patrolling duty and had there for never been anywhere near his old saddle. So when the day arrived everything started fine with Eugene helping Maximus to get dressed. He had no problems putting on his horseshoes and his bridles, but when they got to his saddle, things started to go wrong. After putting it on Eugene pulled the strap under Maximus belly and tried to fit one of the strap holes into the belt, only to find it being too small to reach even the nearest hole into it. “Looks like you have put on some weight since last time you wore this thing.” Eugene said and looked at the holes.

For Eugene this seemed like a smaller but soon fixed problem, but for Maximus this was a violent wakeup call. He had never once thought about his weight, and now he stood here and couldn’t get his own saddle on even if he tried to suck his stomach in. “I think I know a way to fix this problem.” Eugene said and pulled a small knife from his right boot. He took the strap and stabbed some new holes closer to the end of the strap. He then tried to put the saddle on again, and found it fit this time. “There. Look at yourself in the mirror Maximus, how do you think you look?”

Looking at himself Maximus felt miserable. He, who once was a hard working royal army horse in great shape, was now a big sack of lazy lard. He felt ashamed over what he had done to himself. But the most humiliating thing when he looked at his own reflection had to be the saddle with the extra holes. His saddle was a special designed handcrafted part of his outfit, by putting this extra holes Eugene had unintentionally ruined the thing. He couldn’t be mad at Eugene, he didn’t know it was a special made one. No, he only blamed himself for doing this on himself. Eugene didn’t seem to notice Maximus feeling bad about his own looks, and instead reminded him about what they where dressed up for.

“I don’t know what you think, but I think we are going to look awesome for the parade.” Hearing the P word made Maximus whole world chatter. He had been so taken by seeing his own body that he had forgot for a second what was about to happen. In only a few moments they where both going to be led through the city with everybody living there watching them. Almost everyone that he had ever met was going to be watching him, walking through the town, looking like this.

He felt scared, he felt ashamed, he felt he just wanted to run away and never see anyone ever again. But he knew that was impossible. There was royal guards guarding everything, and the only door out of this stable was guarded by two men. It felt like it all was some kind of nightmare for him, that if he only waited he was going to wake up, young and thin just like before. But he knew that wasn’t going to happen.

Just then the door opens and the two guards entered. “Okay Eugene and Maximus, we need you both to get into you’re positions.” “Okay.” Eugene said and jumped up on Maximus back. Maximus felt a little pain in his back, not because of Eugene’s weight but by the combination of Eugene’s weight and his added. One of the guards took in Maximus bridle and tried to lead him out. At first Maximus didn’t move because he didn’t want to show himself like this, but then he knew that making a scene here would only make things worse for him. So he decided to be a good horse and followed out. “Are you having stage fright buddy?” Eugene whispered into Maximus ear, “Don’t worry, it won’t be that bad.”

But that’s just what it was going to be for him. Had he not known about his new looks he would have wondered why people would look at him so strangely, but now he knew just what every single stare meant. As the parade started and he started to do his walk thought the town, all of his worst nightmares came through. He could she the look of people wondering the same things as he had. “What had happen to this great hero horse that saved our princess? Why had he let himself go so badly? He’s just a big fat shadow of his former self.” Some people didn’t want to have eye contact with him, and some just wanted to point finger and laugh at him.

As the parade continues Maximus could see some of the solders and horses he had been training staring at him. Thinking back he could remember them staring at him in just the same way months before this event. “Why couldn’t I have seen that before?” Maximus though. Like that wasn’t bad enough he could feel himself starting to sweat. “Am I sweating?!” he though, “I haven’t done anything but walking calmly this whole time. Am I really in such bad shape that walking for more then a half-hour is too much for me?”

At the end of the parade both Eugene and Maximus was suppose be greeted by the princess herself and her parents. “If there is any kind of comfort to this it is that most of those I’m working for have seen me like this in a long time.” Maximus though. But all that would change now as the princess hadn’t been meeting her heroic horse in almost the whole year, and didn’t know the changes he had gone through. As they arrived Eugene jumped of Maximus, and bowed down to the royal family. Maximus did the same thing, even though his body made it hard. The princess then walked up to Eugene, put a sword on each of his shoulders, and knighted him before telling him that he could stand up again. She then walked over to Maximus to do the same, and first then noticed his enlarged figure. Before knighting him she walked up close to him and whispered “Have you gone and gained some weight since when we last saw each other?” while patting on his belly a little. This felt like the most embarrassing moment yet for him as even thought the princess didn’t meant to do anything wrong, it still felt like her way of saying “Look at how fat he is.” Never could he imagine that being knighted would be so awful.

When everything was set and done Maximus still felt like he had been fooling everyone. That he had been just been given a title he didn’t deserved. What was he going to do to make these bad feelings disappear? There was only one obvious answer. To get back into the same shape as before. “I’m not going to stop before I’m as strong and thin as I was before becoming a hero!” Maximus thought to himself.

But fate would have it that something would happen soon that would make Maximus goal of getting his glory days back stopped.

What?
15511122.title: The walk of shame

155111221.content:
As he gets out of the stable Maximus was very determined to figure out a plan to lose his weight that would match his tight schedule that he didn’t notice a big stack of barrels that was bound together got loose, and started rolling towards him. He didn’t manage to do anything more then to pick up the sounds of it and see the barrels before they where all over him. His fat form got knocked over by the first one, and then started to roll down the street with the rest of them. He finally hit a wall and stopped, but when he tried to get up he felt a horrible pain enter one of his legs, making it impossible for him to stand up. Very quickly people started to rush to help him, including his former rider and former captain of the guards. “Maximus, are you hurt?” Maximus answered by pointing one of his hooves to the one that was hurting. The captain took and felt on it and Maximus started to make sounds of pain. “Oh dear god, I think you may have broken you’re leg!”

Maximus was brought into the stable again laid down carefully on the hay covered floor by a bunch of strong city men that had carried him in. As he laid there trying to make the pain feel less, the captain had brought in a veterinarian to help take a closer look, and maybe tell them that the captain was wrong about Maximus leg. But sadly after doing some examinations on all of Maximus legs the vet gave the sad news that Maximus indeed had one broken leg. “The only thing I think we can do now is to put down this horse, and end its suffering.” He said. The captain wouldn’t have any of this and told the vet aggressive, “Listen! I don’t think you know what kind of horse you’re talking about right now. That is Maximus, and he’s no ordinary horse. He’s the great hero horse who just moments earlier was honored in a parade for saving our kingdom’s princess. There will only one horse like him ever, and I’m not going to end his life unless there isn't another way.” “I’m sorry,” The vet said, “But it’s not as easy like when this kind of thing happens to a human. Just like a human a horse would have to keep itself still while being bandaged, and not let any weight rest onto its broken leg. A horse simply can’t do that. They will not understand what they need to do to get healed again.” “Maximus is much smarter than any other horse you ever seen vet.” The captain said, “If you just tell him what to do to get his leg fixed, he will do it.” “I don’t think you understand reality, he’s…” The vet was saying before being interrupted by the captain. “Please, at least try.” The captain begged. After thinking for a moment the vet sighed and said, “Fine. If you really think this horse is smart enough to understand it, I will try to fix him.” “Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you!” The captain said and hugged the veterinarian. “You have no idea how much this means to me.” He said.

Getting out of the captains grip the vet walked back to Maximus, who was still laying on his back trying to find a good position for his broken leg. “Listen here Maximus.” The vet said, making Maximus turn his head to him and listen. “What I can try to do to fix your leg is to put it in a cast and bound some sticks around it to keep it straight. But to make it have some effect it requires you to keep yourself lying still on the floor, and not try to make any attempt to walk or even stand up. Doing that would very easy break the support that will be around your leg, and could even make the damage even worse. Do you understand?” Maximus answered by nodding his head. “Good. Then I shall do my best to try and fix your leg.”

After a hard work period of keeping Maximus leg straight and putting the cast on, the vet looked Maximus in the eyes and said. “After getting a closer look at your leg and getting the cast on, I would say that you would have to lay here now and avoid movement for about…
155111221.title: A life treating problem.

choices: A whole month later. (The end of the broken leg.)
1551112212.content:
“Two months.” The vet said.

Maximus couldn’t believe what he was hearing. He was going to just let his already unfit body to do nothing else but lazing around for two months while his bad leg was slowly getting fixed. Seeing the horse’s face expression the vet asked if he understood the importance of doing what he was told if he was ever going to be able to walk again. Maximus once again gave him the same kind nod that he gave earlier, only this time the horse had to really force himself to understand the painful truth of it. It was eider to do this or to be put down forever. But understanding that once those two months where gone and he could start to train his body then, Maximus agreed to have himself in a constant rest for this time period. Two months didn’t seem like that hard of a time to endure.

But he would be so wrong. The first few days didn’t seem that bad. He was getting his leg put up nicely with pillows and blankets, he was being generously feed by both his feeder and other persons who wanted to share their chare towards him, and his original owner the former captain was constantly by his side to give his support. But as time went on his friend had to go back on duty and his visits became less and less frequent. The people who liked to share to him became less and less frequent as well, being not so rich they only seemed to share something to him once and then never again. Only rarely did he see the face of someone visiting him twice. Even the guy who was put in feeding him on regular pace had other horses to work with and once he was done feeding Maximus he was gone.

Another bad thing about all this care he got was that it made his belly become even bigger then it already was. Even when the number of people feeding him started to decrease Maximus lack of movement made his gaining inevitable. Being forced to lie on his back during this whole period made it impossible for Maximus to not stare right at his own fatted middle. It was very slow process, but when there was almost nothing else to do for Maximus then to look at his own bulking center it was almost possible for him to actually see the gaining happening with his own eyes. Seeing it rise and become even bigger as the days went on. It was driving him crazy.

After getting through one month of it Maximus was really starting to feel the hope of him getting back his once slim figure again fading. He had through his own eyes seen how his stomach had at a slow but steady pace been stretching out in all kind of ways. It had gone so far that he actually started to lose some of his vision because of it, but that could as well be his fattening neck and chins that was stopping him from reaching his head up as much as before. Having him lying like this pinned on his back was getting more and more humiliating by the day. The few people that were visiting him now all had the same look of fascination when they saw him laying there on the floor. They had probably never seen a horse with such a big stomach before, or maybe it was because he was in such a position that he was exposing his stomach so gracefully to everybody watching. Even his owner started to look a bit ashamed of letting people know that this was his horse.

Looking at his own belly fat Maximus wondered why this thing even existed and why it had come down to ruin his life so much. Feeling really frustrated Maximus took and shoved a hoof into it as a way of letting his anger out, and found to his surprise that it felt somewhat good. Starting to rub his hoof slightly in a circle like pattern he started to for the first time in long feel relaxed. Like how all his bad emotions in him where being silenced gently, and he started to almost go into a trance like state of just rubbing his gut, when he got himself back together.

NO!

He was not going to let the fat win! He was going to get his leg fixed, and then he was going to do put himself in such a big fitness program that he was going to lose it all in no time. He promised himself that.
1551112212.title: The relaxing torture.

15511122121.content:
One and a half month of the two months period had passed, and things had really spun out of control for Maximus. Ever since that first time feeling and rubbing his belly fat he hasn’t been able to control it. He promised himself to not like it and focus on getting better and on the training, but it felt so squishy and warm that he couldn’t resist and the next day he was at it again. After five minutes he once again told himself to not love and let it be. Next day again he was at it for ten minutes, and then 15 the next day, and then 20, and then 25, and then a half-hour, and then a whole hour, and finally he was so lost in loving his own fat that it was all he did every woken hour. He rubbed it with his three good legs, poked them deep into its deep softness, gave it a huge hug, and even jiggled it around with all his strength.

Many people seeing him now either thought he had gone crazy or was getting more sick, but Maximus didn’t care if he was making a fool out of himself now, his belly massages was so wonderful that nothing maters to him anymore. For many of the kingdoms kids he became a great attraction to see. He would do all kind of funny moves and stuff just to have the kids feed him apple. They had fun and he had fun so he didn’t complain.

One day when there was about a week left before getting his cast Maximus got a surprise visit. It was his old owner the former guard captain who was back for an early morning visit. Since seeing him around his first week of living like this the captain had been forced to take Maximus job while he was still laying of getting his leg better, and hasn’t been able to see him in almost a month. Hearing the familiar sound of the door bell got Maximus excited. Ever since starting to love rubbing his fat Maximus loved doing it at most while having some new food inside of him, and since the sound of the doorbell almost always meant food he was fully prepared. He thought it sounded a bit earlier then usual for someone to come, but he thought it was just a kid who took a quick visit to see him before school. He started to roll slightly from side to side making himself funny for the kids who wanted to feed him apples, but seeing his former owner and friend in the eyes again made Maximus for the first time in a longtime to realized how far away from his old self he now was. He stopped rolling and looked both scared and embarrassed into the eyes of his old friend. The captain himself didn’t do anything but stare back for a while before saying, “Well, haven't you changed some since we last saw?” in a very playful manner.

Maximus wasn’t completely sure on what to think at first, here he was expecting to get a big scolding from the man that he had been doing his army training with, and now he was just acting like what has happen to him was not a big deal. “Where you trying to make yourself look cute and cuddly so kids would feed you apples?” He said and rubbed the top of his belly slightly, Maximus felt his whole face turning red by embarrassment. He then looked at Maximus plastered leg and asked him if his leg was feeling any better now. Maximus answered by lifting on of his good fore legs and turning it from side to side in a kind of “Meh” signal. “Still a bit bad eh,” He said resting his hand once again on Maximus big belly and started stroking it slightly.

Even though Maximus tried his hardest to not reveal how much he liked it. He had done this kind of stroking on himself several times, but it had never felt as good as now when human hands where doing it. Without thinking what he was doing he let out a sound that almost sounded like a moan of pleasure. This caught the captain’s attention who asked, “Do you like that Maximus?” Feeling even more embarrassed now Maximus knew that things couldn’t get worse now so he answered by giving a nod. Seeing this the captain took once again and stroked lightly over Maximus big wide belly, making the horse let out these moaning like sounds again. “That feels really good for you, doesn’t it?” He asked and Maximus answered by giving another nod, this time with more enthusiasm in it.

“Oh, but what’s this?” The captain asked as he pulled out a very delicious looking red apple from his jacket pocket. The combination of feeling very happy from the belly massage and the sight of the nice juicy apple made Maximus very excited of wanting to eat it. Seeing this the captain ordered Maximus to lay still on his back as he took and placed it on the top on the middle of Maximus belly. “I want you now to try and eat this apple,” Maximus was on his way to try and knock it of with on of his hooves when the captain finished, “Without using your legs.” At first he wondered if he was serious, but looking him in the eyes Maximus realized that this time he was serious. “I want to see that you get at least some exercise while I’m here.” He said.

Maximus took a deep sigh first, thinking about all the strength this would take before starting. As he took and started to stretch his head and neck up he started to first now really feel how much bigger he had become during this time. He could feel how the extra layers of fat in his neck and shins and chest where all doing there best to prevent him from reaching to his goal. As he stretched on he could see the apple sitting there so close, and still feeling so far away. As he tried to get closer he started to lift some of his back up from the ground, making his whole midsection starting to bend over and created new love handles. To his horror he saw the apple almost starting to tip over, making him pull himself back. Taking a minute to think out a new plan he started to see just how flexible his new middle mass was. Seeing how he could make it rise and sink in a way he wanted he got an idea. By making the chest of his belly sink down and letting the underside of it rise up, Maximus got the apple to start rolling down towards his head and straight into his open mouth. Taking it inside and swallowing it Maximus had succeeded the challenge. “Good job Maximus,” The captain said, “A really tactician always knows how to make his biggest disadvantages into his greatest advantages.” He then patted Maximus belly to indicate what he ment.

Doing so made Maximus belly start to gurgle powerfully, all that hard work in getting that apple plus still being the early morning meant that Maximus ahdn’t have a really meal yet. “Are you hungry also?” The captain asked teasingly. Maximus played along and nodded before another stomach gurgle made itself heard. “Let me tell you something,” The captain said, “I can go and ask the man who feed who if I can take on the job of feeding you today. Plus I have made sure so I’m free from work today, meaning I could use all day feeding you until you big belly reaches its limit.” He said pressing his whole hand firmly on it. The thought of getting to eat apples until he couldn’t take anymore made Maximus gaping his mouth in a way that almost looked like a smile. “But, seeing who you really like getting your stomach rubbed, I thought that maybe I should feed you a normal amount of apples and then use the whole day to give you the best belly rub ever?” The mention of that made Maximus big horse smile to become even bigger. “I sadly don’t have time to do both so you have to decide, Apple stuffing or Belly rub. What do you choose?”

After thinking about it for a short time Maximus decides to choose...
15511122121.title: Maximus losses it.

155111221211.content:
Maximus snorted, he moved one of his chunky forelegs to move the former captain's arm, signalling his decision.

The former captain grinned before getting up and left, leaving a confused Maximus. That confusion was replaced with hunger when the man came back with a huge bucket that was nearly overflowing with juicy looking apples. Settling down next to Maximus, the man began rubbing and kneading Maximus's huge round furry white sack that was his belly with one hand while grabbing an apple with the other, making the obese stallion sigh in contentment while taking a bite out of the apple that was offered to him.

Continue or skip this.
155111221211.title: The belly rubs.

choices: Make it into a decent potbelly.
15511122122.content:
Another month went by and Maximus was finally able to get the cask of his leg. "Your leg still needs some time to get used of moving again. You could start to walk around again, but I recommend you to not start running until another week or so." the vet said before he let Maximus walk free.

Being able to once again stand on his bad leg was a very weird feeling for Maximus. After two months of laying on his back, (And one of playing with his belly fat) standing on all four felt strange...Or rather the feeling of having his stomach hanging down and his legs pressed next to it felt weird. After discovering half way through the resting this wonderful feeling he got from touching his own fat Maximus hadn't been able to stop feeling "funny". It felt like every time one of his hooves touched the soft, warm, place that where his middle he would get a small tingling feeling inside. Like it was his soft spot. So now having his wide center digging itself into his legs was a new feeling.

As he started to walk he could really feel just how much bigger his belly had become. Before he would have felt it being a little bit in contact with his legs but still be able to walk like it was nothing. Now on the other hand he was forced to have his legs spread out wider so he wouldn't be feel like he was trying to force his legs into his stomach, and now every step he took would lead to him pressing or scratching his belly slightly, making him feel a bit "aroused" with every move. Having his belly sway and his almost everything he came close to also made Maximus feel the same feelings as he did when he had his leg broken.

Knowing he might have a problem Maximus thought about what to do. He could either try to lose some of his weight and still have a nice belly to play with on his spare time. Or he could pig himself out, make his stomach bigger, and have an even more wonderful belly rub!

What does he choose?
15511122122.title: A new sensation.

155111221221.content:
He didn't care at this point. He loved the feelings he got from his belly rubs, and only wanted more.

But how would he do to get that food? Being hospitalised for two months had made most of his important jobs being assigned by others, which meant he didn't have any money to buy food with.

He remembers he had seen horses working by giving kids pony rides had been given a lot of stuff to eat by both the owners and the kids visiting. Even though going from a kingdom saving hero to a fat petting zoo kids toy sounded like a (to say the least) humiliated way to go, it still sounded like a good option. He remembered all of the kids that where happy to see him when he laid with a broken leg, and gave him food to make him feel better. He felt happy, and they felt happy that he was happy. Becoming a pet zoo horse would only make things better for all of them. A day of this new life would be him leading a child around on his back, making it feel like it can ride a horse, having a lot of fun and also growing as a person. And after that he would have a bunch of other kids that just want to try and feed the horse. It started to sound more and more like the perfect life for him the more he thought about it.

As he was doing his deep thinking Maximus nostrils picked up a delicious smell coming from one of the stores, and his body went on auto pilot and started to move to the source. The source turned out to be pies. Yummy, deliciously smelling pies. Maximus was about to take a bite out of one, when he got his by a rolling pin. "Get away from my pies you fat slob of a horse!" The man owning the store said angrily. "If you don't have any money to pay, beat it!" He said and forced Maximus away from his store. He then took the pies that was out for display and closed the door violently. Maximus felt really upset over how he had been treated by the man. Even if he didn't know who Maximus was (Or didn't recognize him in his even bigger state) it was no good way in treating a costumer. A man that cruel didn't deserve pies that good, and that made another idea spark inside Maximus head. An idea of him breaking into the store at night-time, and eat all of the pies himself. It did sound illegal and he could be in big trouble if he got caught, but those pies had smelt so good that he was prepared to do anything to get a chance to taste them.

Which one of the ideas does he go with?
155111221221.title: Getting fatter, but how?

choices: He pushed throw and made in inside and he was very hungry
It's no use he was stuck half way throw the window with his ass on full display
1551112212212.content:
Maximus was a kind and loving horse for the most part. He loved kids and, he loved getting belly rubs. He was a heroic horse that helped people.
But at the same time he did have his darker side that just wanted to fill his own needs, and right now the only thing he wanted more than anything was to stuff himself with tasty treats.

That old baker deserved some punishment of some kind for being mean to him, and it was time for payback.
Maximus decided to wait around for the baker to leave so he could start his plan.
Maximus spent most of the day just sitting in the grass playing with his big round belly, and the smell of the cooking pies and other food was making Maximus very hungry.
He wished someone would come feed him and rub his poor hungry belly.

When it was the afternoon he finally saw the baker leave the house. He wrote down something on a piece of paper and stuck it onto the door.
He started walking down the road and left. Maximus got his heavy body up and looked at the paper.
It said "The bakery is closed for the weekend. The owner will be spending the weekend with his family a mile down the road. PS no horses allowed!"
Maximus smiled, "What perfect timing" he thought. He was worried he would have to rush but luckily he could spend a while in here and just enjoy himself.

The door was locked so annoyingly he only had one choice, he had to clime through the window.
Maximus easily opened up the window that the baker forgot to close.
Now came hard part. Getting in that tiny window with his massive fat belly and big wobbly butt.
Maximus squeezed in his head and front legs with easy, it was when he got half way through when he couldn't move anymore!

Oh no, was poor Maximus stuck?
He pushed and pushed as the tight window frame pressed against his soft belly
From the outside all that could be seen was Maximus's big juicy butt and legs and his under belly struggling to get in.
Maximus was now pushing with all his mite to get in as the window frame got tighter and tighter around his very big round belly.

Than....
1551112212212.title: Pie burglar.

choices: Next morning Maximus has a big breakfast while relaxing
In the middle of the night Maximus suddenly needs a big mindnight snack
15511122122121.content:
With one finally push Maximus pushed throw the tiny window.
He landed on his big butt and belly as he hit the floor. His poor tummy hurt from the window frame, and he stroked his belly to try and make the pain go away.
That's when his gut made loud grumbling noises. He was soooooo hungry.

That's when the smell of pies and other treats became very strong.
He got up, sniffed the air, and he waddled over to the smell coming from behind a curtain.
Maximus found that behind it was a hidden room, and he then looked inside of it and saw what looked like pure heaven to him.

It was a large room filled to the brim with pies, chocolate cakes, and big juicy apples.
Maximus mouth watered by all the sweet treats he saw, and then he also noticed that the room also had a large red sofa in the middle of it with a warm fire place next to it.
Maximus guessed this room was a dinning room for families but right now it all belonged to him and no one could stop him.

He walked over to the sofa and lied on it. The sofa felt so comfy and nice and warm.
Maximus then decides to see what that mean old baker's pies were like and he picked up a large fresh one with his hooves, that was pulled right out of the oven. It was very hot and smelled delicious.
He wasted no time by taking large bites of the pie, and he moaned as he ate it as the pie tasted godly to him. He had to have more!

He quickly takes a second one, and then a third one, than one more and one more and one more...
Pies and cakes and other treats were gone in seconds as Maximus eat every single piece. Bits of blueberry pie covered his mouth as he eat.
His belly quickly started to grow as he eat.
His white dome gut rose up covering his lap as well as his butt that got bigger and rounder like two big white orbs.

Minutes turned into hours as Maximus ate more and more. His belly was so big now it was as large as normal human being!
Maximus was starting to get so full as his once soft belly was now as hard as a rock.
Soon Maximus eating slowed down to a crawl.
Maximus was so happy but at the same time felt so insanely overstuffed.
He looked at the clock and saw it was night now and he knew that with his belly being so huge right now there was no way he could get up till his gut digested all of the pies.

So Maximus just decided to relax for now and enjoy the warm sofa and rub his person sized belly.
Maximus spent most of the night just rubbing his belly and listening to the gurgling sounds of his gut.
The fire place was also very relaxing as it warmed up the room.


Maximus smiled as he had never felt any happier then now...
15511122122121.title: He pushed throw and made in inside and he was v...

choices: Maximus was still hungry and kept eating all night he was badly addicted to pies
Maximus went into a food coma and wakes up later to see he is obese now.
155111221221212.content:
Maximus was sitting in his old barn relaxing as small children of the kingdom were petting him and stroking his soft white fur.
Maximus just lied on his side enjoying the attention but suddenly something strange started to happen.
The kids were now rubbing his belly and even his butt making Maximus blush, but before he could do anything the kids got some rope and tied him up!
They than brought in tons and tons of tasty cakes and pies to Maximus.

Maximus had no idea what was happening, the kids smiled as one of them shoved a big juicy apple into his mouth forcing him to eat.
Then other kids started doing the same thing by stuffing every tasty treat down his throat. They didn't even give him time to chew.
Soon his belly started growing large and his legs gut flabby all over, his cheeks became big and full, he started developing 3 chins and his butt became large and round looking.

Maximus gut felt like it was going to pop from the amount of food they were feeding him, his belly just kept getting bigger and bigger.
Maximus was worried. His belly was bigger than him now as it slowly filled the barn. The kids where rubbing his belly and slapping it. Maximus felt that he was going to explode at any second now, and just when he was about to burst he opened his eyes.
It was all a dream...

Maximus looked around the room to see that he was still in the bakery on the giant sofa, and he was still massively fat.
Maximus sighed, he eat too much and had a food coma nightmare.
Maximus looked around the room and saw the clock, it was midnight. He must have been asleep for a few hours.
The fire place was still burning, lighting up the dark room nicely. Maximus looked outside and saw it was raining heavily.
Maximus felt happy. He was nice and warm inside rather than being out there, the fire kept him nice and warm throughout the night.

While looking around the room Maximus saw a large jug of water next to the sofa, so he picked it up and drank it all.
It cleaned his food covered mouth and helped him digest the food in his belly.
He looked at it and felt his belly. It was still huge but no as big as earlier. Maximus felt at his big belly. It was so big and soft, and he could heard sloshing noises and gurgling coming from it as he shock it.

Maximus thoght maybe he should just go back to sleep, but as he was drifting back to sleep...
Out of nowhere Maximus felt a great hunger in his tummy. His mouth started to water for some reason, he was suddenly starving and he had to eat something now!
Maximus started eating more pies and cakes and apples as fast as he could, in mere seconds he mouth was covered in bits of food once again.
His cheeks were big and full of food and his soft belly was quickly becoming hard and round again.

Maximus wanted to stop but couldn't! His midnight hunger was far to strong for him to resist.
Soon his belly was bigger than before. Maximus belly looked half as big as he was now, poor Maximus couldn't even see over his blimp like belly and he couldn't move an inch.
Maximus belly felt as hard as steal. Maximus felt so shameful, he felt more like a pig than a horse.
But at the same time he couldn't lie to himself, it felt amazing to be bloated fat and helpless! Maximus was a true glutton

Than....
155111221221212.title: In the middle of the night Maximus suddenly nee...

choices: He tries to find other heroic things to do.
155111222.content:
As he wondered what he could do to try and help improving his very damaged image, he suddenly heard the sounds of screams.

From the top of a very steep street he could see a horse drawing cart filled with people break free from the horse pulling it, and starting to rush down the road towards his direction.

While the people near him started to run away and scream, he decided to stay. This was his chance to prove that he could still provide the hero role, despite his extra weight. His plan on stopping it and saving the people on-board was to face away from it, wait until the right moment, and then put up his hind legs and send such great counter force to completely stop it. (But given his size he could just have used his huge horse rump as an airbag, and it would have probably done the same.)

He made himself ready, (Hoping his front legs would be able to hold the rest of his weight.) lifted his hind legs up, and was just about to kick the cart when something sent him away from spot.

It was another stallion, this one having a much more coal black coat and white mane in contrast to Maximus's white coat. That wasn't the only thing that this stallion had in contrast to him since he (unlike Maximus) was incredibly fit. He wasn't only free from any unnecessary body fat, he had also legs, chest, waist, neck and other parts of his body swelling with muscles. He looked just like Maximus had done back during his "glory days", if not even better.

It wasn't like Maximus had time to think about that, as while the tall dark stranger stallion was about to do what he had planned to do, Maximus was now instead doing the almost impossible task of "Walking around on only his front legs while the rest of his body is hanging in the air". He wanted to just lower his legs and make it stop, but the push from the other stallion had managed to distracted him so much that he now instead had his legs lifted up even more. So much in fact that even parts of his crazy wide back and spine was starting to bend over it self. It was a pretty amazing site for a horse his size to do that, but Maximus knew that if he stopped moving his legs it would cause him to immediately fall forward.

After getting rid of Maximus the mysterious stallion kept focus on saving the run away cart. He put himself into position, lifted his hind legs, and with the right amount of force managed to make the cart stop right in front of him. It didn't take long for the ones on-board the cart and the city folks watching it to start gathering around the stallion to congratulate him. Some royal guards that had not been quick enough to react to the situation was also very impressed by the bravery from this dark night coloured horse. "That was amazing what you just did brave horse." The captain of the group said, as he walked up to the horse, as if he was just like a human hero. "How can we ever thank you for all you done...?" The captain said before realizing he had forgot something very important. "What is your name?" He asked the horse, not expecting it to speak back but at least help give them a clue. The horse "answered" by pointing a hoof at a white lighting shaped form on one of his legs. "So you're called...White lighting?" The captain asked, and the stallion nicked his head to say yes. "Well, like I was about to say. How can we ever thanks you for saving the these lives..." The captain once again asked, only to be interrupted by a loud "CRASH" sound.

Looking over at what had caused it they all saw that it was Maximus, who had finally managed to lose his balance walking on only his front legs, and had fallen right into a big apple stand. Now he laid there on his back in the broken stand among apples that had fallen off and onto the ground, apples that had been crushed to applesauce, and apples that was still laying in one piece under him. (Almost making it look like he was laying on a bed of apples.) And to top it all of he had a big red juicy apple stuffed in his mouth, making him look like a stuffed pig on Christmas.

What was suppose to be his moment of glory had instead made him look like an even bigger joke then before. There was kids pointing and laughing at the fat horse laying among the apples, adult's who just tried to hold themselves from laughing at the sight, and soldiers that looked really ashamed over once having had Maximus as their own inspiration for becoming the best defenders for this kingdom. The soldiers instead gathered around this new heroic horse, and gave him all the praises and cheer's that they otherwise would have been giving to Maximus.

While everybody followed the black stallion with the white lighting mark away from the place, Maximus was left to get out of the apple stand on his own. After getting up and standing on all four again he could feel that he was still having that big read apple in between his teethes. He could just have spitted it out, but things where so bad now that he thought he might have the apple to cheer himself up a little. But he had barley chewed and swallowed it before he could hear the sound of something metallic hitting the cobblestone ground at a with a quick "Ding" sound. Maximus was about to look over at what it was when he could feel the answer becoming painfully clear. It was the metal lock that kept the belt on the saddle in place, and by eating that big apple it had made Maximus's waist so wide that it couldn't take anymore and just popped off.

Maximus could feel the saddle starting to slip of from one side, and before he could do anything it fell completely off and hit the ground. That was it. That was the last thing proving that he was a part of the royal defence's gone. There was now nothing that would make anyone looking at him believe that he used to be some kind of hero, but instead believing that he's just a fat white horse with nothing at al. He knew he could just have not eaten that apple to start with, but that's something he could have done countless times before getting to this state. If he didn't care about stopping then, then why stopping now?

Was this going to be the end of Maximus's heroic life?
155111222.title: A new horse in town.

choices: There would be a big ball at the castle that evening.
A pack of theifs would try and rob the town during the night.
1551112221.content:
Despite this new stranger called "White Lighting" Maximus was still determined to continue to try and help people in need when he could, but this would turned out to be more challenging then he could ever imagine.

Because no matter what kind of situation it was or how quickly Maximus was trying to come in and save it, White Lightning would already be there. This pitch black stallion with the one white lighting bolt shaped mark on one of his legs was like a creature sent from the devil himself to Maximus, while everyone else saw him as a bless from the heavens.

And it wasn't hard to see why. When a small fire had started Maximus had been running of with a small bucket to get some water from the river, and when he came back he sees that White Lighting had already put the fire out with the help of a whole barrel full of water.

Another moment was when what looked like a poisonous venous snake was loose White Lighting took and put a hoof on top of the head of the snake to keep it still, while Maximus got so scared by the snake (He has a phobia for snakes) that it made his fatted body jiggle in a funny way for everybody to see. (Especially the people standing behind him got a real eye full of how much he could make his butt fat shake.)

This of course was not helping Maximus self confidence, since everyway he looked and listen all he could see and hear was how all kinds of different people talking about "How great this new horse was", and "How he should replace Maximus as the protector of your kingdom". The other things he seemed to see everywhere was apples. Lots and lots of apples seemed to be stacked everywhere. If it wasn't on sales on a wagon, or simply one in a person's hand Maximus could swear that the image of these apples was starting to become a permanent mark inside of his head.

Even his diet seemed to be consisting of nothing but those cursed fruits. No matter if he was depressed of just hungry Maximus seemed to always be near some apples to eat. And for every one he swallowed down he could almost feel how it was becoming a part of his ever growing stomach. It almost felt like his middle was just a huge sack for where he could store all of his apples.,still un-chewed and rolling around with every step he took.

The weird thing was that despite all the positive attention White Lighting was getting and all the humiliation Maximus got, he was still having his role as the leader of the defence. The council all thought unanimously that despite this new horse having done some heroic things it could never compared to the same level as Maximus returning the princess and saving the kingdom from an evil which. "He's still going to be seen as the true heroic horse in our eyes. Now and forever." The leader of the council said, not knowing the things that would later happen that very same evening.
1551112221.title: He tries to find other heroic things to do.

15511122211.content:
At just this evening there was going to be a big ball held in the castle, where everyone that is important will be, and amongst them where both of the two heroic horses. White Lighting for his several recent heroic works for the town, and Maximus for the huge favour he did the kingdom in the past. (And for him still having the role as the leader of the defence.)

The party was to be held in the castle in one of it's many ballrooms. It was in a big room with high ceilings, and a big great chandelier hanging in the middle of it.

Everyone at the party was dressed in their most elegant outfits, and the two horses where no different. White Lighting was wearing a rug that was having a very impressive design with yellow stars and a big red eagle on each side over it black sheet. Maximus guessed that White Lighting must have been getting his outfit made by some generous tailor.

Maximus himself had a much more "open" design. Unlike White Lighting, Maximus had the tailors working for the royal family doing his clothes. But also unlike White Lighting, Maximus had about 2-3 times the body his rival had, so when the tailors tried to make the thing go under and be nicely wrapped around like with White Lightning's rug they found out that they had Maximus's huge belly hanging in the way. And no matter how hard they tried they couldn't make it go around him without making it look like Maximus was carrying around ten foals inside of him. So what they did instead was to cut open the bottom of it and let it hang down to each side to try and discreetly hide just how large Maximus's midsection really was. This had bad effect of him looking like he was wearing a tablecloth.

At the party things seems to be going quite well for Maximus so far. While White Lightning was getting a lot more attention from people wanting to greet him more then Maximus, he still seemed to have his most trusting (And most importantly) of his fans left. Those where the royal council and the royal family themselves, and as long as he had them still liking him there was nothing that White Lighting could do to take his job from him. Looking at the royal family again he first now noticed that someone very important to him was missing. The princess, Rapunzel.
15511122211.title: A big ball for a big horse.

choices: Maximus breas himself free and saves the day.
Something else happens when he tries to free himself.
155111222112.content:
But just as Maximus was about to ask himself where she could be, he and all the others in the huge room could hear loud trumpet sounds being made from the main entrance. Looking over they could all see Rapunzel making her grand entrance. She looked just as beautiful as always, as she made her way to the centre of the room to make a speech.

But as she was just about to start with her speech something else could be heard. Something big and heavy. Looking up they all saw that it was the giant chandelier tilting from side to side, like it was not hold up properly. A loud "SNAP" could then be heard, and that was the sound of the rope holding the thing up that was now broken.

Panic started as people started to run away to not get crushed under it, but one person was to close to the centre of it to have any chance at all of escaping. Rapunzel. She started running away from it, but she knew thanks to it's size that the chandelier would still land on her. The only ones that where quick enough to react was once again the two horses. And while White Lightning dashed of just like a lighting bolt, Maximus found himself (Or rather his rug) stuck under a table leg.
155111222112.title: She's at the main entrance.

1551112221122.content:
He had no idea how it got stuck under there, but it was important right now. What was important was for him to dash of and save the princess yet again. He took off and didn't care if a part of his rug would get torn in the process, or at least that was what he thought was going to happen. What instead happen was that the part of it that got ripped open was the hole from where Maximus could stick his fat neck through, leading to it ripping open nicely all the way from the top to the bottom, and stripping Maximus completely from his garment.

Realizing he was now completely naked made Maximus stop dead in his tracks. The thing was that even before when he had been at least some what "exposed" he had still been wearing a saddle or something similar. That plus that at this place everyone else was so overly dressed that being the only one there not wearing anything felt very strange. He could see some people staring at the sight of him. Now without his rug covering him he was now showing of exactly what he was. They could see every fatted up part of his body perfectly, and having his big hanging stomach still waving from the sudden stop of movement only encouraged that image.

While that was happening White Lighting had taken the chance to run his fastest towards Rapunzel, lowering his head so he could pick her up from behind, and carry her away before the chandelier came crashing down. Maximus could only stare as White Lightning was putting down the princess next to her parents, and got celebrated like crazy. And like if that wasn't bad enough next thing to happen was the king saying, "For doing something so heroic as saving my daughter I decided that you White Lightning will have the new role as the leader for the military defence."
1551112221122.title: Like that time being knighted but worse!

15511122211221.content:
Hearing the words "Leader for the Military Defence" being said to White Lighting became to much for Maximus. He just wanted to ran away and forget everything, and that's just what he did.

While everyone was to busy celebrating the black horse with white lighting bolt on his leg, the fat white horse took off and left the room.

Tears where rolling down Maximus's eyes as he didn't have anything left now. He had lost his honour, his fame, his job, and his body. He was nothing but a simple working horse now, no wait. He was even worse then a simple working horse, since with his large frame he wasn't going to be able to do most kind of shores.

As he kept running through the castle's many rooms and halls he doesn't even seems to care where he was or where he was going. Nothing really mattered to him now, and he just wanted nothing more then to be left alone somewhere.

Suddenly he spotted a room with a door open just slightly. He didn't know why, but something about that door and that room was really dragging him to it. Once he went inside and closed the door behind him he couldn't believe what he saw.

In his careless running he had managed to find a room that was nothing more then a huge pantry!

In this place where just about everything you could imagine. There was milk and flour, fruit and vegetables, meat, fish, chicken and much more.

But what had caught Maximus attention most was, you guessed it. A big red juicy apple.

At first Maximus was about to lean forward and just eat it, but he stopped himself just before biting into it. "This all belong to the royal family, and I can't take their food from them. It is amongst my rights as a working part of the royal defence that I..." Maximus thought to himself, but then it hit him. He wasn't a part of the royal defence anymore. He had no rules to follow and nothing preventing him from having a feast right then and there if he wants to. "It would still probably be considered breaking the law." Maximus thought, before looking at that nice red apple again.

That pretty much sealed the deal. Maximus had pretty much nothing to lose on this. He would probably never even get to set his hooves in the castle again, so why not leave doing what you love most?

Getting himself ready Maximus took off and went head first towards the apple, slamming his body towards the wall in the process and making half of the things on shelf's fall down on him.

Being now covered in flour and eggs and salad Maximus felt even less as his usual self, and he used that as an excuse to be even more crazy.

He was tearing up pieces of meat like a dog, rolled around in the mess on the floor like a pig, and even tried to eat the wooden bowls and plates like he was a goat. He was pretty much being every kind of animal except a horse at this moment.

He was so into his crazy antics that he didn't even noticed someone else entering the room.

It wasn't until seeing a shadowy figure and the light from the hall that Maximus looks up to see_____standing by the door.

http://www.furaffinity.net/view/14644443... (Imagine the horse in the picture to be Maximus and you will have a very accurate picture of how his reaction to when this other character enters the pantry.)

As White Lightning look at him with disapproval at what he was going to do.

Standing by the door was the kingdom's new horse hero and leader of the Military Defence, White Lightning.

Maximus gulped as...

choices: Smiled shyly at him, he shows his idol his admiration for him and his new body.
Smirking sadistically at him, he mocks the fatso by showing how fat he was.

The young and fit black stallion smiled at Maximus, which confused the overweight horse. Maximus whinnied nervously as he shuffled back as White Lightning calmly trotted towards the white obese stallion. The fat horse shivered as he saw the strange light in the young stallion's eyes on him, eyes that were taking every detail of his heavily plump body. Maximus wasn't sure what to feel about that.

White Lightning stopped before his fat predecessor and...
1551112221122121.title: As White Lightning look at his fat body with......

choices: Show the knife to the captain of the guards.
Show the knife to Flynn Rider.
15511122211222.content:
Maximus had just lost everything. His body, his pride, and now even his job. It felt for him like this was all some kind of nightmare, and that he would wake up any minute now.

Not wanting to even look or be near White Lightning and all of his prays Maximus went near the area where the rope that used to hold up the chandelier was. All that was left now was a small stump of rope since the rest of it was laying in the pile of broken glass, but in the corner of his eye Maximus spotted something shining a bit away. Looking closer at it he saw that it was a small knife that somebody had thrown to the side. Looking back at the rope Maximus noticed now that they looked like they might have been cut off with that same knife.

Did this mean that the chandelier accident really wasn't an accident? That this was all a real attempt to kill the princess ? Or maybe this and all the other incidents that had been going on was just to make a certain horse look good?
15511122211222.title: Maximus finds something.

choices: Flynn and Maximus are Captured by Thugs Before they Can Devise a Plan
They Devise a Plan to Catch White Lightening in the Act
155111222112222.content:
Maximus thought deeply about the incident, knowing that the Princess was an exceptionally important member of the Kingdom. Pondering the string of events that had transpired in the last few weeks; White Lightening showing up and saving the day on multiple occasions, always seeming to be in the right place at the right time, and completely one-upping Maximus at every turn.

The fat stallion considered the nature of the dagger, the sliced rope, White Lightening's almost psychic response. He decided that these factors were too similar to be coincidence. So what was White Lightening's intentions? The overweight horse contemplated numerous possibilities, but could only really come to two conclusions. Either the horse was undermining the bulbous horse in order to attain position of Captain of the Guard, or White Lightening's desires stretched further...

A nervous shiver rippled through Maximus' spine, issuing a jelly-like quiver from his puffy neck, wobbling through his low-hanging belly, and petering out with a gentle shaking of his rear. The stallion realized that there was only one true option to take in this course: he needed another individual's opinion.

Immediately Maximus thought of Flynn, the thief-turned-prince was a perfect partner in aiding the horse's quest for truth. With a sense of affirmation that notifying the prince was the best road, Maximus trotted out of the castle doors and after Flynn.

He caught up with the prince after some time, the stallion's sloshing belly often creased and smooshed against his legs when traveling at a faster pace. Stopping up short when he finally found the prince walking along one of the castle's passages. Flynn seemed to be distracted by the notion that his wife had almost lost her life today from something as trivial as a freak chandelier accident.

"Hey buddy, what's up with you?" Flynn asked the obese stallion, whose sides bulged in and out rapidly from the quick pace of travel. "What's in your mouth? A knife? You can eat a lot of things, but I doubt even you could stomach a dagger." Flynn remarked jokingly.

Maximus glowered at Flynn until the prince reciprocated his words, "All right, all right, I'm sorry. So what is the dagger for then?" He inquired.

The horse quickly changed is expression to one of relief, now that he knew Flynn was taking him seriously. Maximus did his best to emulate the actions that transpired in the ball room. He made a gesture towards Flynn with a concerned expression on his face. "Something to do with me. Tonight?" The prince guessed. Maximus nodded vigorously, and made a rolling motion with his muzzle to keep going, which unintentionally sent another wave of ripples rolling quaintly through the stallion's flab.

"Something to do with me...so I suppose the only thing important enough would be the chandelier event?" Flynn asked. Maximus was already nodding before Flynn concluded his sentence.

Maximus then turned the dagger's hilt in his mouth, went over to a rope that supported one of the royal flags near the edge of the walkway, and made a cutting impression with the dagger.

Flynn snapped his fingers in recognition, "You think someone cut the rope. Right?"

Maximus nodded once more and then gestured aggressively to himself to signify that a horse had been the culprit.

"Wait...you did this?" Flynn asked incredulously.

Maximus froze for a moment and the rigorously shook his head, creating accordion rolls in his neck with each sway. Maximus thought for a moment, before taking the dagger and rotating his head as far as he could to get as close to his side as possible. He was trying to specify the spot where White Lightening's trademark emblem was, but his bulbous belly was making it difficult.

The stallion then used the dagger to mimic a classic lightening symbol on his bountiful flank. He did so twice, before he lost his footing and slipped on the cobblestone. Maximus toppled over and crashed to the ground with a humiliating whump that sent his entire body sloshing. He landed on his side and, while his belly took the majority of the impact, the blow was enough to knock the breath out of him.

Maximus wheezed a couple of times, gasping like a fish before finally getting his breath back and inflating his belly widely in the process.

Flynn was too busy laughing to initially aid the horse, but came over and helped brace Maximus to get him back on his hooves. "Heh...you alright buddy?" Flynn inquired. When Maximus affirmed that he was, Flynn returned to a serious mindset and said "I think I know where you were going with the message. The only other horse present at the ceremony was White Lightening, and the mark you mimed was his right?"

Maximus let out a sigh of relief when and grinned to confirm Flynn's theory. He was happy in the knowledge that another person knew of the danger Rapunzel was in.

"Now the question is, what should we do about it?" Flynn contemplated. "I mean, White Lightening is the most popular figure in the kingdom right now, and this accusation goes against everything he's done for the people." Maximus sighed. "And saving the princess was the icing on the cake." Flynn noted.

At the mention of cake, Maximus' monolithic belly growled and rippled with a snarling hunger. The horse turned a crimson red while Flynn smiled. "We also might have to do something to sate your hunger," Flynn added.

Maximus only nodded in agreement, seeing as it was futile to deny what was blatantly obvious.

"So now, we need to come up with a plan to catch White Lightening. We can't simply arrest a public hero, he needs to be caught in the act." Flynn said. "What to do..."
155111222112222.title: Show the knife to Flynn Rider.

choices: White Lightening comes in and has a little heart-to-belly with Maximus
White Lightening "Saves" the day, rescues them, and embarrasses Maximus further
1551112221122221.content:
"Well," Flynn said, "I guess we should confer with the guards first so we can devise a plan to capture White Lightening."

Maximus nodded and they both began heading to the guard house where the Captain resided when a piercing growl emanated from Maximus' belly. Each snarl reverberated through his cavernous gut, leaving his belly wobbling with tremors. "Though perhaps you could use something to eat before we go," Flynn noted. Maximus only nodded in agreement, as he couldn't do much else with hunger pangs shooting through his body.

"Why don't we stop off at a pastry shop before and sate your hunger?" Flynn asked as the two traversed the cobbled path. Maximus eagerly agreed and soon the two spotted a pastry shop a little ways down the boulevard. The sign above it read The Flakey Peasant, and showed a commoner holding a tray of glorious confections. Maximus felt his mouth flood with drooling anticipation and spurred up his pace to reach the shop sooner. Flynn could only laugh and fell into a slow jog behind the horse, getting a good view of the horse steadily swaying backside whose bulging cheeks jiggled with each step.

The horse and the prince, focused on reaching the shop, failed to notice the silhouette flitting through the alleyways a small ways behind the duo. The figure was hooded and melded with the shadows as it observed the pair finally reaching the shop and disappearing inside. The dark figure contemplated this, and then quickly darted off to notify his quarry.

Ding! The small bell above the pastry shop rang, signifying Maximus and Flynn's entrance. Looking around, they saw a sturdy wooden counter sitting at the back of the room. To the right stood a pair of swinging doors that lead back into the kitchen. On the left wall, several rustic benches and tables were lined up to accommodate any folk wishing to enjoy their confections in good company. The right wall hosted a couple more benches and a large, ornate display of the various pastries the shop proffered.

Maximus walked over to the display, noting the variety of flavors and choices he had to choose from. Apple fritters, croissants, strudels, eclairs, cakes, pies, cream horns, puffs, rolls, buns, pretzels, and knotted breads coupled with glazes, fruit garnishes, sugars, icing, caramel, and chocolate. Maximus' mind nearly shorted out before he heard a low swoop of the doors and jolted out of his stupor.

"Why hello there, kind sirs," An older, well-built man said with a hint of humor. "Can I help you?" The man was obviously the owner and creator of the shop's contents, and Flynn quickly recovered to introduce himself and his companion.

"Good evening sir," Flynn greeted politely, "My name is Fl-." "Ah yes, you're Flynn Rider, the hero who rescued the princess, with the aid of.." he cast a quick glance at the horse, "Maximus the captain of the guard. It is an honor to host your presence in my humble shop," The man said rather quickly, not quite believing the caliber of the two individuals' reputations.

"Er, exactly," Flynn said. "We were hoping to acquire some food to counter my friend's hunger." As if on que, Maximus' stomach unleashed another snarl that sent his belly rippling.

The shopkeeper smiled slightly at the comedic timing of the growl, and said "I would love to be of service," he noted the sheer size of the horse's belly. He'd heard that Maximus had let himself go, but now he was able to see for himself. The stallion's belly hung low, rounded out in the middle and pressing slightly against his legs where it creased and smushed slightly. The equine's flanks and posterior were swaddled in fat, with two bulging cheeks trying to swallow up the horse's tail. Maximus' cheeks poofed out slightly and his neck formed accordion rolls whenever the horse turned his head in any direction.

"My name is Tristan," the shopkeeper said, "Please help yourselves to any of the pastries you wish, I was going to throw them out anyway, seeing as it nearly evening and they will be stale soon."

Flynn waved a hand at the offer of free pastries and insisted that he pay the shopkeeper in full for the confections. He was the prince after all, and a small pile of coins spilling onto the counter was a perfect way to cement Tristan's unyielding friendship.

"Alright buddy," Flynn said, "Have fun."

Maximus almost inhaled the pastries in his hunger-driven stupor. The stallion desperately chowed down on the pastries, not giving heed to what kind or size they were. At this point, he could have eaten hardtack and hay. Though he strongly preferred the pastries to those.

The large stand contained 8 rows of pastries that were loosely separated by wooden partitions. Each row contained approximately 6 types of pastry, and there were about 20 of each pastry in the partitions. Though the display wasn't entirely full of pastries, due to the business that had been conducted throughout the day; The stand was still more than 3/4s full.

Maximus devoured the pastries in a roughly periodic order. He spent a minute or two on the first partition before moving onto the next. As he reached the end of the first row, his stomach began signaling that it was full. Maximus barely noticed the warning and forged onwards. Flynn and Tristan could only appreciate the voracity with which Maximus ate. Halfway through the second row, Maximus's stomach began to feel tight. The horse glanced back and was surprised to see his sides bulging outward once more. His stomach was smooth and slightly stretched, but Maximus knew that the bulbous organ still held more room.

Maximus kept at it for another fifteen minutes, before finally petering out at the end of the third row. His stomach now groaned in protest, the barrel like appendage stretched tightly, and it's monumental weight forcing Maximus' spine to dip down slightly. Maximus' sides were almost spherical and wobbled with each labored pant. The horse knew he had overeaten, but the fullness felt incredible. His stomach swaying in an almost hypnotic manner, the horse lowly laid down on his forelocks before his back legs collapsed and the stallion thumped onto his side, Pushing his unrestricted side out further and causing his butt to pool out on the floor.

Maximus took a little time to recover his breath, and orient his surroundings before finally making eye contact with Flynn and Tristan.

Tristan simply smiled and said "Well I'm glad someone enjoys my pastries." Flynn shook his head, gazing bemusedly at the horse's bloated middle expand and contract rapidly. "I think he's good for now, and I think you have a future customer on your hands." Tristan nodded in agreement.

"Well I think we should probably get going before.." CRASH A loud smash accompanied forced opening of the wooden entrance to the shop. Four vague, dark figures poured into the store and quickly ran towards Flynn and Maximus. One bolted the door behind them, while the other three quickly immobilized the prince, shopkeeper, and horse, though Maximus was already pretty sluggish from his bulging belly.

"You three need to keep quiet, you hear?" The figure at the door commanded. When the captives nodded in fearful assent, the dark figure walked across the room and told the other three to bind the captives. Tristan was tied his chair behind the counter, while Flynn was marched over to a bench and roped to his seat. Maximus, being in the bloated state he was in, was too heavy to move, so the three henchmen hogtied his legs together and left him laying on his well cushioned stomach and rear.

What was going to happen next? Maximus wondered. He feared what was to come, but saw no other way out of it.
1551112221122221.title: Flynn and Maximus are Captured by Thugs Before ...

choices: White Lightening Feeds Maximus the pastries until the guest arrives
White Lightening is stopped by an unexpected intrusion
15511122211222211.content:
Maximus could only gape at the dark figures with a fish-eyed expression as one of the men trussed his legs. Due to the impediment of his rounded belly, the figure was unable to tie all four legs together and had to settle for tying Maximus' legs in pairs. Front and back legs were bound together. As the hooded figure worked the rope he muttered to himself "Damn, this horse's gut ain't makin' it easy." After a couple more moments of muffled cursing, the captor finally secured the ropes and gave the horse's belly a sinister slap as he laughed, "Man you're a big 'un." Maximus' belly wobbled in tight undulations from the force of the slap, and the sudden movement elicited a groan from the horse, as his bulging belly creaked from the unwelcome disturbance.

"Wh-who are you guys?" Flynn asked nervously, struggling against his bonds, but it was no use as they were expertly tied. "Do y-you know who I am, do you know who that horse is?" The prince stuttered in a futile attempt of indignation.

The captor who'd bolted the door and ordered the other three to tie the victims smiled menacingly and said "Course we know who you are. Prince and the horse who saved the princess." He cast a quick glance at the bloated horse and smiled even wider, "Er, the cow that saved the kingdom." The captor lifted his hood to reveal a younger, scarred face of a man who had spent their entire life in the streets. A crooked nose and small scar on his cheekbone testified to this fact along with the captor's slightly rough manner of speaking.

"As for who we are," The man spread his arms, "We are simply street folk or hired muscle for whomever feels the need to employ us." He gestured around the shop, "Each of us come from a similar background of poverty, destitute privilege, and an every-man-for-himself nature. We had to learn our trade quickly or die, similar.." He pointed to Flynn, "To yours if I imagine." This was true, given the fact that Flynn had been a professional thief and infamous criminal before his ascension to the princess' side. "But I digress," the leader continued. "For all intents and purposes, you will address me as Fen. No one else needs to be named," the scarred man said.

Maximus had been watching the leader, Fen's, little spiel and realized that he had been growing increasingly nervous by the similarities born between Flynn and the thug. In his nervous state, the stallion had been holding his breath for quite a time and quickly snorted in again. The sudden impediment of air caused the horse's taught stomach to expand dramatically and creak alarmingly from the pressure.

The movement got Fen's attention, and the captor smiled unnervingly. "Our employer seems to have a certain grudge toward this one, and wants a little heart-to-heart with the legendary Maximus." Fen stated the last part with exaggerated sarcasm, as he observed the horse's voluminous belly and fattened hindquarters smushed against the floor.
