1553322222222211222122.content:
Unknowingly to the two of them there was other beings watching them.

Ghosts to be more exact.

Ghosts of what used to be the inhabitants of the village.

When they had all been alive in the past they had used to be a tribe. A tribe just like most others.

Or maybe not as much as other tribes. Unlike other tribes these ones had been having a obsession of worshiping the animals of the jungle, or rather the animals of the jungle that had some extra weight put onto them. But since there wasn't many unnaturally fat amount of creatures in the wild, the tribe used to trick some animals into their city to have it feed to the limits, and later become more pudgy.

They did it to all kinds of animals like Elephants, Gorillas, Jaguars, Snakes, Bird, and much more. They did it since they thought the fatter the beasts where, the more luck they would bring.

But that proved to be very wrong, as only focusing on finding animals and feed them a lot leaved them open for other tribes to attack them. And that's just what happen. When the men of the tribe was out "hunting" animals to take back to the village, members from other tribes had sneaked in and killed everyone inside it. They then waited for the men to return before taking care of them to.

So now their spirits still haunts the place, and while they wont make any appearances for any humans walking around, they will come out when they notice any animals inside their area, and they will make sure to try and please them like the animals they had tried pleasing before, and make this place their home...for the rest of their lives!

Seeing the now very obese Elephant and Gorilla heading towards to exit the city wasn't something they where very pleased with, and they would make sure to keep them here. While their greatest powers where to make the air they breathed more fat filled, they did had the ability to momentarily make parts of their bodies "whole" instead of transparent. They knew that this would be enough if they did it in the right way.

As Tantor was walking and Terk was walking slightly in front of him, the ghost used it's moment to make it's hand visible and tap Terk on the back. Before Terk had a chance to look back and see the hand, the ghost made it invisible again, and that left the gorilla to think that it was Tantor doing it.

"What do you want?" She asked.

"I don't want anything." Tantor said, simply not knowing what had been going on.

"Then why did you have to tap me on the back with your trunk?" Trek asked, sounding a bit more annoyed this time.

"I haven't done anything with my trunk." Tantor said, even he starting to sound slightly annoyed.

Not feeling for having a any longer pointless arguing Terk moved behind Tantor, just to simply avoid being touched by his trunk.

But that's when the ghosts decided to change it up a little, and instead the ghost hand now took and grabbed the huge elephant's rump. (And like when it had touched Terk earlier, the gorilla female did notice when it's touched her elephant friend.)

It didn't take long time for Tantor to notice it, and he quickly turned around to face Terk. (And the ghost hand once again disappeared before any of them had time to see it.)

"And what was that!" He said, sounding more upset then he has ever been before.

"What was what?" Terk asked not knowingly. (But her way of saying it, made it sound like she was acting not knowingly.)

"You first pretend that I touched your back with my trunk, and then immediately after you take one of your big gorilla hands and grabs my butt!" Tantor shouted.

"I have not even looked at your big butt!" Terk said back.

"Not with your eyes, no." Tantor said.

"Is that the attitude you are giving me?" Terk asked angrily.

"You are the one to talk about attitude." Tantor said.

"If you don't like it we don't even have to walk together!" Terk said.

And just at that moment they reached a fork in the road. There was a left road, and a right road to choose from. The walls where to big to Tantor to look over, and Terk was to fat to climb over it.

"I think the left road should be the right one." Tantor said.

"And just because of that I think the right one is the correct one to pick." Terk answered back.

Since they both hated each other to no end at the moment they both decided to continue walk the road they picked. (Both to get out as quick as possible, and to also have to avoid walking with the other one.)

The ghosts loved this as it now meant that it would be much easier to keep them both trapped inside here forever.

155332222222222222112.content:
"Come on Sven," Kristoff said tiredly, "We need to haul more ice!" Kristoff was exhausted, he was now the kingdom's royal ice deliverer, and boy have the hours been tight. It was only his first week and he was already half asleep.
"Who knew so many people want ice after, y'know all that mess..." Kristoff laughed, Sven grunted an "I don't know" grunt. "C'mon buddy, a few more to go..." Kristoff hacked the ice with extreme strength with his pick axe, working hard cutting through the thick layer of ice that was the lake the buddies were standing on.
Sven on the other hand, had no reason to be tired, he was just plain lazy. He didn't care if the ice got back safe or not, he just wanted carrots.
As Kristoff hauled the last block of ice onto the sleigh, something snapped.
"Oh crap!" He gasped, running to the cause of the noise. "Aw man, looks like this...thingamabober came off...oh well, we'll fix it when we get back. Now run Sven!"
Sven galloped through the snow swiftly and gallantly for about 5 seconds. The sleigh began to tip over while he was running.
"Looks like that thingamabober was important after all." Sven's human companion wondered.
Then, BANG CRASH SMASH!
Kristoff and Sven went tumbling down a large snowy hill, sleigh and all.
When Sven regained consciousness, it was all a blur, all he remembered was falling down the hill then he was there, at the bottom of a large hill stuck in the snow.
Sven grunted annoyed, and struggled to get himself out from the snow but succeeded in the end. Sven's mild annoyance changed to worry when he didn't spot Kristoff anywhere in the debris of the sleigh. Sven began to freak out, but he realized it was almost nighttime so he had to find shelter quick.
A little ways away the reindeer found a small cave with blue ice coating the inside like a nice, blue lair. Sven wandered inside, peering at the frozen stalactites and stalagmites with awe. Sven ventured deeper into the den, hoping not to come across any bears or wolves already living inside. It seemed completely empty for the most part, the only exception of life in the cave was him. The reindeer soon realized he was hungry, and started to remember Kristoff bringing him carrots and such. Sven didn't dare go outside at an hour like this, something would for sure eat him before he eats. So he wandered the cave hoping to find anything edible, and then, there it was.
The most perfect glistening icy blue berries dangling on a branch above Sven's head. They almost seemed like they were glowing he was so hungry. Without hesitation, the reindeer kept into the air, teeth biting the branch, snapping it, and the reindeer falling on his bottom. At least he got the berries. Sven ate the berries in one sitting, they were horribly bitter, but at least it was something. Then the reindeer closed his eyes, and fell asleep.

"I can explain." Vixey said to Tod looking nervous.

Vixey belly continued to swish and wiggle with the tuna still in it. Tod noticed that.

"Uhh.... what's moving inside you?" Tod asked. Then he started to have a scared look on his face. "W..w...wait! Don't tell me your..."

"I went to this river to catch some fish. There was soooo much today. More than usual." Vixey said happily. "So I caught a whole bunch for us. But then I got hungry and ate them all. So to make up for it, I was gonna catch you this BIG tuna. Like HUGE tuna.... and I did. But then it was trying to get back to the water. One way or the other, I wasn't gonna it get away. So..... I picked the other. It right in here." Vixey said as she patted her belly. It still squirmed a bit.

Tod was a bit downfounded that Vixey had such an appetite.

"I'm really sorry." Vixey said. "I did tried to save you some."
"It's okay. You didn't have to go to so much trouble." Tod said. "I would have been fine with just one fish."

So Tod left Vixey to rest off the meal she just had. But he was still shocked to she a fox bloat up to be so fat. He hoped that Vixey would be fine with her extra weight.

It was still sloshing inside her, yet it didn't seem to bother her.

"Quite restless. Like the last one." Vixey stated.

Vixey rubbed her belly as she looked at it's overwhelming size. It felt that her belly was the size of 20 full grown foxes. Or at least had the stomach capacity of 20 foxes.

"Oh my. All this fish I've been eating is really taking it's toll on me." Vixey said.

Vixey then looked at the river. Other than the huge reflection she has now, she looked and still realized how much fish was still going down the river.

"Something is going on. There was NEVER this much fish before." Vixey said. "Once more, giant fish were never here either."

With that thought in mind, Vixey could take advantage of this and get even more fish. Or she could investigate what with all the fish all the sudden. Vixey decides to...
155332222222222222212211212212.title: Another giant fish.

1553322222222222222122112122121.content:
Vixey thought about it for a while and decided not to care why there are so many fish. All that matter was that there were still plenty to feast on. She knew that she was already quite large, but she didn't really care about that. A few more extra pounds wouldn't matter.

Vixey lean down as far as her belly could take her and started scooping up fish from the river. But unlike before, instead of piling the fishes up, she just swallowed them whole like a seal. Tuna, Yellowtail, Red Snapper, she caught all kinds of fish and each of them were fainted to go inside her belly. After eating about a hundred or so fish, Vixey finally stopped. She was also really REALLY full.

Vixey laid on her back again as she tries to rest from the meal that she just had. Her belly was sloshing like crazy. Clearly most of the fish inside her were still squirming around in there. It was like her belly was an aquarium.

Vixey's massive belly was like a round ball that a bear or two could fit inside. Her belly also had multiple folds around her lower waist. Her legs all had a extra layer of fat, looking closer to a thick tree branch. As for her face, she now spotted three chins and her cheeks were looking a big as two basketball. Vixey had gotten even huger than she was yesterday. If there never was a fox as big as Vixey is now, she would be the biggest now.

"Oh dear. I'm becoming quite a glutton." Vixey said as she rubbed her belly. Her belly jiggled like jello. It was still working on digesting her whole meal. "At the rate I'm going, I afraid to see how big I could be."

As Vixey laid there.....
1553322222222222222122112122121.title: Eat more fish.

15533222222222222221221121221212.content:
Vixey did a big yawn. All that eating was making her a bit sleepy. The light groaning from her stomach added to that.

"I think... I should get some... more rest... to digest." Vixey thought.

Vixey slowly drifted to sleep as her colossal belly swayed left and right. Still filled with the many fish from her feast. A while later, Vixey....
15533222222222222221221121221212.title: Vixey was getting sleepy.

155332222222222222212211212212122.content:
Vixey had slept for nearly a whole day. She had just woke up from her food coma. Eating so much fish has cause her to have quite a blobby body and massive stomach. It was big enough to hold a family of bears. Swifting her body a bit, she tried to stand on her belly.

"Oh my. I really have put on quite a bit." Vixey said as she rubbed her belly. "I should have better control of myself."

Control was already out the window. As her stomach grown, so did her hunger. Her belly was growling loudly. She had digested her last feast and now she was hungrier than ever.

"Oh dear. Hungry again." Vixey said to herself.

She looked at the river and sees it's still overwhelmed with fish. Even some more giant ones.

"Still quite bountiful, I see. Well then, with all this belly, might as well fill it up... and then some." Vixey said patting her belly and licking her chops.

Vixey then started fishing once more. Pulling out giant fish that was 3 times the size she used to be. She just shallow them whole like before. Due to experience, it was easier for her now. She relentlessly caught fish after fish and they were fated to resign and her ever growing belly. It didn't matter if each one was bigger than the last. She ate and ate and after bloating up to twice her size....
155332222222222222212211212212122.title: Woke up hungry again.

choices: To still eat and go nearly all out.
1553322222222222222122112122121221.content:
Even with the many fish already squirming inside her belly, the ever growing gluttonous vixen still consumed more and more. Fishing out a massive tuna three times the size of a fox, she made quick work of it. A large salmon, also now inside her belly. Even a catfish closer to the size of a human was doomed to be shallowed whole by Vixey.

Hundreds of fish were now in the titanic belly of vixen. After eating a countless amount, Vixey was no doubt the biggest animal in the forest. Her belly reached higher than most trees in the area. As she eats one more fish, she rubbed her belly filling fuller than she ever had. Yet satisfied.

"Ohhhhh. All that fish was so good. So.... stuffed." Vixey said to herself. She also feels her stomach churning up her meal and converting all she ate into more fat. "I can already feel me digesting everything. Maybe I've gone too far with all the eating."

Vixey had a point. At the rate she was going, she might even fill up the entire forest with her fat. Yet, Vixey didn't hate the idea. After thinking, she decided....
1553322222222222222122112122121221.title: She still ate more.

His once angular face had rounded out giving him chubby cheeks, the beginnings of a second chin and a thicker neck. His once loose jumpsuit now thightly clung to his stomach, one of the belts going as far to creak whenever he bent slightly. His chest was now being squeezed by the tightening fabric of the suit. 1553322222222222222222111.title: Rocket's explosive weight change

choices: He could feel himself getting heavier.
15533222222222222222221112.content:
Rocket thought back to 7 hours ago. He and the rest of the guardians were on the trail of a nafarious villain that went by the name "The Chef." He was known for going to planets with the early stages of life and harvesting anything on them; plants, animals and the occasional rock, and then cook it. This was extremely damaging to any emerging life so they had to put a stop to it.
They landed on a planet know only as DHC8T2A, a young life bearing planet. And judging by the trail of destruction nearby their landing zone, the newest victim of The Chef. Following the relatively simple path to a seemingly complex cave system the guardians decided to split up with the intention of calling the others if they found The Chef.
Rocket went down his path and within half an hour picked up a strange scent, he followed the scent to a dead end...but his keen eyes saw small scratch marks on the ground and he was able to push a boulder away from the wall and reveal a small, but well lit, hidden passage.
Stepping into the chamber that the passage led too Rocket came face to face with The Chef. The Chef was a small, only a head taller than rocket, fluffy neon orange monkey like creature with 3 eyes. Around the chef were various plants and animals, a large sack, a bubbling cauldron, and a roaring fire. How he was ventilating Rocket would never know/
"Ah, a new critic to taste my wonderful delicacies!" The creature said with a smile, revealing his large fangs.
"The only thing I'm going to be tasting is whatever the hell I buy after getting the money for busting you, you murderous scumbag!" Rocket replied, pulling out one of his trusty weapons.
The Chef merely grabbed a handful of green powder from his sack and threw it into rocket's face. Rocket's eyes watered and then he sneezed but besides that nothing unusual happened.
"The hell was that?" Rocket asked. Only to be brought to his knees a moment later by the most intense hunger he had ever felt in his life. His mouth started to water as his nose suddenly picked up all sorts of smells he didn't notice at first. He took a couple steps towards the cauldron. "What...what are you making?" He asked, letting go of the weapon he was holding.
"Just some stu." The Chef grinned. "Want some?"
"Yes!" Rocket cried, getting ready to get on his knees and beg for it.
The Chef took out a large ladle and a large wooden bowl and served it up for Rocket.
It was the best thing he had ever tasted.
"This is the best thing I've ever tasted!" Rocket exclaimed, quickly gulping down that serving and two more.
The Chef was very eager to serve Rocket, and he did so with much gusto before the rest of the Gaurdians arrived and quickly shut down his kitchen.
Rocket laid there craddiling his engorged stomach. He stifled a belch and slowly stood up and followed the others out of the cave and towards the ship. However; he would stop every few feet to sample some plant life. When the others noticed this Groot had to pick him up and carry him the rest of the way; but not before Rocket broke off a piece of Groog and sampled it.
Now standing in front of the mirror Rocket knew two things. One; that he had gained weight. And Two;...
15533222222222222222221112.title: The Chef

15533222222222222222222221112.content:
"May I have this dance?" Belle said to Beast while staring into his beautiful eyes.
Beast hesitated. "Y-yes, yes you may." Beast nervously stammered. And just like that- Beast and Belle fell in love. Or was it so? Let's continue the 'REAL' story.
Beast and Belle started to waltz to Ms. Potts's singing. Just then-
BWOOOOP.
Beast realized something. He suddenly became nervous. He looked at his paw and realized...it was swelling up! So was the rest of his body. He broke free from the iconic dance and rushed to his room. He checked his face, body, paws, and legs, in the broken mirror right before him. He definitely was swelling up. And badly. He realized slowly but surely he was going to become a beastly blob. So he-
15533222222222222222222221112.title: The curse is getting stronger and evolving

155332222222222222222222211122.content:
On second thought...Beast ran to his kitchen as fast as he could. He was growing all the way. His stomach churned.
He got to the kitchen. He saw his trusty right-hand clock Cogsworth. Lecturing the kitchen tools on something. Beast's stomach frowned as he saw a HUGE meal set out on the main dining table. "*gasping* Cogsworth, I-*gasp* need...*wheeze* food...*sigh* Without another word, Beast sat down at his far end of the table. Cogsworth realized that there was something...off about his master. Beast's noticeable, small, belly was poking out from underneath his fine-clothes, Beast's cheeks had bloated up like small golf balls, his paws WERE a lot puffier. His legs and arms started collecting a little flab as well.
"Well," Beast panted, still catching his breath. "I NEED FOOD!"
Beast's roar blew the servants away a bit. Normally, Cogsworth would question Beast's appetite and pudgier figure. "Alright...." Cogsworth reluctantly said to the fellow servants.
Plates upon plates of food were balanced upon the servants's (what used to be of their) heads. They marched into Beast's mouth knowing something was brewing.
155332222222222222222222211122.title: HAD to eat something. He was starved!

1553322222222222222222222111221.content:
Plates upon plates, upon plates, upon plates, of food were prepared for Beast's hungry outburst. The plates of food started marching into Beast's mouth in a Disney-like fashion. Pork, cheese, chicken, beef, bread, bubbling pots of fondue, you name it! Beast was being treated well.
Without realizing Beast had been gaining more and more every time he took a bite. His shyer pot-belly was transforming into a sea of flab that would hang down touching his feet. Beast had closed his eyes the whole time during this feeding. His cheeks were becoming puffier due to his fat, his butt started to grow as well.
"Mmmore....mmmmooore!" Beast stammered while getting food semi-forced down his throat. The food was coming faster now, and Beast was munching it all down very quickly. Crumbs and food were falling into his mane. He grunted and snorted every time he was given a piece of his meal.
Eventually Beast told everyone to stop in order to try and bring his flabby gut onto the table. It was VERY heavy and it was dripping over the sides as well.
Beast finally said-
1553322222222222222222222111221.title: During the feeding

15533222222222222222222221112212.content:
"MOOOOOORE!!!" The Beast roared. Cogsworth was extremely frazzled with this, he didn't know if they could get any faster, and his master any fatter. Truth was, they both could.
Beast was being treated at an alarming rate. He was fed 12 dishes at a time. And it did have a massive impact as well as the curse making Beast into a- well, a beast.
Beast's stomach had started to be filled with food as it sagged underneath the table, inflating every step of the way. Soon the table was lop-sided because of the Beast's girth. Soon enough Beast started to panic. What if Belle never loved him for being an almost 5,000 monster. His worries came to an end when his chair finally gave away. Beast landed on his back, but was soon inflated onto his two bouncing bubbles of a rump. His stomach was going to grow larger than the table any second. Beast's cheeks were almost so big he couldn't see past them. His legs have been slowly reciting into his gluttonous whale of a body, same with his arms, (that he couldn't even move anymore, they just hung there, they got flabbier but not any bigger), and his neck. Which had been replaced with 7 chins. Beast knew he was gonna be bigger than the castle soon.
15533222222222222222222221112212.title: BRING ME MOOOORE!

155332222222222222222222211122121.content:
Belle had grown sick of waiting. She knew something must of been wrong. But still, she didn't 100% trust her monstrous captor yet. She knew Zane hadn't seen Beast run to the West Wing, so maybe she should check it out.
When she arrived after 100 flights of stairs, she followed the welcoming glow of a sparkling rose. Of course she touched the glass it was trapped inside. Then she removed the shell. And touched it for herself. Then-
BAAAAAAANG!
A huge flash of light, Belle saw that her skin was disintegrating into fur. And her nose started to grow into a muzzle, a tail ripped through her dress, and her ears started to go to the top of her head. She was a wolf-person.
155332222222222222222222211122121.title: Back to Belle

choices: The Beast grows bigger than the castle
155332222222222222222222211122122.content:
The Beast had finally stopped his meal. He realized he was massive. His beastly appetite had gotten the best of him. The Beast tried will all his might to get up. But he couldn't. He was immobile. How was he ever going to get back to Belle? And what would she do if she saw him like this?

All of a sudden, Beast began to swell up again because of the curse. He moaned and groaned. Trying to get it to stop but he couldn't.

He began to swell larger than the table and break the dining hall table in the process. Servants screamed and ran out of the room in a hurry. They used themselves to block the doors to make sure he wouldn't crash through.

Beast's stomach was pressing against the walls in the front while his ass smoothing him in the back with the Beast's face lodged in the middle of the two. His ass began running out of room and creeping up the wall behind him, smoothing his head down. His belly was inflating wider and taller as well, making the only thing the Beast could see brown fur. The Beast's overinflated arms and legs stuck out to the side like useless sausages. They were useless at this point, far too heavy to move.

The Beast filled up the entire dining room within 10 minutes. The room at it's maximum limit. The walls and ceilings to the point of bursting. Until-

CRAAAAASH
BOOOOOOOOOM

The Beast had exploded out of the dining room, his belly expanding more quickly than ever throughout the rest of the castle while his bare ass stuck out of the castle itself. It was freezing outside. The Beast's ass jiggled as the cold wind smacked it around.
155332222222222222222222211122122.title: One Big Beast

choices: Beast bursts out of the castle and grows more
1553322222222222222222222111221221.content:
The Beast continued to grow; only making it harder for everyone in the castle, including himself. His body continued to shake and ripple with endless amounts of gelatin as he expanded outwards with more flab.

Cogsworth and Lumiere were exasperated. They kept bouncing ideas off of one another but they knew nothing would work to keep the Beast contained.

"Maybe, just maybe zee girl vould do ze trick?" Lumiere's question more of a statement at this point. All Cpgsworth did was nod and run as fast as his small, wooden legs could carry him to the dance hall.

Lumiere heard the wall creaking again. It sounded like a massive stomach growl mixed with the splintering noise of wood breaking apart. And Lumiere knew that he had to make this Beast his guest.

Beast had broken through the ceiling above him, his fattened head could see the rose in all it's glory. He knew that if he snatched it, it would be safe from his gluttonous fate. Maybe it would even reverse this travesty. But alas, Beast's head was only sticking through the floor, he knew he had to grow bigger to be able to reach it.

CREEEEEAAAAK

The wall in front of him bended comically with the size of his pool-sized stomach in front of him. He could also feel the frostbite on his buttcheeks outside, they constantly jiggled due to the wind being blown around. Some of the wind was from outside, some of it his own. The Beast let out a painful roar as he felt himself expand quicker than before. His belly surging through the wall in front of him and into the main hall. It quickly filled up space and it seemed to effortlessly absorb furniture/servants into its mighty bulk. Beast felt his ass grow and flap in the wind behind him. He felt like a machine gun of gas. Belching and farting often. His ass doubled, tripled its size before it had begun to weigh him down. Sticking out of the castle were two massive, rippling globes that seemed to be expanding.

Beast's girth had overflown the whole castle at this point. And the castle's brittle shell was ready to burst.

15533222222222222222222221122111.content:
"Step into the light." Belle began, she couldn't bare her father locked in a cage in this monster's castle. "Step into the light." She repeated, a bit more firmly.
The 6'5 shadow drew near to her, revealing a terrifying Beast.
His face was of that of a mutt, his body of a bear, and legs of a slobbering wolf.
He was a hideous sight. She couldn't imagine what this hulking creature could do to her Papa. But the creature's main asset was his plump belly stretching outwards and down. It jiggled with every step he took closer to her.

"I will take my Papa's place." Belle spoke strongly to the monster.
The Beast scowled, "Fine, take him to the village." He demanded two gargoyles to take him away. Belle reached out to her Papa but didn't even get to say goodbye.

The Beast dragged her through the long hallways and winding spires of the castle until he showed her the room she would be staying in.
Belle creaked open the door, it was a quaint room, but a nice one. Tapestries hung on the walls of royalty and mythical creatures.
"Now I expect you to be down for dinner in an hour, that is not a request it is a requirement. Do not disobey my orders otherwise I'll throw you in the dungeon. Do you understand?" The Beast spoke sternly to Belle as he stared her down, then he slammed the door behind him.

Belle cried, first her Papa now a monster has imprisoned her?! Then a kind voice spoke:
"Cheer up dear, things aren't always as bad as they seem." She spun around to see a teapot smiling at her.
"W-who are you?!" Belle gasped, "You're a teapot...and you're talking!"
The teapot giggled, "I'm Mrs Potts dear, now I hope we'll be friends, but in just a few minutes the master expects you to be down for dinner. So we better get you dressed."
Just then, a very large wardrobe waltzed her way to Belle and Mrs Potts,
"Madame de la grande Bouche darling, pleased to meet you." She spoke in a loud booming voice, but nowhere near as loud as the Beast who ran the castle.
"Now, let's get you dressed, aha this dress used to fit me, let's see if it fits you..." Madame threw a humongous baggy dress onto Belle, it probably could fit a cow.
"Aha perfect!" Madame sang.
Belle stared at the dress, it was so large it covered her feet. "Now, Madame I'm afraid this dress is far too big."
Madame laughed, "Of course it is! Every night the master expects you to eat every single morsel on your plate, the dress will fit perfectly when you're done with dinner.
Belle didn't really know what that meant, but before she could speak Madame pushed her out the door.
"Good luck honey!"
And before Belle knew it she was sitting at an overflowing table filled with food as she stared at the Beast.
15533222222222222222222221122111.title: "Step into the light"

choices: Belle runs all the way back to her room
Belle finds something on the way to her room
155332222222222222222222211221111.content:
The Beast stared her down as he ate, she could tell that he was trying to eat properly to impress her but he was failing at that task.
Belle picked up her fork and pretended to eat some of the escargot on her plate so the monster wouldn't have a fit.

Belle just stared at him, he was eating more piggishly now, he ate with both of his hands, food and grease covering his face. He reached out and stuffed some cake into his maw, he was eating quickly and sloppily.
Lumiere realized what was going on so he rallied the troops from the kitchen and sent them to the dining room to stuff the Beast in the form of an assembly line.
The Beast opened his mouth wide as plates upon plates of food were dumped down his throat.
The Beast groaned with gluttony, he rubbed his swelling tummy as the food slid down his throat. He was beginning to plump up quite nicely, his cheeks becoming the size of large oranges as he chewed. He grabbed his gut and plopped it on the table so it would be more comfy. It had taken up more than half of the table at this point, and it was still growing. His ass was swelling as well and riding up the chair behind him.

Belle stared at him in awe as he continued to gorge himself, she couldn't take any more of it. She slowly got up from her chair and left.

"BRRRAAAAAAAP!" The Beast belched, "Where do you think you're going?!"
"Far away from here!" Belle yelled back at the overweight Beast, then she ran off.
155332222222222222222222211221111.title: One Hungry Beast

As the two dastardly eels flicked around a corner with ease, fish scrambled for cover. Flotsam and Jetsam hadn't eaten anything all day, they weren't fast enough to catch anything good, and their hiding tactics were deeply flawed. Until-
"Brother, what issss that sssspectacular blubber barrel?" Jetsam hissed. Eyeing a morbidly obese shark.
"My, my..." Flotsam cooed. "What a ssscrumptious ssssight!" He slimily explained.
"Brother, ssshall we?" Jetsam started
"We ssshall..." Flotsam evilly smirked.
The two slimy water-snakes glided through the water to meet the monstrous morsel.
"Hello..." Flotsam trailed off.
"Before you say anything...I will eat you in an instant before you can even trick me," the fat shark started with a deep-booming voice.
"Whatever do you mean?" Jetsam laughed, sharing knowing looks with his brother.
"You two, I know you two, you work for the sea witch!" The whale-sized monstrosity boomed
"Sssooo?" Jetsam chuckled. "You don't seem to be catching anything with all that...fat of yours." He continued, his voice greasy and pleading, he changed the topic with little to no ease, but the shark seemed to fall for it.
"Y'know you two would catch much more if you were big-boned like me, fish just sit on 'ya, like your a rock, than BAM! Lunch..." The beastly shark started to very slowly drift away without a care, leaving the eels dumbfounded.
"Fat? Is that the sssecret to ssucssesss?" Flotsam questioned no one in particular.
"It mussst be brother, you sssaw how content he wasssss. We mussst assssk Ursssala at once!" Jetsam, without waiting for his brother, quickly jetted through the bright waters down into the depths of Ursala's cave.
"So, you two want...fat?!" Ursala loudly questioned. "There certainly is nothing wrong with it, but you two must keep thin! You two are my...hmm...helpers. Are you not?"
"Your highnesss, I completely agree, but if we had more fat, we would possibly be able to devour the whole ocean, with King Triton inssside..." Jetsam hummed, he smiled.
"Hmm, yes, yes, that does sound very nice, very nice indeed...fine, but don't come crawling to me once you realize you're poor unfortunate souls."
Ursala stated, and just like that she was at her old tricks again, chanting a spell over a boiling hot cauldron, making a potion.
"Seems a bit traditional, but it'll work." Ursala always said when doing stuff like this.

1553322222222222222222222221111.content:
Chief Bogo slammed his forehoof down on his desk, and leaned forwards, raising his voice at the small grey bunny sitting in the chair across from him, looming over her to increase his menace and, of course, show he was serious.

"YOU heard me, Hopps! And yes, I am COMPLETELY serious!"

Judy sat stunned and stared at her new boss. She couldn't believe what she'd just heard. "But...why?" she inquired.

"Listen to me, there is absolutely no way you would be able to take down ANY crooks, not like that. They'd knock you away like a bloody plush doll!" Chief Bogo shouted, aggressively. "It is a requirement, you must weight AT LEAST 500 pounds, or else you'll end up losing a little weight." He tapped the gleaming badge on his own chest. "About two and a half ounces, to be exact. Understand?"

After staring for a second, Judy straightened herself up. "Yes, Chief. I do, Chief."

The Chief nodded once. "Good. Now get outta my sight."

Judy got up, and walked out of the Chief's office. As she was leaving, she inhaled deeply, and sighed. She knew what was going on. Nobody liked that there was a bunny on the force, and Bogo figured if he gave her an impossible task, it'd be the easiest quickest way to get her out of his building, permanently. Judy groaned in defeat. Then she thought... all her life, she was told her ambitions were impossible. But she proved everyone wrong, and worked past it all. She showed her parents, she showed Gideon Grey, and she'd show Chief Bogo.

"If he wants me to weigh five hundred pounds..." she muttered to herself, as she marched off with a new spring in her step. "I'll weigh a thousand. At least."
1553322222222222222222222221111.title: Early in the movie (she gains alone)

choices: "if you think it'll work, I suppose we could try it."
1553322222222222222222222221112.content:
"Hopps and Wilde, see me after the meeting."

Both Judy and Nick winced as Chief Bogo called them out during the morning briefing. They'd had yesterday's case locked up, or so it seemed - stopping a simple heist at the bank. Nick's driving skills and Judy's ability to keep a tail on the getaway car were enough for them to be there when it careened into a fire hydrant and lost a vehicle. When the robbers themselves - an elephant and a hippo - slowly started taking off on foot, the cops had gotten cocky and pursued on foot instead of waiting for backup. Once they'd cornered the two huge animals in an alleyway, it seemed like a routine arrest... until the hippo simply body-slammed Nick as he approached with a Taser, knocking the fox out against a wall. Judy put up a fighting chance against the elephant, but he'd managed to take every blow she could give - it was like taking on a pile of bricks. Exhausted, she crumpled down next to Nick, who was just coming to, as Officer McHorn and the rest of the cavalry arrived and made short work of the robbers.

So when they arrived at Bogo's office just after the meeting's end, they expected to get reamed out. Bogo was surprisingly civil to them - mostly because he had an offer.

"Hopps, Wilde, don't get me wrong. You're two of the better officers on this force by far. But instances like yesterday simply cannot happen. Not only did you almost compromise your case, but you both were at huge risk. Judy, Nick, I understand you're two of our smallest patrollers by far, but I'm not sure I can allow you to continue putting yourselves in danger. Judy, your poor parents are emailing me every third day, asking for you to go back on parking duty. And I might need to do that -" he was cut off by the rabbit's combination of screaming and moaning - "unless you're willing to work with me here."

Judy was still shocked by the prospect of parking duty, so Nick followed up. "What's your idea, Chief?"

"We've got to make you two bigger. Sturdier. Able to take some hits. And I think... well, I've thought about putting you on a workout plan, but I don't think either of you can bulk up like our cat officers. But, speaking of cats, I remembered that time Clawhauser was the only person in the lobby when that bear went savage, and he was able to wrestle him down surprisingly easily for a cat of his size. And that might be a viable solution."

Nick and Judy were confused. "I'm not sure I follow," Judy said.

"Look, I'm gonna pull you off the force for a few weeks, and I can't believe I'm saying this, but I want you two to get fat," the water buffalo replied. "It'll give you extra cushion in fights, it'll stop you from being pushed around so much... it could work. If it doesn't, we'll try something else. But please give it a shot."

Nick and Judy were still just as confused. The three sat in silence for an uncomfortably long time, until Judy finally said...
1553322222222222222222222221112.title: After the movie (both she and Nick gain)

choices: Time-skip to see how things are going
15533222222222222222222222211121.content:
Both Nick and Judy were still unsure about the idea - to say the least - but it seemed better than parking duty. "Chief, if you think it'll work, I guess we can try it," Judy said.

"Wonderful. Thank you for understanding. I've already approved both of you for a month of paid time off the normal force. I've already informed Clawhauser of the situation, and he was willing to help, so report to him in the time being. You're dismissed."

As the fox and rabbit walked from Bogo's office to the front desk, they discussed what they'd just agreed to. "Carrots, this is the best job I've ever had and I want to keep it, but I can't wrap my head around this thing," Nick said. "What do they expect us to do? And are you really OK with getting huge?"

"Well, it does seem strange," Judy replied. "Really strange. But Bogo actually likes us. He would have reamed us out if he didn't. So I'd rather stay in his good graces, even with as weird as this idea is. And hey, a month of free PTO? A slacker like you can't turn that down," she said with a grin.

Nick smiled back. "Well, you've got me there," he said. "Let's just hope this works."

The two arrived at Clawhauser's desk, where the cheetah was beaming. "Chief told me about the plan! I'm so excited! This is going to be so much fun!", the big cat said.

"Wait, you're excited about this?", Judy asked.

Clawhauser laughed. "Of course, silly! For the next month I get paid to hang out and eat nonstop with my two favorite members of the force! What's not to love?"

"Speaking of which, what exactly is the plan?", Nick said.

The cheetah responded by pulling out two boxes of donuts. "Well, for starters, we're going to sit and chat while you two each finish one of these boxes," he said. "You might be surprised to learn there's some fun to be had at this size. Plus, who doesn't love chowing down?"

It took each of the animals a seeming eternity to choke down their boxes of donuts. Clawhauser had gotten them from one of the boutiques for larger animals, so each one was nearly the size of Judy's head. Both Nick and Judy couldn't deny how tasty each sweet was - Boston Creme, chocolate glazed, blueberry cream and vanilla-caramel blend, to name a few - but the rabbit was already full after her third, and Nick was full up after his fifth. Clawhauser wasn't about to let things end there, as each leaned back in their chairs and rubbed their bellies.

"Chief didn't give me time off for nothing! You're gonna keep going!", the cheetah said, and with each flabby paw he grabbed two more donuts out of the box and shoved them into his friends' faces. Begrudgingly, Judy and Nick kept chewing and chewing, cajoled into it by the cheetah's insistence.

By the end of the day, the boxes were empty and the small mammals had never been more stuffed. Both of their stomachs left outlines against their uniforms, which had tightened slightly around their waists. Almost sleepwalking with exhaustion as they began to meander home, they cringed when Clawhauser called out after them, "we're doing milkshakes tomorrow!"

1553322222222222222222222221212121.content:
It was a sunny morning in Zootopia. In Nick's messy apartment, he was still sleeping in his bed. He had the day off so be didn't have to be in a hurry to wake up. Yet, sunlight hit his face, telling him to wake up.

"*yawn* Alright sun, I'm up." Nick said still a bit groggy.

Nick gets out of his covers and stretches a bit. Nick only wearing a pair of green boxers. He gets out of the bed to start his morning routine by looking at himself at the mirror in his room.

"Hello, handsome. How are you toda....." Nick said as he looks at himself and stops when he took a good look. He realized something was up.

Nick noticed that he had a bit of... pudge around his body. His gut was more out than usual, his arms and legs had some thickness to them, and his face had some puff to it. It was obvious that Nick wasn't his usual skinny self. He was now quite chubby. Nick freaked out a bit.

"What the? When did this happen?" Nick shouted out to himself.

He then pokes his belly and see that it jiggles a bit.

"How did I end up like this?" Nick asked. "Okay. Let me think. What did you had the last month? There was the ZPD Banquet. Then your folks' Congratulations Party on being the first fox cop with your relatives. Mom also made blueberry pie. You had four slices. The buffet place with Judy. Donuts with Clawhauser. Those baked goods from that Gideon Grey. Then the...."

Nick finally realized how much extra eating he has been doing around the past month. It's no wonder he's put on weight.

"Well that explains it." Nick said. "Now... what to do?"

Since it was Nick's day off.Nick thought it would be a good time to exercise and attempt to lose the pounds.

Nick decided that it was time to do some exercising. He put on a ZPD shirt and some workout pants. He had some trouble putting his shirt on. It felt a little tight.

"Come on. My weight can't be that bad." Nick said as he struggles with pulling his suit down his belly. But he was able to do it. "Finally."

Nick started by doing some basic exercises. A few jumping jack, some hard push-ups and some really tough sit-ups. Nick was really having some problems exercising due to his weight. He was getting out of breathe.

"*pant**pant* Need a break." Nick said to himself.

Nick sat on a chair and wiped his sweat off with a rag. Then a loud growl came from his stomach. He was hungry. He did happen to not eat breakfast yet.

"Ugh! Not healthy to workout on an empty stomach." Nick thought rubbing his stomach. "I better eat."

Nick looked in his fridge and see that it was empty like his stomach.

"Guess I forgot to go shopping again." Nick thought.

So it seem that he had to go out for breakfast. Nick decides to get a...

15533222222222222222222222212121221.content:
It's been months since Nick Wilde was now assigned as a police officer of Zootopia. It not changed his life, but also the way he's living. Instead of "hustling" with his once good-friend Finnick and selling popsicles, he now solves crime and captures criminals, something he actually never thought of doing. He even now lives in an apartment (thanks in large part to the help of Judy Hopps), instead of living underneath that bridge. Life's great for him...or is it?

For Nick, being a cop was a little more difficult than he imagined. Whenever he was hunting down criminals or solving cases with either Judy or even a different cop, he come home to his new apartment feeling bushed, even tiresome. On to the point where he was just exhausted. The poor 4 foot fox dragged his 80 pound body on the couch.

"Too...tired...to get...myself...up" Nick said as he grabbed a hold of the cushion. With all his might he lifted himself up on the couch and hyperventilated after.

"Cheese and Crackers, Rabbit." he thought to himself after catching his breath, "Whataya doing to me? It was your idea that I would be like you! I mean...I go and take out animals who break the law whether it's a robbery, vandalism or illegal soliciting, I just wanna take a break. More than just one day every week, Like..."

Then he had an idea flicker out of his head, "Yeah, that's it." he continues while looking at a picture of him with Judy photobombing it. "I need a vacation."

He gets off the couch and heads over to the photo of them and behind it is a cruise liner, "Oh Carrots you make the dumb fox smarter every time I look at you photobombing my picture."

"In fact I think I may have heard about through..."
15533222222222222222222222212121221.title: "I Need a Vacation."

choices: Buys a Cruise Ticket Online for Himself.
155332222222222222222222222121212212.content:
Earlier at ZPD, Nick was over by the breakroom treating himself to a donut and a cup of coffee while Clawhauser was approaching him.

“Hey, how’s ZPD’s first fox cop doing?” to which the said corpulent cheetah responded with.

“About to start another long day with Carrots.”

“Carrots?” As Clawhauser was picking up a usual box of donuts.

“Judy.” said Nick after taking a bite of his donut.

“Oh. I get it.” Clawhauser picked up a advertisement for Colossal Cruises, “Even I’m getting a little pushy too despite how nice and generous I am. How about you and I, Nick. We take some time off and go on a cruise. We can eat, drink and relax, and have the best time of our lives”

Nick was almost lost in Clawhauser’s words because he was too busy eating his breakfast until he said, “By eating meaning stuffing yourself some more? I mean no offense at all but don’t you feel relaxed about your job?”

“Most times, yes but...do you know anything can come in your way at any point? Sometimes these animals come up to me screaming Bloody Mary about who knows what, so let me rephrase myself and say...no. I barely feel relaxed.”

“Well, thank you for the offer big boy but I’ll have to think about it in the meantime.” He takes a couple more donuts to satisfy himself, “If I change my mind, I’ll let you know. Otherwise, I hope Chief can allow you to have your own little personal fridge and microwave at the front desk.”

Walking out of the breakroom and into the hallway he thought to himself, “He’s gonna come back more than TWICE, if not THREE TIMES his size.” He was finishing the rest of his donuts and coffee before heading out for the day.

Back at the apartment, Nick realized what he said to Clawhauser might have been a mistake. Maybe he did need to go on cruise after all. The tired cop he was, Nick looked at himself in the mirror in his bathroom and he could imagine him as the size of Clawhauser, but not disgusted by it, accepting it. He was wearing sunglasses and a big blue Hawaiian shirt that would fit his new size. He would see Judy picking him up from the ferry docks and asking him if he was hungry? To which he said, “Always, Carrots. Hungry is my middle name.”

Feeling good after thinking about his future fat self, Nick...
155332222222222222222222222121212212.title: Clawhauser...earlier today.

Maybe spending some vacation time in Bunnyburrow and trying some of the food? Maybe ending up in a total binge-fest?
15533222222222222222222222212122.title: Both Nick and Judy.

15533222222222222222222222212211.title: the morning. when Benjamin wake up

choices: A morbidly obese Chief Bogo comes in
155332222222222222222222222122111.content:
Benjamin stretched and let out a mighty yawn, he was jovial and excited to be at work another day. When he looked around, he was already at work.
"I must of passed out last night." Said Benjamin, wiping away a pile of drool that filled his desk.
The cheetah noticed that boxes upon boxes of donuts were scattered throughout the office. None of them were in the trash can.
The chubby feline grabbed three donuts at once in his desk and shoved them into his maw.
"Mmm...now that I've had breakfast, I'm ready for work." He didn't question anything, the donuts everywhere, no one in the police station, and he didn't even seem to really care, he just sat there with an ecstatic smile on his pudgy face as he waited for someone to arrive.
And he waited, and waited, and waited, for three hours straight. But no one arrived.
"This is very odd..." The cheetah scratched his head with his claw in confusion. "No one's here!" It finally hit him, no one was in the office.
Thankfully, in case of extreme emergency, Chief Bogo left his phone number on the wall just in case something terrible happened, because the Chief didn't trust Clawhouser 100%.
So the wild cat picked up the phone at his desk and began to dial the number.
"555-555-5555" he repeated to himself, hoping not to screw up. Suddenly he stopped, "Oh no, what's the rest of the number? Oh yeah!"
"Chief Bogo, yeah this is Benny, I'm scared and confused and why is nobody here? Thank you. AHHHHHHHHH!" He screeched into the phone at last second, realizing something.
He was huge.
Well bigger than he was before.
His clothes were close to tearing off, his gut almost scraped the floor, his tail was dwarfed by the two massive jiggling orbs that bounced behind him every movement he made, his arms and legs were thicker like sausages, and his cheeks had grown as big as baseballs with a second chin to compliment it.
"How could it be? I'm fatter, then before!" The large cheetah tried to waddle out of his desk, but it seemed to close in around his girth, he didn't realize it, but his seat had broken a while ago so he was sitting on the floor while he was asleep. As much as he twisted and turned, he couldn't escape.
Suddenly-
155332222222222222222222222122111.title: Story 1

1553322222222222222222222221221111.title: A morbidly obese Chief Bogo comes in

15533222222222222222222222212212.content:
”Volkovoi and Clawhauser, you’re on surveillance,” the chief declared, cordially informing the new officer and the chubby veteran of their tasks for the day. Volkovoi was slightly disappointed. He was a wolf, and only a bit out of shape. He might have been in the lower-middle quintile of his class in fitness, but he could still run; and he seriously doubted that his partner would be able to. Officer Clawhauser’s uniform looked a bit tight on the cheetah, and the man’s face looked like pumpkin. Almost as soon as they were in the surveillance room, Clawhauser opened a box of donuts. But he paused for a moment before he offered Volkovoi the wolf’s pick ofthe donuts. Volkovoi went for a plain glazed; chocolate would make him stir-crazy and he knew it. The coffee alone already was.
         Clawhauser smiled and took a chocolate one. The two finished their first donuts, then their third—there were only six total—before Clawhauser spoke first. “So, Officer Volkovoi, that’s your name right? Good, what brings you here?” Volkovoi leaned back, stretched, and smiled. “Please, call me Ivan, Officer Clawhauser; you’re the superior here.” Clawhauser laughed openly at that, causing Volkovoi to stop and frown before Clawhauser interjected, “I’m sorry, that notion is too funny for me to entertain yet. No, this relationship will be friend-to-friend as long as I’m in charge.” Volkovoi smiled; his harsh features—his eyes, lips, chest—relaxed noticeably.
         ”But anyway, as I was saying, I’m here because I have experience with cyber-security,” Volkovoi smiled. He didn’t say anything further, but Clawhauser immediately understood what he had meant. “So you’re here because of a plea deal because they know that you’re a cyber-criminal?” Volkovoi winced, “I was.” Clawhauser laughed: “Donmt worry, man, your secret’s safe here. I’m here because I was once caught trying to wiretap the mayor’s office, back when I was young and fit.” Volkovoi laughed, but Clawhauser frowned and pulled out his phone. “Here,” Clawhauser showed the wolf a picture of a thin Cheetah who was unmistakably Clawhauser in the face. Was Clawhauser a photoshop God? But he was with someone, and you couldn’t really photoshop that too well.
         ”Damn,” Volkovoi laughed, “you really were!” Volkovoi looked at himself; he had a small little gut that formed when he sat. “I can’t ever really claim I was fit,” the wolf admitted finally. Clawhauser smiled, “I get it; life’s hard. Just smile and move on.” They turned to the cameras. All this surveillance; they were looking for someone. “So just who are we looking for?” Volkovoi asked. Clawhauser smiled. “I guess, here, familiarize yourself with these guys and help me look for them.” Clawhauser then handed Volkovoi a sheaf of about 20 pages or so of criminal records for various people. Volkovoi quickly looked through them, spending about a minute learning each of their names, faces, identities, etc. In the meantime Clawhuaser opned a family-sized bag of potato chips and placed it between the two of them.
         When he was done analyzing the files, Volkovoi noticed that Clawhauser had opened a bag of potato chips that he shared willingly with Volkovoi. Volkovoi smiled and took a pawful and took them while he looked for the suspects in the city security footage. It was mentally taxing work, and Clawhauser gave the wolf various tips on how to scan the cameras for faces methodically and not taxingly. Suddenly, Volkovoi noticed someone who looked suspiciously like one of the suspects on the wanted list. This guy, Evan Pasturefield, was a registered sex-offender who had violated parole and had been untracked since he had violated parole. Clawhauser huffed, “Look at that; his car even has the stereotypical look of a pimp car—what with the magenta custom wheels and everything. Call the Chief.”
         Volkovoi nervously picked up the phone and called the chief’s office number. One ring. Two rings. “Yes, Clawhauser, what is it?” “Ah, sir, this is Officer Volkovoi, we think—we think we found Evan Pasturefield—the one who violated parole.” Bogo snorted, “And where is he?” Volkovoi nervously looked at Clawhauser, who told him, “At the corner of, uh, 7th and Mongolia.” Clawhauser facepalmed himself, “I’m sorry, sir, 7th and Magnolia—Magnolia, not Mongolia. I misspoke, sorry, sir.” Bogo laughed, “Ivan, on my first day, I dipped my tie in my coffee. At least you didn’t do that. Wilde’s in the area; he’ll be on it in a minute.” And Bogo hung up. Volkovoi set the phone down gingerly. That was embarrassing. At least he hadn’t dipped his tie in his coffee.
         Volkovoi then realized he was parched, so he asked Clawhauser if he wanted anything to drink, and Clawhauser smiled. “I’ll have some Mountain Up if there’s any in the fridge. There was some in a 2-Liter in the fridge in the lounge—where the coffee is—that’s for general consumption.” Volkovoi nodded and trotted off to the lounge.
         When he arrived, Volkovoi found the fridge stocked with a panoply of 2-Liters of seemingly every variety of soft drink he knew of. He stood in front of the door before he noticed.
15533222222222222222222222212212.title: the evening. when he come home

155332222222222222222222222122122.content:
Officer Hopps stood beside Officer Volkovoi and smiled, “Are you going to stand there all day with the door open, or are you going to get something?” Volkovoi grabbed what he and Clawhauser wanted and stepped out of Judy’s way. Pouring what each wanted into his and Clawhauser’s tumblers, Volkovoi moved to put the drinks back in the fridge before he noticed Judy, who was standing indecisively at the fridge. “You’re letting all the cool air out, Officer Hopps,” Ivan tutted. Suddenly, Judy wheeled on Ivan and snapped, “So?” Ivan didn’t know what to say. The coldness of the response had stunned him. “Geez, lighten up.” Suddenly, Judy sprnag back and grabbed the wolf by his tie. She was obviously going for the throat, but the size mismatch was too much. Still, she managed to grab the back of the tie and pull as she came down, which started to choke Ivan. But Ivan gently pried Judy’s fingers off his tie and properly loosened it.
         ”Now, do be civilized, Officer Hopps,” Volkovoi smiled, genuinely this time. How, he wondered, could she take anyone down? He genuinely worried for her. If some predator got hold of her, he’d tear her to shreds. People said that was discriminatory, but wasn’t that just a fact of life? “I’m sorry if I offended you, Judy; but I was merely joking with you the same way you did with me. It’s a two-way street here.” Before she could respond, Volkovoi left.
         Back in the surveillance room, Clawhauser was smiling, “Look, Ivan, look! There’s a chase! Nick and a few others are chasing that bastard all over town.” But he didn’t need to explain because the wolf noticed immeidately what was going on. Ivan smiled. They had him. Suddenly, the fugitive took a sharp right an intersection and floored the accelerator. Following them on camera, Volkovoi had yet to figure out why the pig was only suddenly accelerating. The chase took a series of sharp lefts and right down a series of allies that Clawhauser and Volkovoi thought Nick nor Pasturefield was able to make, much less in rapid succession before they reached what appeared to be the beggining of a suburban cul-de-sac. Suddenly, it appeared that in the distance the pavement was moving. Why hadn’t someone riding with Nick shot at the bastard yet?
         Then the reason emerged: she was young—an antelope by look—and beautiful. But she had a gun to her head by one of the bastard’s stooges. He and the leopard were eating the chips like popcorn, Volkovoi realized. And they were nearing the bottom of the bag. Volkovoi smiled. It wasn’t even lunchtime. His focus then shifted back to the action. The pavement had in fact moved. And they were nearing the closing hole. “Wilde, your car isn’t gonna make it!” Volkovoi yelped into the radio. “Clawhauser, I’ll be fine. Are you ok?” Volkovoi rolled his eyes again. “It’s Volkovoi, but you’re not going to make it!” And the pig did, but Wilde’s car didn’t. The pig accelerated at just the right time. It was a science to him at this point, it seemed. Not hitting the parked cars in the turnaround was the scariest part of the whole encounter. But Wilde didn’t hit any of them.
         ”Geez, that guy’s nuts!” Ivan seethed to Clawhauser, who only smiled, “yeah, but he’s as good as the chief at practical skills. The chief’s only still the chief because Bogo can handle the paperwork of chiefdom.” Having finished the chips and checked his watch, Clawhauser smiled. “Wanna take a lunch break?” Volkovoi laughed, “You’re hungry after that? I’m about ready to vomit.” Ben laughed, “I get that; wait for the adrenaline to subside; then you’ll be hungry.” Surely enough, fifteen minutes later, Ivan’s stomach rumbled despite the offerings of a breakfast, donuts, and potato chips to it. “Those are carbohydrates,” Clawhauser explained, “they’re more for keeping you from going crazy with boredom than to fill you. Protein satisfies you; might I therefore recommend to you the borger place down the street? It’s synthetic meat—grown entirely in laboratories—but it’s still good enough to eat. They taste almost like the real stuff. And would you mind if we met up with Officer Lighthoof? He’s amusing.”

         It was apparent that the monicker “Lighthoof” was not exactly appropriate for the horse who sat across from Volkovoi at lunch. He was not only tall, but well muscled and well padded. His forearms and legs were massive—even by a horse’s standards—nor did the gut that spilled nearly to his lap when he sat indicate that he got a shortage of calories. He was older than both Clawhauser and Volkovoi, probably about middle-aged, but he was a quieter person than Clawhauser’s often bubbly personality. The two in combination were really quite something. Volkovoi would feed Lighthoof gossip, and Lighthoof would spin some very acidicly amusing sarcastic comments back about them. But that all stopped the moment the food arrived. At that moment, there was only the sound of eating. The bacon cheeseborger was phenomenal, and Officer Lighthoof quickly polished off a black-bean burger with a side of oatmeal and french fries. Having stifled a burp, Officer Lighthoof stretched and yawned.
         Volkovoi smiled. The two—and he laughed self-deprecatingly—and perhaps soon three fat police officers all sitting together made Ivan chuckle. “Boys,” Lighthoof smiled sleepily, “Can I crash with you for an hour or two? I need a good nap.” Clawhauser smiled, “Sure, Harry, that’s no big deal; your wisdom is much appreciated.”
         Having returned to the station unnoticed, the three slipped into the surveillance room just as the phone was ringing. Volkovoi picked it up, “Officer Volkovoi, sorry, sir, we just returned from lunch break.” Chief Bogo immediately whispered, “Listen, Volkovoi, you can’t go around making fun of Officer Hopps. She’s valuable for PR, and we can’t lose her. Do I make myself clear?” Volkovoi was now confused. “Sir, listen, if that was about this morning, sir, I apologized. It was a joke. She had made the same joke to me a few moments before.” Bogo sighed, “I get it. But my advice is to stay away from her. Treat her professionally, but stay away. The media will spin this as discrimination if she tells them to. I don’t know. Bye.” Bogo hung up. Volkovoi’s face fell. He couldn’t make a joke? What kind of environment was that?
         ”What was that all about?” the leoard asked pleasantly. “Nothing, just a congratulations,” Volkovoi smiled back, “I just don’t like congratulations. They have a tendency to expose me to being knocked flat on my ass.” Clawhauser sniffed it out immediately, “Did you harass Judy?” The wolf dipped his head, abashed at his co-worker’s emotional aptitude. “I made a joke to her, she tried to choke me by grabbing my tie, you know. So I pried her paws off my tie. She must’ve reported me.” Clawhauser frowned. “That doesn’t sound like Judy.” Volkovoi nodded and smiled wanly.
         He noticed Lighthoof’s stomach rising and falling slowly and deeply. He sat amusedly staring at the fleshy hill that quivered and shook a tiny bit with each breath. But the horse only breathed just barely audibly. “So what does he do?” Volkovoi asked Clawhauser. “He’s a security contractor who builds databases for criminals and tries to predict which ones’ll commit more crimes. We’re working on it as an alternative to bail.” Suddenly, the phone rings, and on the other end of the line is...

info.brief_description: Fat up animal character's from famous Disney movies.
info.description:
Make them fat.

These stories is mainly about the animal characters from different Disney movies and Tv-series. Human characters can be used as well, but make sure to keep the animal characters weight gain in focus.

I want this to just be about weight gain in first hand. Inflation or vore could be alowed if it is well writen, but only if you can't figure out anything else. Transformation could work too if it is in a movie where magic excist.

I also want the content to be kept PG, I want to imagine that these stories could take place in the movies, or be a sequel to one of them.

Things I wont allow in this!!!

Scat & Piss stuff!

Sexual Scenes.

Killing of a character in a gory fashion.
(Keeping it mild and/or true to the story of the film could be accepted.)

Characters with good stories so far...

Louis (Princess and the Frog) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Bagheera ((And Shere Khan)) (The Jungle Book) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Scat Cat (Aristocats) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Maximus (Tangled) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/cid/1687910

Koda (Brother Bear) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Vitani (The Lion King II: Simba's Pride) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Robin Hood (Robin Hood) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Tantor ((And Terk)) (Tarzan) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Stitch (Lilo and Stitch) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

Pegasus (Hercules) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-Character...

Rolly (From 101 Dalmatians: The Series) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-Character...

Roscoe and Desoto (Oliver and Company) http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1882452-Fat-Disney-Animal-character...

If you are running out of characters from a certain movie or TV-show you can always create your own character that would fit in the movie/TV-show's own universe.

You can also go and visit this great site to learn more about the characters that are on this story, or find ones that should have their own. http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/The_Disney_Wiki

If you would like to please rate and/or review it.

Update: It has finally happen people! We have now 1,000 chapters for this thing!!!

Thank you all so much for all your great ideas and supports to make this thing as big as it is!

Even more updates: This thing has of today reached over 20,000 views! It's really incredible how many that has wanted to come and see this.

Incredible updates: This item has now over 200,000 views in total from all it's chapters. It's just to unreal to believe that this is actually true.
